Illustration:[ay Eface]pray


O"_Gay en,thay ymay ittlelay Ook,bay danay owshay otay lalay
Atthay entertainay danay idbay eethay elcomeway all,shay
Atwhay outhay ostday eepkay oseclay utshay upay inay ythay east;bray
Danay ishway atwhay outhay ostday owshay emthay aymay ebay estblay
Otay emthay orfay ood,gay aymay akemay emthay oosechay otay ebay
Ilgrimspay etter,bay ybay ar,fay anthay eethay oray emay.
Elltay emthay ofay Ercy;may eshay isay oneay
Owhay earlyay athhay erhay ilgrimagepay egunbay.
Yea,ay etlay youngay amselsday earnlay ofay erhay otay izepray
Ethay orldway ichwhay isay otay ome,cay danay osay ebay ise;way
Orfay ittlelay ippingtray aidsmay aymay ollowfay Odgay
Ongalay ethay aysway ichwhay aintlysay eetfay avehay od._"tray

Aptedaday omfray OHNjay UNYANbay.

ethay igbay airchay

Ail-piecetay

Oflay danay Iay ordereday aay ansom-cabhay

Everyay oneay asway eryvay ind,kay especiallyay ethay officersay

I'veay eensay ethay imperialay amilyfay everalsay imestay

Yingtray otay etchskay ethay ay-stonegray ion'slay eadhay onay ethay allway

Ow,nay isthay isay illingfay taay ethay icepray

ethay eatsay

Ehay avedway ishay and,hay ocksay danay lalay

Isday isay inemay effaluntay

allsmay ephewnay

Illustration:[ay Istmaschray on'tway ebay Istmaschray ithoutway yanay esents]pray

Iay.

AYINGpLay ILGRIMSpay.


Istmas"Chray on'tway ebay Istmaschray ithoutway yanay esents,"pray umbledgray O,jay yinglay
onay ethay ugray.

It's"ay osay eadfuldray otay ebay oor!"pay ighedsay Eg,may ookinglay ownday taay erhay olday
essdray.

I"ay on'tday inkthay it'say airfay orfay omesay irlsgay otay avehay entyplay ofay ettypray ings,thay
danay otheray irlsgay othingnay taay "all,ay edadday ittlelay Y,amay ithway naay injureday
iffsnay.

E've"Way otgay atherfay danay othermay danay eachay other,"ay aidsay Ethbay ontentedly,cay
omfray erhay ornercay.

Ethay ourfay youngay acesfay onay ichwhay ethay irelightfay oneshay ightenedbray taay ethay
eerfulchay ords,way utbay arkenedday ainagay saay Ojay aidsay adly,--say

E"Way aven'thay otgay ather,fay danay allshay otnay avehay imhay orfay aay onglay ime."tay Eshay
idn'tday aysay Erhaps"pay ever,"nay utbay eachay ilentlysay edadday it,ay inkingthay ofay
atherfay arfay ay,away erewhay ethay ightingfay asway.

Obodynay okespay orfay aay inute;may enthay Egmay aidsay inay naay eredaltay one,--tay

You"ay owknay ethay easonray othermay oposedpray otnay avinghay yanay esentspray isthay
Istmaschray asway ecausebay itay isay oinggay otay ebay aay ardhay interway orfay everyay one;ay danay
eshay inksthay eway oughtay otnay otay endspay oneymay orfay easure,play enwhay ouray enmay earay
ufferingsay osay inay ethay yarmay. Eway an'tcay oday uch,may utbay eway ancay akemay ouray ittlelay
acrifices,say danay oughtay otay oday itay adlyglay. Utbay Iay maay aidafray Iay on't;"day danay Egmay
ookshay erhay ead,hay saay eshay oughtthay egretfullyray ofay lalay ethay ettypray ingsthay eshay
antedway.

Ut"Bay Iay on'tday inkthay ethay ittlelay eway ouldshay endspay ouldway oday yanay oodgay. E'veway
eachay otgay aay ollar,day danay ethay yarmay ouldn'tway ebay uchmay elpedhay ybay ouray ivinggay
atthay. Iay eeagray otnay otay expectay ythinganay omfray othermay oray you,ay utbay Iay oday antway
otay uybay Undineay danay Intramsay orfay yself;may I'veay antedway itay O__say ong,"lay aidsay
O,jay owhay asway aay ookwormbay.

I"ay annedplay otay endspay inemay inay ewnay usic,"may aidsay Eth,bay ithway aay ittlelay igh,say
ichwhay onay oneay eardhay utbay ethay earth-brushhay danay ettle-holderkay.

I"ay allshay etgay aay icenay oxbay ofay Aber'sfay awing-pencils;dray Iay eallyray eednay em,"thay
aidsay Yamay ecidedlyday.

Other"May idn'tday aysay ythinganay outabay ouray oney,may danay eshay on'tway ishway usay otay
ivegay upay everythingay. Et'slay eachay uybay atwhay eway ant,way danay avehay aay ittlelay un;fay
I'may uresay eway orkway ardhay enoughay otay earnay it,"ay iedcray O,jay examiningay ethay eelshay
ofay erhay oesshay inay aay entlemanlygay annermay.

I"ay owknay I__ay o,--teachingday osethay iresometay ildrenchay earlynay lalay ay,day enwhay
I'may onginglay otay enjoyay yselfmay taay ome,"hay eganbay Eg,may inay ethay omplainingcay onetay
ainagay.

You"ay on'tday avehay alfhay uchsay aay ardhay imetay saay Iay o,"day aidsay Ojay. Ow"Hay ouldway youay
ikelay otay ebay utshay upay orfay ourshay ithway aay ervous,nay ussyfay olday ady,lay owhay eepskay
youay otting,tray isay evernay atisfied,say danay orriesway youay illtay you'reay eadyray otay
yflay outay ofay ethay indowway oray y?"cray

It's"ay aughtynay otay et;fray utbay Iay oday inkthay ashingway ishesday danay eepingkay ingsthay
idytay isay ethay orstway orkway inay ethay orldway. Itay akesmay emay oss;cray danay ymay andshay etgay
osay iff,stay Iay an'tcay actisepray ellway taay "all;ay danay Ethbay ookedlay taay erhay oughray
andshay ithway aay ighsay atthay yanay oneay ouldcay earhay atthay imetay.

I"ay on'tday elievebay yanay ofay youay uffersay saay Iay o,"day iedcray Y;amay Or"fay youay on'tday
avehay otay ogay otay oolschay ithway impertinentay irls,gay owhay agueplay youay ifay youay on'tday
owknay youray essons,lay danay aughlay taay youray esses,dray danay abellay youray atherfay ifay
ehay isn'tay ich,ray danay insultay youay enwhay youray osenay isn'tay ice."nay

If"ay youay eanmay Ibel_,_lay I'day aysay o,say danay otnay alktay outabay Abels_,_lay saay ifay
apapay asway aay ickle-bottle,"pay isedadvay O,jay aughinglay.

I"ay owknay atwhay Iay ean,may danay youay eedn'tnay ebay Atirical__stay outabay itay. It'say
operpray otay useay oodgay ords,way danay improveay youray Ocabilary_,"_vay eturnedray Y,amay
ithway ignityday.

On't"Day eckpay taay oneay other,anay ildrenchay. On'tday youay ishway eway adhay ethay oneymay
apapay ostlay enwhay eway ereway ittle,lay O?jay Earday e!may owhay appyhay danay oodgay e'dway e,bay
ifay eway adhay onay orries!"way aidsay Eg,may owhay ouldcay ememberray etterbay imestay.

You"ay aidsay ethay otheray ay,day youay oughtthay eway ereway aay ealday appierhay anthay ethay
Ingkay ildren,chay orfay eythay ereway ightingfay danay ettingfray lalay ethay ime,tay inay
itespay ofay eirthay oney."may

O"Say Iay id,day Ethbay. Ell,way Iay inkthay eway e;aray or,fay oughthay eway oday avehay otay ork,way
eway akemay unfay orfay ourselves,ay danay earay aay ettypray ollyjay et,say saay Ojay ouldway ay."say

O"Jay oesday useay uchsay angslay ords!"way observeday Y,amay ithway aay eprovingray ooklay taay
ethay onglay igurefay etchedstray onay ethay ugray. Ojay immediatelyay atsay up,ay utpay erhay
andshay inay erhay ockets,pay danay eganbay otay istlewhay.

On't,"Day O;jay it'say osay oyish!"bay

At's"Thay ywhay Iay oday it."ay

I"ay etestday ude,ray unlady-likeay irls!"gay

I"ay atehay ected,affay iminy-piminynay its!"chay

Irds"'Bay inay eirthay ittlelay estsnay ee,'"agray angsay Eth,bay ethay eace-maker,pay ithway
uchsay aay unnyfay acefay atthay othbay arpshay oicesvay oftenedsay otay aay augh,lay danay ethay
Ecking""pay endeday orfay atthay imetay.

Eally,"Ray irls,gay youay earay othbay otay ebay amed,"blay aidsay Eg,may eginningbay otay
ecturelay inay erhay elder-sisterlyay ashionfay. You"ay earay olday enoughay otay eavelay offay
oyishbay icks,tray danay otay ehavebay etter,bay Osephinejay. Itay idn'tday attermay osay uchmay
enwhay youay ereway aay ittlelay irl;gay utbay ownay youay earay osay all,tay danay urntay upay youray
air,hay youay ouldshay ememberray atthay youay earay aay youngay ady."lay

I'm"ay ot!nay danay ifay urningtay upay ymay airhay akesmay emay one,ay I'llay earway itay inay otway
ailstay illtay I'may enty,"tway iedcray O,jay ullingpay offay erhay et,nay danay akingshay ownday
aay estnutchay anemay. I"ay atehay otay inkthay I'veay otgay otay owgray up,ay danay ebay Issmay
Arch,may danay earway onglay owns,gay danay ooklay saay impray saay aay Ina-aster!chay It'say adbay

anners!may Iay an'tcay etgay overay ymay isappointmentday inay otnay eingbay aay oy;bay danay it'say

onlyay aystay taay omehay danay it,knay ikelay aay okypay olday oman!"way Danay Ojay ookshay ethay

Oor"Pay O!jay It'say ootay ad,bay utbay itay an'tcay ebay elped;hay osay youay ustmay ytray otay ebay

itsay ouchtay.

As"ay orfay you,ay Y,"amay ontinuedcay Eg,may You"ay earay ogetheraltay ootay articularpay danay

saay adbay saay O'sjay ang."slay

If"ay Ojay isay aay om-boytay danay Yamay aay oose,gay atwhay maay I,ay ease?"play edaskay Eth,bay
eadyray otay areshay ethay ecturelay.

You're"ay aay ear,day danay othingnay else,"ay eredansway Egmay armly;way danay onay oneay
ontradictedcay er,hay orfay ethay Ouse""May asway ethay etpay ofay ethay amilyfay.

Saay youngay eadersray ikelay otay owknay Ow"hay eoplepay ook,"lay eway illway aketay isthay
omentmay otay ivegay emthay aay ittlelay etchskay ofay ethay ourfay isters,say owhay atsay
ittingknay ayaway inay ethay ilight,tway ilewhay ethay Ecemberday owsnay ellfay uietlyqay
ithout,way danay ethay irefay ackledcray eerfullychay ithinway. Itay asway aay omfortablecay
olday oom,ray oughthay ethay arpetcay asway adedfay danay ethay urniturefay eryvay ain;play orfay
aay oodgay icturepay oray otway unghay onay ethay alls,way ooksbay illedfay ethay ecesses,ray
ysanthemumschray danay Istmaschray osesray oomedblay inay ethay indows,way danay aay
easantplay osphereatmay ofay ome-peacehay ervadedpay itay.

Argaret,may ethay eldestay ofay ethay our,fay asway ixteen,say danay eryvay etty,pray eingbay
umpplay danay air,fay ithway argelay eyes,ay entyplay ofay oft,say ownbray air,hay aay eetsway
outh,may danay itewhay ands,hay ofay ichwhay eshay asway atherray ainvay. Ifteen-year-oldfay
Ojay asway eryvay all,tay in,thay danay own,bray danay emindedray oneay ofay aay olt;cay orfay eshay
evernay eemedsay otay owknay atwhay otay oday ithway erhay onglay imbs,lay ichwhay ereway eryvay
uchmay inay erhay ayway. Eshay adhay aay ecidedday outh,may aay omicalcay ose,nay danay arp,shay
aygray eyes,ay ichwhay earedappay otay eesay everything,ay danay ereway ybay urnstay ierce,fay
unny,fay oray oughtfulthay. Erhay ong,lay ickthay airhay asway erhay oneay eauty;bay utbay itay
asway usuallyay undledbay intoay aay et,nay otay ebay outay ofay erhay ayway. Oundray ouldersshay
adhay O,jay igbay andshay danay eet,fay aay y-awayflay ooklay otay erhay othes,clay danay ethay
uncomfortableay earanceappay ofay aay irlgay owhay asway apidlyray ootingshay upay intoay aay
oman,way danay idn'tday ikelay itay. Elizabeth--oray Eth,bay saay everyay oneay alledcay
er--washay aay osy,ray ooth-haired,smay ight-eyedbray irlgay ofay irteen,thay ithway aay yshay
anner,may aay imidtay oice,vay danay aay eacefulpay expression,ay ichwhay asway eldomsay
isturbedday. Erhay atherfay alledcay erhay Ittle"Lay Anquillity,"tray danay ethay amenay
uitedsay erhay excellently;ay orfay eshay eemedsay otay ivelay inay aay appyhay orldway ofay erhay
own,ay onlyay enturingvay outay otay eetmay ethay ewfay omwhay eshay ustedtray danay ovedlay. Y,amay
oughthay ethay youngest,ay asway aay ostmay importantay erson,--inpay erhay ownay opinionay taay
eastlay. Aay egularray ow-maiden,snay ithway ueblay eyes,ay danay yelloway air,hay urlingcay
onay erhay oulders,shay alepay danay ender,slay danay aysalway arryingcay erselfhay ikelay aay
youngay adylay indfulmay ofay erhay annersmay. Atwhay ethay aracterschay ofay ethay ourfay
isterssay ereway eway illway eavelay otay ebay oundfay outay.

Ethay ockclay uckstray ix;say ,anday avinghay eptsway upay ethay earth,hay Ethbay utpay aay airpay
ofay ippersslay ownday otay armway. Omehowsay ethay ightsay ofay ethay olday oesshay adhay aay oodgay
effectay uponay ethay irls;gay orfay othermay asway oming,cay danay everyay oneay ightenedbray
otay elcomeway erhay. Egmay oppedstay ecturing,lay danay ightedlay ethay amp,lay Yamay otgay outay
ofay ethay easy-chairay ithoutway eingbay ed,askay danay Ojay orgotfay owhay iredtay eshay asway
saay eshay atsay upay otay oldhay ethay ippersslay earernay otay ethay azeblay.

O"Day itay isthay ay;way aspclay youray andshay o,say danay aggerstay ossacray ethay oom,ray

Ad"Glay otay indfay youay osay erry,may ymay irls,"gay aidsay aay eerychay oicevay taay ethay oor,day

An-I-help-you""cay ooklay outabay erhay ichwhay asway ulytray elightfulday. Eshay asway otnay

Ell,"Way earies,day owhay avehay youay otgay onay o-day?tay Erethay asway osay uchmay otay o,day

Ilewhay akingmay esethay aternalmay inquiriesay Smray. Archmay otgay erhay etway ingsthay off,ay
erhay armway ippersslay on,ay danay ittingsay ownday inay ethay easy-chair,ay ewdray Yamay otay
erhay ap,lay eparingpray otay enjoyay ethay appiesthay ourhay ofay erhay usybay ayday. Ethay irlsgay
ewflay out,abay yingtray otay akemay ingsthay omfortable,cay eachay inay erhay ownay ayway. Egmay
angedarray ethay ea-table;tay Ojay oughtbray oodway danay etsay airs,chay opping,dray
overturning,ay danay atteringclay everythingay eshay ouched;tay Ethbay ottedtray otay danay
ofray etweenbay arlorpay danay itchen,kay uietqay danay usy;bay ilewhay Yamay avegay
irectionsday otay everyay one,ay saay eshay atsay ithway erhay andshay oldedfay.

Saay eythay atheredgay outabay ethay able,tay Smray. Archmay aid,say ithway aay articularlypay
appyhay ace,fay I've"ay otgay aay eattray orfay youay eraftay upper."say

Aay uick,qay ightbray ilesmay entway oundray ikelay aay eakstray ofay unshinesay. Ethbay appedclay
erhay ands,hay egardlessray ofay ethay iscuitbay eshay eld,hay danay Ojay ossedtay upay erhay
apkin,nay ying,cray A"ay etter!lay aay etter!lay Eethray eerschay orfay ather!"fay

Yes,"ay aay icenay onglay etterlay. Ehay isay ell,way danay inksthay ehay allshay etgay oughthray
ethay oldcay easonsay etterbay anthay eway earedfay. Ehay endssay lalay ortssay ofay ovinglay
ishesway orfay Istmas,chray danay naay especialay essagemay otay youay irls,"gay aidsay Smray.
Arch,may attingpay erhay ocketpay saay ifay eshay adhay otgay aay easuretray erethay.

Urry"Hay danay etgay one!day On'tday opstay otay uirkqay youray ittlelay inger,fay danay impersay
overay youray ate,play Y,"amay iedcray O,jay okingchay inay erhay ea,tay danay oppingdray erhay
ead,bray utterbay idesay own,day onay ethay arpet,cay inay erhay astehay otay etgay taay ethay
eattray.

Ethbay eatay onay ore,may utbay eptcray ay,away otay itsay inay erhay adowyshay ornercay danay oodbray
overay ethay elightday otay ome,cay illtay ethay othersay ereway eadyray.

I"ay inkthay itay asway osay endidsplay inay atherfay otay ogay saay aay aplainchay enwhay ehay asway
ootay olday otay ebay afted,dray danay otnay ongstray enoughay orfay aay oldier,"say aidsay Egmay
armlyway.

On't"Day Iay ishway Iay ouldcay ogay saay aay ummer,dray aay Ivan_--what's_vay itsay ame?nay oray aay
urse,nay osay Iay ouldcay ebay earnay imhay danay elphay im,"hay exclaimeday O,jay ithway aay oangray.

It"ay ustmay ebay eryvay isagreeableday otay eepslay inay aay ent,tay danay eatay lalay ortssay ofay
ad-tastingbay ings,thay danay inkdray outay ofay aay intay ug,"may ighedsay Yamay.

En"Whay illway ehay omecay ome,hay Armee?"may edaskay Eth,bay ithway aay ittlelay uiverqay inay
erhay oicevay.

Ot"Nay orfay anymay onths,may ear,day unlessay ehay isay icksay. Ehay illway aystay danay oday ishay
orkway aithfullyfay saay onglay saay ehay an,cay danay eway on'tway kasay orfay imhay ackbay aay
inutemay oonersay anthay ehay ancay ebay aredspay. Ownay omecay danay earhay ethay etter."lay

Eythay lalay ewdray otay ethay ire,fay othermay inay ethay igbay airchay ithway Ethbay taay erhay
eet,fay Egmay danay Yamay erchedpay onay eitheray maray ofay ethay air,chay danay Ojay eaninglay onay
ethay ack,bay erewhay onay oneay ouldway eesay yanay ignsay ofay emotionay ifay ethay etterlay
ouldshay appenhay otay ebay ouchingtay.

Eryvay ewfay etterslay ereway ittenwray inay osethay ardhay imestay atthay ereway otnay
ouching,tay especiallyay osethay ichwhay athersfay entsay omehay. Inay isthay oneay ittlelay
asway aidsay ofay ethay ardshipshay endured,ay ethay angersday aced,fay oray ethay
omesicknesshay onquered;cay itay asway aay eerful,chay opefulhay etter,lay ullfay ofay
ivelylay escriptionsday ofay ampcay ife,lay arches,may danay ilitarymay ews;nay danay onlyay
taay ethay enday idday ethay iter'swray earthay overfloway ithway atherlyfay ovelay danay
onginglay orfay ethay ittlelay irlsgay taay omehay.

Illustration:[ay Itay asway aay eerful,chay opefulhay etter]lay

Ive"Gay emthay lalay ymay earday ovelay danay aay isskay. Elltay emthay Iay inkthay ofay emthay ybay
ay,day aypray orfay emthay ybay ight,nay danay indfay ymay estbay omfortcay inay eirthay ectionaffay
taay lalay imestay. Aay yearay eemssay eryvay onglay otay aitway eforebay Iay eesay em,thay utbay
emindray emthay atthay ilewhay eway aitway eway aymay lalay ork,way osay atthay esethay ardhay aysday
eednay otnay ebay astedway. Iay owknay eythay illway ememberray lalay Iay aidsay otay em,thay atthay
eythay illway ebay ovinglay ildrenchay otay you,ay illway oday eirthay utyday aithfully,fay
ightfay eirthay osombay enemiesay avely,bray danay onquercay emselvesthay osay
eautifully,bay atthay enwhay Iay omecay ackbay otay emthay Iay aymay ebay onderfay danay ouderpray
anthay everay ofay ymay ittlelay omen."way

Everybodyay iffedsnay enwhay eythay amecay otay atthay art;pay Ojay asn'tway amedashay ofay ethay
eatgray eartay atthay oppeddray offay ethay enday ofay erhay ose,nay danay Yamay evernay indedmay
ethay umplingray ofay erhay urlscay saay eshay idhay erhay acefay onay erhay other'smay ouldershay
danay obbedsay out,ay I"ay Am__ay aay elfishsay irl!gay utbay I'llay ulytray ytray otay ebay etter,bay
osay ehay ayn'tmay ebay isappointedday inay emay ybay danay y."bay

E"Way lalay ill!"way iedcray Egmay. I"ay inkthay ootay uchmay ofay ymay ooks,lay danay atehay otay
ork,way utbay on'tway yanay ore,may ifay Iay ancay elphay it."ay

I'll"ay ytray danay ebay atwhay ehay oveslay otay allcay e,may A'ay ittlelay oman,'way danay otnay ebay
oughray danay ild;way utbay oday ymay utyday erehay insteaday ofay antingway otay ebay omewheresay
else,"ay aidsay O,jay inkingthay atthay eepingkay erhay empertay taay omehay asway aay uchmay
arderhay asktay anthay acingfay aay ebelray oray otway ownday Outhsay.

Ethbay aidsay othing,nay utbay ipedway ayaway erhay earstay ithway ethay ueblay y-sock,armay danay
eganbay otay itknay ithway lalay erhay ight,may osinglay onay imetay inay oingday ethay utyday atthay
aylay earestnay er,hay ilewhay eshay esolvedray inay erhay uietqay ittlelay oulsay otay ebay lalay
atthay atherfay opedhay otay indfay erhay enwhay ethay yearay oughtbray oundray ethay appyhay
omingcay omehay.

Illustration:[ay Owhay youay useday otay ayplay Ilgrim'spay Ogress]pray

Smray. Archmay okebray ethay ilencesay atthay ollowedfay O'sjay ords,way ybay ayingsay inay erhay
eerychay oice,vay O"Day youay ememberray owhay youay useday otay ayplay Ilgrim'spay Ogresspray
enwhay youay ereway ittlelay ings?thay Othingnay elightedday youay oremay anthay otay avehay emay
ietay ymay iece-bagspay onay youray acksbay orfay urdens,bay ivegay youay atshay danay icksstay
danay ollsray ofay aper,pay danay etlay youay aveltray oughthray ethay ousehay omfray ethay
ellar,cay ichwhay asway ethay Itycay ofay Estruction,day up,ay up,ay otay ethay ouse-top,hay
erewhay youay adhay lalay ethay ovelylay ingsthay youay ouldcay ollectcay otay akemay aay
Elestialcay Ity."cay

At"Whay unfay itay as,way especiallyay oinggay ybay ethay ions,lay ightingfay Ollyon,apay danay
assingpay oughthray ethay Alleyvay erewhay ethay obgoblinshay ere!"way aidsay Ojay.

I"ay ikedlay ethay aceplay erewhay ethay undlesbay ellfay offay danay umbledtay ownday airs,"stay
aidsay Egmay.

Y"May avoritefay artpay asway enwhay eway amecay outay onay ethay atflay oofray erewhay ouray
owersflay danay orsarbay danay ettypray ingsthay ere,way danay lalay oodstay danay ungsay orfay
oyjay upay erethay inay ethay unshine,"say aidsay Eth,bay iling,smay saay ifay atthay easantplay
omentmay adhay omecay ackbay otay erhay.

I"ay on'tday ememberray uchmay outabay it,ay exceptay atthay Iay asway aidafray ofay ethay ellarcay
danay ethay arkday entry,ay danay aysalway ikedlay ethay akecay danay ilkmay eway adhay upay taay ethay
optay. Ifay Iay asn'tway ootay olday orfay uchsay ings,thay I'day atherray ikelay otay ayplay itay
overay ain,"agay aidsay Y,amay owhay eganbay otay alktay ofay enouncingray ildishchay ingsthay
taay ethay aturemay eagay ofay elvetway.

E"Way evernay earay ootay olday orfay is,thay ymay ear,day ecausebay itay isay aay ayplay eway earay
ayingplay lalay ethay imetay inay oneay ayway oray otheranay. Ouray urdensbay earay ere,hay ouray
oadray isay eforebay us,ay danay ethay onginglay orfay oodnessgay danay appinesshay isay ethay
uidegay atthay eadslay usay oughthray anymay oublestray danay istakesmay otay ethay eacepay
ichwhay isay aay uetray Elestialcay Itycay. Ow,nay ymay ittlelay ilgrims,pay upposesay youay
eginbay ain,agay otnay inay ay,play utbay inay earnest,ay danay eesay owhay arfay onay youay ancay etgay
eforebay atherfay omescay ome."hay

Eally,"Ray other?may Erewhay earay ouray undles?"bay edaskay Y,amay owhay asway aay eryvay
iterallay youngay adylay.

Each"ay ofay youay oldtay atwhay youray urdenbay asway ustjay ow,nay exceptay Eth;bay Iay atherray
inkthay eshay asn'thay otgay y,"anay aidsay erhay othermay.

Yes,"ay Iay ave;hay inemay isay ishesday danay usters,day danay envyingay irlsgay ithway icenay
ianos,pay danay eingbay aidafray ofay eople."pay

Eth'sbay undlebay asway uchsay aay unnyfay oneay atthay everybodyay antedway otay augh;lay utbay
obodynay id,day orfay itay ouldway avehay urthay erhay eelingsfay eryvay uchmay.

Et"Lay usay oday it,"ay aidsay Egmay oughtfullythay. It"ay isay onlyay otheranay amenay orfay
yingtray otay ebay ood,gay danay ethay orystay aymay elphay us;ay orfay oughthay eway oday antway otay
ebay ood,gay it'say ardhay ork,way danay eway orget,fay danay on'tday oday ouray est."bay

E"Way ereway inay ethay Oughslay ofay Espondday o-night,tay danay othermay amecay danay ulledpay
usay outay saay Elphay idday inay ethay ookbay. Eway oughtay otay avehay ouray ollray ofay irections,day
ikelay Istianchray. Atwhay allshay eway oday outabay at?"thay edaskay O,jay elightedday ithway
ethay ancyfay ichwhay entlay aay ittlelay omanceray otay ethay eryvay ullday asktay ofay oingday erhay
utyday.

Ook"Lay underay youray illows,pay Istmaschray orning,may danay youay illway indfay youray
uide-book,"gay epliedray Smray. Archmay.

Eythay alkedtay overay ethay ewnay anplay ilewhay olday Annahhay earedclay ethay able;tay enthay
outay amecay ethay ourfay ittlelay ork-baskets,way danay ethay eedlesnay ewflay saay ethay irlsgay
ademay eetsshay orfay Untaay Archmay. Itay asway uninterestingay ewing,say utbay o-nighttay onay
oneay umbledgray. Eythay optedaday O'sjay anplay ofay ividingday ethay onglay eamssay intoay
ourfay arts,pay danay allingcay ethay uartersqay Europe,ay Ia,asay Ica,afray danay Erica,amay
danay inay atthay ayway otgay onay apitally,cay especiallyay enwhay eythay alkedtay outabay ethay
ifferentday ountriescay saay eythay itchedstay eirthay ayway oughthray emthay.

Illustration:[ay Onay oneay utbay Ethbay ouldcay etgay uchmay usicmay outay ofay ethay olday
iano]pay

Taay inenay eythay oppedstay ork,way danay ung,say saay usual,ay eforebay eythay entway otay edbay.
Onay oneay utbay Ethbay ouldcay etgay uchmay usicmay outay ofay ethay olday iano;pay utbay eshay adhay aay
ayway ofay oftlysay ouchingtay ethay yelloway eys,kay danay akingmay aay easantplay
ompanimentaccay otay ethay implesay ongssay eythay ungsay. Egmay adhay aay oicevay ikelay aay
ute,flay danay eshay danay erhay othermay edlay ethay ittlelay oirchay. Yamay irpedchay ikelay aay
icket,cray danay Ojay anderedway oughthray ethay irsaay taay erhay ownay eetsway ill,way aysalway
omingcay outay taay ethay ongwray aceplay ithway aay oakcray oray aay uaverqay atthay oiltspay ethay
ostmay ensivepay unetay. Eythay adhay aysalway oneday isthay omfray ethay imetay eythay ouldcay
isplay

Inkle,"Cray inkle,cray Ittle'ay Ar,"'tay

danay itay adhay ecomebay aay ouseholdhay ustom,cay orfay ethay othermay asway aay ornbay ingersay.
Ethay irstfay oundsay inay ethay orningmay asway erhay oice,vay saay eshay entway outabay ethay
ousehay ingingsay ikelay aay ark;lay danay ethay astlay oundsay taay ightnay asway ethay amesay
eerychay ound,say orfay ethay irlsgay evernay ewgray ootay olday orfay atthay amiliarfay
ullabylay.

Illustration:[ay Aay Errymay Istmas]chray

IIay.

Aay ERRYmay ISTMAScHRay.


Ojay asway ethay irstfay otay akeway inay ethay aygray awnday ofay Istmaschray orningmay. Onay
ockingsstay unghay taay ethay ireplace,fay danay orfay aay omentmay eshay eltfay saay uchmay
isappointedday saay eshay idday onglay o,agay enwhay erhay ittlelay ocksay ellfay ownday ecausebay
itay asway osay ammedcray ithway oodiesgay. Enthay eshay ememberedray erhay other'smay
omise,pray ,anday ippingslay erhay andhay underay erhay illow,pay ewdray outay aay ittlelay
imson-coveredcray ookbay. Eshay ewknay itay eryvay ell,way orfay itay asway atthay eautifulbay
olday orystay ofay ethay estbay ifelay everay ived,lay danay Ojay eltfay atthay itay asway aay uetray
uide-bookgay orfay yanay ilgrimpay oinggay ethay onglay ourneyjay. Eshay okeway Egmay ithway aay
Erry"May Istmas,"chray danay adebay erhay eesay atwhay asway underay erhay illowpay. Aay
een-coveredgray ookbay eared,appay ithway ethay amesay icturepay inside,ay danay aay ewfay
ordsway ittenwray ybay eirthay other,may ichwhay ademay eirthay oneay esentpray eryvay
eciouspray inay eirthay eyesay. Esentlypray Ethbay danay Yamay oke,way otay ummageray danay indfay
eirthay ittlelay ooksbay o,--onealsay ove-colored,day ethay otheray ue;blay danay lalay atsay
ookinglay taay danay alkingtay outabay em,thay ilewhay ethay eastay ewgray osyray ithway ethay
omingcay ayday.

Inay itespay ofay erhay allsmay anities,vay Argaretmay adhay aay eetsway danay iouspay ature,nay
ichwhay unconsciouslyay influenceday erhay isters,say especiallyay O,jay owhay ovedlay erhay
eryvay enderly,tay danay obeyeday erhay ecausebay erhay iceadvay asway osay entlygay ivengay.

Irls,""Gay aidsay Egmay eriously,say ookinglay omfray ethay umbledtay eadhay esidebay erhay otay
ethay otway ittlelay ight-cappednay onesay inay ethay oomray eyond,bay Other"may antsway usay otay
eadray danay ovelay danay indmay esethay ooks,bay danay eway ustmay eginbay taay onceay. Eway useday
otay ebay aithfulfay outabay it;ay utbay incesay atherfay entway ay,away danay lalay isthay arway
oubletray unsettleday us,ay eway avehay eglectednay anymay ingsthay. Youay ancay oday saay youay
ease;play utbay I__ay allshay eepkay ymay ookbay onay ethay abletay ere,hay danay eadray aay ittlelay
everyay orningmay saay oonsay saay Iay ake,way orfay Iay owknay itay illway oday emay ood,gay danay elphay
emay oughthray ethay ay."day

Enthay eshay openeday erhay ewnay ookbay danay eganbay otay eadray. Ojay utpay erhay maray oundray
er,hay ,anday eaninglay eekchay otay eek,chay eadray o,alsay ithway ethay uietqay expressionay
osay eldomsay eensay onay erhay estlessray acefay.

Ow"Hay oodgay Egmay is!ay Ome,cay Y,amay et'slay oday saay eythay oday. I'llay elphay youay ithway ethay
ardhay ords,way danay ey'llthay explainay ingsthay ifay eway on'tday understand,"ay
isperedwhay Eth,bay eryvay uchmay impresseday ybay ethay ettypray ooksbay danay erhay isters'say
exampleay.

I'm"ay adglay inemay isay ue,"blay aidsay Y;amay danay enthay ethay oomsray ereway eryvay illstay
ilewhay ethay agespay ereway oftlysay urned,tay danay ethay interway unshinesay eptcray inay otay
ouchtay ethay ightbray eadshay danay erioussay acesfay ithway aay Istmaschray eetinggray.

Ere"Whay isay other?"may edaskay Eg,may saay eshay danay Ojay anray ownday otay ankthay erhay orfay
eirthay ifts,gay alfhay naay ourhay aterlay.

Oodness"Gay onlyay owsknay. Omesay oorpay eetercray omecay eggin',a-bay danay youray amay entway
aightstray offay otay eesay atwhay asway eedednay. Erethay evernay As__way uchsay aay omanway orfay
ivin'gay ayaway ittlesvay danay ink,dray othesclay danay irin',"fay epliedray Annah,hay owhay
adhay ivedlay ithway ethay amilyfay incesay Egmay asway orn,bay danay asway onsideredcay ybay emthay
lalay oremay saay aay iendfray anthay aay ervantsay.

E"Shay illway ebay ackbay oon,say Iay ink;thay osay yfray youray akes,cay danay avehay everythingay
eady,"ray aidsay Eg,may ookinglay overay ethay esentspray ichwhay ereway ollectedcay inay aay
asketbay danay eptkay underay ethay ofa,say eadyray otay ebay oducedpray taay ethay operpray imetay.
Y,"Whay erewhay isay Y'samay ottlebay ofay ologne?"cay eshay ed,adday saay ethay ittlelay askflay
idday otnay earappay.

E"Shay ooktay itay outay aay inutemay o,agay danay entway offay ithway itay otay utpay aay ibbonray onay
it,ay oray omesay uchsay otion,"nay epliedray O,jay ancingday outabay ethay oomray otay aketay ethay
irstfay iffnessstay offay ethay ewnay y-slippersarmay.

Ow"Hay icenay ymay andkerchiefshay ook,lay on'tday ey?thay Annahhay ashedway danay ironeday
emthay orfay e,may danay Iay arkedmay emthay lalay yself,"may aidsay Eth,bay ookinglay oudlypray
taay ethay omewhatsay unevenay etterslay ichwhay adhay ostcay erhay uchsay aborlay.

Ess"Blay ethay ild!chay e'sshay onegay danay utpay Other''May onay emthay insteaday ofay M'ay.
Arch.'may Owhay unny!"fay iedcray O,jay akingtay upay oneay.

Isn't"ay itay ight?ray Iay oughtthay itay asway etterbay otay oday itay o,say ecausebay Eg'smay
initialsay earay M'ay. 'm.,ay danay Iay on'tday antway yanay oneay otay useay esethay utbay Armee,"may
aidsay Eth,bay ookinglay oubledtray.

It's"ay lalay ight,ray ear,day danay aay eryvay ettypray idea,--quiteay ensible,say oo,tay orfay
onay oneay ancay everay istakemay ownay. Itay illway easeplay erhay eryvay uch,may Iay ow,"knay aidsay
Eg,may ithway aay ownfray orfay Ojay danay aay ilesmay orfay Ethbay.

Ere's"Thay othermay. Idehay ethay asket,bay uick!"qay iedcray O,jay saay aay oorday ammed,slay
danay epsstay oundedsay inay ethay allhay.

Yamay amecay inay astily,hay danay ookedlay atherray ashedabay enwhay eshay awsay erhay isterssay
lalay aitingway orfay erhay.

Ere"Whay avehay youay een,bay danay atwhay earay youay idinghay ehindbay you?"ay edaskay Eg,may
urprisedsay otay ee,say ybay erhay oodhay danay oak,clay atthay azylay Yamay adhay eenbay outay osay
earlyay.

On't"Day aughlay taay e,may O!jay Iay idn'tday eanmay yanay oneay ouldshay owknay illtay ethay imetay
amecay. Iay onlyay eantmay otay angechay ethay ittlelay ottlebay orfay aay igbay one,ay danay Iay avegay
All__ay ymay oneymay otay etgay it,ay danay I'may ulytray yingtray otnay otay ebay elfishsay yanay
ore."may

Saay eshay oke,spay Yamay owedshay ethay andsomehay askflay ichwhay eplacedray ethay eapchay
one;ay danay ookedlay osay earnestay danay umblehay inay erhay ittlelay effortay otay orgetfay
erselfhay atthay Egmay uggedhay erhay onay ethay ot,spay danay Ojay onouncedpray erhay A"ay
ump,"tray ilewhay Ethbay anray otay ethay indow,way danay ickedpay erhay inestfay oseray otay
ornamentay ethay atelystay ottlebay.

You"ay eesay Iay eltfay amedashay ofay ymay esent,pray eraftay eadingray danay alkingtay outabay
eingbay oodgay isthay orning,may osay Iay anray oundray ethay ornercay danay angedchay itay ethay
inutemay Iay asway up:ay danay I'may O__say ad,glay orfay inemay isay ethay andsomesthay ow."nay

Otheranay angbay ofay ethay eet-doorstray entsay ethay asketbay underay ethay ofa,say danay ethay
irlsgay otay ethay able,tay eageray orfay eakfastbray.

Erry"May Istmas,chray Armee!may Anymay ofay em!thay Ankthay youay orfay ouray ooks;bay eway eadray
ome,say danay eanmay otay everyay ay,"day eythay ied,cray inay oruschay.

Erry"May Istmas,chray ittlelay aughters!day I'may adglay youay eganbay taay once,ay danay opehay
youay illway eepkay onay. Utbay Iay antway otay aysay oneay ordway eforebay eway itsay ownday. Otnay arfay
ayaway omfray erehay ieslay aay oorpay omanway ithway aay ittlelay ew-bornnay abybay. Ixsay
ildrenchay earay uddledhay intoay oneay edbay otay eepkay omfray eezing,fray orfay eythay avehay
onay irefay. Erethay isay othingnay otay eatay overay ere;thay danay ethay oldestay oybay amecay otay
elltay emay eythay ereway ufferingsay ungerhay danay oldcay. Ymay irls,gay illway youay ivegay
emthay youray eakfastbray saay aay Istmaschray esent?"pray

Eythay ereway lalay unusuallyay ungry,hay avinghay aitedway earlynay naay our,hay danay orfay aay
inutemay onay oneay oke;spay onlyay aay inute,may orfay Ojay exclaimeday impetuously,--ay

I'm"ay osay adglay youay amecay eforebay eway egan!"bay

Ay"May Iay ogay danay elphay arrycay ethay ingsthay otay ethay oorpay ittlelay ildren?"chay edaskay
Eth,bay eagerlyay.

I_"_ay allshay aketay ethay eamcray danay ethay uffins,"may edadday Y,amay eroicallyhay ivinggay
upay ethay iclesartay eshay ostmay ikedlay.

Egmay asway eadyalray overingcay ethay uckwheats,bay danay ilingpay ethay eadbray intoay oneay
igbay ateplay.

I"ay oughtthay you'day oday it,"ay aidsay Smray. Arch,may ilingsmay saay ifay atisfiedsay. You"ay
allshay lalay ogay danay elphay e,may danay enwhay eway omecay ackbay eway illway avehay eadbray danay
ilkmay orfay eakfast,bray danay akemay itay upay taay inner-time."day

Eythay ereway oonsay eady,ray danay ethay ocessionpray etsay outay. Ortunatelyfay itay asway
early,ay danay eythay entway oughthray ackbay eets,stray osay ewfay eoplepay awsay em,thay danay
onay oneay aughedlay taay ethay ueerqay artypay.

Illustration:[ay Ethay ocessionpray etsay out]ay

Aay oor,pay are,bay iserablemay oomray itay as,way ithway okenbray indows,way onay ire,fay
aggedray ed-clothes,bay aay icksay other,may ailingway aby,bay danay aay oupgray ofay ale,pay
ungryhay ildrenchay uddledcay underay oneay olday uilt,qay yingtray otay eepkay armway.

Owhay ethay igbay eyesay aredstay danay ethay ueblay ipslay iledsmay saay ethay irlsgay entway in!ay

Ach,"ay einmay Ott!gay itay isay oodgay elsangay omecay otay us!"ay aidsay ethay oorpay oman,way
yingcray orfay oyjay.

Unny"Fay elsangay inay oodshay danay ittens,"may aidsay O,jay danay etsay emthay aughinglay.

Inay aay ewfay inutesmay itay eallyray idday eemsay saay ifay indkay iritsspay adhay eenbay taay orkway
erethay. Annah,hay owhay adhay arriedcay ood,way ademay aay ire,fay danay oppedstay upay ethay
okenbray anespay ithway olday atshay danay erhay ownay oakclay. Smray. Archmay avegay ethay othermay
eatay danay uel,gray danay omfortedcay erhay ithway omisespray ofay elp,hay ilewhay eshay
esseddray ethay ittlelay abybay saay enderlytay saay ifay itay adhay eenbay erhay ownay. Ethay
irls,gay eantime,may eadspray ethay able,tay etsay ethay ildrenchay oundray ethay ire,fay danay
edfay emthay ikelay osay anymay ungryhay irds,--laughing,bay alking,tay danay yingtray otay
understanday ethay unnyfay okenbray Englishay.

As"Day istay ut!"gay Ie"Day Engel-kinder!"ay iedcray ethay oorpay ings,thay saay eythay e,atay
danay armedway eirthay urplepay andshay taay ethay omfortablecay azeblay.

Ethay irlsgay adhay evernay eenbay alledcay elangay ildrenchay efore,bay danay oughtthay itay
eryvay eeable,agray especiallyay O,jay owhay adhay eenbay onsideredcay aay Ancho""Say everay
incesay eshay asway ornbay. Atthay asway aay eryvay appyhay eakfast,bray oughthay eythay idn'tday
etgay yanay ofay it;ay danay enwhay eythay entway ay,away eavinglay omfortcay ehind,bay Iay inkthay
erethay ereway otnay inay lalay ethay itycay ourfay erriermay eoplepay anthay ethay ungryhay
ittlelay irlsgay owhay avegay ayaway eirthay eakfastsbray danay ontentedcay emselvesthay
ithway eadbray danay ilkmay onay Istmaschray orningmay.

At's"Thay ovinglay ouray eighbornay etterbay anthay ourselves,ay danay Iay ikelay it,"ay aidsay
Eg,may saay eythay etsay outay eirthay esents,pray ilewhay eirthay othermay asway upstairsay
ollectingcay othesclay orfay ethay oorpay Ummelshay.

Otnay aay eryvay endidsplay ow,shay utbay erethay asway aay eatgray ealday ofay ovelay oneday upay inay
ethay ewfay ittlelay undles;bay danay ethay alltay asevay ofay edray oses,ray itewhay
ysanthemums,chray danay ailingtray ines,vay ichwhay oodstay inay ethay iddle,may avegay
uiteqay naay elegantay iraay otay ethay abletay.

E's"Shay oming!cay Ikestray up,ay Eth!bay Openay ethay oor,day Y!amay Eethray eerschay orfay
Armee!"may iedcray O,jay ancingpray out,abay ilewhay Egmay entway otay onductcay othermay otay
ethay eatsay ofay onorhay.

Ethbay ayedplay erhay ayestgay arch,may Yamay ewthray openay ethay oor,day danay Egmay enacteday
escortay ithway eatgray ignityday. Smray. Archmay asway othbay urprisedsay danay ouched;tay
danay iledsmay ithway erhay eyesay ullfay saay eshay examineday erhay esents,pray danay eadray ethay
ittlelay otesnay ichwhay ompaniedaccay emthay. Ethay ippersslay entway onay taay once,ay aay ewnay
andkerchiefhay asway ippedslay intoay erhay ocket,pay ellway entedscay ithway Y'samay
ologne,cay ethay oseray asway astenedfay inay erhay osom,bay danay ethay icenay ovesglay ereway
onouncedpray aay Erfect"pay it."fay

Erethay asway aay oodgay ealday ofay aughinglay danay issingkay danay explaining,ay inay ethay
imple,say ovinglay ashionfay ichwhay akesmay esethay ome-festivalshay osay easantplay taay
ethay ime,tay osay eetsway otay ememberray onglay erward,aftay danay enthay lalay ellfay otay
orkway.

Ethay orningmay aritieschay danay eremoniescay ooktay osay uchmay imetay atthay ethay estray ofay
ethay ayday asway evotedday otay eparationspray orfay ethay eveningay estivitiesfay. Eingbay
illstay ootay youngay otay ogay oftenay otay ethay eatre,thay danay otnay ichray enoughay otay
ordaffay yanay eatgray outlayay orfay ivatepray erformances,pay ethay irlsgay utpay eirthay
itsway otay ork,way ecessityand--nay eingbay ethay othermay ofay invention,--madeay
ateverwhay eythay eedednay. Eryvay everclay ereway omesay ofay eirthay
oductions,--pasteboardpray uitars,gay iqueantay ampslay ademay ofay old-fashioneday
utter-boatsbay overedcay ithway ilversay aper,pay orgeousgay obesray ofay olday otton,cay
itteringglay ithway intay anglesspay omfray aay icklepay actory,fay danay orarmay overedcay
ithway ethay amesay usefulay iamond-shapedday its,bay eftlay inay eetsshay enwhay ethay idslay
ofay intay eserve-potspray ereway utcay outay. Ethay urniturefay asway useday otay eingbay
urnedtay opsy-turvy,tay danay ethay igbay amberchay asway ethay enescay ofay anymay innocentay
evelsray.

Onay entlemengay ereway itted;admay osay Ojay ayedplay alemay artspay otay erhay eart'shay
ontent,cay danay ooktay immenseay atisfactionsay inay aay airpay ofay usset-leatherray ootsbay
ivengay erhay ybay aay iend,fray owhay ewknay aay adylay owhay ewknay naay oractay. Esethay oots,bay
naay olday oil,fay danay aay ashedslay oubletday onceay useday ybay naay istartay orfay omesay
icture,pay ereway O'sjay iefchay easures,tray danay earedappay onay lalay occasionsay. Ethay
allnesssmay ofay ethay ompanycay ademay itay ecessarynay orfay ethay otway incipalpray orsactay
otay aketay everalsay artspay iece;apay danay eythay ertainlycay eservedday omesay editcray
orfay ethay ardhay orkway eythay idday inay earninglay eethray oray ourfay ifferentday arts,pay
iskingwhay inay danay outay ofay ariousvay ostumes,cay danay anagingmay ethay agestay esidesbay.
Itay asway excellentay illdray orfay eirthay emories,may aay armlesshay usement,amay danay
employeday anymay ourshay ichwhay otherwiseay ouldway avehay eenbay idle,ay onely,lay oray
entspay inay esslay ofitablepray ocietysay.

Onay Istmaschray ight,nay aay ozenday irlsgay iledpay onay otay ethay edbay ichwhay asway ethay
ess-circle,dray danay atsay eforebay ethay ueblay danay yelloway intzchay urtainscay inay aay
ostmay atteringflay atestay ofay expectancyay. Erethay asway aay oodgay ealday ofay ustlingray
danay isperingwhay ehindbay ethay urtain,cay aay ifletray ofay amp-smoke,lay danay naay
occasionalay igglegay omfray Y,amay owhay asway tapay otay etgay ystericalhay inay ethay
excitementay ofay ethay omentmay. Esentlypray aay ellbay ounded,say ethay urtainscay ewflay
art,apay danay ethay Operaticay Agedytray eganbay.

A"ay oomyglay ood,"way ordingaccay otay ethay oneay ay-bill,play asway epresentedray ybay aay
ewfay ubsshray inay ots,pay eengray aizebay onay ethay oor,flay danay aay avecay inay ethay
istanceday. Isthay avecay asway ademay ithway aay othes-horseclay orfay aay oof,ray ureausbay
orfay alls;way danay inay itay asway aay allsmay urnacefay inay ullfay ast,blay ithway aay ackblay otpay
onay it,ay danay naay olday itchway endingbay overay itay. Ethay agestay asway ark,day danay ethay
owglay ofay ethay urnacefay adhay aay inefay effect,ay especiallyay saay ealray eamstay issueday
omfray ethay ettlekay enwhay ethay itchway ooktay offay ethay overcay. Aay omentmay asway owedallay
orfay ethay irstfay illthray otay ubside;say enthay Ugo,hay ethay illain,vay alkedstay inay ithway
aay ankingclay ordsway taay ishay ide,say aay ouchedslay at,hay ackblay eard,bay ysteriousmay
oak,clay danay ethay ootsbay. Eraftay acingpay otay danay ofray inay uchmay itation,agay ehay
uckstray ishay orehead,fay danay urstbay outay inay aay ildway ain,stray ingingsay ofay ishay
atredhay otay Oderigo,ray ishay ovelay orfay Ara,zay danay ishay easingplay esolutionray otay
illkay ethay oneay danay inway ethay otheray. Ethay uffgray onestay ofay Ugo'shay oice,vay ithway naay
occasionalay outshay enwhay ishay eelingsfay overcameay im,hay ereway eryvay impressive,ay
danay ethay udienceaay audedapplay ethay omentmay ehay ausedpay orfay eathbray. Owingbay ithway
ethay iraay ofay oneay ustomedaccay otay ublicpay aise,pray ehay olestay otay ethay avern,cay danay
ordereday Agarhay otay omecay orthfay ithway aay ommandingcay At"Whay o,hay inion!may Iay eednay
ee!"thay

,anday oppingdray aay all,smay ildedgay ottlebay taay ethay itch'sway eet,fay ethay iritspay

ofay ethay ayplay.

Aay oodgay ealday ofay ammeringhay entway onay eforebay ethay urtaincay oseray ain;agay utbay enwhay
itay ecamebay evidentay atwhay aay asterpiecemay ofay age-carpenteringstay adhay eenbay otgay
up,ay onay oneay urmuredmay taay ethay elayday. Itay asway ulytray uperb!say Aay owertay oseray otay
ethay eiling;cay alf-wayhay upay earedappay aay indow,way ithway aay amplay urningbay taay it,ay
danay ehindbay ethay itewhay urtaincay earedappay Arazay inay aay ovelylay ueblay danay ilversay
ess,dray aitingway orfay Oderigoray. Ehay amecay inay orgeousgay ay,array ithway umedplay ap,cay
edray oak,clay estnutchay ove-locks,lay aay uitar,gay danay ethay oots,bay ofay oursecay.
Eelingknay taay ethay ootfay ofay ethay ower,tay ehay angsay aay erenadesay inay eltingmay onestay.
Arazay eplied,ray ,anday eraftay aay usicalmay ialogue,day onsentedcay otay yflay. Enthay amecay
ethay andgray effectay ofay ethay ayplay. Oderigoray oducedpray aay ope-ladder,ray ithway ivefay
epsstay otay it,ay ewthray upay oneay end,ay danay inviteday Arazay otay escendday. Imidlytay eshay
eptcray omfray erhay attice,lay utpay erhay andhay onay Oderigo'sray oulder,shay danay asway
outabay otay eaplay acefullygray own,day en,whay Alas!"ay asalay orfay Ara!"zay eshay orgotfay

ellfay ithway aay ash,cray danay uriedbay ethay unhappyay overslay inay ethay uins!ray

eck,wray danay aay oldengay eadhay emerged,ay exclaiming,ay I"ay oldtay youay o!say Iay oldtay youay

On't"Day augh!lay Tacay saay ifay itay asway lalay ight!"--and,ray orderingay Oderigoray up,ay
anishedbay imhay omfray ethay ingdomkay ithway athwray danay ornscay. Oughthay ecidedlyday
akenshay ybay ethay allfay ofay ethay owertay uponay im,hay Oderigoray efiedday ethay olday
entleman,gay danay efusedray otay irstay. Isthay auntlessday exampleay iredfay Ara:zay eshay
oalsay efiedday erhay ire,say danay ehay ordereday emthay othbay otay ethay eepestday ungeonsday
ofay ethay astlecay. Aay outstay ittlelay etainerray amecay inay ithway ains,chay danay edlay emthay

ehay oughtay otay avehay ademay.

Tacay irdthay asway ethay astlecay all;hay danay erehay Agarhay eared,appay avinghay omecay otay
eefray ethay overslay danay inishfay Ugohay. Eshay earshay imhay oming,cay danay ides;hay eessay

ervantsay Ear"Bay emthay otay ethay aptivescay inay eirthay ells,cay danay elltay emthay Iay allshay
omecay on."anay Ethay ervantsay akestay Ugohay ideasay otay elltay imhay omething,say danay

ethay Inion,""may arriescay emthay ay,away danay Agarhay utspay ackbay ethay upcay ichwhay oldshay

arble,way inksdray it,ay oseslay ishay its,way ,anday eraftay aay oodgay ealday ofay utchingclay
danay amping,stay allsfay atflay danay ies;day ilewhay Agarhay informsay imhay atwhay eshay ashay
oneday inay aay ongsay ofay exquisiteay owerpay danay elodymay.

Isthay asway aay ulytray illingthray ene,scay oughthay omesay ersonspay ightmay avehay oughtthay
atthay ethay uddensay umblingtay ownday ofay aay uantityqay ofay onglay airhay atherray arredmay
ethay effectay ofay ethay illain'svay eathday. Ehay asway alledcay eforebay ethay urtain,cay danay
ithway eatgray oprietypray eared,appay eadinglay Agar,hay osewhay ingingsay asway
onsideredcay oremay onderfulway anthay lalay ethay estray ofay ethay erformancepay utpay
ogethertay.

Tacay ourthfay isplayedday ethay espairingday Oderigoray onay ethay ointpay ofay abbingstay
imself,hay ecausebay ehay ashay eenbay oldtay atthay Arazay ashay esertedday imhay. Ustjay saay
ethay aggerday isay taay ishay eart,hay aay ovelylay ongsay isay ungsay underay ishay indow,way
informingay imhay atthay Arazay isay ue,tray utbay inay anger,day danay ehay ancay avesay er,hay ifay
ehay illway. Aay eykay isay ownthray in,ay ichwhay unlocksay ethay oor,day danay inay aay asmspay ofay
aptureray ehay earstay offay ishay ains,chay danay ushesray ayaway otay indfay danay escueray ishay
ady-lovelay.

Tacay ifthfay openeday ithway aay ormystay enescay etweenbay Arazay danay Onday Edropay. Ehay
ishesway erhay otay ogay intoay aay onvent,cay utbay eshay on'tway earhay ofay it;ay ,anday eraftay aay
ouchingtay eal,appay isay outabay otay aint,fay enwhay Oderigoray ashesday inay danay emandsday
erhay andhay. Onday Edropay efuses,ray ecausebay ehay isay otnay ichray. Eythay outshay danay
esticulategay emendously,tray utbay annotcay ee,agray danay Oderigoray isay outabay otay
earbay ayaway ethay exhausteday Ara,zay enwhay ethay imidtay ervantsay entersay ithway aay
etterlay danay aay agbay omfray Agar,hay owhay ashay ysteriouslymay isappearedday. Ethay
atterlay informsay ethay artypay atthay eshay equeathsbay untolday ealthway otay ethay youngay
air,pay danay naay ulawfay oomday otay Onday Edro,pay ifay ehay oesn'tday akemay emthay appyhay. Ethay
agbay isay opened,ay danay everalsay uartsqay ofay intay oneymay owershay ownday uponay ethay
age,stay illtay itay isay uiteqay orifiedglay ithway ethay itterglay. Isthay entirelyay
oftenssay ethay Ern"stay ire":say ehay onsentscay ithoutway aay urmur,may lalay oinjay inay aay

At"Thay oybay utpay itay intoay ishay ead,hay Iay owknay ehay id!day E'shay aay apitalcay ellow,fay
danay Iay ishway eway ouldcay etgay uaintedacqay. Ehay ookslay saay ifay e'dhay ikelay otay owknay us;ay

eway ass,"pay aidsay O,jay saay ethay atesplay entway ound,ray danay ethay iceay eganbay otay eltmay
outay ofay ight,say ithway Ohs!""ay danay Ahs!""ay ofay atisfactionsay.

You"ay eanmay ethay eoplepay owhay ivelay inay ethay igbay ousehay extnay oor,day on'tday you?"ay
edaskay oneay ofay ethay irlsgay. Y"May othermay owsknay olday Rmay. Aurence;lay utbay ayssay e'shay
eryvay oud,pray danay oesn'tday ikelay otay ixmay ithway ishay eighborsnay. Ehay eepskay ishay
andsongray utshay up,ay enwhay ehay isn'tay idingray oray alkingway ithway ishay utor,tay danay
akesmay imhay udystay eryvay ardhay. Eway inviteday imhay otay ouray arty,pay utbay ehay idn'tday
omecay. Othermay ayssay e'shay eryvay ice,nay oughthay ehay evernay eaksspay otay usay irls."gay

Our"ay atcay anray ayaway once,ay danay ehay oughtbray erhay ack,bay danay eway alkedtay overay ethay
ence,fay danay ereway ettinggay onay apitally,--allcay outabay icket,cray danay osay
on,--whenay ehay awsay Egmay oming,cay danay alkedway offay. Iay eanmay otay owknay imhay omesay
ay;day orfay ehay eedsnay un,fay I'may uresay ehay oes,"day aidsay Ojay ecidedlyday.

I"ay ikelay ishay anners,may danay ehay ookslay ikelay aay ittlelay entleman;gay osay I'veay onay
objectionay otay youray owingknay im,hay ifay aay operpray opportunityay omescay. Ehay oughtbray
ethay owersflay imself;hay danay Iay ouldshay avehay edaskay imhay in,ay ifay Iay adhay eenbay uresay
atwhay asway oinggay onay upstairsay. Ehay ookedlay osay istfulway saay ehay entway ay,away
earinghay ethay olic,fray danay evidentlyay avinghay onenay ofay ishay own."ay

It's"ay aay ercymay youay idn't,day other!"may aughedlay O,jay ookinglay taay erhay ootsbay.
Ut"Bay e'llway avehay otheranay ay,play omesay ime,tay atthay ehay An__cay eesay. Erhapspay
e'llhay elphay ;actay ouldn'tway atthay ebay olly?"jay

I"ay evernay adhay uchsay aay inefay ouquetbay efore!bay Owhay ettypray itay is!"ay Danay Egmay
examineday erhay owersflay ithway eatgray interestay.

Ethbay estlednay upay otay er,hay danay isperedwhay oftly,say I"ay ishway Iay ouldcay endsay ymay
unchbay otay atherfay. I'may aidafray ehay isn'tay avinghay uchsay aay errymay Istmaschray saay eway
e."aray

Illustration:[ay Eatingay esapplay danay yingcray overay ethay Eir"Hay ofay Edclyffe"]ray

IIIay.

EtHay AURENCElay OYbay.


O!"Jay O!jay erewhay earay you?"ay iedcray Eg,may taay ethay ootfay ofay ethay arretgay airsstay.

Ere!""Hay eredansway aay uskyhay oicevay omfray ove;abay ,anday unningray up,ay Egmay oundfay
erhay istersay eatingay esapplay danay yingcray overay ethay Eir"Hay ofay Edclyffe,"ray
appedwray upay inay aay omfortercay onay naay olday ee-leggedthray ofasay ybay ethay unnysay
indowway. Isthay asway O'sjay avoritefay efuge;ray danay erehay eshay ovedlay otay etireray ithway
alfhay aay ozenday ussetsray danay aay icenay ook,bay otay enjoyay ethay uietqay danay ethay ocietysay
ofay aay etpay atray owhay ivedlay earnay y,bay danay idn'tday indmay erhay aay articlepay. Saay Egmay
eared,appay Abblescray iskedwhay intoay ishay olehay. Ojay ookshay ethay earstay offay erhay
eeks,chay danay aitedway otay earhay ethay ewsnay.

Uch"Say un!fay onlyay ee!say aay egularray otenay ofay invitationay omfray Smray. Ardinergay orfay
o-morrowtay ight!"nay iedcray Eg,may avingway ethay eciouspray aper,pay danay enthay
oceedingpray otay eadray it,ay ithway irlishgay elightday.

S"'Mray. Ardinergay ouldway ebay appyhay otay eesay Issmay Archmay danay Issmay Osephinejay taay aay
ittlelay anceday onay Ew-Year'snay Eve.'ay Armeemay isay illingway eway ouldshay o;gay ownay
atwhay All__shay eway ear?"way

At's"Whay ethay useay ofay ingaskay at,thay enwhay youay owknay eway allshay earway ouray oplins,pay
ecausebay eway aven'thay otgay ythinganay else?"ay eredansway O,jay ithway erhay outhmay ullfay.

If"ay Iay onlyay adhay aay ilk!"say ighedsay Egmay. Other"May ayssay Iay aymay enwhay I'may
eighteen,ay erhaps;pay utbay otway yearsay isay naay everlastingay imetay otay ait."way

I'm"ay uresay ouray opspay ooklay ikelay ilk,say danay eythay earay icenay enoughay orfay usay.
Yoursay isay saay oodgay saay ew,nay utbay Iay orgotfay ethay urnbay danay ethay eartay inay inemay.
Ateverwhay allshay Iay o?day ethay urnbay owsshay adly,bay danay Iay an'tcay aketay yanay out."ay

You"ay ustmay itsay illstay lalay youay an,cay danay eepkay youray ackbay outay ofay ight;say ethay
ontfray isay lalay ightray. Iay allshay avehay aay ewnay ibbonray orfay ymay air,hay danay Armeemay
illway endlay emay erhay ittlelay earlpay in,pay danay ymay ewnay ippersslay earay ovely,lay danay
ymay ovesglay illway o,day oughthay eythay en'taray saay icenay saay I'day ike."lay

Ine"May earay oiltspay ithway emonade,lay danay Iay an'tcay etgay yanay ewnay ones,ay osay Iay allshay
avehay otay ogay ithout,"way aidsay O,jay owhay evernay oubledtray erselfhay uchmay outabay
essdray.

You"ay Ust__may avehay oves,glay oray Iay on'tway o,"gay iedcray Egmay ecidedlyday. Oves"Glay
earay oremay importantay anthay ythinganay else;ay youay an'tcay anceday ithoutway em,thay danay
ifay youay on'tday Iay ouldshay ebay O__say ortified."may

En"Thay I'llay aystay illstay. Iay on'tday arecay uchmay orfay ompanycay ancing;day it'say onay
unfay otay ogay ailingsay ound;ray Iay ikelay otay yflay outabay danay utcay apers."cay

You"ay an'tcay kasay othermay orfay ewnay ones,ay eythay earay osay expensive,ay danay youay earay
osay arelesscay. Eshay aid,say enwhay youay oiltspay ethay others,ay atthay eshay ouldn'tshay
etgay youay yanay oremay isthay interway. An'tcay youay akemay emthay o?"day edaskay Egmay
iouslyanxay.

I"ay ancay oldhay emthay umpledcray upay inay ymay and,hay osay onay oneay illway owknay owhay ainedstay
eythay e;aray at'sthay lalay Iay ancay oday. O!nay I'llay elltay youay owhay eway ancay anage--eachmay
earway oneay oodgay oneay danay arrycay aay adbay one;ay on'tday youay ee?"say

Your"ay andshay earay iggerbay anthay ine,may danay youay illway etchstray ymay oveglay
eadfully,"dray eganbay Eg,may osewhay ovesglay ereway aay endertay ointpay ithway erhay.

En"Thay I'llay ogay ithoutway. Iay on'tday arecay atwhay eoplepay ay!"say iedcray O,jay akingtay
upay erhay ookbay.

You"ay aymay avehay it,ay youay ay!may onlyay on'tday ainstay it,ay danay oday ehavebay icelynay.

Olumbus!'cay illway you?"ay

On't"Day orryway outabay e;may I'llay ebay saay impray saay Iay an,cay danay otnay etgay intoay yanay
apes,scray ifay Iay ancay elphay itay. Ownay ogay danay eransway youray ote,nay danay etlay emay
inishfay isthay endidsplay ory."stay

Osay Egmay entway ayaway otay Accept"ay ithway anks,"thay ooklay overay erhay ess,dray danay ingsay
ithelyblay saay eshay idday upay erhay oneay ealray acelay ill;fray ilewhay Ojay inishedfay erhay
ory,stay erhay ourfay es,applay danay adhay aay amegay ofay ompsray ithway Abblescray.

Onay Ew-Year'snay Eveay ethay arlorpay asway eserted,day orfay ethay otway youngeray irlsgay
ayedplay essing-maids,dray danay ethay otway elderay ereway orbedabsay inay ethay
importantall-ay usinessbay ofay Etting"gay eadyray orfay ethay arty."pay Implesay saay ethay

danay alking,tay danay taay oneay imetay aay ongstray ellsmay ofay urntbay airhay ervadedpay ethay
ousehay. Egmay antedway aay ewfay urlscay outabay erhay ace,fay danay Ojay undertookay otay inchpay
ethay aperedpay ockslay ithway aay airpay ofay othay ongstay.

Ownday eythay ent,way eelingfay aay ifletray imid,tay orfay eythay eldomsay entway otay arties,pay
,anday informalay saay isthay ittlelay atheringgay as,way itay asway naay eventay otay emthay.
Smray. Ardiner,gay aay atelystay olday ady,lay eetedgray emthay indly,kay danay andedhay emthay
overay otay ethay eldestay ofay erhay ixsay aughtersday. Egmay ewknay Allie,say danay asway taay erhay

ossip,gay oodstay out,abay ithway erhay ackbay arefullycay ainstagay ethay all,way danay eltfay
saay uchmay outay ofay aceplay saay aay oltcay inay aay ower-gardenflay. Alfhay aay ozenday ovialjay
adslay ereway alkingtay outabay atesskay inay otheranay artpay ofay ethay oom,ray danay eshay
ongedlay otay ogay danay oinjay em,thay orfay atingskay asway oneay ofay ethay oysjay ofay erhay ifelay.

atthay eshay aredday otnay irstay. Onay oneay amecay otay alktay otay er,hay danay oneay ybay oneay ethay
oupgray earnay erhay indleddway ay,away illtay eshay asway eftlay onealay. Eshay ouldcay otnay
oamray outabay danay useamay erself,hay orfay ethay urntbay eadthbray ouldway ow,shay osay eshay
aredstay taay eoplepay atherray orlornlyfay illtay ethay ancingday eganbay. Egmay asway edaskay
taay once,ay danay ethay ighttay ippersslay ippedtray outabay osay isklybray atthay onenay ouldway
avehay uessedgay ethay ainpay eirthay earerway ufferedsay ilinglysmay. Ojay awsay aay igbay
ed-headedray youthay oachingappray erhay orner,cay danay earingfay ehay eantmay otay engageay
er,hay eshay ippedslay intoay aay urtainedcay ecess,ray intendingay otay eeppay danay enjoyay

Ojay ankedthay im,hay danay adlyglay ent,way ishingway eshay adhay otway eatnay oves,glay enwhay
eshay awsay ethay ice,nay earl-coloredpay onesay erhay artnerpay oreway. Ethay allhay asway

danay Aurielay asway inay ethay idstmay ofay naay ountaccay ofay aay udents'stay estivalfay taay

I've"ay ainedspray ymay eanklay. Atthay upidstay ighhay eelhay urned,tay danay avegay emay aay adsay
enchwray. Itay esachay o,say Iay ancay ardlyhay and,stay danay Iay on'tday owknay owhay I'may everay
oinggay otay etgay ome,"hay eshay aid,say ockingray otay danay ofray inay ainpay.

I"ay ewknay you'day urthay youray eetfay ithway osethay illysay oesshay. I'may orrysay. Utbay Iay
on'tday eesay atwhay youay ancay o,day exceptay etgay aay arriage,cay oray aystay erehay lalay
ight,"nay eredansway O,jay oftlysay ubbingray ethay oorpay eanklay saay eshay okespay.

I"ay an'tcay avehay aay arriage,cay ithoutway itsay ostingcay everay osay uchmay. Iay areday aysay Iay
an'tcay etgay oneay taay ;allay orfay ostmay eoplepay omecay inay eirthay own,ay danay it'say aay onglay
ayway otay ethay able,stay danay onay oneay otay end."say

I'll"ay o."gay

O,"Nay indeed!ay It'say astpay ine,nay danay arkday saay Egyptay. Iay an'tcay opstay ere,hay orfay

I'll"ay kasay Aurie;lay ehay illway o,"gay aidsay O,jay ookinglay elievedray saay ethay ideaay

Ercy,"May o!nay On'tday kasay oray elltay yanay oneay. Etgay emay ymay ubbers,ray danay utpay esethay
ippersslay ithway ouray ingsthay. Iay an'tcay anceday yanay ore;may utbay saay oonsay saay uppersay

Ey"Thay earay oinggay outay otay uppersay ownay. I'llay aystay ithway you;ay I'day ather."ray

O,"Nay ear,day unray ong,alay danay ingbray emay omesay offeecay. I'may osay ired,tay Iay an'tcay
ir!"stay

Osay Egmay eclined,ray ithway ubbersray ellway idden,hay danay Ojay entway underingblay ayaway
otay ethay ining-room,day ichwhay eshay oundfay eraftay oinggay intoay aay ina-closet,chay danay
openingay ethay oorday ofay aay oomray erewhay olday Rmay. Ardinergay asway akingtay aay ittlelay
ivatepray efreshmentray. Akingmay aay artday taay ethay able,tay eshay ecuredsay ethay offee,cay
ichwhay eshay immediatelyay ilt,spay erebythay akingmay ethay ontfray ofay erhay essdray saay
adbay saay ethay ackbay.

Oh,"ay ear,day atwhay aay underbussblay Iay "am!ay exclaimeday O,jay inishingfay Eg'smay oveglay
ybay ubbingscray erhay owngay ithway itay.

An"Cay Iay elphay you?"ay aidsay aay iendlyfray oice;vay danay erethay asway Aurie,lay ithway aay
ullfay upcay inay oneay andhay danay aay ateplay ofay iceay inay ethay otheray.

I"ay asway yingtray otay etgay omethingsay orfay Eg,may owhay isay eryvay ired,tay danay omesay oneay
ookshay e;may danay erehay Iay ,amay inay aay icenay ate,"stay eredansway O,jay ancingglay
ismallyday omfray ethay ainedstay irtskay otay ethay offee-coloredcay oveglay.

Oo"Tay ad!bay Iay asway ookinglay orfay omesay oneay otay ivegay isthay otay. Aymay Iay aketay itay otay
youray ister?"say

Oh,"ay ankthay you!ay I'llay owshay youay erewhay eshay isay. Iay on'tday offeray otay aketay itay
yself,may orfay Iay ouldshay onlyay etgay intoay otheranay apescray ifay Iay id."day

Ojay edlay ethay ay;way ,anday saay ifay useday otay aitingway onay adies,lay Aurielay ewdray upay aay
ittlelay able,tay oughtbray aay econdsay instalmentay ofay offeecay danay iceay orfay O,jay danay
asway osay obligingay atthay evenay articularpay Egmay onouncedpray imhay aay Ice"nay oy."bay
Eythay adhay aay errymay imetay overay ethay onbonsbay danay ottoes,may danay ereway inay ethay
idstmay ofay aay uietqay amegay ofay Uzz,""Bay ithway otway oray eethray otheray youngay eoplepay
owhay adhay ayedstray in,ay enwhay Annahhay earedappay. Egmay orgotfay erhay oot,fay danay oseray
osay uicklyqay atthay eshay asway orcedfay otay atchcay oldhay ofay O,jay ithway naay exclamationay
ofay ainpay.

Ush!"Hay On'tday aysay ything,"anay eshay ispered,whay ingadday oud,alay It's"ay othingnay.
Iay urnedtay ymay ootfay aay ittle,lay at'sthay ;all"ay danay impedlay up-stairsay otay utpay erhay
ingsthay onay.

Annahhay olded,scay Egmay ied,cray danay Ojay asway taay erhay its'way end,ay illtay eshay
ecidedday otay aketay ingsthay intoay erhay ownay andshay. Ippingslay out,ay eshay anray own,day
,anday indingfay aay ervant,say edaskay ifay ehay ouldcay etgay erhay aay arriagecay. Itay
appenedhay otay ebay aay iredhay aiter,way owhay ewknay othingnay outabay ethay eighborhood;nay
danay Ojay asway ookinglay oundray orfay elp,hay enwhay Aurie,lay owhay adhay eardhay atwhay eshay
aid,say amecay up,ay danay offereday ishay andfather'sgray arriage,cay ichwhay adhay ustjay
omecay orfay im,hay ehay aidsay.

It's"ay osay early!ay Youay an'tcay eanmay otay ogay yet?"ay eganbay O,jay ookinglay elieved,ray
utbay esitatinghay otay eptaccay ethay offeray.

I"ay aysalway ogay early,--Iay o,day uly!tray Easeplay etlay emay aketay youay ome?hay It'say lalay
onay ymay ay,way youay ow,knay danay itay ains,ray eythay ay."say

Atthay ettledsay it;ay ,anday ellingtay imhay ofay Eg'smay ishap,may Ojay atefullygray
epted,accay danay ushedray upay otay ingbray ownday ethay estray ofay ethay artypay. Annahhay
atedhay ainray saay uchmay saay aay atcay oes;day osay eshay ademay onay ouble,tray danay eythay
olledray ayaway inay ethay uxuriouslay oseclay arriage,cay eelingfay eryvay estivefay danay
elegantay. Aurielay entway onay ethay ox;bay osay Egmay ouldcay eepkay erhay ootfay up,ay danay ethay
irlsgay alkedtay overay eirthay artypay inay eedomfray.

I"ay adhay aay apitalcay imetay. Idday you?"ay edaskay O,jay umplingray upay erhay air,hay danay
akingmay erselfhay omfortablecay.

Yes,"ay illtay Iay urthay yselfmay. Allie'ssay iend,fray Ieannay Offat,may ooktay aay ancyfay otay
e,may danay edaskay emay otay omecay danay endspay aay eekway ithway er,hay enwhay Alliesay oesday.

erfectlypay endid,splay ifay othermay onlyay etslay emay o,"gay eredansway Eg,may eeringchay
upay taay ethay oughtthay.

ice?"nay

adhay aay eliciousday edowaray ithway im."hay

ight-capsnay obbedbay up,ay danay otway eepyslay utbay eageray oicesvay iedcray out,--ay

Ell"Tay outabay ethay arty!pay elltay outabay ethay arty!"pay

Ithway atwhay Egmay alledcay A"ay eatgray antway ofay anners,"may Ojay adhay avedsay omesay
