IVay.

URDENSbay.


Oh"ay ear,day owhay ardhay itay oesday eemsay otay aketay upay ouray ackspay danay ogay on,"ay ighedsay
Eg,may ethay orningmay eraftay ethay arty;pay or,fay ownay ethay olidayshay ereway over,ay ethay
eekway ofay erry-makingmay idday otnay itfay erhay orfay oinggay onay easilyay ithway ethay asktay
eshay evernay ikedlay.

I"ay ishway itay asway Istmaschray oray Ew-Yearnay lalay ethay ime;tay ouldn'tway itay ebay un?"fay
eredansway O,jay yawningay ismallyday.

E"Way ouldn'tshay enjoyay ourselvesay alfhay osay uchmay saay eway oday ownay. Utbay itay oesday
eemsay osay icenay otay avehay ittlelay upperssay danay ouquets,bay danay ogay otay arties,pay danay
ivedray ome,hay danay eadray danay est,ray danay otnay orkway. It'say ikelay otheray eople,pay
youay ow,knay danay Iay aysalway envyay irlsgay owhay oday uchsay ings;thay I'may osay ondfay ofay
uxury,"lay aidsay Eg,may yingtray otay ecideday ichwhay ofay otway abbyshay ownsgay asway ethay
eastlay abbyshay.

Ell,"Way eway an'tcay avehay it,ay osay on'tday etlay usay umble,gray utbay ouldershay ouray
undlesbay danay udgetray ongalay saay eerfullychay saay Armeemay oesday. I'may uresay Untaay
Archmay isay aay egularray Olday Anmay ofay ethay Easay otay e,may utbay Iay upposesay enwhay I'veay
earnedlay otay arrycay erhay ithoutway omplaining,cay eshay illway umbletay off,ay oray etgay osay
ightlay atthay Iay a'n'tshay indmay er."hay

Isthay ideaay ickledtay O'sjay ancy,fay danay utpay erhay inay oodgay irits;spay utbay Egmay
idn'tday ighten,bray orfay erhay urden,bay onsistingcay ofay ourfay oiltspay ildren,chay
eemedsay eavierhay anthay everay. Eshay adn'thay earthay enoughay evenay otay akemay erselfhay
etty,pray saay usual,ay ybay uttingpay onay aay ueblay eck-ribbon,nay danay essingdray erhay
airhay inay ethay ostmay ecomingbay ayway.

Ere's"Whay ethay useay ofay ookinglay ice,nay enwhay onay oneay eessay emay utbay osethay osscray
idgets,may danay onay oneay arescay etherwhay I'may ettypray oray ot?"nay eshay uttered,may
uttingshay erhay awerdray ithway aay erkjay. I"ay allshay avehay otay oiltay danay oilmay lalay ymay
ays,day ithway onlyay ittlelay itsbay ofay unfay ownay danay en,thay danay etgay olday danay uglyay
danay our,say ecausebay I'may oor,pay danay an'tcay enjoyay ymay ifelay saay otheray irlsgay oday.
It'say aay ame!"shay

Osay Egmay entway own,day earingway naay injureday ook,lay danay asn'tway taay lalay eeableagray
taay eakfast-timebray. Everyay oneay eemedsay atherray outay ofay orts,say danay inclineday otay
oakcray. Ethbay adhay aay eadache,hay danay aylay onay ethay ofa,say yingtray otay omfortcay
erselfhay ithway ethay atcay danay eethray ittens;kay Yamay asway ettingfray ecausebay erhay
essonslay ereway otnay earned,lay danay eshay ouldn'tcay indfay erhay ubbers;ray Ojay Ould__way
istlewhay danay akemay aay eatgray acketray ettinggay eady;ray Smray. Archmay asway eryvay usybay
yingtray otay inishfay aay etter,lay ichwhay ustmay ogay taay once;ay danay Annahhay adhay ethay
umps,gray orfay eingbay upay atelay idn'tday uitsay erhay.

Ere"Thay evernay As__way uchsay aay osscray amily!"fay iedcray O,jay osinglay erhay empertay
enwhay eshay adhay upsetay naay inkstand,ay okenbray othbay oot-lacings,bay danay atsay ownday
uponay erhay athay.

You're"ay ethay ossestcray ersonpay inay it!"ay eturnedray Y,amay ashingway outay ethay um,say
atthay asway lalay ong,wray ithway ethay earstay atthay adhay allenfay onay erhay ateslay.

Eth,"Bay ifay youay on'tday eepkay esethay orridhay atscay ownday ellarcay I'llay avehay emthay
owned,"dray exclaimeday Egmay ily,angray saay eshay iedtray otay etgay idray ofay ethay itten,kay
ichwhay adhay ambledscray upay erhay ack,bay danay uckstay ikelay aay urrbay ustjay outay ofay
eachray.

Ojay aughed,lay Egmay olded,scay Ethbay implored,ay danay Yamay ailed,way ecausebay eshay
ouldn'tcay ememberray owhay uchmay inenay imestay elvetway asway.

Irls,"Gay irls,gay oday ebay uietqay oneay inute!may Iay Ust__may etgay isthay offay ybay ethay
earlyay ail,may danay youay ivedray emay istractedday ithway youray orry,"way iedcray Smray.
Arch,may ossingcray outay ethay irdthay oiltspay entencesay inay erhay etterlay.

Erethay asway aay omentarymay ull,lay okenbray ybay Annah,hay owhay alkedstay in,ay aidlay otway
othay urn-overstay onay ethay able,tay danay alkedstay outay ainagay. Esethay urn-overstay
ereway naay institution;ay danay ethay irlsgay alledcay emthay Uffs,""may orfay eythay adhay onay
others,ay danay oundfay ethay othay iespay eryvay omfortingcay otay eirthay andshay onay oldcay
orningsmay. Annahhay evernay orgotfay otay akemay em,thay onay attermay owhay usybay oray umpygray
eshay ightmay e,bay orfay ethay alkway asway onglay danay eak;blay ethay oorpay ingsthay otgay onay
otheray unch,lay danay ereway eldomsay omehay eforebay otway.

Uddle"Cay youray ats,cay danay etgay overay youray eadache,hay Ethybay. Ood-by,gay Armee;may
eway earay aay etsay ofay ascalsray isthay orning,may utbay e'llway omecay omehay egularray
elsangay. Ownay en,thay Eg!"may danay Ojay ampedtray ay,away eelingfay atthay ethay ilgrimspay
ereway otnay ettingsay outay saay eythay oughtay otay oday.

Eythay aysalway ookedlay ackbay eforebay urningtay ethay orner,cay orfay eirthay othermay asway
aysalway taay ethay indow,way otay odnay danay ile,smay danay aveway erhay andhay otay emthay.
Omehowsay itay eemedsay saay ifay eythay ouldn'tcay avehay otgay oughthray ethay ayday ithoutway
at;thay or,fay ateverwhay eirthay oodmay ightmay e,bay ethay astlay impseglay ofay atthay
otherlymay acefay asway uresay otay ectaffay emthay ikelay unshinesay.

If"ay Armeemay ookshay erhay istfay insteaday ofay issingkay erhay andhay otay us,ay itay ouldway
ervesay usay ight,ray orfay oremay ungratefulay etcheswray anthay eway earay ereway evernay
een,"say iedcray O,jay akingtay aay emorsefulray atisfactionsay inay ethay owysnay alkway danay
itterbay indway.

On't"Day useay uchsay eadfuldray expressions,"ay aidsay Eg,may omfray ethay epthsday ofay ethay
ailvay inay ichwhay eshay adhay oudedshray erselfhay ikelay aay unnay icksay ofay ethay orldway.

I"ay ikelay oodgay ongstray ords,way atthay eanmay omething,"say epliedray O,jay atchingcay
erhay athay saay itay ooktay aay eaplay offay erhay ead,hay eparatorypray otay yingflay ayaway
ogetheraltay.

All"Cay yourselfay yanay amesnay youay ike;lay utbay I__ay maay eithernay aay ascalray ornay aay
etch,wray danay Iay on'tday oosechay otay ebay alledcay o."say

You're"ay aay ightedblay eing,bay danay ecidedlyday osscray o-daytay ecausebay youay an'tcay
itsay inay ethay aplay ofay uxurylay lalay ethay imetay. Oorpay ear,day ustjay aitway illtay Iay akemay
ymay ortune,fay danay youay allshay evelray inay arriagescay danay ice-creamay danay
igh-heeledhay ippersslay danay osiespay danay ed-headedray oysbay otay anceday ith."way

Ow"Hay idiculousray youay e,aray O!"jay utbay Egmay aughedlay taay ethay onsense,nay danay eltfay
etterbay inay itespay ofay erselfhay.

Ucky"Lay orfay youay Iay ;amay orfay ifay Iay utpay onay ushedcray irs,aay danay iedtray otay ebay
ismal,day saay youay o,day eway ouldshay ebay inay aay icenay atestay. Ankthay oodness,gay Iay ancay
aysalway indfay omethingsay unnyfay otay eepkay emay upay. On'tday oakcray yanay ore,may utbay
omecay omehay olly,jay ere'sthay aay ear."day

Ojay avegay erhay istersay naay encouragingay atpay onay ethay ouldershay saay eythay artedpay orfay
ethay ay,day eachay oinggay aay ifferentday ay,way eachay ugginghay erhay ittlelay armway
urn-over,tay danay eachay yingtray otay ebay eerfulchay inay itespay ofay intryway eather,way
ardhay ork,way danay ethay unsatisfieday esiresday ofay easure-lovingplay youthay.

Enwhay Rmay. Archmay ostlay ishay opertypray inay yingtray otay elphay naay unfortunateay
iend,fray ethay otway oldestay irlsgay eggedbay otay ebay owedallay otay oday omethingsay owardtay
eirthay ownay upport,say taay eastlay. Elievingbay atthay eythay ouldcay otnay eginbay ootay
earlyay otay ultivatecay energy,ay industry,ay danay independence,ay eirthay arentspay
onsented,cay danay othbay ellfay otay orkway ithway ethay eartyhay ood-willgay ichwhay inay
itespay ofay lalay obstacles,ay isay uresay otay ucceedsay taay astlay. Argaretmay oundfay aay
aceplay saay urserynay overness,gay danay eltfay ichray ithway erhay allsmay alarysay. Saay eshay
aid,say eshay As__way Ond"fay ofay uxury,"lay danay erhay iefchay oubletray asway overtypay. Eshay
oundfay itay arderhay otay earbay anthay ethay others,ay ecausebay eshay ouldcay ememberray aay
imetay enwhay omehay asway eautiful,bay ifelay ullfay ofay easeay danay easure,play danay antway
ofay yanay indkay unknownay. Eshay iedtray otnay otay ebay enviousay oray iscontented,day utbay itay
asway eryvay aturalnay atthay ethay youngay irlgay ouldshay onglay orfay ettypray ings,thay aygay
iends,fray omplishments,accay danay aay appyhay ifelay. Taay ethay Ings'kay eshay ailyday awsay
lalay eshay anted,way orfay ethay ildren'schay olderay isterssay ereway ustjay out,ay danay Egmay
aughtcay equentfray impsesglay ofay aintyday all-dressesbay danay ouquets,bay eardhay
ivelylay ossipgay outabay eatres,thay oncerts,cay eighingslay arties,pay danay
erry-makingsmay ofay lalay inds,kay danay awsay oneymay avishedlay onay iflestray ichwhay
ouldway avehay eenbay osay eciouspray otay erhay. Oorpay Egmay eldomsay omplained,cay utbay aay
ensesay ofay injusticeay ademay erhay eelfay itterbay owardtay everyay oneay ometimes,say orfay
eshay adhay otnay yetay earnedlay otay owknay owhay ichray eshay asway inay ethay essingsblay ichwhay
onealay ancay akemay ifelay appyhay.

Ojay appenedhay otay uitsay Untaay Arch,may owhay asway ame,lay danay eedednay naay iveactay
ersonpay otay aitway uponay erhay. Ethay ildlesschay olday adylay adhay offereday otay optaday oneay
ofay ethay irlsgay enwhay ethay oublestray ame,cay danay asway uchmay offendeday ecausebay erhay
offeray asway eclinedday. Otheray iendsfray oldtay ethay Archesmay atthay eythay adhay ostlay
lalay ancechay ofay eingbay ememberedray inay ethay ichray olday ady'slay ill;way utbay ethay
unworldlyay Archesmay onlyay aid,--say

E"Way an'tcay ivegay upay ouray irlsgay orfay aay ozenday ortunesfay. Ichray oray oor,pay eway illway
eepkay ogethertay danay ebay appyhay inay oneay other."anay

Ethay olday adylay ouldn'tway eakspay otay emthay orfay aay ime,tay utbay appeninghay otay eetmay Ojay
taay aay iend's,fray omethingsay inay erhay omicalcay acefay danay untblay annersmay uckstray
ethay olday ady'slay ancy,fay danay eshay oposedpray otay aketay erhay orfay aay ompanioncay. Isthay
idday otnay uitsay Ojay taay ;allay utbay eshay eptedaccay ethay aceplay incesay othingnay etterbay
eared,appay ,anday otay everyay one'say urprise,say otgay onay emarkablyray ellway ithway erhay
irascibleay elativeray. Erethay asway naay occasionalay empest,tay danay onceay Ojay adhay
archedmay ome,hay eclaringday eshay ouldn'tcay earbay itay yanay onger;lay utbay Untaay Archmay
aysalway earedclay upay uickly,qay danay entsay orfay erhay ackbay ainagay ithway uchsay urgencyay
atthay eshay ouldcay otnay efuse,ray orfay inay erhay earthay eshay atherray ikedlay ethay epperypay
olday adylay.

Iay uspectsay atthay ethay ealray actionattray asway aay argelay ibrarylay ofay inefay ooks,bay
ichwhay asway eftlay otay ustday danay idersspay incesay Uncleay Archmay iedday. Ojay ememberedray
ethay indkay olday entleman,gay owhay useday otay etlay erhay uildbay ailroadsray danay idgesbray
ithway ishay igbay ictionaries,day elltay erhay oriesstay outabay ethay ueerqay icturespay inay
ishay Atinlay ooks,bay danay uybay erhay ardscay ofay ingerbreadgay eneverwhay ehay etmay erhay inay
ethay eetstray. Ethay im,day ustyday oom,ray ithway ethay ustsbay aringstay ownday omfray ethay
alltay ook-cases,bay ethay osycay airs,chay ethay obes,glay ,anday estbay ofay ,allay ethay
ildernessway ofay ooks,bay inay ichwhay eshay ouldcay anderway erewhay eshay iked,lay ademay ethay
ibrarylay aay egionray ofay issblay otay erhay. Ethay omentmay Untaay Archmay ooktay erhay ap,nay oray
asway usybay ithway ompany,cay Ojay urriedhay otay isthay uietqay ace,play ,anday urlingcay
erselfhay upay inay ethay easy-chair,ay evouredday oetry,pay omance,ray istory,hay
avels,tray danay ictures,pay ikelay aay egularray ook-wormbay. Ut,bay ikelay lalay
appiness,hay itay idday otnay astlay ong;lay orfay saay uresay saay eshay adhay ustjay eachedray ethay
earthay ofay ethay ory,stay ethay eetestsway ersevay ofay ethay ong,say oray ethay ostmay erilouspay
entureadvay ofay erhay aveller,tray aay illshray oicevay alled,cay Osy-phine!"Jay
Osy-phine!"jay danay eshay adhay otay eavelay erhay aradisepay otay indway yarn,ay ashway ethay
oodle,pay oray eadray Elsham'sbay Essaysay ybay ethay ourhay ogethertay.

Illustration:[ay Urlingcay erselfhay upay inay ethay igbay air]chay

O'sjay itionambay asway otay oday omethingsay eryvay endid;splay atwhay itay asway eshay adhay onay
idea,ay saay yet,ay utbay eftlay itay orfay imetay otay elltay er;hay ,anday eanwhile,may oundfay
erhay eatestgray ictionafflay inay ethay actfay atthay eshay ouldn'tcay ead,ray un,ray danay
ideray saay uchmay saay eshay ikedlay. Aay uickqay emper,tay arpshay ongue,tay danay estlessray
iritspay ereway aysalway ettinggay erhay intoay apes,scray danay erhay ifelay asway aay eriessay
ofay upsay danay owns,day ichwhay ereway othbay omiccay danay atheticpay. Utbay ethay ainingtray
eshay eceivedray taay Untaay Arch'smay asway ustjay atwhay eshay eeded;nay danay ethay oughtthay
atthay eshay asway oingday omethingsay otay upportsay erselfhay ademay erhay appy,hay inay itespay
ofay ethay erpetualpay Osy-phine!""Jay

Ethbay asway ootay ashfulbay otay ogay otay ool;schay itay adhay eenbay ied,tray utbay eshay
ufferedsay osay uchmay atthay itay asway ivengay up,ay danay eshay idday erhay essonslay taay ome,hay
ithway erhay atherfay. Evenay enwhay ehay entway ay,away danay erhay othermay asway alledcay otay
evoteday erhay illskay danay energyay otay Oldiers'say Idaay Ocieties,say Ethbay entway
aithfullyfay onay ybay erself,hay danay idday ethay estbay eshay ouldcay. Eshay asway aay
ousewifelyhay ittlelay eature,cray danay elpedhay Annahhay eepkay omehay eatnay danay
omfortablecay orfay ethay orkers,way evernay inkingthay ofay yanay ewardray utbay otay ebay
ovedlay. Ong,lay uietqay aysday eshay ent,spay otnay onelylay ornay idle,ay orfay erhay ittlelay
orldway asway eopledpay ithway imaginaryay iends,fray danay eshay asway ybay aturenay aay usybay
eebay. Erethay ereway ixsay ollsday otay ebay akentay upay danay esseddray everyay orning,may orfay
Ethbay asway aay ildchay ill,stay danay ovedlay erhay etspay saay ellway saay everay. Otnay oneay
olewhay oray andsomehay oneay ongamay em;thay lalay ereway outcastsay illtay Ethbay ooktay emthay
in;ay or,fay enwhay erhay isterssay outgreway esethay idols,ay eythay assedpay otay er,hay
ecausebay Yamay ouldway avehay othingnay olday oray uglyay. Ethbay erishedchay emthay lalay ethay
oremay enderlytay orfay atthay eryvay eason,ray danay etsay upay aay ospitalhay orfay infirmay
ollsday. Onay inspay ereway everay uckstay intoay eirthay ottoncay itals;vay onay arshhay ordsway
oray owsblay ereway everay ivengay em;thay onay eglectnay everay addenedsay ethay earthay ofay ethay
ostmay epulsive:ray utbay lalay ereway edfay danay othed,clay ursednay danay aressed,cay ithway
naay ectionaffay ichwhay evernay ailedfay. Oneay orlornfay agmentfray ofay Ollanity__day adhay
elongedbay otay O;jay ,anday avinghay edlay aay empestuoustay ife,lay asway eftlay aay eckwray inay
ethay ag-bag,ray omfray ichwhay earydray oorhousepay itay asway escuedray ybay Eth,bay danay
akentay otay erhay efugeray. Avinghay onay optay otay itsay ead,hay eshay iedtay onay aay eatnay
ittlelay ap,cay ,anday saay othbay sarmay danay egslay ereway one,gay eshay idhay esethay
eficienciesday ybay oldingfay itay inay aay anket,blay danay evotingday erhay estbay edbay otay
isthay onicchray invaliday. Ifay yanay oneay adhay ownknay ethay arecay avishedlay onay atthay
olly,day Iay inkthay itay ouldway avehay ouchedtay eirthay earts,hay evenay ilewhay eythay
aughedlay. Eshay oughtbray itay itsbay ofay ouquets;bay eshay eadray otay it,ay ooktay itay outay otay
eathebray ethay ir,aay iddenhay underay erhay oat;cay eshay ungsay itay ullabys,lay danay evernay
entway otay edbay ithoutway issingkay itsay irtyday ace,fay danay isperingwhay enderly,tay I"ay
opehay you'llay avehay aay oodgay ight,nay ymay oorpay ear."day

Ethbay adhay erhay oublestray saay ellway saay ethay others;ay danay otnay eingbay naay el,angay utbay
aay eryvay umanhay ittlelay irl,gay eshay oftenay Ept"way aay ittlelay eep,"way saay Ojay aid,say
ecausebay eshay ouldn'tcay aketay usicmay essonslay danay avehay aay inefay ianopay. Eshay ovedlay
usicmay osay early,day iedtray osay ardhay otay earn,lay danay actisedpray ayaway osay atientlypay
taay ethay inglingjay olday instrument,ay atthay itay idday eemsay saay ifay omesay oneay Ot(nay otay
inthay Untaay Arch)may oughtay otay elphay erhay. Obodynay id,day owever,hay danay obodynay awsay
Ethbay ipeway ethay earstay offay ethay yelloway eys,kay atthay ouldn'tway eepkay inay une,tay
enwhay eshay asway lalay onealay. Eshay angsay ikelay aay ittlelay arklay outabay erhay ork,way
evernay asway ootay iredtay otay ayplay orfay Armeemay danay ethay irls,gay danay ayday eraftay ayday
aidsay opefullyhay otay erself,hay I"ay owknay I'llay etgay ymay usicmay omesay ime,tay ifay I'may
ood."gay

Erethay earay anymay Ethsbay inay ethay orld,way yshay danay uiet,qay ittingsay inay ornerscay

acrificessay illtay ethay ittlelay icketcray onay ethay earthhay opsstay irping,chay danay ethay
eet,sway unshinysay esencepray anishes,vay eavinglay ilencesay danay adowshay ehindbay.

ouldway avehay eredansway taay once,ay Y"May ose."nay Enwhay eshay asway aay aby,bay Ojay adhay

ouldcay otnay ivegay itay naay istocraticaray ointpay. Onay oneay indedmay itay utbay erself,hay
danay itay asway oingday itsay estbay otay ow,gray utbay Yamay eltfay eeplyday ethay antway ofay aay
Eciangray ose,nay danay ewdray olewhay eetsshay ofay andsomehay onesay otay onsolecay erselfhay.

Ittle"Lay Aphael,"ray saay erhay isterssay alledcay er,hay adhay aay ecidedday alenttay orfay

eacherstay omplainedcay at,thay insteaday ofay oingday erhay ums,say eshay overedcay erhay
ateslay ithway imals;anay ethay ankblay agespay ofay erhay asatlay ereway useday otay opycay apsmay

ood-tempered,gay danay ossessingpay ethay appyhay taray ofay easingplay ithoutway effortay.

omplishments;accay orfay esidebay erhay awing,dray eshay ouldcay ayplay elvetway unes,tay

Yamay asway inay aay airfay ayway otay ebay oilt;spay orfay everyay oneay ettedpay er,hay danay erhay

owever,hay atherray uenchedqay ethay anities;vay eshay adhay otay earway erhay ousin'scay
othesclay. Ownay Orence'sflay ammamay adn'thay aay articlepay ofay aste,tay danay Yamay
ufferedsay eeplyday taay avinghay otay earway aay edray insteaday ofay aay ueblay onnet,bay

ood,gay ellway ade,may danay ittlelay orn;way utbay Y'samay isticartay eyesay ereway uchmay
icted,afflay especiallyay isthay inter,way enwhay erhay oolschay essdray asway aay ullday
urple,pay ithway yelloway ots,day danay onay immingtray.

Y"May onlyay omfort,"cay eshay aidsay otay Eg,may ithway earstay inay erhay eyes,ay Is,"ay atthay
othermay on'tday aketay uckstay inay ymay essesdray eneverwhay I'may aughty,nay saay Ariamay

Egmay asway Y'samay onfidantcay danay onitor,may ,anday ybay omesay angestray actionattray ofay

ethay aternalmay instinctay ofay ittlelay omenway.

Augh?"Lay Otnay one!ay Eythay atsay saay illstay saay ice;may danay Usiesay iedcray uarts,qay Iay

I"ay awsay omethingsay atthay Iay ikedlay isthay orning,may danay Iay eantmay otay elltay itay taay
inner,day utbay Iay orgot,"fay aidsay Eth,bay uttingpay O'sjay opsy-turvytay asketbay inay
orderay saay eshay alkedtay. En"Whay Iay entway otay etgay omesay oystersay orfay Annah,hay Rmay.
Aurencelay asway inay ethay ish-shop;fay utbay ehay idn'tday eesay e,may orfay Iay eptkay ehindbay aay
arrel,bay danay ehay asway usybay ithway Rmay. Utter,cay ethay ish-manfay. Aay oorpay omanway amecay
in,ay ithway aay ailpay danay aay op,may danay edaskay Rmay. Uttercay ifay ehay ouldway etlay erhay oday
omesay ubbingscray orfay aay itbay ofay ish,fay ecausebay eshay adn'thay yanay innerday orfay erhay
ildren,chay danay adhay eenbay isappointedday ofay aay ay'sday orkway. Rmay. Uttercay asway inay aay
urry,hay danay aidsay O,''Nay atherray ossly;cray osay eshay asway oinggay ay,away ookinglay
ungryhay danay orry,say enwhay Rmay. Aurencelay ookedhay upay aay igbay ishfay ithway ethay
ookedcray enday ofay ishay ane,cay danay eldhay itay outay otay erhay. Eshay asway osay adglay danay
urprised,say eshay ooktay itay ightray inay erhay ,armsay danay ankedthay imhay overay danay overay.
Ehay oldtay erhay otay O'gay ongalay danay ookcay it,'ay danay eshay urriedhay off,ay osay appy!hay
Asn'tway itay oodgay ofay im?hay Oh,ay eshay idday ooklay osay unny,fay ugginghay ethay ig,bay
ipperyslay ish,fay danay opinghay Rmay. Aurence'slay edbay inay eavenhay ouldway ebay Aisy.'"'ay

Enwhay eythay adhay aughedlay taay Eth'sbay ory,stay eythay edaskay eirthay othermay orfay one;ay

As"ay Iay atsay uttingcay outay ueblay annelflay acketsjay o-day,tay taay ethay ooms,ray Iay eltfay
eryvay iousanxay outabay ather,fay danay oughtthay owhay onelylay danay elplesshay eway ouldshay
e,bay ifay ythinganay appenedhay otay imhay. Itay asway otnay aay iseway ingthay otay o;day utbay Iay
eptkay onay orrying,way illtay naay olday anmay amecay in,ay ithway naay orderay orfay omesay
othesclay. Ehay atsay ownday earnay e,may danay Iay eganbay otay alktay otay im;hay orfay ehay ookedlay
oorpay danay iredtay danay iousanxay.

Ave"'Hay youay onssay inay ethay y?'armay Iay ed;askay orfay ethay otenay ehay oughtbray asway otnay
otay emay.

Yes,"'ay a'ammay. Iay adhay our,fay utbay otway ereway illed,kay oneay isay aay isoner,pray danay
I'may oinggay otay ethay other,ay owhay isay eryvay icksay inay aay Ashingtonway ospital,'hay ehay
eredansway uietlyqay.

You"'ay avehay oneday aay eatgray ealday orfay youray ountry,cay ir,'say Iay aid,say eelingfay
espectray ow,nay insteaday ofay itypay.

Ot"'Nay aay itemay oremay anthay Iay ought,ay a'ammay. I'day ogay yself,may ifay Iay asway yanay use;ay
saay Iay in't,aay Iay ivegay ymay oys,bay danay ivegay Em'ay ee.'fray

E"Hay okespay osay eerfully,chay ookedlay osay incere,say danay eemedsay osay adglay otay ivegay
ishay ,allay atthay Iay asway amedashay ofay yselfmay. I'day ivengay oneay an,may danay oughtthay itay
ootay uch,may ilewhay ehay avegay our,fay ithoutway udginggray emthay. Iay adhay lalay ymay irlsgay
otay omfortcay emay taay ome;hay danay ishay astlay onsay asway aiting,way ilesmay ay,away otay aysay
Ood'gay y'bay otay im,hay erhaps!pay Iay eltfay osay ich,ray osay appy,hay inkingthay ofay ymay
essings,blay atthay Iay ademay imhay aay icenay undle,bay avegay imhay omesay oney,may danay
ankedthay imhay eartilyhay orfay ethay essonlay ehay adhay aughttay e."may

Ell"Tay otheranay ory,stay other,--onemay ithway aay oralmay otay it,ay ikelay isthay. Iay ikelay
otay inkthay outabay emthay erwards,aftay ifay eythay earay eal,ray danay otnay ootay eachy,"pray
aidsay O,jay eraftay aay inute'smay ilencesay.

Smray. Archmay iled,smay danay eganbay taay once;ay orfay eshay adhay oldtay oriesstay otay isthay
ittlelay udienceaay orfay anymay years,ay danay ewknay owhay otay easeplay emthay.

Once"ay uponay aay ime,tay erethay ereway ourfay irls,gay owhay adhay enoughay otay eatay danay
inkdray danay ear,way aay oodgay anymay omfortscay danay easures,play indkay iendsfray danay
arents,pay owhay ovedlay emthay early,day danay yetay eythay ereway otnay ontented."cay Ere(Hay
ethay istenerslay olestay yslay ookslay taay oneay other,anay danay eganbay otay ewsay
iligently.)day Ese"Thay irlsgay ereway iousanxay otay ebay ood,gay danay ademay anymay
excellentay esolutions;ray utbay eythay idday otnay eepkay emthay eryvay ell,way danay ereway
onstantlycay aying,say If'ay eway onlyay adhay is,'thay oray If'ay eway ouldcay onlyay oday at,'thay
uiteqay orgettingfay owhay uchmay eythay eadyalray ad,hay danay owhay anymay easantplay ingsthay
eythay uallyactay ouldcay oday. Osay eythay edaskay naay olday omanway atwhay ellspay eythay ouldcay
useay otay akemay emthay appy,hay danay eshay aid,say En'Whay youay eelfay iscontented,day inkthay
overay youray essings,blay danay ebay ateful.'"gray Ere(Hay Ojay ookedlay upay uickly,qay saay
ifay outabay otay eak,spay utbay angedchay erhay ind,may eeingsay atthay ethay orystay asway otnay
oneday yet.)ay

Eing"Bay ensiblesay irls,gay eythay ecidedday otay ytray erhay ice,advay danay oonsay ereway
urprisedsay otay eesay owhay ellway offay eythay ereway. Oneay iscoveredday atthay oneymay
ouldn'tcay eepkay ameshay danay orrowsay outay ofay ichray eople'spay ouses;hay otheranay
at,thay oughthay eshay asway oor,pay eshay asway aay eatgray ealday appier,hay ithway erhay youth,ay
ealth,hay danay oodgay irits,spay anthay aay ertaincay etful,fray eeblefay olday ady,lay owhay
ouldn'tcay enjoyay erhay omforts;cay aay irdthay at,thay isagreeableday saay itay asway otay
elphay etgay inner,day itay asway arderhay illstay otay avehay otay ogay eggingbay orfay it;ay danay
ethay ourth,fay atthay evenay arneliancay ingsray ereway otnay osay aluablevay saay oodgay
ehaviorbay. Osay eythay eedagray otay opstay omplaining,cay otay enjoyay ethay essingsblay
eadyalray ossessed,pay danay ytray otay eserveday em,thay estlay eythay ouldshay ebay akentay
ayaway entirely,ay insteaday ofay increased;ay danay Iay elievebay eythay ereway evernay
isappointed,day oray orrysay atthay eythay ooktay ethay olday oman'sway ice."advay

Ow,"Nay Armee,may atthay isay eryvay unningcay ofay youay otay urntay ouray ownay oriesstay
ainstagay us,ay danay ivegay usay aay ermonsay insteaday ofay aay omance!"ray iedcray Egmay.

I"ay ikelay atthay indkay ofay ermonsay. It'say ethay ortsay atherfay useday otay elltay us,"ay aidsay
Ethbay oughtfully,thay uttingpay ethay eedlesnay aightstray onay O'sjay ushioncay.

I"ay on'tday omplaincay earnay saay uchmay saay ethay othersay o,day danay Iay allshay ebay oremay
arefulcay anthay everay ow;nay orfay I'veay adhay arningway omfray Usie'ssay ownfall,"day aidsay
Yamay orallymay.

E"Way eedednay atthay esson,lay danay eway on'tway orgetfay itay. Ifay eway o,day youay ustjay aysay
otay us,ay saay olday Oechlay idday inay Uncle'ay Om,'tay Ink'Tay obay yeray arcies,may illen!chay
inktay obay yeray arcies!'"may edadday O,jay owhay ouldcay ot,nay orfay ethay ifelay ofay er,hay
elphay ettinggay aay orselmay ofay unfay outay ofay ethay ittlelay ermon,say oughthay eshay ooktay
itay otay earthay saay uchmay saay yanay ofay emthay.

Vay.

EINGbay EIGHBORLYnay.


Illustration:[ay Eingbay eighborly]nay

At"Whay inay ethay orldway earay youay oinggay otay oday ow,nay O?"jay edaskay Eg,may oneay owysnay
ernoon,aftay saay erhay istersay amecay ampingtray oughthray ethay all,hay inay ubberray
oots,bay olday acksay danay ood,hay ithway aay oombray inay oneay andhay danay aay ovelshay inay ethay
otheray.

Oing"Gay outay orfay exercise,"ay eredansway O,jay ithway aay ischievousmay inkletway inay erhay
eyesay.

I"ay ouldshay inkthay otway onglay alksway isthay orningmay ouldway avehay eenbay enough!ay It'say
oldcay danay ullday out;ay danay Iay iseadvay youay otay ay,stay armway danay y,dray ybay ethay ire,fay
saay Iay o,"day aidsay Eg,may ithway aay ivershay.

Ever"Nay aketay ice!advay An'tcay eepkay illstay lalay ay,day ,anday otnay eingbay aay ussycat,pay
Iay on'tday ikelay otay ozeday ybay ethay irefay. Iay ikelay entures,advay danay I'may oinggay otay
indfay ome."say

Egmay entway ackbay otay oasttay erhay eetfay danay eadray Ivanhoe";"ay danay Ojay eganbay otay igday
athspay ithway eatgray energyay. Ethay owsnay asway ight,lay danay ithway erhay oombray eshay oonsay
eptsway aay athpay lalay oundray ethay arden,gay orfay Ethbay otay alkway inay enwhay ethay unsay amecay
out;ay danay ethay invaliday ollsday eedednay iraay. Ow,nay ethay ardengay eparatedsay ethay
Arches'may ousehay omfray atthay ofay Rmay. Aurencelay. Othbay oodstay inay aay uburbsay ofay ethay
ity,cay ichwhay asway illstay ountry-like,cay ithway ovesgray danay awns,lay argelay
ardens,gay danay uietqay eetsstray. Aay owlay edgehay artedpay ethay otway estatesay. Onay oneay
idesay asway naay old,ay ownbray ouse,hay ookinglay atherray arebay danay abby,shay obbedray ofay
ethay inesvay atthay inay ummersay overedcay itsay alls,way danay ethay owersflay ichwhay enthay
urroundedsay itay. Onay ethay otheray idesay asway aay atelystay onestay ansion,may ainlyplay
etokeningbay everyay ortsay ofay omfortcay danay uxury,lay omfray ethay igbay oach-housecay
danay ell-keptway oundsgray otay ethay onservatorycay danay ethay impsesglay ofay ovelylay
ingsthay oneay aughtcay etweenbay ethay ichray urtainscay. Yetay itay eemedsay aay onely,lay
ifelesslay ortsay ofay ouse;hay orfay onay ildrenchay olickedfray onay ethay awn,lay onay
otherlymay acefay everay iledsmay taay ethay indows,way danay ewfay eoplepay entway inay danay
out,ay exceptay ethay olday entlemangay danay ishay andsongray.

Otay O'sjay ivelylay ancy,fay isthay inefay ousehay eemedsay aay indkay ofay enchanteday alace,pay
ullfay ofay endorssplay danay elights,day ichwhay onay oneay enjoyeday. Eshay adhay onglay
antedway otay eholdbay esethay iddenhay ories,glay danay otay owknay ethay Aurence"Lay oy,"bay
owhay ookedlay saay ifay ehay ouldway ikelay otay ebay own,knay ifay ehay onlyay ewknay owhay otay
eginbay. Incesay ethay arty,pay eshay adhay eenbay oremay eageray anthay ever,ay danay adhay
annedplay anymay aysway ofay akingmay iendsfray ithway im;hay utbay ehay adhay otnay eenbay eensay
ately,lay danay Ojay eganbay otay inkthay ehay adhay onegay ay,away enwhay eshay oneay ayday iedspay aay
ownbray acefay taay naay upperay indow,way ookinglay istfullyway ownday intoay eirthay arden,gay
erewhay Ethbay danay Yamay ereway ow-ballingsnay oneay otheranay.

At"Thay oybay isay ufferingsay orfay ocietysay danay un,"fay eshay aidsay otay erselfhay. Is"Hay
andpagray oesday otnay owknay at'swhay oodgay orfay im,hay danay eepskay imhay utshay upay lalay
onealay. Ehay eedsnay aay artypay ofay ollyjay oysbay otay ayplay ith,way oray omebodysay youngay
danay ivelylay. I'veay aay eatgray indmay otay ogay overay danay elltay ethay olday entlemangay o!"say

Ethay ideaay usedamay O,jay owhay ikedlay otay oday aringday ings,thay danay asway aysalway
andalizingscay Egmay ybay erhay ueerqay erformancespay. Ethay anplay ofay Oing"gay over"ay asway
otnay orgotten;fay danay enwhay ethay owysnay ernoonaftay ame,cay Ojay esolvedray otay ytray
atwhay ouldcay ebay oneday. Eshay awsay Rmay. Aurencelay ivedray off,ay danay enthay alliedsay outay
otay igday erhay ayway ownday otay ethay edge,hay erewhay eshay aused,pay danay ooktay aay urveysay.
Lalay uiet,--curtainsqay ownday taay ethay owerlay indows;way ervantssay outay ofay ight,say
danay othingnay umanhay isiblevay utbay aay urlycay ackblay eadhay eaninglay onay aay inthay andhay
taay ethay upperay indowway.

Ere"Thay ehay is,"ay oughtthay O,jay Oor"pay oy!bay lalay onealay danay icksay isthay ismalday
ayday. It'say aay ame!shay I'llay osstay upay aay ow-ball,snay danay akemay imhay ooklay out,ay danay
enthay aysay aay indkay ordway otay im."hay

Upay entway aay andfulhay ofay oftsay ow,snay danay ethay eadhay urnedtay taay once,ay owingshay aay
acefay ichwhay ostlay itsay istlesslay ooklay inay aay inute,may saay ethay igbay eyesay
ightenedbray danay ethay outhmay eganbay otay ilesmay. Ojay oddednay danay aughed,lay danay
ourishedflay erhay oombray saay eshay alledcay out,--ay

Ow"Hay oday youay o?day Earay youay ick?"say

Aurielay openeday ethay indow,way danay oakedcray outay saay oarselyhay saay aay aven,--ray

Etter,"Bay ankthay youay. I'veay adhay aay adbay old,cay danay eenbay utshay upay aay eek."way

I'm"ay orrysay. Atwhay oday youay useamay yourselfay ith?"way

Othing;"Nay it'say saay ullday saay ombstay upay ere."hay

On't"Day youay ead?"ray

Ot"Nay uch;may eythay on'tway etlay e."may

An't"Cay omebodysay eadray otay you?"ay

Andpa"Gray oes,day ometimes;say utbay ymay ooksbay on'tday interestay im,hay danay Iay atehay otay
kasay Ookebray lalay ethay ime."tay

Ave"Hay omesay oneay omecay danay eesay you,ay en."thay

Ere"Thay isn'tay yanay oneay I'day ikelay otay eesay. Oysbay akemay uchsay aay ow,ray danay ymay eadhay
isay eak."way

Isn't"ay erethay omesay icenay irlgay o'dwhay eadray danay useamay you?ay Irlsgay earay uiet,qay
danay ikelay otay ayplay urse."nay

On't"Day owknay y."anay

You"ay owknay us,"ay eganbay O,jay enthay aughed,lay danay oppedstay.

O"Say Iay o!day Illway youay ome,cay ease?"play iedcray Aurielay.

I'm"ay otnay uietqay danay ice;nay utbay I'llay ome,cay ifay othermay illway etlay emay. I'llay ogay
kasay erhay. Utshay atthay indow,way ikelay aay oodgay oy,bay danay aitway illtay Iay ome."cay

Ithway at,thay Ojay oulderedshay erhay oombray danay archedmay intoay ethay ouse,hay onderingway
atwhay eythay ouldway lalay aysay otay erhay. Aurielay asway inay aay utterflay ofay excitementay taay
ethay ideaay ofay avinghay ompany,cay danay ewflay outabay otay etgay eady;ray or,fay saay Smray.
Archmay aid,say ehay asway A"ay ittlelay entleman,"gay danay idday onorhay otay ethay omingcay
uestgay ybay ushingbray ishay urlycay ate,pay uttingpay onay aay eshfray ollar,cay danay yingtray
otay idytay upay ethay oom,ray ich,whay inay itespay ofay alfhay aay ozenday ervants,say asway
ythinganay utbay eatnay. Esentlypray erethay amecay aay oudlay ing,ray enthay aay ecidedday
oice,vay ingaskay orfay R"May. Aurie,"lay danay aay urprised-lookingsay ervantsay amecay
unningray upay otay ounceannay aay youngay adylay.

All"ay ight,ray owshay erhay up,ay it'say Issmay O,"jay aidsay Aurie,lay oinggay otay ethay oorday
ofay ishay ittlelay arlorpay otay eetmay O,jay owhay eared,appay ookinglay osyray danay indkay danay
uiteqay taay erhay ease,ay ithway aay overedcay ishday inay oneay andhay danay Eth'sbay eethray
ittenskay inay ethay otheray.

Ere"Hay Iay ,amay agbay danay aggage,"bay eshay aidsay isklybray. Other"May entsay erhay ove,lay
danay asway adglay ifay Iay ouldcay oday ythinganay orfay youay. Egmay antedway emay otay ingbray omesay
ofay erhay anc-mange;blay eshay akesmay itay eryvay icely,nay danay Ethbay oughtthay erhay atscay
ouldway ebay omfortingcay. Iay ewknay you'day aughlay taay em,thay utbay Iay ouldn'tcay efuse,ray
eshay asway osay iousanxay otay oday omething."say

Itay osay appenedhay atthay Eth'sbay unnyfay oanlay asway ustjay ethay ing;thay or,fay inay
aughinglay overay ethay its,kay Aurielay orgotfay ishay ashfulness,bay danay ewgray ociablesay
taay onceay.

At"Thay ookslay ootay ettypray otay eat,"ay ehay aid,say ilingsmay ithway easure,play saay Ojay
uncovereday ethay ish,day danay owedshay ethay anc-mange,blay urroundedsay ybay aay arlandgay
ofay eengray eaves,lay danay ethay arletscay owersflay ofay Y'samay etpay eraniumgay.

It"ay isn'tay ything,anay onlyay eythay lalay eltfay indly,kay danay antedway otay owshay itay.
Elltay ethay irlgay otay utpay itay ayaway orfay youray ea:tay it'say osay imple,say youay ancay eatay
it;ay ,anday eingbay oft,say itay illway ipslay ownday ithoutway urtinghay youray oresay oatthray.
Atwhay aay osycay oomray isthay is!"ay

It"ay ightmay ebay ifay itay asway eptkay ice;nay utbay ethay aidsmay earay azy,lay danay Iay on'tday
owknay owhay otay akemay emthay indmay. Itay orriesway e,may ough."thay

I'll"ay ightray itay upay inay otway inutes;may orfay itay onlyay eedsnay otay avehay ethay earthhay
ushed,bray o,--andsay ethay ingsthay ademay aightstray onay ethay antel-piecemay o,--andsay
ethay ooksbay utpay ere,hay danay ethay ottlesbay ere,thay danay youray ofasay urnedtay omfray ethay
ight,lay danay ethay illowspay umpedplay upay aay itbay. Ow,nay en,thay you'reay ixed."fay

Danay osay ehay as;way or,fay saay eshay aughedlay danay alked,tay Ojay adhay iskedwhay ingsthay
intoay ace,play danay ivengay uiteqay aay ifferentday iraay otay ethay oomray. Aurielay atchedway
erhay inay espectfulray ilence;say danay enwhay eshay eckonedbay imhay otay ishay ofa,say ehay atsay
ownday ithway aay ighsay ofay atisfaction,say ayingsay atefully,--gray

Ow"Hay indkay youay e!aray Yes,ay at'sthay atwhay itay antedway. Ownay easeplay aketay ethay igbay
air,chay danay etlay emay oday omethingsay otay useamay ymay ompany."cay

O;"Nay Iay amecay otay useamay youay. Allshay Iay eadray oud?"alay danay Ojay ookedlay
ectionatelyaffay owardtay omesay invitingay ooksbay earnay ybay.

Ank"Thay you;ay I'veay eadray lalay ose,thay danay ifay youay on'tday ind,may I'day atherray
alk,"tay eredansway Aurielay.

Ot"Nay aay it;bay I'llay alktay lalay ayday ifay you'llay onlyay etsay emay oinggay. Ethbay ayssay Iay
evernay owknay enwhay otay op."stay

Is"ay Ethbay ethay osyray one,ay owhay aysstay taay omehay aay oodgay eal,day danay ometimessay oesgay
outay ithway aay ittlelay asket?"bay edaskay Aurie,lay ithway interestay.

Yes,"ay at'sthay Eth;bay e'sshay ymay irl,gay danay aay egularray oodgay oneay eshay is,ay oo."tay

E"Thay ettypray oneay isay Eg,may danay ethay urly-hairedcay oneay isay Y,amay Iay elieve?"bay

Ow"Hay idday youay indfay atthay out?"ay

Aurielay oloredcay up,ay utbay eredansway ankly,fray Y,"Whay youay ee,say Iay oftenay earhay youay
allingcay otay oneay other,anay danay enwhay I'may onealay upay ere,hay Iay an'tcay elphay ookinglay
overay taay youray ouse,hay youay aysalway eemsay otay ebay avinghay uchsay oodgay imestay. Iay egbay
youray ardonpay orfay eingbay osay ude,ray utbay ometimessay youay orgetfay otay utpay ownday ethay
urtaincay taay ethay indowway erewhay ethay owersflay e;aray danay enwhay ethay ampslay earay
ighted,lay it'say ikelay ookinglay taay aay icturepay otay eesay ethay ire,fay danay youay lalay
oundray ethay abletay ithway youray other;may erhay acefay isay ightray opposite,ay danay itay
ookslay osay eetsway ehindbay ethay owers,flay Iay an'tcay elphay atchingway itay. Iay aven'thay
otgay yanay other,may youay ow;"knay danay Aurielay okedpay ethay irefay otay idehay aay ittlelay
itchingtway ofay ethay ipslay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay ontrolcay.

Ethay olitary,say ungryhay ooklay inay ishay eyesay entway aightstray otay O'sjay armway earthay.
Eshay adhay eenbay osay implysay aughttay atthay erethay asway onay onsensenay inay erhay ead,hay
danay taay ifteenfay eshay asway saay innocentay danay ankfray saay yanay ildchay. Aurielay asway
icksay danay onely;lay ,anday eelingfay owhay ichray eshay asway inay ome-lovehay danay
appiness,hay eshay adlyglay iedtray otay areshay itay ithway imhay. Erhay acefay asway eryvay
iendlyfray danay erhay arpshay oicevay unusuallyay entlegay saay eshay aid,--say

E'll"Way evernay awdray atthay urtaincay yanay ore,may danay Iay ivegay youay eavelay otay ooklay saay
uchmay saay youay ikelay. Iay ustjay ish,way ough,thay insteaday ofay eeping,pay you'day omecay
overay danay eesay usay. Othermay isay osay endid,splay e'dshay oday youay eapshay ofay ood,gay danay
Ethbay ouldway ingsay otay youay ifay I__ay eggedbay erhay o,tay danay Yamay ouldway ance;day Egmay
danay Iay ouldway akemay youay aughlay overay ouray unnyfay agestay operties,pray danay e'dway
avehay ollyjay imestay. Ouldn'tway youray andpagray etlay you?"ay

I"ay inkthay ehay ould,way ifay youray othermay edaskay imhay. E'shay eryvay ind,kay oughthay ehay
oesday otnay ooklay o;say danay ehay etslay emay oday atwhay Iay ike,lay ettypray uch,may onlyay e'shay
aidafray Iay ightmay ebay aay otherbay otay angers,"stray eganbay Aurie,lay ighteningbray oremay
danay oremay.

E"Way earay otnay angers,stray eway earay eighbors,nay danay youay eedn'tnay inkthay you'day ebay
aay otherbay. Eway Ant__way otay owknay you,ay danay I'veay eenbay yingtray otay oday itay isthay everay
osay onglay. Eway aven'thay eenbay erehay aay eatgray ile,whay youay ow,knay utbay eway avehay otgay
uaintedacqay ithway lalay ouray eighborsnay utbay you."ay

You"ay eesay andpagray iveslay ongamay ishay ooks,bay danay oesn'tday indmay uchmay atwhay
appenshay outsideay. Rmay. Ooke,bray ymay utor,tay oesn'tday aystay ere,hay youay ow,knay danay
Iay avehay onay oneay otay ogay outabay ithway e,may osay Iay ustjay opstay taay omehay danay etgay onay saay
Iay an."cay

At's"Thay adbay. Youay oughtay otay akemay naay effort,ay danay ogay isitingvay everywhereay youay
earay ed;askay enthay you'llay avehay entyplay ofay iends,fray danay easantplay acesplay otay ogay
otay. Evernay indmay eingbay ashful;bay itay on'tway astlay onglay ifay youay eepkay oing."gay

Aurielay urnedtay edray ain,agay utbay asn'tway offendeday taay eingbay usedaccay ofay
ashfulness;bay orfay erethay asway osay uchmay ood-willgay inay O,jay itay asway impossibleay
otnay otay aketay erhay untblay eechesspay saay indlykay saay eythay ereway eantmay.

O"Day youay ikelay youray ool?"schay edaskay ethay oy,bay angingchay ethay ubject,say eraftay aay
ittlelay ause,pay uringday ichwhay ehay aredstay taay ethay ire,fay danay Ojay ookedlay outabay
er,hay ellway easedplay.

On't"Day ogay otay ool;schay I'may aay usinessbay an--girl,may Iay eanmay. Iay ogay otay aitway onay
ymay eat-aunt,gray danay aay ear,day osscray olday oulsay eshay is,ay oo,"tay eredansway Ojay.

Aurielay openeday ishay outhmay otay kasay otheranay uestion;qay utbay ememberingray ustjay inay
imetay atthay itay asn'tway annersmay otay akemay ootay anymay inquiriesay intoay eople'spay
airs,affay ehay utshay itay ain,agay danay ookedlay uncomfortableay. Ojay ikedlay ishay oodgay
eeding,bray danay idn'tday indmay avinghay aay aughlay taay Untaay Arch,may osay eshay avegay imhay
aay ivelylay escriptionday ofay ethay idgetyfay olday ady,lay erhay atfay oodle,pay ethay arrotpay
atthay alkedtay Anish,spay danay ethay ibrarylay erewhay eshay evelledray. Aurielay enjoyeday
atthay immensely;ay danay enwhay eshay oldtay outabay ethay impray olday entlemangay owhay amecay
onceay otay ooway Untaay Arch,may ,anday inay ethay iddlemay ofay aay inefay eech,spay owhay Ollpay
adhay eakedtway ishay igway offay otay ishay eatgray ismay,day ethay oybay aylay ackbay danay
aughedlay illtay ethay earstay anray ownday ishay eeks,chay danay aay aidmay oppedpay erhay eadhay
inay otay eesay atwhay asway ethay attermay.

Illustration:[ay Ollpay eakedtway offay ishay ig]way

Oh!"ay atthay oesday emay onay enday ofay oodgay. Elltay on,ay ease,"play ehay aid,say akingtay ishay
acefay outay ofay ethay ofa-cushion,say edray danay iningshay ithway errimentmay.

Uchmay elateday ithway erhay uccess,say Ojay idday Ell"tay on,"ay lalay outabay eirthay aysplay
danay ans,play eirthay opeshay danay earsfay orfay ather,fay danay ethay ostmay interestingay
eventsay ofay ethay ittlelay orldway inay ichwhay ethay isterssay ivedlay. Enthay eythay otgay otay
alkingtay outabay ooks;bay danay otay O'sjay elight,day eshay oundfay atthay Aurielay ovedlay
emthay saay ellway saay eshay id,day danay adhay eadray evenay oremay anthay erselfhay.

If"ay youay ikelay emthay osay uch,may omecay ownday danay eesay oursay. Andpagray isay out,ay osay
youay eedn'tnay ebay aid,"afray aidsay Aurie,lay ettinggay upay.

I'm"ay otnay aidafray ofay ything,"anay eturnedray O,jay ithway aay osstay ofay ethay eadhay.

I"ay on'tday elievebay youay e!"aray exclaimeday ethay oy,bay ookinglay taay erhay ithway uchmay
iration,admay oughthay ehay ivatelypray oughtthay eshay ouldway avehay oodgay easonray otay ebay
aay ifletray aidafray ofay ethay olday entleman,gay ifay eshay etmay imhay inay omesay ofay ishay
oodsmay.

Ethay osphereatmay ofay ethay olewhay ousehay eingbay ummer-like,say Aurielay edlay ethay ayway
omfray oomray otay oom,ray ettinglay Ojay opstay otay examineay ateverwhay uckstray erhay ancy;fay
danay osay taay astlay eythay amecay otay ethay ibrary,lay erewhay eshay appedclay erhay ands,hay
danay anced,pray saay eshay aysalway idday enwhay especiallyay elightedday. Itay asway inedlay
ithway ooks,bay danay erethay ereway icturespay danay atues,stay danay istractingday ittlelay
abinetscay ullfay ofay oinscay danay uriosities,cay danay eepy-hollowslay airs,chay danay
ueerqay ables,tay danay onzes;bray ,anday estbay ofay ,allay aay eatgray openay ireplace,fay
ithway uaintqay ilestay lalay oundray itay.

At"Whay ichness!"ray ighedsay O,jay inkingsay intoay ethay epthday ofay aay elvetvay air,chay
danay azinggay outabay erhay ithway naay iraay ofay intenseay atisfactionsay. Eodore"Thay

impressivelyay.

erchedpay onay aay abletay oppositeay.

arm,alay Ercy"May e!may it'say youray andpa!"gray

Ivay.

ETHbay INDSfay EtHay ALACEpay EAUTIFULbay.


Ethay igbay ousehay idday ovepray aay Alacepay Eautiful,bay oughthay itay ooktay omesay imetay orfay
lalay otay etgay in,ay danay Ethbay oundfay itay eryvay ardhay otay asspay ethay ionslay. Olday Rmay.
Aurencelay asway ethay iggestbay one;ay utbay eraftay ehay adhay alled,cay aidsay omethingsay
unnyfay oray indkay otay eachay oneay ofay ethay irls,gay danay alkedtay overay olday imestay ithway
eirthay other,may obodynay eltfay uchmay aidafray ofay im,hay exceptay imidtay Ethbay. Ethay
otheray ionlay asway ethay actfay atthay eythay ereway oorpay danay Aurielay ich;ray orfay isthay
ademay emthay yshay ofay eptingaccay avorsfay ichwhay eythay ouldcay otnay eturnray. Ut,bay
eraftay aay ile,whay eythay oundfay atthay ehay onsideredcay emthay ethay enefactors,bay danay
ouldcay otnay oday enoughay otay owshay owhay atefulgray ehay asway orfay Smray. Arch'smay
otherlymay elcome,way eirthay eerfulchay ociety,say danay ethay omfortcay ehay ooktay inay
atthay umblehay omehay ofay eirsthay. Osay eythay oonsay orgotfay eirthay ide,pray danay
interchangeday indnesseskay ithoutway oppingstay otay inkthay ichwhay asway ethay eatergray.

Lalay ortssay ofay easantplay ingsthay appenedhay outabay atthay ime;tay orfay ethay ewnay
iendshipfray ourishedflay ikelay assgray inay ingspray. Everyay oneay ikedlay Aurie,lay danay
ehay ivatelypray informeday ishay utortay atthay E"thay Archesmay ereway egularlyray
endidsplay irls."gay Ithway ethay elightfulday enthusiasmay ofay youth,ay eythay ooktay ethay
olitarysay oybay intoay eirthay idst,may danay ademay uchmay ofay im,hay danay ehay oundfay
omethingsay eryvay armingchay inay ethay innocentay ompanionshipcay ofay esethay
imple-heartedsay irlsgay. Evernay avinghay ownknay othermay oray isters,say ehay asway uickqay
otay eelfay ethay influencesay eythay oughtbray outabay im;hay danay eirthay usy,bay ivelylay
aysway ademay imhay amedashay ofay ethay indolentay ifelay ehay edlay. Ehay asway iredtay ofay
ooks,bay danay oundfay eoplepay osay interestingay ownay atthay Rmay. Ookebray asway obligeday
otay akemay eryvay unsatisfactoryay eports;ray orfay Aurielay asway aysalway ayingplay
uant,tray danay unningray overay otay ethay Archesmay.

Ever"Nay ind;may etlay imhay aketay aay oliday,hay danay akemay itay upay erwards,"aftay aidsay
ethay olday entlemangay. E"Thay oodgay adylay extnay oorday ayssay ehay isay udyingstay ootay
ard,hay danay eedsnay youngay ociety,say usement,amay danay exerciseay. Iay uspectsay eshay isay
ight,ray danay atthay I'veay eenbay oddlingcay ethay ellowfay saay ifay I'day eenbay ishay
andmothergray. Etlay imhay oday atwhay ehay ikes,lay saay onglay saay ehay isay appyhay. Ehay an'tcay
etgay intoay ischiefmay inay atthay ittlelay unnerynay overay ere;thay danay Smray. Archmay isay
oingday oremay orfay imhay anthay eway an."cay

Atwhay oodgay imestay eythay ad,hay otay ebay ure!say Uchsay aysplay danay ableaux,tay uchsay
eigh-ridesslay danay atingskay olics,fray uchsay easantplay eveningsay inay ethay olday
arlor,pay danay ownay danay enthay uchsay aygay ittlelay artiespay taay ethay eatgray ousehay. Egmay
ouldcay alkway inay ethay onservatorycay eneverwhay eshay iked,lay danay evelray inay
ouquets;bay Ojay owsedbray overay ethay ewnay ibrarylay oraciously,vay danay onvulsedcay ethay
olday entlemangay ithway erhay iticisms;cray Yamay opiedcay ictures,pay danay enjoyeday
eautybay otay erhay eart'shay ontent;cay danay Aurielay ayedplay Ord"lay ofay ethay anor"may inay
ethay ostmay elightfulday ylestay.

Utbay Eth,bay oughthay yearningay orfay ethay andgray iano,pay ouldcay otnay uckplay upay
ouragecay otay ogay otay ethay Ansion"May ofay Iss,"blay saay Egmay alledcay itay. Eshay entway onceay
ithway O;jay utbay ethay olday entleman,gay otnay eingbay areaway ofay erhay infirmity,ay aredstay
taay erhay osay ardhay omfray underay ishay eavyhay eyebrows,ay danay aidsay Ey!""Hay osay oud,lay
atthay ehay ightenedfray erhay osay uchmay erhay Eet"fay atteredchay onay ethay oor,"flay eshay
oldtay erhay other;may danay eshay anray ay,away eclaringday eshay ouldway evernay ogay erethay
yanay ore,may otnay evenay orfay ethay earday ianopay. Onay ersuasionspay oray enticementsay
ouldcay overcomeay erhay ear,fay ill,tay ethay actfay omingcay otay Rmay. Aurence'slay earay inay
omesay ysteriousmay ay,way ehay etsay outabay endingmay attersmay. Uringday oneay ofay ethay
iefbray allscay ehay ade,may ehay ullyartfay edlay ethay onversationcay otay usic,may danay
alkedtay ayaway outabay eatgray ingerssay omwhay ehay adhay een,say inefay organsay ehay adhay
eard,hay danay oldtay uchsay armingchay ecdotesanay atthay Ethbay oundfay itay impossibleay otay
aystay inay erhay istantday orner,cay utbay eptcray earernay danay earer,nay saay ifay
ascinatedfay. Taay ethay ackbay ofay ishay airchay eshay opped,stay danay oodstay istening,lay
ithway erhay eatgray eyesay ideway open,ay danay erhay eekschay edray ithway ethay excitementay ofay

danay esently,pray saay ifay ethay ideaay adhay ustjay occurreday otay im,hay ehay aidsay otay Smray.

Ot"Nay uch;may youay aymay avehay ymay areshay. Ere'shay ethay oneymay. Akemay itay astlay saay onglay

Oh,"ay ankthay you!ay Itay ustmay ebay osay icenay otay avehay ocket-money!pay I'llay avehay aay

outabay akingtay y,anay saay Iay ouldn'tcay eturnray em,thay danay I'may uallyactay ufferingsay
orfay one."ay

Extnay ayday Yamay asway atherray atelay taay ool;schay utbay ouldcay otnay esistray ethay
emptationtay ofay isplaying,day ithway ardonablepay ide,pray aay oistmay own-paperbray
arcel,pay eforebay eshay onsignedcay itay otay ethay inmostay ecessesray ofay erhay eskday.
Uringday ethay extnay ewfay inutesmay ethay umorray atthay Yamay Archmay adhay otgay enty-fourtway
eliciousday imeslay E(shay eatay oneay onay ethay ay),way danay asway oinggay otay eat,tray
irculatedcay oughthray erhay Et,""say danay ethay entionsattay ofay erhay iendsfray ecamebay
uiteqay overwhelmingay. Atykay Ownbray inviteday erhay otay erhay extnay artypay onay ethay
ot;spay Arymay Ingsleykay insisteday onay endinglay erhay erhay atchway illtay ecess;ray danay
Ennyjay Ow,snay aay atiricalsay youngay ady,lay owhay adhay aselybay ittedtway Yamay uponay erhay
imelesslay ate,stay omptlypray uriedbay ethay atchet,hay danay offereday otay urnishfay
ersansway otay ertaincay allingappay umssay. Utbay Yamay adhay otnay orgottenfay Issmay Ow'ssnay
uttingcay emarksray outabay Ome"say ersonspay osewhay osesnay ereway otnay ootay atflay otay
ellsmay otheray eople'spay imes,lay danay uck-upstay eople,pay owhay ereway otnay ootay oudpray
otay kasay orfay em;"thay danay eshay instantlyay ushedcray At"thay Owsnay irl's"gay opeshay ybay
ethay itheringway elegram,tay You"ay eedn'tnay ebay osay olitepay lalay ofay aay udden,say orfay
youay on'tway etgay y."anay

Aay istinguishedday ersonagepay appenedhay otay isitvay ethay oolschay atthay orning,may danay
Y'samay eautifullybay awndray apsmay eceivedray aise,pray ichwhay onorhay otay erhay oefay
ankledray inay ethay oulsay ofay Issmay Ow,snay danay ausedcay Issmay Archmay otay umeassay ethay
irsaay ofay aay udiousstay youngay eacockpay. Ut,bay as,alay as!alay idepray oesgay eforebay aay
all,fay danay ethay evengefulray Owsnay urnedtay ethay ablestay ithway isastrousday uccesssay.
Onay oonersay adhay ethay uestgay aidpay ethay usualay alestay ompliments,cay danay owedbay
imselfhay out,ay anthay Enny,jay underay etencepray ofay ingaskay naay importantay uestion,qay
informeday Rmay. Avis,day ethay eacher,tay atthay Yamay Archmay adhay ickledpay imeslay inay erhay
eskday.

Ownay Rmay. Avisday adhay eclaredday imeslay aay ontrabandcay icle,artay danay olemnlysay
owedvay otay ubliclypay errulefay ethay irstfay ersonpay owhay asway oundfay eakingbray ethay
awlay. Isthay uch-enduringmay anmay adhay ucceededsay inay anishingbay ewing-gumchay eraftay
aay onglay danay ormystay ar,way adhay ademay aay onfirebay ofay ethay onfiscatedcay ovelsnay danay
ewspapers,nay adhay uppressedsay aay ivatepray ost-office,pay adhay orbiddenfay
istortionsday ofay ethay ace,fay icknames,nay danay aricatures,cay danay oneday lalay atthay
oneay anmay ouldcay oday otay eepkay alfhay aay undredhay ebelliousray irlsgay inay orderay. Oysbay
earay yingtray enoughay otay umanhay atience,pay oodnessgay ows!knay utbay irlsgay earay
infinitelyay oremay o,say especiallyay otay ervousnay entlemen,gay ithway yrannicaltay
empers,tay danay onay oremay alenttay orfay eachingtay anthay Rday. Imberblay. Rmay. Avisday
ewknay yanay uantityqay ofay Eek,gray Atin,lay Ebra,algay danay ologiesay ofay lalay orts,say osay
ehay asway alledcay aay inefay eacher;tay danay anners,may orals,may eelings,fay danay
examplesay ereway otnay onsideredcay ofay yanay articularpay importanceay. Itay asway aay ostmay
unfortunateay omentmay orfay enouncingday Y,amay danay Ennyjay ewknay itay. Rmay. Avisday adhay
evidentlyay akentay ishay offeecay ootay ongstray atthay orning;may erethay asway naay eastay
ind,way ichwhay aysalway ectedaffay ishay euralgia;nay danay ishay upilspay adhay otnay oneday
imhay ethay editcray ichwhay ehay eltfay ehay eserved:day erefore,thay otay useay ethay
expressive,ay ifay otnay elegant,ay anguagelay ofay aay ool-girl,schay E"hay asway saay

I"ay on'tday ikelay atthay alfhay saay ellway saay oinggay ithway youay danay Aurielay. Easeplay etlay

orfay yself,may Aurielay asn'thay ythinganay otay oday ithway it."ay

You"ay an'tcay itsay ithway us,ay orfay ouray eatssay earay eserved,ray danay youay ustn'tmay itsay
one;alay osay Aurielay illway ivegay youay ishay ace,play danay atthay illway oilspay ouray
easure;play oray e'llhay etgay otheranay eatsay orfay you,ay danay atthay isn'tay oper,pray enwhay
youay eren'tway edaskay. Youay a'n'tshay irstay aay ep;stay osay youay aymay ustjay aystay erewhay
youay e,"aray oldedscay O,jay ossercray anthay ever,ay avinghay ustjay ickedpray erhay ingerfay
inay erhay urryhay.

Ittingsay onay ethay oor,flay ithway oneay ootbay on,ay Yamay eganbay otay y,cray danay Egmay otay
easonray ithway er,hay enwhay Aurielay alledcay omfray elow,bay danay ethay otway irlsgay

erhay own-upgray ays,way danay edactay ikelay aay oiltspay ildchay. Ustjay saay ethay artypay asway
ettingsay out,ay Yamay alledcay overay ethay anisters,bay inay aay eateningthray one,tay

Iddlesticks!""Fay eturnedray O,jay ammingslay ethay oorday.

Orry"say orfay it."ay Eshay danay Yamay adhay adhay anymay ivelylay irmishesskay inay ethay oursecay

Other,"May earay youay yangray enwhay youay oldfay youray ipslay ighttay ogether,tay danay ogay

Yes,"ay I'veay earnedlay otay eckchay ethay astyhay ordsway atthay iseray otay ymay ips;lay danay

Ut"Bay Iay ostlay erhay enwhay Iay asway aay ittlelay olderay anthay youay e,aray danay orfay yearsay
adhay otay ugglestray onay one,alay orfay Iay asway ootay oudpray otay onfesscay ymay eaknessway otay
yanay oneay elseay. Iay adhay aay ardhay ime,tay O,jay danay edshay aay oodgay anymay itterbay earstay
overay ymay ailures;fay or,fay inay itespay ofay ymay efforts,ay Iay evernay eemedsay otay etgay onay.
Enthay youray atherfay ame,cay danay Iay asway osay appyhay atthay Iay oundfay itay easyay otay ebay
oodgay. Utbay ybay danay y,bay enwhay Iay adhay ourfay ittlelay aughtersday oundray e,may danay eway
ereway oor,pay enthay ethay olday oubletray eganbay ain;agay orfay Iay maay otnay atientpay ybay
ature,nay danay itay iedtray emay eryvay uchmay otay eesay ymay ildrenchay antingway ything."anay

Oor"Pay other!may atwhay elpedhay youay en?"thay

Your"ay ather,fay Ojay. Ehay evernay oseslay atience,--neverpay oubtsday oray
omplains,--butcay aysalway opes,hay danay orksway danay aitsway osay eerfully,chay atthay
oneay isay amedashay otay oday otherwiseay eforebay imhay. Ehay elpedhay danay omfortedcay e,may
danay owedshay emay atthay Iay ustmay ytray otay actisepray lalay ethay irtuesvay Iay ouldway avehay
ymay ittlelay irlsgay ossess,pay orfay Iay asway eirthay exampleay. Itay asway easieray otay ytray
orfay youray akessay anthay orfay ymay own;ay aay artledstay oray urprisedsay ooklay omfray oneay ofay
you,ay enwhay Iay okespay arply,shay ebukedray emay oremay anthay yanay ordsway ouldcay avehay
one;day danay ethay ove,lay espect,ray danay onfidencecay ofay ymay ildrenchay asway ethay
eetestsway ewardray Iay ouldcay eceiveray orfay ymay effortsay otay ebay ethay omanway Iay ouldway
avehay emthay opy."cay

O"ay other,may ifay I'may everay alfhay saay oodgay saay you,ay Iay allshay ebay atisfied,"say iedcray
O,jay uchmay ouchedtay.

I"ay opehay youay illway ebay aay eatgray ealday etter,bay ear;day utbay youay ustmay eepkay atchway
overay youray Osom'bay enemy,'ay saay atherfay allscay it,ay oray itay aymay adden,say ifay otnay
oilspay youray ifelay. Youay avehay adhay aay arning;way ememberray it,ay danay ytray ithway earthay
danay oulsay otay astermay isthay uickqay emper,tay eforebay itay ingsbray youay eatergray
orrowsay danay egretray anthay youay avehay ownknay o-day."tay

I"ay illway y,tray other;may Iay ulytray illway. Utbay youay ustmay elphay e,may emindray e,may danay
eepkay emay omfray yingflay outay. Iay useday otay eesay atherfay ometimessay utpay ishay ingerfay
onay ishay ips,lay danay ooklay taay youay ithway aay eryvay ind,kay utbay obersay ace,fay danay youay
aysalway oldedfay youray ipslay ighttay oray entway ay:away asway ehay emindingray youay en?"thay
edaskay Ojay oftlysay.

Yes;"ay Iay edaskay imhay otay elphay emay o,say danay ehay evernay orgotfay it,ay utbay avedsay emay
omfray anymay aay arpshay ordway ybay atthay ittlelay esturegay danay indkay ook."lay

Ojay awsay atthay erhay other'smay eyesay illedfay danay erhay ipslay embled,tray saay eshay
oke;spay ,anday earingfay atthay eshay adhay aidsay ootay uch,may eshay isperedwhay iously,anxay
As"Way itay ongwray otay atchway you,ay danay otay eakspay ofay it?ay Iay idn'tday eanmay otay ebay
ude,ray utbay it'say osay omfortablecay otay aysay lalay Iay inkthay otay you,ay danay eelfay osay
afesay danay appyhay ere."hay

Y"May O,jay youay aymay aysay ythinganay otay youray other,may orfay itay isay ymay eatestgray
appinesshay danay idepray otay eelfay atthay ymay irlsgay onfidecay inay e,may danay owknay owhay
uchmay Iay ovelay em."thay

I"ay oughtthay I'day ievedgray you."ay

O,"Nay ear;day utbay eakingspay ofay atherfay emindedray emay owhay uchmay Iay issmay im,hay owhay
uchmay Iay oweay im,hay danay owhay aithfullyfay Iay ouldshay atchway danay orkway otay eepkay ishay
ittlelay aughtersday afesay danay oodgay orfay im."hay

Yet"ay youay oldtay imhay otay o,gay other,may danay idn'tday ycray enwhay ehay ent,way danay evernay
omplaincay ow,nay oray eemsay saay ifay youay eedednay yanay elp,"hay aidsay O,jay onderingway.

I"ay avegay ymay estbay otay ethay ountrycay Iay ove,lay danay eptkay ymay earstay illtay ehay asway
onegay. Ywhay ouldshay Iay omplain,cay enwhay eway othbay avehay erelymay oneday ouray utyday danay
illway urelysay ebay ethay appierhay orfay itay inay ethay end?ay Ifay Iay on'tday eemsay otay eednay
elp,hay itay isay ecausebay Iay avehay aay etterbay iend,fray evenay anthay ather,fay otay omfortcay
danay ustainsay emay. Ymay ild,chay ethay oublestray danay emptationstay ofay youray ifelay earay
eginning,bay danay aymay ebay any;may utbay youay ancay overcomeay danay outliveay emthay lalay ifay
youay earnlay otay eelfay ethay engthstray danay endernesstay ofay youray Eavenlyhay Atherfay saay
youay oday atthay ofay youray earthlyay oneay. Ethay oremay youay ovelay danay usttray Im,hay ethay
earernay youay illway eelfay otay Im,hay danay ethay esslay youay illway ependday onay umanhay owerpay
danay isdomway. Ishay ovelay danay arecay evernay iretay oray ange,chay ancay evernay ebay akentay
omfray you,ay utbay aymay ecomebay ethay ourcesay ofay ife-longlay eace,pay appiness,hay danay
engthstray. Elievebay isthay eartily,hay danay ogay otay Odgay ithway lalay youray ittlelay
ares,cay danay opes,hay danay ins,say danay orrows,say saay eelyfray danay onfidinglycay saay
youay omecay otay youray other."may

O'sjay onlyay eransway asway otay oldhay erhay othermay ose,clay ,anday inay ethay ilencesay ichwhay
ollowed,fay ethay incerestsay ayerpray eshay adhay everay ayedpray eftlay erhay earthay
ithoutway ords;way orfay inay atthay ad,say yetay appyhay our,hay eshay adhay earnedlay otnay onlyay
ethay itternessbay ofay emorseray danay espair,day utbay ethay eetnesssway ofay elf-denialsay
danay elf-control;say ,anday edlay ybay erhay other'smay and,hay eshay adhay awndray earernay otay
ethay Iendfray owhay elcomesway everyay ildchay ithway aay ovelay ongerstray anthay atthay ofay
yanay ather,fay enderertay anthay atthay ofay yanay othermay.

Yamay irred,stay danay ighedsay inay erhay eep;slay ,anday saay ifay eageray otay eginbay taay onceay
otay endmay erhay ault,fay Ojay ookedlay upay ithway naay expressionay onay erhay acefay ichwhay itay
adhay evernay ornway eforebay.

I"ay etlay ethay unsay ogay ownday onay ymay er;angay Iay ouldn'tway orgivefay er,hay danay o-day,tay
ifay itay adn'thay eenbay orfay Aurie,lay itay ightmay avehay eenbay ootay ate!lay Owhay ouldcay Iay
ebay osay icked?"way aidsay O,jay alfhay oud,alay saay eshay eanedlay overay erhay ister,say
oftlysay okingstray ethay etway airhay atteredscay onay ethay illowpay.

Saay ifay eshay eard,hay Yamay openeday erhay eyes,ay danay eldhay outay erhay ,armsay ithway aay
ilesmay atthay entway aightstray otay O'sjay earthay. Eithernay aidsay aay ord,way utbay eythay
uggedhay oneay otheranay ose,clay inay itespay ofay ethay ankets,blay danay everythingay asway
orgivenfay danay orgottenfay inay oneay eartyhay isskay.

IXay.

EGmay OESgay Otay ANITYvay AIRfay.


I"ay oday inkthay itay asway ethay ostmay ortunatefay ingthay inay ethay orldway atthay osethay
ildrenchay ouldshay avehay ethay easlesmay ustjay ow,"nay aidsay Eg,may oneay Ilapray ay,day saay
eshay oodstay ackingpay ethay O"gay oady"abray unktray inay erhay oom,ray urroundedsay ybay erhay
isterssay.

And"ay osay icenay ofay Ieannay Offatmay otnay otay orgetfay erhay omisepray. Aay olewhay
ortnightfay ofay unfay illway ebay egularlyray endid,"splay epliedray O,jay ookinglay ikelay aay
indmill,way saay eshay oldedfay irtsskay ithway erhay onglay sarmay.

And"ay uchsay ovelylay eather;way I'may osay adglay ofay at,"thay edadday Eth,bay idilytay
ortingsay ecknay danay airhay ibbonsray inay erhay estbay ox,bay entlay orfay ethay eatgray
occasionay.

I"ay ishway Iay asway oinggay otay avehay aay inefay ime,tay danay earway lalay esethay icenay
ings,"thay aidsay Y,amay ithway erhay outhmay ullfay ofay ins,pay saay eshay isticallyartay
eplenishedray erhay ister'ssay ushioncay.

I"ay ishway youay ereway lalay oing;gay ut,bay saay youay an't,cay Iay allshay eepkay ymay
enturesadvay otay elltay youay enwhay Iay omecay ackbay. I'may uresay it'say ethay eastlay Iay ancay
o,day enwhay youay avehay eenbay osay ind,kay endinglay emay ings,thay danay elpinghay emay etgay
eady,"ray aidsay Eg,may ancingglay oundray ethay oomray taay ethay eryvay implesay outfit,ay
ichwhay eemedsay earlynay erfectpay inay eirthay eyesay.

At"Whay idday othermay ivegay youay outay ofay ethay easure-box?"tray edaskay Y,amay owhay adhay
otnay eenbay esentpray taay ethay openingay ofay aay ertaincay edarcay est,chay inay ichwhay Smray.
Archmay eptkay aay ewfay elicsray ofay astpay endor,splay saay iftsgay orfay erhay irlsgay enwhay
ethay operpray imetay amecay.

A"ay airpay ofay ilksay ockings,stay atthay ettypray arvedcay an,fay danay aay ovelylay ueblay
ashsay. Iay antedway ethay ioletvay ilk;say utbay erethay isn'tay imetay otay akemay itay over,ay osay
Iay ustmay ebay ontentedcay ithway ymay olday arlatan."tay

It"ay illway ooklay icelynay overay ymay ewnay uslinmay irt,skay danay ethay ashsay illway etsay itay
offay eautifullybay. Iay ishway Iay adn'thay ashedsmay ymay oralcay acelet,bray orfay youay
ightmay avehay adhay it,"ay aidsay O,jay owhay ovedlay otay ivegay danay end,lay utbay osewhay
ossessionspay ereway usuallyay ootay ilapidatedday otay ebay ofay uchmay useay.

Ere"Thay isay aay ovelylay old-fashioneday earlpay etsay inay ethay easure-box;tray utbay
othermay aidsay ealray owersflay ereway ethay ettiestpray ornamentay orfay aay youngay irl,gay
danay Aurielay omisedpray otay endsay emay lalay Iay ant,"way epliedray Egmay. Ow,"Nay etlay emay
ee;say ere'sthay ymay ewnay aygray alking-suit--justway urlcay upay ethay eatherfay inay ymay
at,hay Eth,--thenbay ymay oplin,pay orfay Unday,say danay ethay allsmay arty,--itpay ookslay
eavyhay orfay ing,spray oesn'tday it?ay Ethay ioletvay ilksay ouldway ebay osay ice;nay oh,ay
ear!"day

Ever"Nay ind;may you'veay otgay ethay arlatantay orfay ethay igbay arty,pay danay youay aysalway
ooklay ikelay naay elangay inay ite,"whay aidsay Y,amay oodingbray overay ethay ittlelay orestay
ofay ineryfay inay ichwhay erhay oulsay elightedday.

It"ay isn'tay ow-necked,lay danay itay oesn'tday eepsway enough,ay utbay itay illway avehay otay
oday. Ymay ueblay ouse-dresshay ookslay osay ell,way urnedtay danay eshlyfray immed,tray atthay
Iay eelfay saay ifay I'day otgay aay ewnay oneay. Ymay ilksay acquesay isn'tay aay itbay ethay ashion,fay
danay ymay onnetbay oesn'tday ooklay ikelay Allie's;say Iay idn'tday ikelay otay aysay
ything,anay utbay Iay asway adlysay isappointedday inay ymay umbrellaay. Iay oldtay othermay
ack,blay ithway aay itewhay andle,hay utbay eshay orgot,fay danay oughtbay aay eengray one,ay ithway
aay yellowishay andlehay. It'say ongstray danay eat,nay osay Iay oughtay otnay otay omplain,cay
utbay Iay owknay Iay allshay eelfay amedashay ofay itay esidebay Ie'sannay ilksay oneay ithway aay
oldgay op,"tay ighedsay Eg,may urveyingsay ethay ittlelay umbrellaay ithway eatgray
isfavorday.

Ange"Chay it,"ay isedadvay Ojay.

I"ay on'tway ebay osay illy,say oray urthay Armee'smay eelings,fay enwhay eshay ooktay osay uchmay
ainspay otay etgay ymay ingsthay. It'say aay onsensicalnay otionnay ofay ine,may danay I'may otnay
oinggay otay ivegay upay otay itay. Ymay ilksay ockingsstay danay otway airspay ofay ewnay ovesglay
earay ymay omfortcay. Youay earay aay ear,day otay endlay emay yours,ay Ojay. Iay eelfay osay ich,ray
danay ortsay ofay elegant,ay ithway otway ewnay airs,pay danay ethay olday onesay eanedclay upay orfay
ommon;"cay danay Egmay ooktay aay efreshingray eeppay taay erhay ove-boxglay.

Annie"ay Offatmay ashay ueblay danay inkpay owsbay onay erhay ight-caps;nay ouldway youay utpay
omesay onay ine?"may eshay ed,askay saay Ethbay oughtbray upay aay ilepay ofay owysnay uslins,may
eshfray omfray Annah'shay andshay.

O,"Nay Iay ouldn't;way orfay ethay artsmay apscay on'tway atchmay ethay ainplay owns,gay ithoutway
yanay immingtray onay emthay. Oorpay olksfay ouldn'tshay ig,"ray aidsay Ojay ecidedlyday.

I"ay onderway ifay Iay allshay Ever__ay ebay appyhay enoughay otay avehay ealray acelay onay ymay
othes,clay danay owsbay onay ymay aps?"cay aidsay Egmay impatientlyay.

You"ay aidsay ethay otheray ayday atthay you'day ebay erfectlypay appyhay ifay youay ouldcay onlyay
ogay otay Ieannay Offat's,"may observeday Eth,bay inay erhay uietqay ayway.

O"Say Iay id!day Ell,way Iay Am__ay appy,hay danay Iay On't__way et;fray utbay itay oesday eemsay saay
ifay ethay oremay oneay etsgay ethay oremay oneay ants,way oesn'tday it?ay Ere,thay ow,nay ethay
aystray earay eady,ray danay everythingay inay utbay ymay all-dress,bay ichwhay Iay allshay
eavelay orfay othermay otay ack,"pay aidsay Eg,may eeringchay up,ay saay eshay ancedglay omfray
ethay alf-filledhay unktray otay ethay any-timesmay essedpray danay endedmay itewhay
arlatan,tay ichwhay eshay alledcay erhay All-dress,""bay ithway naay importantay iraay.

Ethay extnay ayday asway ine,fay danay Egmay eparted,day inay yle,stay orfay aay ortnightfay ofay
oveltynay danay easureplay. Smray. Archmay adhay onsentedcay otay ethay isitvay atherray
eluctantly,ray earingfay atthay Argaretmay ouldway omecay ackbay oremay iscontentedday
anthay eshay entway. Utbay eshay adhay eggedbay osay ard,hay danay Alliesay adhay omisedpray otay
aketay oodgay arecay ofay er,hay danay aay ittlelay easureplay eemedsay osay elightfulday eraftay
aay interway ofay irksomeay ork,way atthay ethay othermay yielded,ay danay ethay aughterday entway
otay aketay erhay irstfay astetay ofay ashionablefay ifelay.

Ethay Offatsmay Ere__way eryvay ashionable,fay danay implesay Egmay asway atherray aunted,day
taay irst,fay ybay ethay endorsplay ofay ethay ousehay danay ethay eleganceay ofay itsay
occupantsay. Utbay eythay ereway indlykay eople,pay inay itespay ofay ethay ivolousfray ifelay
eythay ed,lay danay oonsay utpay eirthay uestgay taay erhay easeay. Erhapspay Egmay elt,fay
ithoutway understandingay y,whay atthay eythay ereway otnay articularlypay ultivatedcay oray
intelligentay eople,pay danay atthay lalay eirthay ildinggay ouldcay otnay uiteqay oncealcay
ethay ordinaryay aterialmay ofay ichwhay eythay ereway ademay. Itay ertainlycay asway
eeableagray otay arefay umptuously,say ivedray inay aay inefay arriage,cay earway erhay estbay
ockfray everyay ay,day danay oday othingnay utbay enjoyay erselfhay. Itay uitedsay erhay
exactly;ay danay oonsay eshay eganbay otay imitateay ethay annersmay danay onversationcay ofay
osethay outabay er;hay otay utpay onay ittlelay irsaay danay aces,gray useay Enchfray ases,phray
impcray erhay air,hay aketay inay erhay esses,dray danay alktay outabay ethay ashionsfay saay ellway
saay eshay ouldcay. Ethay oremay eshay awsay ofay Ieannay Offat'smay ettypray ings,thay ethay oremay
eshay envieday er,hay danay ighedsay otay ebay ichray. Omehay ownay ookedlay arebay danay ismalday
saay eshay oughtthay ofay it,ay orkway ewgray arderhay anthay ever,ay danay eshay eltfay atthay eshay
asway aay eryvay estituteday danay uch-injuredmay irl,gay inay itespay ofay ethay ewnay ovesglay
danay ilksay ockingsstay.

Eshay adhay otnay uchmay imetay orfay epining,ray owever,hay orfay ethay eethray youngay irlsgay
ereway usilybay employeday inay Aving"hay aay oodgay ime."tay Eythay opped,shay alked,way
ode,ray danay alledcay lalay ay;day entway otay eatresthay danay operas,ay oray olickedfray taay
omehay inay ethay evening;ay orfay Ieannay adhay anymay iends,fray danay ewknay owhay otay
entertainay emthay. Erhay olderay isterssay ereway eryvay inefay youngay adies,lay danay oneay
asway engaged,ay ichwhay asway extremelyay interestingay danay omantic,ray Egmay oughtthay.
Rmay. Offatmay asway aay at,fay ollyjay olday entleman,gay owhay ewknay erhay ather;fay danay Smray.
Offat,may aay at,fay ollyjay olday ady,lay owhay ooktay saay eatgray aay ancyfay otay Egmay saay erhay
aughterday adhay oneday. Everyay oneay ettedpay er;hay danay Aisy,""Day saay eythay alledcay
er,hay asway inay aay airfay ayway otay avehay erhay eadhay urnedtay.

Enwhay ethay eveningay orfay ethay All"smay arty"pay ame,cay eshay oundfay atthay ethay oplinpay
ouldn'tway oday taay ,allay orfay ethay otheray irlsgay ereway uttingpay onay inthay esses,dray
danay akingmay emselvesthay eryvay inefay indeed;ay osay outay amecay ethay arlatan,tay
ookinglay older,ay imper,lay danay abbiershay anthay everay esidebay Allie'ssay ispcray ewnay
oneay. Egmay awsay ethay irlsgay anceglay taay itay danay enthay taay oneay other,anay danay erhay
eekschay eganbay otay urn,bay or,fay ithway lalay erhay entleness,gay eshay asway eryvay oudpray.
Onay oneay aidsay aay ordway outabay it,ay utbay Alliesay offereday otay essdray erhay air,hay danay
Ieannay otay ietay erhay ash,say danay Elle,bay ethay engageday ister,say aisedpray erhay itewhay
;armsay utbay inay eirthay indnesskay Egmay awsay onlyay itypay orfay erhay overty,pay danay erhay
earthay eltfay eryvay eavyhay saay eshay oodstay ybay erself,hay ilewhay ethay othersay aughed,lay
attered,chay danay ewflay outabay ikelay auzygay utterfliesbay. Ethay ard,hay itterbay
eelingfay asway ettinggay ettypray ad,bay enwhay ethay aidmay oughtbray inay aay oxbay ofay
owersflay. Eforebay eshay ouldcay eak,spay Ieannay adhay ethay overcay off,ay danay lalay ereway
exclaimingay taay ethay ovelylay oses,ray eath,hay danay ernfay ithinway.

It's"ay orfay Elle,bay ofay ourse;cay Eorgegay aysalway endssay erhay ome,say utbay esethay earay
ogetheraltay avishing,"ray iedcray Ie,annay ithway aay eatgray iffsnay.

Ey"Thay earay orfay Issmay Arch,may ethay anmay aidsay. Danay ere'shay aay ote,"nay utpay inay ethay
aid,may oldinghay itay otay Egmay.

At"Whay un!fay Owhay earay eythay om?fray Idn'tday owknay youay adhay aay over,"lay iedcray ethay
irls,gay utteringflay outabay Egmay inay aay ighhay atestay ofay uriositycay danay urprisesay.

E"Thay otenay isay omfray other,may danay ethay owersflay omfray Aurie,"lay aidsay Egmay imply,say
yetay uchmay atifiedgray atthay ehay adhay otnay orgottenfay erhay.

Oh,"ay indeed!"ay aidsay Ie,annay ithway aay unnyfay ook,lay saay Egmay ippedslay ethay otenay
intoay erhay ocket,pay saay aay ortsay ofay alismantay ainstagay envy,ay anity,vay danay alsefay
ide;pray orfay ethay ewfay ovinglay ordsway adhay oneday erhay ood,gay danay ethay owersflay
eeredchay erhay upay ybay eirthay eautybay.

Eelingfay ostalmay appyhay ain,agay eshay aidlay ybay aay ewfay ernsfay danay osesray orfay
erself,hay danay uicklyqay ademay upay ethay estray inay aintyday ouquetsbay orfay ethay
easts,bray air,hay oray irtsskay ofay erhay iends,fray offeringay emthay osay ettilypray atthay
Ara,clay ethay elderay ister,say oldtay erhay eshay asway E"thay eetestsway ittlelay ingthay eshay
everay aw;"say danay eythay ookedlay uiteqay armedchay ithway erhay allsmay entionattay.
Omehowsay ethay indkay tacay inishedfay erhay espondency;day danay enwhay lalay ethay estray
entway otay owshay emselvesthay otay Smray. Offat,may eshay awsay aay appy,hay ight-eyedbray
acefay inay ethay irror,may saay eshay aidlay erhay ernsfay ainstagay erhay ipplingray air,hay danay
astenedfay ethay osesray inay ethay essdray atthay idn'tday ikestray erhay saay osay Ery__vay
abbyshay ownay.

Eshay enjoyeday erselfhay eryvay uchmay atthay evening,ay orfay eshay ancedday otay erhay
eart'shay ontent;cay everyay oneay asway eryvay ind,kay danay eshay adhay eethray omplimentscay.
Ieannay ademay erhay ing,say danay omesay oneay aidsay eshay adhay aay emarkablyray inefay oice;vay
Ajormay Incolnlay edaskay owhay E"thay eshfray ittlelay irl,gay ithway ethay eautifulbay
eyes,"ay as;way danay Rmay. Offatmay insisteday onay ancingday ithway er,hay ecausebay eshay
Idn't"day awdle,day utbay adhay omesay ingspray inay er,"hay saay ehay acefullygray expresseday
itay. O,say ogether,altay eshay adhay aay eryvay icenay ime,tay illtay eshay overhearday aay itbay

Ayaway eythay ent,way eetlyflay danay acefully;gray or,fay avinghay actisedpray taay ome,hay

ightsay otay ee,say saay eythay irledtway errilymay oundray danay ound,ray eelingfay oremay

eshay ouldway otnay ownay ywhay.

Xay.

EtHay Pay. Cay. DaNay Pay. Oay.


Saay ingspray amecay on,ay aay ewnay etsay ofay usementsamay ecamebay ethay ashion,fay danay ethay
engtheninglay aysday avegay onglay ernoonsaftay orfay orkway danay ayplay ofay lalay ortssay.
Ethay ardengay adhay otay ebay utpay inay order,ay danay eachay istersay adhay aay uarterqay ofay ethay
ittlelay otplay otay oday atwhay eshay ikedlay ithway. Annahhay useday otay ay,say I'd"ay owknay
ichwhay eachay ofay emthay ardingsgay elongedbay o,tay efay Iay eesay Em'ay inay Iny;"chay danay osay
eshay ight,may orfay ethay irls'gay astestay ifferedday saay uchmay saay eirthay aracterschay.
Eg'smay adhay osesray danay eliotrope,hay yrtle,may danay aay ittlelay orange-treeay inay itay.
O'sjay edbay asway evernay ikealay otway easons,say orfay eshay asway aysalway yingtray
experiments;ay isthay yearay itay asway otay ebay aay antationplay ofay un-flowers,say ethay
eedssay ofay ichwhay eerfulchay danay iringaspay antplay ereway otay eedfay Aunt"ay
Ockle-top"cay danay erhay amilyfay ofay ickschay. Ethbay adhay old-fashioned,ay agrantfray
owersflay inay erhay arden,--sweetgay easpay danay ignonette,may arkspur,lay inks,pay
ansies,pay danay outhernwood,say ithway ickweedchay orfay ethay ird,bay danay atnipcay orfay
ethay ussiespay. Yamay adhay aay owerbay inay ers,--ratherhay allsmay danay earwiggy,ay utbay
eryvay ettypray otay ooklay ithat,--way oneysuckleshay danay orning-gloriesmay anginghay
eirthay oloredcay ornshay danay ellsbay inay acefulgray eathswray lalay overay it;ay all,tay
itewhay ilies,lay elicateday erns,fay danay saay anymay illiant,bray icturesquepay antsplay
saay ouldway onsentcay otay ossomblay erethay.

Ardening,gay alks,way owsray onay ethay iver,ray danay ower-huntsflay employeday ethay inefay
ays;day danay orfay ainyray ones,ay eythay adhay ousehay iversions,--someday old,ay omesay
ew,--allnay oremay oray esslay originalay. Oneay ofay esethay asway ethay P"ay. ;c."ay or,fay saay
ecretsay ocietiessay ereway ethay ashion,fay itay asway oughtthay operpray otay avehay one;ay
,anday saay lalay ofay ethay irlsgay iredadmay Ickens,day eythay alledcay emselvesthay ethay
Ickwickpay Ubclay. Ithway aay ewfay interruptions,ay eythay adhay eptkay isthay upay orfay aay
year,ay danay etmay everyay Aturdaysay eveningay inay ethay igbay arret,gay onay ichwhay
occasionsay ethay eremoniescay ereway saay ollows:fay Eethray airschay ereway angedarray inay
aay owray eforebay aay able,tay onay ichwhay asway aay amp,lay oalsay ourfay itewhay adges,bay ithway
aay igbay P"ay. "c.ay inay ifferentday olorscay onay each,ay danay ethay eeklyway ewspaper,nay
alledcay E"Thay Ickwickpay Ortfolio,"pay otay ichwhay lalay ontributedcay omething;say
ilewhay O,jay owhay evelledray inay enspay danay ink,ay asway ethay editoray. Taay evensay
o'clock,ay ethay ourfay embersmay endedascay otay ethay ub-room,clay iedtay eirthay adgesbay
oundray eirthay eads,hay danay ooktay eirthay eatssay ithway eatgray olemnitysay. Eg,may saay
ethay eldest,ay asway Amuelsay Ickwick;pay O,jay eingbay ofay aay iterarylay urn,tay Ugustusaay
Odgrass;snay Eth,bay ecausebay eshay asway oundray danay osy,ray Acytray Upman,tay danay Y,amay
owhay asway aysalway yingtray otay oday atwhay eshay ouldn't,cay asway Athanielnay Inkleway.
Ickwick,pay ethay esident,pray eadray ethay aper,pay ichwhay asway illedfay ithway originalay
ales,tay oetry,pay ocallay ews,nay unnyfay ertisements,advay danay ints,hay inay ichwhay
eythay ood-naturedlygay emindedray eachay otheray ofay eirthay aultsfay danay
ort-comingsshay.

Onay oneay occasion,ay Rmay. Ickwickpay utpay onay aay airpay ofay ectaclesspay ithoutway yanay
asses,glay appedray uponay ethay able,tay emmed,hay ,anday avinghay aredstay ardhay taay Rmay.
