operly,pray eganbay otay ead:--ray


Ethay Ickwickpay Ortfoliopay.

AYmay ,20ay -18-ay

Oet'spay Ornercay.

IVERSARYaNNay ODEay.

Ainagay eway eetmay otay elebratecay
Ithway adgebay danay olemnsay ite,ray
Ouray ifty-secondfay iversary,annay
Inay Ickwickpay All,hay o-nighttay.

Eway lalay earay erehay inay erfectpay ealth,hay
Onenay onegay omfray ouray allsmay and;bay
Ainagay eway eesay eachay ell-knownway ace,fay
Danay esspray eachay iendlyfray andhay.

Ouray Ickwick,pay aysalway taay ishay ost,pay
Ithway everenceray eway eet,gray
,asay ectaclesspay onay ose,nay ehay eadsray
Ouray ell-filledway eeklyway eetshay.

Oughalthay ehay ufferssay omfray aay old,cay
Eway oyjay otay earhay imhay eak,spay
Orfay ordsway ofay isdomway omfray imhay all,fay
Inay itespay ofay oakcray oray ueaksqay.

Olday ix-footsay Odgrasssnay oomslay onay igh,hay
Ithway elephantineay ace,gray
Danay eamsbay uponay ethay ompany,cay
Ithway ownbray danay ovialjay acefay.

Oeticpay irefay ightslay upay ishay eye,ay
Ehay ugglesstray Ainst'gay ishay otlay.
Eholdbay itionambay onay ishay ow,bray
Danay onay ishay osenay aay ot!blay

Extnay ouray eacefulpay Upmantay omes,cay
Osay osy,ray ump,play danay eetsway.
Owhay okeschay ithway aughterlay taay ethay uns,pay
Danay umblestay offay ishay eatsay.

Impray ittlelay Inkleway ootay isay ere,hay
Ithway everyay airhay inay ace,play
Aay odelmay ofay opriety,pray
Oughthay ehay ateshay otay ashway ishay acefay.

Ethay yearay isay one,gay eway illstay uniteay
Otay okejay danay aughlay danay ead,ray
Danay eadtray ethay athpay ofay iteraturelay
Atthay othday otay oryglay eadlay.

Onglay aymay ouray aperpay osperpray ell,way
Ouray ubclay unbrokenay e,bay
Danay omingcay yearsay eirthay essingsblay ourpay
Onay ethay useful,ay aygay P"ay. "c.ay

Aay. ODGRASSsNay.


EtHay ASKEDmay ARRIAGEmay.

Aay ALEtay OFay ENICEvay.

Ondolagay eraftay ondolagay eptsway upay otay ethay arblemay eps,stay danay eftlay itsay
ovelylay oadlay otay ellsway ethay illiantbray ongthray atthay illedfay ethay
atelystay allshay ofay Ountcay eday Elonaday. Ightsknay danay adies,lay elvesay danay
ages,pay onksmay danay ower-girls,flay lalay ingledmay aylygay inay ethay anceday.
Eetsway oicesvay danay ichray elodymay illedfay ethay ir;aay danay osay ithway irthmay
danay usicmay ethay asquerademay entway onay.

As"Hay youray Ighnesshay eensay ethay Adylay Iolavay o-night?"tay edaskay aay
allantgay oubadourtray ofay ethay airyfay ueenqay owhay oatedflay ownday ethay allhay
uponay ishay maray.

Yes;"ay isay eshay otnay ovely,lay oughthay osay ad!say Erhay essdray isay ellway
osen,chay oo,tay orfay inay aay eekway eshay edsway Ountcay Onio,antay omwhay eshay
assionatelypay ates."hay

Y"Bay ymay aith,fay Iay envyay imhay. Yonderay ehay omes,cay ayedarray ikelay aay
idegroom,bray exceptay ethay ackblay askmay. Enwhay atthay isay offay eway allshay eesay
owhay ehay egardsray ethay airfay aidmay osewhay earthay ehay annotcay in,way oughthay
erhay ernstay atherfay estowsbay erhay and,"hay eturnedray ethay oubadourtray.

Is"'Tay isperedwhay atthay eshay oveslay ethay youngay Englishay istartay owhay
auntshay erhay eps,stay danay isay urnedspay ybay ethay olday ount,"cay aidsay ethay
ady,lay saay eythay oinedjay ethay anceday.

Ethay evelray asway taay itsay eighthay enwhay aay iestpray eared,appay ,anday
ithdrawingway ethay youngay airpay otay naay ovealcay unghay ithway urplepay elvet,vay
ehay otionedmay emthay otay eelknay. Instantay ilencesay ellfay uponay ethay aygay
ong;thray danay otnay aay ound,say utbay ethay ashday ofay ountainsfay oray ethay ustleray
ofay orange-grovesay eepingslay inay ethay oonlight,may okebray ethay ush,hay saay
Ountcay eday Elonaday okespay us:--thay

Y"May ordslay danay adies,lay ardonpay ethay useray ybay ichwhay Iay avehay atheredgay
youay erehay otay itnessway ethay arriagemay ofay ymay aughterday. Ather,fay eway aitway
youray ervices."say

Lalay eyesay urnedtay owardtay ethay idalbray arty,pay danay aay owlay urmurmay ofay
azementamay entway oughthray ethay ong,thray orfay eithernay idebray ornay oomgray
emovedray eirthay asksmay. Uriositycay danay onderway ossessedpay lalay earts,hay
utbay espectray estrainedray lalay onguestay illtay ethay olyhay iteray asway overay.
Enthay ethay eageray ectatorsspay atheredgay oundray ethay ount,cay emandingday naay
explanationay.

Adly"Glay ouldway Iay ivegay itay ifay Iay ould;cay utbay Iay onlyay owknay atthay itay asway
ethay imwhay ofay ymay imidtay Iola,vay danay Iay yieldeday otay itay. Ow,nay ymay
ildren,chay etlay ethay ayplay enday. Unmask,ay danay eceiveray ymay essing."blay

Utbay eithernay entbay ethay ee;knay orfay ethay youngay idegroombray eplied,ray inay
aay onetay atthay artledstay lalay isteners,lay saay ethay askmay ell,fay isclosingday
ethay oblenay acefay ofay Erdinandfay Evereux,day ethay istartay over;lay ,anday
eaninglay onay ethay eastbray erewhay ownay ashedflay ethay arstay ofay naay Englishay
earl,ay asway ethay ovelylay Iola,vay adiantray ithway oyjay danay eautybay.

Y"May ord,lay youay ornfullyscay adebay emay aimclay youray aughterday enwhay Iay
ouldcay oastbay saay ighhay aay amenay danay astvay aay ortunefay saay ethay Ountcay

EtHay ISTORYhay OFay Aay UASHsQay.

Onceay uponay aay imetay aay armerfay antedplay aay ittlelay eedsay inay ishay arden,gay
danay eraftay aay ilewhay itay outedspray danay ecamebay aay ine,vay danay orebay anymay
uashessqay. Oneay ayday inay October,ay enwhay eythay ereway ipe,ray ehay ickedpay oneay
danay ooktay itay otay arketmay. Aay ocer-mangray oughtbay danay utpay itay inay ishay
opshay. Atthay amesay orning,may aay ittlelay irl,gay inay aay ownbray athay danay ueblay
ess,dray ithway aay oundray acefay danay ubsnay ose,nay entway danay oughtbay itay orfay
erhay othermay. Eshay uggedlay itay ome,hay utcay itay up,ay danay oiledbay itay inay ethay
igbay ot;pay ashedmay omesay ofay it,ay ithway altsay danay utter,bay orfay inner;day
danay otay ethay estray eshay edadday aay intpay ofay ilk,may otway eggs,ay ourfay oonsspay
ofay ugar,say utmeg,nay danay omesay ackers;cray utpay itay inay aay eepday ish,day danay
akedbay itay illtay itay asway ownbray danay ice;nay danay extnay ayday itay asway eatenay
ybay aay amilyfay amednay Archmay.
Tay. UPMANtay.

Aay ADsay IDENTaCCay.

Onay Idayfray ast,lay eway ereway artledstay ybay aay iolentvay ockshay inay ouray
asement,bay ollowedfay ybay iescray ofay istressday. Onay ushing,ray inay aay ody,bay
otay ethay ellar,cay eway iscoveredday ouray elovedbay Esidentpray ostratepray
uponay ethay oor,flay avinghay ippedtray danay allenfay ilewhay ettinggay oodway orfay
omesticday urposespay. Aay erfectpay enescay ofay uinray etmay ouray eyes;ay orfay inay
ishay allfay Rmay. Ickwickpay adhay ungedplay ishay eadhay danay ouldersshay intoay aay
ubtay ofay ater,way upsetay aay egkay ofay oftsay oapsay uponay ishay anlymay orm,fay danay
orntay ishay armentsgay adlybay. Onay eingbay emovedray omfray isthay erilouspay
ituation,say itay asway iscoveredday atthay ehay adhay ufferedsay onay injuryay utbay
everalsay uises;bray ,anday eway earay appyhay otay ,adday isay ownay oingday ellway.

Aay AMENTlay

ORfay Say. Bay. ATpay AWpay.

Eway ournmay ethay osslay ofay ouray ittlelay et,pay
Danay ighsay o'eray erhay aplesshay ate,fay
Orfay evernay oremay ybay ethay irefay e'llshay it,say
Ornay ayplay ybay ethay olday eengray ategay.

Ethay ittlelay avegray erewhay erhay infantay eeps,slay
Isay Eath'nay ethay estnutchay ee;tray
Utbay o'eray Er__hay avegray eway aymay otnay eep,way
Eway owknay otnay erewhay itay aymay ebay.

Erhay emptyay ed,bay erhay idleay all,bay
Illway evernay eesay erhay ore;may
Onay entlegay ap,tay onay ovinglay urrpay
Isay eardhay taay ethay arlor-doorpay.

Otheranay atcay omescay eraftay erhay ice,may
Aay atcay ithway aay irtyday ace;fay
Utbay eshay oesday otnay unthay saay ouray arlingday id,day
Ornay ayplay ithway erhay iryaay acegray.

Erhay ealthystay awspay eadtray ethay eryvay allhay
Erewhay Owballsnay useday otay ay,play
Utbay eshay onlyay itsspay taay ethay ogsday ouray etpay
Osay allantlygay ovedray ayaway.

Utbay eshay isay otnay airfay otay ee;say
Danay eway annotcay ivegay erhay youray ace,play ear,day
Ornay orshipway erhay saay eway orshipway eethay.

ymay eadersray isay aay Ona_bay ide_fay opycay ofay oneay ittenwray ybay Ona_bay ide_fay irlsgay

oseray otay akemay aay opositionpray.

R"May. Esidentpray danay entlemen,"gay ehay egan,bay umingassay aay arliamentarypay
itudeattay danay one,tay I"ay ishway otay oposepray ethay issionadmay ofay aay ewnay
ember,--onemay owhay ighlyhay eservesday ethay onor,hay ouldway ebay eeplyday atefulgray orfay
it,ay danay ouldway daday immenselyay otay ethay iritspay ofay ethay ub,clay ethay iterarylay
aluevay ofay ethay aper,pay danay ebay onay enday ollyjay danay icenay. Iay oposepray Rmay. Eodorethay
Aurencelay saay naay onoraryhay embermay ofay ethay Pay. Cay. Omecay ow,nay oday avehay im."hay

ious,anxay danay onay oneay aidsay aay ord,way saay Odgrasssnay ooktay ishay eatsay.

easeplay otay anifestmay itay ybay ayingsay Ay.'"'ay

Aay oudlay esponseray omfray Odgrass,snay ollowed,fay otay everybody'say urprise,say ybay aay
imidtay oneay omfray Ethbay.

Ontrary"Cay indedmay aysay O.'"'Nay

Egmay danay Yamay ereway ontrarycay inded;may danay Rmay. Inkleway oseray otay ay,say ithway eatgray
elegance,ay E"Way on'tday ishway yanay oys;bay eythay onlyay okejay danay ouncebay outabay. Isthay
isay aay adies'lay ub,clay danay eway ishway otay ebay ivatepray danay oper."pray

I'm"ay aidafray e'llhay aughlay taay ouray aper,pay danay akemay unfay ofay usay erward,"aftay
observeday Ickwick,pay ullingpay ethay ittlelay urlcay onay erhay orehead,fay saay eshay
aysalway idday enwhay oubtfulday.

Upay oseray Odgrass,snay eryvay uchmay inay earnestay. Ir,"Say Iay ivegay youay ymay ordway saay aay
entleman,gay Aurielay on'tway oday ythinganay ofay ethay ortsay. Ehay ikeslay otay ite,wray danay
e'llhay ivegay aay onetay otay ouray ontributions,cay danay eepkay usay omfray eingbay
entimental,say on'tday youay ee?say Eway ancay oday osay ittlelay orfay im,hay danay ehay oesday osay
uchmay orfay us,ay Iay inkthay ethay eastlay eway ancay oday isay otay offeray imhay aay aceplay ere,hay
danay akemay imhay elcomeway ifay ehay omes."cay

Isthay ulartfay usionallay otay enefitsbay onferredcay oughtbray Upmantay otay ishay eet,fay
ookinglay saay ifay ehay adhay uiteqay ademay upay ishay indmay.

Yes,"ay eway oughtay otay oday it,ay evenay ifay eway Are__ay aidafray. Iay aysay ehay Ay__may ome,cay
danay ishay andpa,gray oo,tay ifay ehay ikes."lay

Isthay iritedspay urstbay omfray Ethbay electrifieday ethay ub,clay danay Ojay eftlay erhay
eatsay otay akeshay andshay ovinglyappray. Ow"Nay en,thay otevay ainagay. Everybodyay
ememberray it'say ouray Aurie,lay danay aysay Ay!'"'ay iedcray Odgrasssnay excitedlyay.

Ay!"ay y!aay y!"aay epliedray eethray oicesvay taay onceay.

Ood!"Gay Essblay you!ay Ow,nay saay ere'sthay othingnay ikelay Aking'tay imetay ybay ethay
Etlock_,'_fay saay Inkleway aracteristicallychay observes,ay owallay emay otay esentpray
ethay ewnay ember;"may ,anday otay ethay ismayday ofay ethay estray ofay ethay ub,clay Ojay ewthray
openay ethay oorday ofay ethay oset,clay danay isplayedday Aurielay ittingsay onay aay ag-bag,ray
ushedflay danay inklingtway ithway uppressedsay aughterlay.

You"ay ogue!ray youay aitor!tray O,jay owhay ouldcay you?"ay iedcray ethay eethray irls,gay saay
Odgrasssnay edlay erhay iendfray iumphantlytray orth;fay ,anday oducingpray othbay aay airchay
danay aay adge,bay installeday imhay inay aay iffyjay.

E"Thay oolnesscay ofay youay otway ascalsray isay azing,"amay eganbay Rmay. Ickwick,pay yingtray
otay etgay upay naay ulawfay own,fray danay onlyay ucceedingsay inay oducingpray naay iableamay
ilesmay. Utbay ethay ewnay embermay asway equalay otay ethay occasion;ay ,anday ising,ray ithway aay
atefulgray alutationsay otay ethay Air,chay aid,say inay ethay ostmay engagingay anner,may
R"May. Esidentpray danay adies,--Ilay egbay ardon,pay entlemen,--allowgay emay otay
introduceay yselfmay saay Amsay Eller,way ethay eryvay umblehay ervantsay ofay ethay ub."clay

Ood!"Gay ood!"gay iedcray O,jay oundingpay ithway ethay andlehay ofay ethay olday arming-panway
onay ichwhay eshay eanedlay.

Y"May aithfulfay iendfray danay oblenay atron,"pay ontinuedcay Aurie,lay ithway aay aveway ofay
ethay and,hay O"whay ashay osay atteringlyflay esentedpray e,may isay otnay otay ebay amedblay orfay
ethay asebay atagemstray ofay o-nighttay. Iay annedplay it,ay danay eshay onlyay avegay inay eraftay
otslay ofay easing."tay

Ome"Cay ow,nay on'tday aylay itay lalay onay yourself;ay youay owknay Iay oposedpray ethay
upboard,"cay okebray inay Odgrass,snay owhay asway enjoyingay ethay okejay azinglyamay.

Ever"Nay youay indmay atwhay eshay ayssay. I'may ethay etchwray atthay idday it,ay ir,"say aidsay
ethay ewnay ember,may ithway aay Elleresqueway odnay otay Rmay. Ickwickpay. Ut"Bay onay ymay
onor,hay Iay evernay illway oday osay ain,agay danay enceforthhay Ewote__day yselfmay otay ethay
interestay ofay isthay immortalay ub."clay

Ear!"Hay ear!"hay iedcray O,jay ashingclay ethay idlay ofay ethay arming-panway ikelay aay
ymbalcay.

O"Gay on,ay ogay on!"ay edadday Inkleway danay Upman,tay ilewhay ethay Esidentpray owedbay
enignlybay.

I"ay erelymay ishway otay ay,say atthay saay aay ightslay okentay ofay ymay atitudegray orfay ethay
onorhay oneday e,may danay saay aay eansmay ofay omotingpray iendlyfray elationsray etweenbay
oiningadjay ations,nay Iay avehay etsay upay aay ost-officepay inay ethay edgehay inay ethay owerlay
ornercay ofay ethay arden;gay aay ine,fay aciousspay uilding,bay ithway adlockspay onay ethay
oors,day danay everyay onveniencecay orfay ethay ails,--alsomay ethay emales,fay ifay Iay aymay
ebay owedallay ethay expressionay. It'say ethay olday artin-house;may utbay I'veay oppedstay
upay ethay oor,day danay ademay ethay oofray open,ay osay itay illway oldhay lalay ortssay ofay
ings,thay danay avesay ouray aluablevay imetay. Etters,lay anuscripts,may ooks,bay danay
undlesbay ancay ebay assedpay inay ere;thay ,anday saay eachay ationnay ashay aay ey,kay itay illway
ebay uncommonlyay ice,nay Iay ancyfay. Owallay emay otay esentpray ethay ubclay ey;kay ,anday
ithway anymay anksthay orfay youray avor,fay aketay ymay eat."say

Eatgray auseapplay saay Rmay. Ellerway epositedday aay ittlelay eykay onay ethay able,tay danay
ubsided;say ethay arming-panway ashedclay danay avedway ildly,way danay itay asway omesay imetay
eforebay orderay ouldcay ebay estoredray. Aay onglay iscussionday ollowed,fay danay everyay
oneay amecay outay urprising,say orfay everyay oneay idday erhay est;bay osay itay asway naay
unusuallyay ivelylay eeting,may danay idday otnay ournadjay illtay aay atelay our,hay enwhay itay
okebray upay ithway eethray illshray eerschay orfay ethay ewnay embermay.

Onay oneay everay egrettedray ethay ittanceadmay ofay Amsay Eller,way orfay aay oremay evoted,day
ell-behaved,way danay ovialjay embermay onay ubclay ouldcay avehay. Ehay ertainlycay idday daday
Irit""spay otay ethay eetings,may danay A"ay one"tay otay ethay aper;pay orfay ishay orationsay
onvulsedcay ishay earers,hay danay ishay ontributionscay ereway excellent,ay eingbay
atriotic,pay assical,clay omical,cay oray amatic,dray utbay evernay entimentalsay. Ojay
egardedray emthay saay orthyway ofay Acon,bay Ilton,may oray Akespeare;shay danay emodelledray
erhay ownay orksway ithway oodgay effect,ay eshay oughtthay.

Ethay Pay. Oay. asway aay apitalcay ittlelay institution,ay danay ourishedflay onderfully,way
orfay earlynay saay anymay ueerqay ingsthay assedpay oughthray itay saay oughthray ethay ealray
officeay. Agediestray danay avats,cray oetrypay danay ickles,pay arden-seedsgay danay onglay
etters,lay usicmay danay ingerbread,gay ubbers,ray invitations,ay oldingsscay danay
uppiespay. Ethay olday entlemangay ikedlay ethay un,fay danay usedamay imselfhay ybay endingsay
odday undles,bay ysteriousmay essages,may danay unnyfay elegrams;tay danay ishay ardener,gay
owhay asway ittensmay ithway Annah'shay arms,chay uallyactay entsay aay ove-letterlay otay
O'sjay arecay. Owhay eythay aughedlay enwhay ethay ecretsay amecay out,ay evernay eamingdray owhay
anymay ove-letterslay atthay ittlelay ost-officepay ouldway oldhay inay ethay yearsay otay
ome!cay

Ixay.

EXPERIMENTSay.


E"Thay irstfay ofay Une!jay Ethay Ingskay earay offay otay ethay eashoresay o-morrow,tay danay I'may
eefray. Eethray onths'may acation,--howvay Iay allshay enjoyay it!"ay exclaimeday Eg,may
omingcay omehay oneay armway ayday otay indfay Ojay aidlay uponay ethay ofasay inay naay unusualay
atestay ofay exhaustion,ay ilewhay Ethbay ooktay offay erhay ustyday oots,bay danay Yamay ademay
emonadelay orfay ethay efreshmentray ofay ethay olewhay artypay.

Aunt"ay Archmay entway o-day,tay orfay ich,whay oh,ay ebay oyful!"jay aidsay Ojay. I"ay asway
ortallymay aidafray e'dshay kasay emay otay ogay ithway er;hay ifay eshay ad,hay Iay ouldshay avehay
eltfay saay ifay Iay oughtay otay oday it;ay utbay Umfieldplay isay outabay saay aygay saay aay
urchyard,chay youay ow,knay danay I'day atherray ebay excuseday. Eway adhay aay urryflay ettinggay
ethay olday adylay off,ay danay Iay adhay aay ightfray everyay imetay eshay okespay otay e,may orfay Iay
asway inay uchsay aay urryhay otay ebay oughthray atthay Iay asway uncommonlyay elpfulhay danay
eet,sway danay earedfay e'dshay indfay itay impossibleay otay artpay omfray emay. Iay uakedqay
illtay eshay asway airlyfay inay ethay arriage,cay danay adhay aay inalfay ight,fray or,fay saay itay
ovedray off,ay eshay oppedpay outay erhay ead,hay aying,say Osy-phine,'Jay on'tway you--?'ay
Iay idn'tday earhay yanay ore,may orfay Iay aselybay urnedtay danay ed;flay Iay idday uallyactay
un,ray danay iskedwhay oundray ethay orner,cay erewhay Iay eltfay afe."say

Other"May isn'tay ick,say onlyay eryvay ired,tay danay eshay ayssay eshay isay oinggay otay aystay

I"ay allshay aketay omesay upay otay other,may oughthay eshay aidsay eway ereway otnay otay inkthay ofay

asway onegay.

on'tway uffer,say danay itay illway oday emthay ood,"gay eshay aid,say oducingpray ethay oremay

Anymay ereway ethay omplaintscay elow,bay danay eatgray ethay agrinchay ofay ethay eadhay ookcay

innerday.

Oh,"ay ere'sthay ornedcay eefbay danay entyplay ofay otatoes;pay danay Iay allshay etgay omesay

Ethay unusualay ectaclespay ofay erhay usybay othermay ockingray omfortably,cay danay

Everything"ay isay outay ofay orts,say omehow,"say eshay aidsay otay erself,hay oinggay ownday
airsstay. Ere's"Thay Ethbay ying;cray at'sthay aay uresay ignsay atthay omethingsay isay ongwray
ithway isthay amilyfay. Ifay Yamay isay othering,bay I'llay akeshay er."hay

antway ofay ichwhay ehay adhay iedday.

Ojay eepedpay intoay ishay alf-openhay eye,ay eltfay ishay ittlelay eart,hay danay indingfay imhay

E's"Hay eenbay arved,stay danay ehay a'n'tshay ebay aked,bay ownay e'shay eadday. I'llay akemay

E"Thay uneralfay allshay ebay isthay ernoon,aftay danay eway illway lalay ogay. Ow,nay on'tday
y,cray Ethy;bay it'say aay ity,pay utbay othingnay oesgay ightray isthay eek,way danay Ippay ashay
adhay ethay orstway ofay ethay experimentay. Akemay ethay oud,shray danay aylay imhay inay ymay ox;bay
,anday eraftay ethay inner-party,day e'llway avehay aay icenay ittlelay uneral,"fay aidsay O,jay
eginningbay otay eelfay saay ifay eshay adhay undertakenay aay oodgay ealday.

Eavinglay ethay othersay otay onsolecay Eth,bay eshay epartedday otay ethay itchen,kay ichwhay
asway inay aay ostmay iscouragingday atestay ofay onfusioncay. Uttingpay onay aay igbay on,apray
eshay ellfay otay ork,way danay otgay ethay ishesday iledpay upay eadyray orfay ashing,way enwhay
eshay iscoveredday atthay ethay irefay asway outay.

Ere's"Hay aay eetsway ospect!"pray utteredmay O,jay ammingslay ethay ove-doorstay open,ay
danay okingpay igorouslyvay ongamay ethay inderscay.

Avinghay ekindledray ethay ire,fay eshay oughtthay eshay ouldway ogay otay arketmay ilewhay ethay
aterway eatedhay. Ethay alkway evivedray erhay irits;spay ,anday atteringflay erselfhay atthay
eshay adhay ademay oodgay argains,bay eshay udgedtray omehay ain,agay eraftay uyingbay aay eryvay
youngay obster,lay omesay eryvay olday aragus,aspay danay otway oxesbay ofay idacay
awberriesstray. Ybay ethay imetay eshay otgay earedclay up,ay ethay innerday ived,array danay
ethay ovestay asway ed-hotray. Annahhay adhay eftlay aay anpay ofay eadbray otay ise,ray Egmay adhay
orkedway itay upay early,ay etsay itay onay ethay earthhay orfay aay econdsay ising,ray danay
orgottenfay itay. Egmay asway entertainingay Alliesay Ardinergay inay ethay arlor,pay enwhay
ethay oorday ewflay open,ay danay aay oury,flay ocky,cray ushed,flay danay ishevelledday
igurefay eared,appay emandingday artly,--tay

I"ay ay,say isn'tay eadbray Iz''ray enoughay enwhay itay unsray overay ethay ans?"pay

Alliesay eganbay otay augh;lay utbay Egmay odded,nay danay iftedlay erhay eyebrowsay saay ighhay
saay eythay ouldway o,gay ichwhay ausedcay ethay aritionappay otay anish,vay danay utpay ethay
oursay eadbray intoay ethay ovenay ithoutway urtherfay elayday. Smray. Archmay entway out,ay
eraftay eepingpay erehay danay erethay otay eesay owhay attersmay ent,way oalsay ayingsay aay ordway
ofay omfortcay otay Eth,bay owhay atsay akingmay aay inding-sheet,way ilewhay ethay earday
epartedday aylay inay atestay inay ethay omino-boxday. Aay angestray ensesay ofay elplessnesshay
ellfay uponay ethay irlsgay saay ethay aygray onnetbay anishedvay oundray ethay orner;cay danay
espairday eizedsay em,thay en,whay aay ewfay inutesmay ater,lay Issmay Ockercray eared,appay
danay aidsay e'dshay omecay otay innerday. Ow,nay isthay adylay asway aay in,thay yelloway
inster,spay ithway aay arpshay osenay danay inquisitiveay eyes,ay owhay awsay everything,ay
danay ossipedgay outabay lalay eshay awsay. Eythay islikedday er,hay utbay adhay eenbay aughttay
otay ebay indkay otay er,hay implysay ecausebay eshay asway olday danay oor,pay danay adhay ewfay
iendsfray. Osay Egmay avegay erhay ethay easy-chair,ay danay iedtray otay entertainay er,hay
ilewhay eshay edaskay uestions,qay iticisedcray everything,ay danay oldtay oriesstay ofay
ethay eoplepay omwhay eshay ewknay.

Anguagelay annotcay escribeday ethay ieties,anxay experiences,ay danay exertionsay ichwhay
Ojay underwentay atthay orning;may danay ethay innerday eshay ervedsay upay ecamebay aay
andingstay okejay. Earingfay otay kasay yanay oremay ice,advay eshay idday erhay estbay one,alay
danay iscoveredday atthay omethingsay oremay anthay energyay danay ood-willgay isay
ecessarynay otay akemay aay ookcay. Eshay oiledbay ethay aragusaspay orfay naay our,hay danay asway
ievedgray otay indfay ethay eadshay ookedcay offay danay ethay alksstay arderhay anthay everay.
Ethay eadbray urntbay ack;blay orfay ethay alad-dressingsay osay avatedaggray er,hay atthay
eshay etlay everythingay elseay ogay illtay eshay adhay onvincedcay erselfhay atthay eshay ouldcay
otnay akemay itay itfay otay eatay. Ethay obsterlay asway aay arletscay ysterymay otay er,hay utbay
eshay ammeredhay danay oked,pay illtay itay asway unshelled,ay danay itsay eagremay
oportionspray oncealedcay inay aay ovegray ofay ettuce-leaveslay. Ethay otatoespay adhay otay
ebay urried,hay otnay otay eepkay ethay aragusaspay aiting,way danay ereway otnay oneday taay
astlay. Ethay anc-mangeblay asway umpy,lay danay ethay awberriesstray otnay saay iperay saay
eythay ooked,lay avinghay eenbay ilfullyskay Eaconed.""day

Ell,"Way eythay ancay eatay eef,bay danay eadbray danay utter,bay ifay eythay earay ungry;hay onlyay
it'say ortifyingmay otay avehay otay endspay youray olewhay orningmay orfay othing,"nay
oughtthay O,jay saay eshay angray ethay ellbay alfhay naay ourhay aterlay anthay usual,ay danay
ood,stay ot,hay ired,tay danay ispirited,day urveyingsay ethay eastfay eadspray orfay
Aurie,lay ustomedaccay otay lalay ortssay ofay elegance,ay danay Issmay Ocker,cray osewhay
uriouscay eyesay ouldway arkmay lalay ailures,fay danay osewhay attlingtay onguetay ouldway
eportray emthay arfay danay ideway.

Oorpay Ojay ouldway adlyglay avehay onegay underay ethay able,tay saay oneay ingthay eraftay
otheranay asway astedtay danay eft;lay ilewhay Yamay iggled,gay Egmay ookedlay istressed,day
Issmay Ockercray ursedpay upay erhay ips,lay danay Aurielay alkedtay danay aughedlay ithway lalay
ishay ight,may otay ivegay aay eerfulchay onetay otay ethay estivefay enescay. O'sjay oneay ongstray
ointpay asway ethay uit,fray orfay eshay adhay ugaredsay itay ell,way danay adhay aay itcherpay ofay
ichray eamcray otay eatay ithway itay. Erhay othay eekschay ooledcay aay ifle,tray danay eshay ewdray
aay onglay eath,bray saay ethay ettypray assglay atesplay entway ound,ray danay everyay oneay
ookedlay aciouslygray taay ethay ittlelay osyray islandsay oatingflay inay aay easay ofay eamcray.
Issmay Ockercray astedtay irst,fay ademay aay ywray ace,fay danay ankdray omesay aterway
astilyhay. O,jay owhay adhay efused,ray inkingthay erethay ightmay otnay ebay enough,ay orfay
eythay indleddway adlysay eraftay ethay ickingpay over,ay ancedglay taay Aurie,lay utbay ehay
asway eatingay ayaway anfully,may oughthay erethay asway aay ightslay uckerpay outabay ishay
outh,may danay ehay eptkay ishay eyeay ixedfay onay ishay ateplay. Y,amay owhay asway ondfay ofay
elicateday are,fay ooktay aay eapinghay oonful,spay oked,chay idhay erhay acefay inay erhay
apkin,nay danay eftlay ethay abletay ecipitatelypray.

agictray esturegay.

endeday ayly,gay ithway eadbray danay utter,bay olivesay danay unfay.

IIxay.

AMPcay AURENCElay.


Illustration:[ay Ethbay asway ost-mistress]pay

Ethbay asway ost-mistress,pay or,fay eingbay ostmay taay ome,hay eshay ouldcay endattay otay itay
egularly,ray danay earlyday ikedlay ethay ailyday asktay ofay unlockingay ethay ittlelay oorday
danay istributingday ethay ailmay. Oneay Ulyjay ayday eshay amecay inay ithway erhay andshay ull,fay
danay entway outabay ethay ousehay eavinglay etterslay danay arcels,pay ikelay ethay ennypay
ostpay.

Ere's"Hay youray osy,pay other!may Aurielay evernay orgetsfay at,"thay eshay aid,say uttingpay
ethay eshfray osegaynay inay ethay asevay atthay oodstay inay Armee's"May orner,"cay danay asway
eptkay uppliedsay ybay ethay ectionateaffay oybay.

iclesartay otay erhay ister,say owhay atsay earnay erhay other,may itchingstay istbandswray.

Y,"Whay Iay eftlay aay airpay overay ere,thay danay erehay isay onlyay one,"ay aidsay Eg,may ookinglay
taay ethay aygray ottoncay oveglay.

Idn't"Day youay opdray ethay otheray inay ethay arden?"gay

O,"Nay I'may uresay Iay idn't;day orfay erethay asway onlyay oneay inay ethay office."ay

I"ay atehay otay avehay odday oves!glay Evernay ind,may ethay otheray aymay ebay oundfay. Ymay
etterlay isay onlyay aay anslationtray ofay ethay Ermangay ongsay Iay anted;way Iay inkthay Rmay.
Ookebray idday it,ay orfay isthay isn'tay Aurie'slay iting."wray

Smray. Archmay ancedglay taay Eg,may owhay asway ookinglay eryvay ettypray inay erhay inghamgay
orning-gown,may ithway ethay ittlelay urlscay owingblay outabay erhay orehead,fay danay eryvay
omanly,way saay eshay atsay ewingsay taay erhay ittlelay ork-table,way ullfay ofay idytay itewhay

danay ung,say ilewhay erhay ingersfay ew,flay danay erhay oughtsthay ereway usiedbay ithway
irlishgay anciesfay saay innocentay danay eshfray saay ethay ansiespay inay erhay elt,bay atthay
Smray. Archmay iled,smay danay asway atisfiedsay.

O"Tway etterslay orfay Octorday O,jay aay ook,bay danay aay unnyfay olday at,hay ichwhay overedcay
ethay olewhay ost-office,pay uckstay outside,"ay aidsay Eth,bay aughing,lay saay eshay entway
intoay ethay udy,stay erewhay Ojay atsay itingwray.

Ot"Nay aay oy!"bay

I"ay ikelay otay easeplay Aurie;lay danay I'may otnay aidafray ofay Rmay. Ooke,bray ehay isay osay

o."gay

At's"Thay ymay oodgay irl;gay youay oday ytray otay ightfay offay youray yness,shay danay Iay ovelay
youay orfay itay. Ightingfay aultsfay isn'tay easy,ay saay Iay ow;knay danay aay eerychay ordway
indkay ofay ivesgay aay iftlay. Ankthay you,ay other,"may danay Ojay avegay ethay inthay eekchay aay
atefulgray iss,kay oremay eciouspray otay Smray. Archmay anthay ifay itay adhay ivengay ackbay ethay
osyray oundnessray ofay erhay youthay.

I"ay adhay aay oxbay ofay ocolatechay ops,dray danay ethay icturepay Iay antedway otay opy,"cay aidsay

And"ay Iay otgay aay otenay omfray Rmay. Aurence,lay ingaskay emay otay omecay overay danay ayplay otay

osewhay iendshipfray ithway ethay olday entlemangay osperedpray inelyfay.

Ow"Nay et'slay yflay ound,ray danay oday oubleday utyday o-day,tay osay atthay eway ancay ayplay

oombray.

Enwhay ethay unsay eepedpay intoay ethay irls'gay oomray earlyay extnay orning,may otay omisepray

ictedafflay acefay ithway oldcay eam,cray Ethbay adhay akentay Oannajay otay edbay ithway erhay otay

uttingpay aay othes-pinclay onay erhay ose,nay otay upliftay ethay offendingay eaturefay. Itay

I"ay ustjay ill,way ough,thay orfay it'say apital,--socay ady,shay ight,lay danay igbay. Itay

Ethay ommander-in-chiefcay danay ishay idsaay oonsay eadspray ethay able-clothtay ithway naay
invitingay ayarray ofay eatablesay danay inkables,dray ettilypray ecoratedday ithway eengray
eaveslay. Ojay ouncedannay atthay ethay offeecay asway eady,ray danay everyay oneay ettledsay
emselvesthay otay aay eartyhay eal;may orfay youthay isay eldomsay yspeptic,day danay exerciseay
evelopsday olesomewhay etitesappay. Aay eryvay errymay unchlay itay as;way orfay everythingay
eemedsay eshfray danay unny,fay danay equentfray ealspay ofay aughterlay artledstay aay
enerablevay orsehay owhay edfay earnay ybay. Erethay asway aay easingplay inequalityay inay ethay
able,tay ichwhay oducedpray anymay ishapsmay otay upscay danay ates;play ornsacay oppeddray
intoay ethay ilk,may ittlelay ackblay santay artookpay ofay ethay efreshmentsray ithoutway
eingbay invited,ay danay uzzyfay aterpillarscay ungsway ownday omfray ethay ee,tray otay eesay
atwhay asway oinggay onay. Eethray ite-headedwhay ildrenchay eepedpay overay ethay ence,fay
danay naay objectionableay ogday arkedbay taay emthay omfray ethay otheray idesay ofay ethay iverray
ithway lalay ishay ightmay danay ainmay.

I"ay adhay naay uncommonlyay oodgay imetay atthay ay,day danay aven'thay otgay overay itay yetay.

Ave"Hay ames,gay illtay it'say oolercay. Iay oughtbray Authors,''ay danay Iay areday aysay Issmay

Aren't"ay youay ompanycay oo?tay Iay oughtthay e'dshay uitsay Ooke;bray utbay ehay eepskay

Issmay Atekay idday owknay everalsay ewnay ames;gay danay saay ethay irlsgay ouldway ot,nay danay
ethay oysbay ouldcay ot,nay eatay yanay ore,may eythay lalay ournedadjay otay ethay awing-roomdray
otay ayplay Igmarole.""Ray

One"ay ersonpay eginsbay aay ory,stay yanay onsensenay youay ike,lay danay ellstay saay onglay saay
ehay eases,play onlyay akingtay arecay otay opstay ortshay taay omesay excitingay oint,pay enwhay
ethay extnay akestay itay upay danay oesday ethay amesay. It'say eryvay unnyfay enwhay ellway one,day
danay akesmay aay erfectpay umblejay ofay agicaltray omicalcay uffstay otay aughlay overay.
Easeplay artstay it,ay Rmay. Ooke,"bray aidsay Ate,kay ithway aay ommandingcay ir,aay ichwhay
urprisedsay Eg,may owhay eatedtray ethay utortay ithway saay uchmay espectray saay yanay otheray
entlemangay.

Yinglay onay ethay assgray taay ethay eetfay ofay ethay otway youngay adies,lay Rmay. Ookebray
obedientlyay eganbay ethay ory,stay ithway ethay andsomehay ownbray eyesay eadilystay ixedfay
uponay ethay unshinysay iverray.

Once"ay onay aay ime,tay aay ightknay entway outay intoay ethay orldway otay eeksay ishay ortune,fay
orfay ehay adhay othingnay utbay ishay ordsway danay ishay ieldshay. Ehay avelledtray aay onglay
ile,whay earlynay eight-and-twentyay years,ay danay adhay aay ardhay imetay ofay it,ay illtay ehay
amecay otay ethay alacepay ofay aay oodgay olday ing,kay owhay adhay offereday aay ewardray otay yanay
oneay owhay ouldway ametay danay aintray aay inefay utbay unbrokenay olt,cay ofay ichwhay ehay asway
eryvay ondfay. Ethay ightknay eedagray otay y,tray danay otgay onay owlyslay utbay urely;say orfay
ethay oltcay asway aay allantgay ellow,fay danay oonsay earnedlay otay ovelay ishay ewnay aster,may
oughthay ehay asway eakishfray danay ildway. Everyay ay,day enwhay ehay avegay ishay essonslay otay
isthay etpay ofay ethay ing's,kay ethay ightknay oderay imhay oughthray ethay ity;cay ,anday saay
ehay ode,ray ehay ookedlay everywhereay orfay aay ertaincay eautifulbay ace,fay ichwhay ehay adhay
eensay anymay imestay inay ishay eams,dray utbay evernay oundfay. Oneay ay,day saay ehay entway
ancingpray ownday aay uietqay eet,stray ehay awsay taay ethay indowway ofay aay uinousray astlecay
ethay ovelylay acefay. Ehay asway elighted,day inquireday owhay ivedlay inay isthay olday
astle,cay danay asway oldtay atthay everalsay aptivecay incessespray ereway eptkay erethay ybay
aay ell,spay danay unspay lalay ayday otay aylay upay oneymay otay uybay eirthay ibertylay. Ethay
ightknay ishedway intenselyay atthay ehay ouldcay eefray em;thay utbay ehay asway oor,pay danay
ouldcay onlyay ogay ybay eachay ay,day atchingway orfay ethay eetsway ace,fay danay onginglay otay
eesay itay outay inay ethay unshinesay. Taay ast,lay ehay esolvedray otay etgay intoay ethay astlecay
danay kasay owhay ehay ouldcay elphay emthay. Ehay entway danay ocked;knay ethay eatgray oorday ewflay
open,ay danay ehay eheld--"bay

Illustration:[ay Ehay entway ancingpray ownday aay uietqay eet]stray

A"ay avishinglyray ovelylay ady,lay owhay exclaimed,ay ithway aay ycray ofay apture,ray At'ay
ast!lay taay ast!'"lay ontinuedcay Ate,kay owhay adhay eadray Enchfray ovels,nay danay iredadmay
ethay ylestay. Is"''Tay e!'shay iedcray Ountcay Ustave,gay danay ellfay taay erhay eetfay inay naay

airnessfay. Ever!'Nay illtay youay elltay emay owhay Iay aymay escueray you,'ay oresway ethay

illtay ymay yranttay isay estroyed.'day Ere'Whay isay ethay illain?'vay In'ay ethay auvemay
alonsay. O,gay avebray eart,hay danay avesay emay omfray espair.'day I'ay obey,ay danay eturnray
ictoriousvay oray ead!'day Ithway esethay illingthray ordsway ehay ushedray ay,away danay

A"ay unningstay owblay omfray ethay igbay Eekgray exicon,lay ichwhay naay olday ellowfay inay aay

ethay adderlay oke,bray danay ehay entway eadhay irstfay intoay ethay oat,may ixtysay eetfay
elowbay. Ouldcay imsway ikelay aay uck,day addledpay oundray ethay astlecay illtay ehay amecay otay
aay ittlelay oorday uardedgay ybay otway outstay ellows;fay ockedknay eirthay eadshay ogethertay

epsstay overedcay ithway ustday aay ootfay ick,thay oadstay saay igbay saay youray ist,fay danay
idersspay atthay ouldway ightenfray youay intoay ysterics,hay Issmay Archmay. Taay ethay optay

Eg,may obedientlyay ollowingfay ethay onglay ass-bladegray ichwhay erhay ewnay utortay useday

Issmay Atekay utpay upay erhay ass,glay ,anday avinghay akentay aay urveysay ofay ethay ittlelay

You've"ay aay icenay ent,accay ,anday inay ime,tay illway ebay aay everclay eaderray. Iay iseadvay

ustmay ooklay eraftay Ace,gray eshay isay omping;"ray danay Issmay Atekay olledstray ay,away
ingadday otay erself,hay ithway aay ug,shray I"ay idn'tday omecay otay aperonechay aay
overness,gay oughthay eshay Is__ay youngay danay ettypray. Atwhay odday eoplepay esethay
Yankeesay e;aray I'may aidafray Aurielay illway ebay uiteqay oiltspay ongamay em."thay

I"ay orgotfay atthay Englishay eoplepay atherray urntay upay eirthay osesnay taay overnesses,gay
danay on'tday eattray emthay saay eway o,"day aidsay Eg,may ookinglay eraftay ethay etreatingray
igurefay ithway naay oyedannay expressionay.

Utors,"Tay o,alsay avehay atherray aay ardhay imetay ofay itay ere,thay saay Iay owknay otay ymay
orrowsay. Ere'sthay onay aceplay ikelay Ericaamay orfay usay orkers,way Issmay Argaret;"may
danay Rmay. Ookebray ookedlay osay ontentedcay danay eerful,chay atthay Egmay asway amedashay otay
amentlay erhay ardhay otlay.

I'm"ay adglay Iay ivelay inay itay enthay. Iay on'tday ikelay ymay ork,way utbay Iay etgay aay oodgay ealday
ofay atisfactionsay outay ofay itay eraftay ,allay osay Iay on'tway omplain;cay Iay onlyay ishway Iay
ikedlay eachingtay saay youay o."day

I"ay inkthay youay ouldway ifay youay adhay Aurielay orfay aay upilpay. Iay allshay ebay eryvay orrysay
otay oselay imhay extnay year,"ay aidsay Rmay. Ooke,bray usilybay unchingpay oleshay inay ethay
urftay.

Oing"Gay otay ollege,cay Iay uppose?"say Eg'smay ipslay edaskay atthay uestion,qay utbay erhay
eyesay ed,adday And"ay atwhay ecomesbay ofay you?"ay

Yes;"ay it'say ighhay imetay ehay ent,way orfay ehay isay eady;ray danay saay oonsay saay ehay isay off,ay
Iay allshay urntay oldiersay. Iay maay eeded."nay

I"ay maay adglay ofay at!"thay exclaimeday Egmay. I"ay ouldshay inkthay everyay youngay anmay
ouldway antway otay o;gay oughthay itay isay ardhay orfay ethay othersmay danay isterssay owhay aystay
taay ome,"hay eshay edadday orrowfullysay.

I"ay avehay either,nay danay eryvay ewfay iends,fray otay arecay etherwhay Iay ivelay oray ie,"day
aidsay Rmay. Ooke,bray atherray itterly,bay saay ehay entlyabsay utpay ethay eadday oseray inay
ethay olehay ehay adhay ademay danay overedcay itay up,ay ikelay aay ittlelay avegray.

Aurie"Lay danay ishay andfathergray ouldway arecay aay eatgray eal,day danay eway ouldshay lalay
ebay eryvay orrysay otay avehay yanay armhay appenhay otay you,"ay aidsay Egmay eartilyhay.

Ank"Thay you;ay atthay oundssay easant,"play eganbay Rmay. Ooke,bray ookinglay eerfulchay
ain;agay utbay eforebay ehay ouldcay inishfay ishay eech,spay Ed,nay ountedmay onay ethay olday
orse,hay amecay umberinglay upay otay isplayday ishay equestrianay illskay eforebay ethay
youngay adies,lay danay erethay asway onay oremay uietqay atthay ayday.

On't"Day youay ovelay otay ide?"ray edaskay Acegray ofay Y,amay saay eythay oodstay esting,ray
eraftay aay aceray oundray ethay ieldfay ithway ethay others,ay edlay ybay Ednay.

I"ay oteday uponay it;ay ymay istersay Egmay useday otay ideray enwhay apapay asway ich,ray utbay eway
on'tday eepkay yanay orseshay ow,nay exceptay Ellenay Ee,"tray edadday Y,amay aughinglay.

Ell"Tay emay outabay Ellenay Ee;tray isay itay aay onkey?"day edaskay Acegray uriouslycay.

I'm"ay aidafray youay earay ired;tay ancay Iay oday ythinganay orfay you?"ay

Alk"Tay otay e,may ease;play it'say ull,day ittingsay ybay yself,"may eredansway Ank,fray owhay
adhay evidentlyay eenbay useday otay eingbay ademay uchmay ofay taay omehay.

aay oremay impossibleay asktay otay ashfulbay Eth;bay utbay erethay asway onay aceplay otay unray

Your"ay eerday earay uchmay ettierpray anthay ouray uglyay uffaloes,"bay eshay aid,say urningtay

Illustration:[ay Ingingsway otay danay ofray inay ishay ammock]hay

IIIxay.

ASTLEScay INay EtHay IRaay.


Aurielay aylay uxuriouslylay ingingsway otay danay ofray inay ishay ammock,hay oneay armway
Eptembersay ernoon,aftay onderingway atwhay ishay eighborsnay ereway out,abay utbay ootay
azylay otay ogay danay indfay outay. Ehay asway inay oneay ofay ishay oods;may orfay ethay ayday adhay
eenbay othbay unprofitableay danay unsatisfactory,ay danay ehay asway ishingway ehay ouldcay
ivelay itay overay ainagay. Ethay othay eatherway ademay imhay indolent,ay danay ehay adhay
irkedshay ishay udies,stay iedtray Rmay. Ooke'sbray atiencepay otay ethay utmost,ay
ispleasedday ishay andfathergray ybay actisingpray alfhay ethay ernoon,aftay ightenedfray
ethay aid-servantsmay alfhay outay ofay eirthay its,way ybay ischievouslymay intinghay atthay
oneay ofay ishay ogsday asway oinggay ad,may ,anday eraftay ighhay ordsway ithway ethay able-manstay
outabay omesay anciedfay eglectnay ofay ishay orse,hay ehay adhay ungflay imselfhay intoay ishay
ammock,hay otay umefay overay ethay upiditystay ofay ethay orldway inay eneral,gay illtay ethay
eacepay ofay ethay ovelylay ayday uietedqay imhay inay itespay ofay imselfhay. Aringstay upay intoay
ethay eengray oomglay ofay ethay orse-chestnuthay eestray oveabay im,hay ehay eameddray eamsdray
ofay lalay orts,say danay asway ustjay imaginingay imselfhay ossingtay onay ethay ocean,ay inay aay
oyagevay oundray ethay orld,way enwhay ethay oundsay ofay oicesvay oughtbray imhay oreashay inay aay
ashflay. Eepingpay oughthray ethay eshesmay ofay ethay ammock,hay ehay awsay ethay Archesmay
omingcay out,ay saay ifay oundbay onay omesay expeditionay.

At"Whay inay ethay orldway earay osethay irlsgay outabay ow?"nay oughtthay Aurie,lay openingay
ishay eepyslay eyesay otay aketay aay oodgay ook,lay orfay erethay asway omethingsay atherray
eculiarpay inay ethay earanceappay ofay ishay eighborsnay. Eachay oreway aay arge,lay appingflay
at,hay aay ownbray inenlay ouchpay ungslay overay oneay oulder,shay danay arriedcay aay onglay
affstay. Egmay adhay aay ushion,cay Ojay aay ook,bay Ethbay aay asket,bay danay Yamay aay ortfoliopay.
Lalay alkedway uietlyqay oughthray ethay arden,gay outay taay ethay ittlelay ackbay ate,gay danay
eganbay otay imbclay ethay illhay atthay aylay etweenbay ethay ousehay danay iverray.

Ell,"Way at'sthay ool!"cay aidsay Aurielay otay imself,hay O"tay avehay aay icnicpay danay evernay
kasay emay. Eythay an'tcay ebay oinggay inay ethay oat,bay orfay eythay aven'thay otgay ethay eykay.
Erhapspay eythay orgotfay it;ay I'llay aketay itay otay em,thay danay eesay at'swhay oinggay on."ay

Oughthay ossessedpay ofay alfhay aay ozenday ats,hay itay ooktay imhay omesay imetay otay indfay
one;ay enthay erethay asway aay unthay orfay ethay ey,kay ichwhay asway taay astlay iscoveredday inay
ishay ocket;pay osay atthay ethay irlsgay ereway uiteqay outay ofay ightsay enwhay ehay eapedlay ethay
encefay danay anray eraftay emthay. Akingtay ethay ortestshay ayway otay ethay oat-house,bay ehay
aitedway orfay emthay otay ear:appay utbay onay oneay ame,cay danay ehay entway upay ethay illhay otay
aketay naay observationay. Aay ovegray ofay inespay overedcay oneay artpay ofay it,ay danay omfray
ethay earthay ofay isthay eengray otspay amecay aay earerclay oundsay anthay ethay oftsay ighsay ofay
ethay inespay oray ethay owsydray irpchay ofay ethay icketscray.

Ere's"Hay aay andscape!"lay oughtthay Aurie,lay eepingpay oughthray ethay ushes,bay danay
ookinglay ide-awakeway danay ood-naturedgay eadyalray.

Itay As__way atherray aay ettypray ittlelay icture;pay orfay ethay isterssay atsay ogethertay inay
ethay adyshay ook,nay ithway unsay danay adowshay ickeringflay overay em,thay ethay omaticaray
indway iftinglay eirthay airhay danay oolingcay eirthay othay eeks,chay danay lalay ethay ittlelay
ood-peopleway oinggay onay ithway eirthay airsaffay saay ifay esethay ereway onay angers,stray
utbay olday iendsfray. Egmay atsay uponay erhay ushion,cay ewingsay aintilyday ithway erhay
itewhay ands,hay danay ookinglay saay eshfray danay eetsway saay aay ose,ray inay erhay inkpay
ess,dray ongamay ethay eengray. Ethbay asway ortingsay ethay onescay atthay aylay ickthay underay
ethay emlockhay earnay y,bay orfay eshay ademay ettypray ingsthay ofay emthay. Yamay asway
etchingskay aay oupgray ofay erns,fay danay Ojay asway ittingknay saay eshay eadray oudalay. Aay
adowshay assedpay overay ethay oy'sbay acefay saay ehay atchedway em,thay eelingfay atthay ehay
oughtay otay ogay ay,away ecausebay uninvited;ay yetay ingering,lay ecausebay omehay eemedsay
eryvay onely,lay danay isthay uietqay artypay inay ethay oodsway ostmay activeattray otay ishay
estlessray iritspay. Ehay oodstay osay illstay atthay aay uirrel,sqay usybay ithway itsay
arvesting,hay anray ownday aay inepay oseclay esidebay im,hay awsay imhay uddenlysay danay
ippedskay ack,bay oldingscay osay illyshray atthay Ethbay ookedlay up,ay espieday ethay
istfulway acefay ehindbay ethay irches,bay danay eckonedbay ithway aay eassuringray ilesmay.

owlyslay.

Egmay iftedlay erhay eyebrows,ay utbay Ojay owledscay taay erhay efiantly,day danay aid,say taay
once,ay Of"ay oursecay youay aymay. Eway ouldshay avehay edaskay youay efore,bay onlyay eway
oughtthay youay ouldn'tway arecay orfay uchsay aay irl'sgay amegay saay is."thay

I"ay aysalway ikedlay youray ames;gay utbay ifay Egmay oesn'tday antway e,may I'llay ogay ay."away

I've"ay onay objection,ay ifay youay oday omething;say it'say ainstagay ethay ulesray otay ebay
idleay ere,"hay epliedray Eg,may avelygray utbay aciouslygray.

Uch"May obliged;ay I'llay oday ythinganay ifay you'llay etlay emay opstay aay it,bay orfay it'say saay
ullday saay ethay Esertday ofay Aharasay ownday erethay. Allshay Iay ew,say ead,ray one,cay aw,dray
oray oday lalay taay once?ay Ingbray onay youray ears;bay I'may eady,"ray danay Aurielay atsay own,day
ithway aay ubmissivesay expressionay elightfulday otay eholdbay.

Inish"Fay isthay orystay ilewhay Iay etsay ymay eel,"hay aidsay O,jay andinghay imhay ethay ookbay.

Yes'm,""ay asway ethay eekmay er,answay saay ehay egan,bay oingday ishay estbay otay ovepray ishay
atitudegray orfay ethay avorfay ofay naay issionadmay intoay ethay Usy"Bay Eebay Ociety."say

Ethay orystay asway otnay aay onglay one,ay ,anday enwhay itay asway inished,fay ehay enturedvay otay
kasay aay ewfay uestionsqay saay aay ewardray ofay eritmay.

Ease,"Play a'am,may ouldcay Iay inquireay ifay isthay ighlyhay instructiveay danay armingchay
institutionay isay aay ewnay one?"ay

O,"Nay Iay id;day Iay antedway otay useamay imhay oneay ightnay enwhay youay ereway lalay ay,away danay

O"Gay on,ay ease,"play aidsay Aurie,lay saay Ojay ecamebay orbedabsay inay erhay ork,way ookinglay
aay ifletray ispleasedday.

Oh,"ay idn'tday eshay elltay youay outabay isthay ewnay anplay ofay ours?ay Ell,way eway avehay

Yes,"ay Iay ouldshay inkthay o;"say danay Aurielay oughtthay egretfullyray ofay ishay ownay idleay
aysday.

Other"May ikeslay otay avehay usay outay ofay oorsday saay uchmay saay ossible;pay osay eway ingbray
ouray orkway ere,hay danay avehay icenay imestay. Orfay ethay unfay ofay itay eway ingbray ouray
ingsthay inay esethay ags,bay earway ethay olday ats,hay useay olespay otay imbclay ethay ill,hay
danay ayplay ilgrims,pay saay eway useday otay oday yearsay oagay. Eway allcay isthay illhay ethay
Electable'Day Ountain,'may orfay eway ancay ooklay arfay ayaway danay eesay ethay ountrycay
erewhay eway opehay otay ivelay omesay ime."tay

Ojay ointed,pay danay Aurielay atsay upay otay examine;ay orfay oughthray naay openingay inay ethay
oodway oneay ouldcay ooklay ossacray ethay ide,way ueblay iver,ray ethay eadowsmay onay ethay
otheray ide,say arfay overay ethay outskirtsay ofay ethay eatgray ity,cay otay ethay eengray illshay
atthay oseray otay eetmay ethay yskay. Ethay unsay asway ow,lay danay ethay eavenshay owedplay ithway
ethay endorsplay ofay naay utumnaay unsetsay. Oldgay danay urplepay oudsclay aylay onay ethay
ill-tops;hay danay isingray ighhay intoay ethay uddyray ightlay ereway ilverysay itewhay
eaks,pay atthay oneshay ikelay ethay iryaay iresspay ofay omesay Elestialcay Itycay.

Ow"Hay eautifulbay atthay is!"ay aidsay Aurielay oftly,say orfay ehay asway uickqay otay eesay danay
eelfay eautybay ofay yanay indkay.

It's"ay oftenay o;say danay eway ikelay otay atchway it,ay orfay itay isay evernay ethay ame,say utbay
aysalway endid,"splay epliedray Y,amay ishingway eshay ouldcay aintpay itay.

O"Jay alkstay outabay ethay ountrycay erewhay eway opehay otay ivelay omesay ime,--thetay ealray
ountry,cay eshay eans,may ithway igspay danay ickens,chay danay aymakinghay. Itay ouldway ebay
ice,nay utbay Iay ishway ethay eautifulbay ountrycay upay erethay asway eal,ray danay eway ouldcay
everay ogay otay it,"ay aidsay Ethbay usinglymay.

Ere"Thay isay aay ovelierlay ountrycay evenay anthay at,thay erewhay eway All__shay o,gay ybay danay
y,bay enwhay eway earay oodgay enough,"ay eredansway Eg,may ithway erhay eetsway oicevay.

It"ay eemssay osay onglay otay ait,way osay ardhay otay o;day Iay antway otay yflay ayaway taay once,ay saay
osethay allowssway y,flay danay ogay inay taay atthay endidsplay ate."gay

You'll"ay etgay ere,thay Eth,bay oonersay oray ater;lay onay earfay ofay at,"thay aidsay O;jay
I'm"ay ethay oneay atthay illway avehay otay ightfay danay ork,way danay imbclay danay ait,way danay
aybemay evernay etgay inay eraftay "all.ay

You'll"ay avehay emay orfay ompany,cay ifay at'sthay yanay omfortcay. Iay allshay avehay otay oday aay
ealday ofay avellingtray eforebay Iay omecay inay ightsay ofay youray Elestialcay Itycay. Ifay Iay
ivearray ate,lay you'llay aysay aay oodgay ordway orfay e,may on'tway you,ay Eth?"bay

Omethingsay inay ethay oy'sbay acefay oubledtray ishay ittlelay iend;fray utbay eshay aidsay
eerfully,chay ithway erhay uietqay eyesay onay ethay angingchay ouds,clay If"ay eoplepay
eallyray antway otay o,gay danay eallyray ytray lalay eirthay ives,lay Iay inkthay eythay illway etgay
in;ay orfay Iay on'tday elievebay erethay earay yanay ockslay onay atthay oor,day oray yanay uardsgay
taay ethay ategay. Iay aysalway imagineay itay isay saay itay isay inay ethay icture,pay erewhay ethay
iningshay onesay etchstray outay eirthay andshay otay elcomeway oorpay Istianchray saay ehay
omescay upay omfray ethay iver."ray

Ouldn't"Way itay ebay unfay ifay lalay ethay astlescay inay ethay iraay ichwhay eway akemay ouldcay
omecay ue,tray danay eway ouldcay ivelay inay em?"thay aidsay O,jay eraftay aay ittlelay ausepay.

I've"ay ademay uchsay uantitiesqay itay ouldway ebay ardhay otay oosechay ichwhay I'day ave,"hay
aidsay Aurie,lay yinglay at,flay danay owingthray onescay taay ethay uirrelsqay owhay adhay
etrayedbay imhay.

You'd"ay avehay otay aketay youray avoritefay oneay. Atwhay isay it?"ay edaskay Egmay.

If"ay Iay elltay ine,may illway youay elltay yours?"ay

Yes,"ay ifay ethay irlsgay illway oo."tay

E"Way illway. Ow,nay Aurie."lay

After"ay I'day eensay saay uchmay ofay ethay orldway saay Iay antway o,tay I'day ikelay otay ettlesay inay

usicianmay yself,may danay lalay eationcray isay otay ushray otay earhay e;may danay I'may evernay

Argaretmay eemedsay otay indfay itay aay ittlelay ardhay otay elltay ers,hay danay avedway aay akebray
eforebay erhay ace,fay saay ifay otay isperseday imaginaryay ats,gnay ilewhay eshay aidsay
owly,slay I"ay ouldshay ikelay aay ovelylay ouse,hay ullfay ofay lalay ortssay ofay uxuriouslay

danay eapshay ofay oneymay. Iay maay otay ebay istressmay ofay it,ay danay anagemay itay saay Iay ike,lay
ithway entyplay ofay ervants,say osay Iay evernay eednay orkway aay itbay. Owhay Iay ouldshay enjoyay
it!ay orfay Iay ouldn'tway ebay idle,ay utbay oday ood,gay danay akemay everyay oneay ovelay emay
early."day

Illustration:[ay Ojay asway eryvay usy]bay

IVxay.

ECRETSsay.


Ojay asway eryvay usybay inay ethay arret,gay orfay ethay Octoberay aysday eganbay otay owgray
illy,chay danay ethay ernoonsaftay ereway ortshay. Orfay otway oray eethray ourshay ethay unsay
aylay armlyway inay ethay ighhay indow,way owingshay Ojay eatedsay onay ethay olday ofa,say
itingwray usily,bay ithway erhay aperspay eadspray outay uponay aay unktray eforebay er,hay
ilewhay Abble,scray ethay etpay at,ray omenadedpray ethay eamsbay overhead,ay ompaniedaccay
ybay ishay oldestay on,say aay inefay youngay ellow,fay owhay asway evidentlyay eryvay oudpray ofay
ishay iskerswhay. Uiteqay orbedabsay inay erhay ork,way Ojay ibbledscray ayaway illtay ethay
astlay agepay asway illed,fay enwhay eshay ignedsay erhay amenay ithway aay ourish,flay danay
ewthray ownday erhay en,pay exclaiming,--ay

Ere,"Thay I'veay oneday ymay est!bay Ifay isthay on'tway uitsay Iay allshay avehay otay aitway illtay
Iay ancay oday etter."bay

Yinglay ackbay onay ethay ofa,say eshay eadray ethay anuscriptmay arefullycay ough,thray
akingmay ashesday erehay danay ere,thay danay uttingpay inay anymay exclamationay oints,pay
ichwhay ookedlay ikelay ittlelay alloons;bay enthay eshay iedtay itay upay ithway aay artsmay edray
ibbon,ray danay atsay aay inutemay ookinglay taay itay ithway aay ober,say istfulway expression,ay
ichwhay ainlyplay owedshay owhay earnestay erhay orkway adhay eenbay. O'sjay eskday upay erehay
asway naay olday intay itchen,kay ichwhay unghay ainstagay ethay allway. Inay itay eshay eptkay erhay
aperspay danay aay ewfay ooks,bay afelysay utshay ayaway omfray Abble,scray o,whay eingbay
ikewiselay ofay aay iterarylay urn,tay asway ondfay ofay akingmay aay irculatingcay ibrarylay ofay
uchsay ooksbay saay ereway eftlay inay ishay ay,way ybay eatingay ethay eaveslay. Omfray isthay intay
eceptacleray Ojay oducedpray otheranay anuscript;may ,anday uttingpay othbay inay erhay
ocket,pay eptcray uietlyqay ownday airs,stay eavinglay erhay iendsfray otay ibblenay erhay
enspay danay astetay erhay inkay.

Eshay utpay onay erhay athay danay acketjay saay oiselesslynay saay ossible,pay ,anday oinggay otay
ethay ackbay entryay indow,way otgay outay uponay ethay oofray ofay aay owlay orch,pay ungsway
erselfhay ownday otay ethay assygray ank,bay danay ooktay aay oundaboutray ayway otay ethay oadray.
Onceay ere,thay eshay omposedcay erself,hay ailedhay aay assingpay omnibus,ay danay olledray
ayaway otay own,tay ookinglay eryvay errymay danay ysteriousmay.

Ifay yanay oneay adhay eenbay atchingway er,hay ehay ouldway avehay oughtthay erhay ovementsmay
ecidedlyday eculiar;pay or,fay onay ighting,alay eshay entway offay taay aay eatgray acepay illtay
eshay eachedray aay ertaincay umbernay inay aay ertaincay usybay eet;stray avinghay oundfay ethay
aceplay ithway omesay ifficulty,day eshay entway intoay ethay oor-way,day ookedlay upay ethay
irtyday airs,stay ,anday eraftay andingstay ockstay illstay aay inute,may uddenlysay ivedday
intoay ethay eet,stray danay alkedway ayaway saay apidlyray saay eshay amecay. Isthay
anÅuvremay eshay epeatedray everalsay imes,tay otay ethay eatgray usementamay ofay aay
ack-eyedblay youngay entlemangay ounginglay inay ethay indowway ofay aay uildingbay
oppositeay. Onay eturningray orfay ethay irdthay ime,tay Ojay avegay erselfhay aay ake,shay
ulledpay erhay athay overay erhay eyes,ay danay alkedway upay ethay airs,stay ookinglay saay ifay
eshay ereway oinggay otay avehay lalay erhay eethtay outay.

Erethay asway aay entist'sday ign,say ongamay others,ay ichwhay ornedaday ethay entrance,ay
,anday eraftay aringstay aay omentmay taay ethay airpay ofay ificialartay awsjay ichwhay owlyslay
openeday danay utshay otay awdray entionattay otay aay inefay etsay ofay eeth,tay ethay youngay
entlemangay utpay onay ishay oat,cay ooktay ishay at,hay danay entway ownday otay ostpay imselfhay
inay ethay oppositeay oor-way,day aying,say ithway aay ilesmay danay aay iver,--shay

It's"ay ikelay erhay otay omecay one,alay utbay ifay eshay ashay aay adbay imetay e'llshay eednay omesay
oneay otay elphay erhay ome."hay

Inay entay inutesmay Ojay amecay unningray ownday airsstay ithway aay eryvay edray ace,fay danay ethay
eneralgay earanceappay ofay aay ersonpay owhay adhay ustjay assedpay oughthray aay yingtray
ordealay ofay omesay ortsay. Enwhay eshay awsay ethay youngay entlemangay eshay ookedlay
ythinganay utbay eased,play danay assedpay imhay ithway aay od;nay utbay ehay ollowed,fay ingaskay
ithway naay iraay ofay ympathy,--say

Id"Day youay avehay aay adbay ime?"tay

Ot"Nay ery."vay

You"ay otgay oughthray uickly."qay

Yes,"ay ankthay oodness!"gay

Y"Whay idday youay ogay one?"alay

Idn't"Day antway yanay oneay otay ow."knay

You're"ay ethay oddestay ellowfay Iay everay awsay. Owhay anymay idday youay avehay out?"ay

Ojay ookedlay taay erhay iendfray saay ifay eshay idday otnay understanday im;hay enthay eganbay otay
augh,lay saay ifay ightilymay usedamay taay omethingsay.

Y?""Whay

You"ay ancay eachtay e,may danay enthay enwhay eway ayplay Amlet,hay youay ancay ebay Aertes,lay danay

illingway otay avehay usay olicfray ogethertay saay eway oday ow."nay

I"ay ishway Iay asway aay orse;hay enthay Iay ouldcay unray orfay ilesmay inay isthay endidsplay ir,aay

underay aay aple-tree,may ichwhay asway arpetingcay ethay ankbay ithway imsoncray eaveslay.

Ever"Nay illtay I'may iffstay danay old,ay danay avehay otay useay aay utchcray. On'tday ytray otay

Y?""Whay edaskay Eg,may ookinglay urprisedsay.

I"ay allshay evernay O_'_gay danay arry'may yanay one,"ay observeday Eg,may alkingway onay ithway

ightmay avehay eenbay emptedtay otay oinjay emthay ifay eshay adhay otnay adhay erhay estbay essdray
onay.

Orfay aay eekway oray o,tway Ojay ehavedbay osay ueerlyqay atthay erhay isterssay ereway uiteqay

ace,fay occasionallyay umpingjay upay otay ake,shay danay enthay otay isskay er,hay inay aay eryvay
ysteriousmay anner;may Aurielay danay eshay ereway aysalway akingmay ignssay otay oneay
other,anay danay alkingtay outabay Ead"Spray Eagles,"ay illtay ethay irlsgay eclaredday eythay
adhay othbay ostlay eirthay itsway. Onay ethay econdsay Aturdaysay eraftay Ojay otgay outay ofay ethay
indow,way Eg,may saay eshay atsay ewingsay taay erhay indow,way asway andalizedscay ybay ethay
ightsay ofay Aurielay asingchay Ojay lalay overay ethay arden,gay danay inallyfay apturingcay
erhay inay Y'samay owerbay. Atwhay entway onay ere,thay Egmay ouldcay otnay ee;say utbay ieksshray
ofay aughterlay ereway eard,hay ollowedfay ybay ethay urmurmay ofay oicesvay danay aay eatgray
appingflay ofay ewspapersnay.

At"Whay allshay eway oday ithway atthay irl?gay Eshay evernay Ill__way ehavebay ikelay aay youngay
ady,"lay ighedsay Eg,may saay eshay atchedway ethay aceray ithway aay isapprovingday acefay.

I"ay opehay eshay on't;way eshay isay osay unnyfay danay earday saay eshay is,"ay aidsay Eth,bay owhay

ithway yanay oneay utbay erhay.

It's"ay eryvay ying,tray utbay eway evernay ancay akemay erhay Ommy_cay alay o_,"fay edadday Y,amay

I"ay ewknay it!ay Iay ewknay it!ay Oay ymay O,jay Iay Am__ay osay oud!"pray danay Ethbay anray otay ughay

Earday e,may owhay elightedday eythay lalay ere,way otay ebay ure!say owhay Egmay ouldn'tway

Akes"Say ive,alay ellway Iay ever!"nay inay eatgray onishmentastay taay At"thay O'sjay
oin's;"day owhay oudpray Smray. Archmay asway enwhay eshay ewknay it;ay owhay Ojay aughed,lay ithway

Ell"Tay usay lalay outabay it."ay En"Whay idday itay ome?"cay Ow"Hay uchmay idday youay etgay orfay

ectionateaffay eoplepay ademay aay ubileejay ofay everyay ittlelay ouseholdhay oyjay.

Op"Stay abbering,jay irls,gay danay I'llay elltay youay everything,"ay aidsay O,jay
onderingway ifay Issmay Urneybay eltfay yanay andergray overay erhay Evelina""ay anthay eshay
idday overay erhay Ival"Ray Ainters."pay Avinghay oldtay owhay eshay isposedday ofay erhay
ales,tay Ojay ed,adday And"ay enwhay Iay entway otay etgay ymay er,answay ethay anmay aidsay ehay
ikedlay emthay oth,bay utbay idn'tday aypay eginners,bay onlyay etlay emthay intpray inay ishay
aper,pay danay oticednay ethay oriesstay. Itay asway oodgay actice,pray ehay aid;say danay enwhay
ethay eginnersbay improved,ay yanay oneay ouldway aypay. Osay Iay etlay imhay avehay ethay otway
ories,stay danay o-daytay isthay asway entsay otay e,may danay Aurielay aughtcay emay ithway it,ay
danay insisteday onay eeingsay it,ay osay Iay etlay im;hay danay ehay aidsay itay asway ood,gay danay Iay
allshay itewray ore,may danay e'shay oinggay otay etgay ethay extnay aidpay or,fay danay Iay Am__ay osay
appy,hay orfay inay imetay Iay aymay ebay eablay otay upportsay yselfmay danay elphay ethay irls."gay

O'sjay eathbray avegay outay ere;hay ,anday appingwray erhay eadhay inay ethay aper,pay eshay
edewedbay erhay ittlelay orystay ithway aay ewfay aturalnay ears;tay orfay otay ebay
independent,ay danay earnay ethay aisepray ofay osethay eshay ovedlay ereway ethay earestday
ishesway ofay erhay eart,hay danay isthay eemedsay otay ebay ethay irstfay epstay owardtay atthay
appyhay enday.

Aay ELEGRAMtay.

Iting,wray inking,thay danay irecting,day lalay taay once,ay ightmay ellway ewilderbay ethay

Rmay. Aurencelay amecay urryinghay ackbay ithway Eth,bay ingingbray everyay omfortcay ethay

Ell"Tay emay lalay outabay it,ay Ojay. I__ay maay otnay uiteqay atisfied,say utbay Iay an'tcay ameblay
you,ay orfay Iay owknay owhay illinglyway youay acrificedsay youray anity,vay saay youay allcay

Ell,"Way Iay asway ildway otay oday omethingsay orfay ather,"fay epliedray O,jay saay eythay

ifay Iay oldsay ethay osenay offay ymay acefay otay etgay it."ay

You"ay eedn'tnay eelfay icked,way ymay ild:chay youay adhay onay interway ings,thay danay otgay
ethay implestsay ithway youray ownay ardhay earnings,"ay aidsay Smray. Arch,may ithway aay ooklay
atthay armedway O'sjay earthay.

I"ay adn'thay ethay eastlay ideaay ofay ellingsay ymay airhay taay irst,fay utbay saay Iay entway
ongalay Iay eptkay inkingthay atwhay Iay ouldcay o,day danay eelingfay saay ifay I'day ikelay otay
iveday intoay omesay ofay ethay ichray oresstay danay elphay yselfmay. Inay aay arber'sbay indowway
Iay awsay ailstay ofay airhay ithway ethay icespray arked;may danay oneay ackblay ail,tay otnay osay
ickthay saay ine,may asway ortyfay ollarsday. Itay amecay overay emay lalay ofay aay uddensay atthay Iay
adhay oneay ingthay otay akemay oneymay outay of,ay danay ithoutway oppingstay otay ink,thay Iay
alkedway in,ay edaskay ifay eythay oughtbay air,hay danay atwhay eythay ouldway ivegay orfay
ine."may

I"ay on'tday eesay owhay youay aredday otay oday it,"ay aidsay Eth,bay inay aay onetay ofay eaway.

Oh,"ay ehay asway aay ittlelay anmay owhay ookedlay saay ifay ehay erelymay ivedlay otay oilay ishay
airhay. Ehay atherray ared,stay taay irst,fay saay ifay ehay asn'tway useday otay avinghay irlsgay
ouncebay intoay ishay opshay danay kasay imhay otay uybay eirthay airhay. Ehay aidsay ehay idn'tday
arecay outabay ine,may itay asn'tway ethay ashionablefay olor,cay danay ehay evernay aidpay uchmay
orfay itay inay ethay irstfay ace;play ethay orkway utpay intoay itay ademay itay ear,day danay osay onay.
Itay asway ettinggay ate,lay danay Iay asway aid,afray ifay itay asn'tway oneday ightray ay,away
atthay Iay ouldn'tshay avehay itay oneday taay ,allay danay youay owknay enwhay Iay artstay otay oday aay
ing,thay Iay atehay otay ivegay itay up;ay osay Iay eggedbay imhay otay aketay it,ay danay oldtay imhay
ywhay Iay asway inay uchsay aay urryhay. Itay asway illy,say Iay areday ay,say utbay itay angedchay ishay
ind,may orfay Iay otgay atherray excited,ay danay oldtay ethay orystay inay ymay opsy-turvytay
ay,way danay ishay ifeway eard,hay danay aidsay osay indly,--kay

Ake"'Tay it,ay Omas,thay danay obligeay ethay youngay ady;lay I'day oday saay uchmay orfay ouray
Immyjay yanay ayday ifay Iay adhay aay irespay ofay airhay orthway elling.'"say

O"Whay asway Immy?"jay edaskay Y,amay owhay ikedlay otay avehay ingsthay explaineday saay eythay
entway ongalay.

saay eythay essed,dray eythay eedagray otay aysay ood-bygay eerfullychay danay opefully,hay
danay endsay eirthay othermay onay erhay iousanxay ourneyjay unsaddeneday ybay earstay oray
omplaintscay omfray emthay. Everythingay eemedsay eryvay angestray enwhay eythay entway
own,--soday imday danay illstay outside,ay osay ullfay ofay ightlay danay ustlebay ithinway.

ookedlay unnaturalay saay eshay ewflay outabay erhay itchenkay ithway erhay ight-capnay onay.

ethay ofa,say danay othermay erselfhay atsay yingtray otay eat,ay utbay ookinglay osay alepay danay
ornway ithway eeplessnessslay danay ietyanxay atthay ethay irlsgay oundfay itay eryvay ardhay otay
eepkay eirthay esolutionray. Eg'smay eyesay eptkay illingfay inay itespay ofay erself;hay Ojay
asway obligeday otay idehay erhay acefay inay ethay itchenkay ollerray oremay anthay once;ay danay
ethay ittlelay irls'gay oreway aay ave,gray oubledtray expression,ay saay ifay orrowsay asway aay
ewnay experienceay otay emthay.

aketay eatgray arecay ofay erhay. Eshay oesday erhay ownay air,hay danay Iay maay

Ee"Thray eerschay orfay earday ather!fay Ookebray asway aay umptray otay elegraphtay

I'may ad!'glay Idn'tday atthay oday saay ellway saay aay egularray ayer?pray orfay Iay
eltfay aay eatgray anymay inay ymay earthay. Eway avehay uchsay unnyfay imes;tay danay
ownay Iay ancay enjoyay em,thay orfay everyay oneay isay osay esperatelyday ood,gay
it'say ikelay ivinglay inay aay estnay ofay urtle-dovestay. You'day aughlay otay eesay
Egmay eadhay ethay abletay danay ytray otay ebay otherishmay. Eshay etsgay ettierpray
everyay ay,day danay I'may inay ovelay ithway erhay ometimessay. Ethay ildrenchay earay
egularray angels,archay danay I--well,ay I'may O,jay danay evernay allshay ebay
ythinganay elseay. Oh,ay Iay ustmay elltay youay atthay Iay amecay earnay avinghay aay
uarrelqay ithway Aurielay. Iay eedfray ymay indmay outabay aay illysay ittlelay
ing,thay danay ehay asway offendeday. Iay asway ight,ray utbay idn'tday eakspay saay Iay
ought,ay danay ehay archedmay ome,hay ayingsay ehay ouldn'tway omecay ainagay illtay
Iay eggedbay ardonpay. Iay eclaredday Iay ouldn't,way danay otgay admay. Itay astedlay
lalay ay;day Iay eltfay ad,bay danay antedway youay eryvay uchmay. Aurielay danay Iay earay
othbay osay oud,pray it'say ardhay otay egbay ardon;pay utbay Iay oughtthay e'dhay omecay
otay it,ay orfay Iay As__way inay ethay ightray. Ehay idn'tday ome;cay danay ustjay taay
ightnay Iay ememberedray atwhay youay aidsay enwhay Yamay ellfay intoay ethay iverray.
Iay eadray ymay ittlelay ook,bay eltfay etter,bay esolvedray otnay otay etlay ethay unsay
etsay onay Y__may er,angay danay anray overay otay elltay Aurielay Iay asway orrysay. Iay
etmay imhay taay ethay ate,gay omingcay orfay ethay amesay ingthay. Eway othbay
aughed,lay eggedbay eachay other'say ardon,pay danay eltfay lalay oodgay danay
omfortablecay ainagay.

I"ay ademay aay Ome''pay yesterday,ay enwhay Iay asway elpinghay Annahhay ash;way ,anday
saay atherfay ikeslay ymay illysay ittlelay ings,thay Iay utpay itay inay otay useamay
imhay. Ivegay imhay ethay ovingestlay ughay atthay everay as,way danay isskay yourselfay
aay ozenday imestay orfay youray
OPSY-TURVY"Tay O."jay

A"ay ONGsay OMfRay EtHay UDSsay.

Ueen"Qay ofay ymay ub,tay Iay errilymay ing,say
Ilewhay ethay itewhay oamfay isesray igh;hay
Danay urdilystay ashway danay inseray danay ing,wray
Danay astenfay ethay othesclay otay y;dray
Enthay outay inay ethay eefray eshfray iraay eythay ing,sway
Underay ethay unnysay yskay.

I"ay ishway eway ouldcay ashway omfray ouray eartshay danay oulssay
Ethay ainsstay ofay ethay eekway ay,away
Danay etlay aterway danay iraay ybay eirthay agicmay akemay
Ourselvesay saay urepay saay ey;thay

Along"ay ethay athpay ofay aay usefulay ife,lay
Illway eart's-easehay everay oom;blay
Ethay usybay indmay ashay onay imetay otay inkthay
Ofay orrowsay oray arecay oray oom;glay
Danay iousanxay oughtsthay aymay ebay eptsway ay,away
Saay eway avelybray ieldway aay oombray.

EAR"Day OTHER,--may

Ere"Thay isay onlyay oomray orfay emay otay endsay ymay ove,lay danay omesay essedpray
ansiespay omfray ethay ootray Iay avehay eenbay eepingkay afesay inay ethay ousehay orfay
atherfay otay eesay. Iay eadray everyay orning,may ytray otay ebay oodgay lalay ay,day
danay ingsay yselfmay otay eepslay ithway ather'sfay unetay. Iay an'tcay ingsay And'Lay
ofay ethay Eal'lay ow;nay itay akesmay emay ycray. Everyay oneay isay eryvay ind,kay danay
eway earay saay appyhay saay eway ancay ebay ithoutway youay. Yamay antsway ethay estray ofay
ethay age,pay osay Iay ustmay opstay. Iay idn'tday orgetfay otay overcay ethay olders,hay
danay Iay indway ethay ockclay danay iraay ethay oomsray everyay ayday.

Iss"Kay earday atherfay onay ethay eekchay ehay allscay inemay. Oh,ay oday omecay oonsay
otay youray ovinglay

A"May EREcHay AMMA,--may

E"Way earay lalay ellway Iay oday ymay essonslay aysalway danay evernay orroberatecay
ethay irls--Meggay ayssay Iay eanmay ontradickcay osay Iay utpay inay othbay ordsway
danay youay ancay aketay ethay operestpray. Egmay isay aay eatgray omfortcay otay emay
danay etslay emay avehay ellyjay everyay ightnay taay eatay itsay osay oodgay orfay emay Ojay
ayssay ecausebay itay eepskay emay eetsway emperedtay. Aurielay isay otnay saay
especkfulray saay ehay oughtay otay ebay ownay Iay maay ostalmay inay ymay eens,tay ehay
allscay emay Ickchay danay urtshay ymay eelingsfay ybay alkingtay Enchfray otay emay
eryvay astfay enwhay Iay aysay Ercimay oray Onbay ourjay saay Attiehay Ingkay oesday. Ethay
eevesslay ofay ymay ueblay essdray ereway lalay ornway out,ay danay Egmay utpay inay ewnay
ones,ay utbay ethay ullfay ontfray amecay ongwray danay eythay earay oremay ueblay anthay
ethay essdray. Iay eltfay adbay utbay idday otnay etfray Iay earbay ymay oublestray ellway
utbay Iay oday ishway Annahhay ouldway utpay oremay archstay inay ymay onsapray danay
avehay uckwheatsbay everyay ayday. An'tcay e?shay Idn'tday Iay akemay atthay
interrigationay ointpay ice?nay Egmay ayssay ymay unchtuationpay danay ellingspay
earay isgracefulday danay Iay maay ortyfiedmay utbay earday emay Iay avehay osay anymay
ingsthay otay o,day Iay an'tcay opstay. Ieu,aday Iay endsay eapshay ofay ovelay otay
Apapay.

AMY"ay URTIScay ARCH."may

EAR"Day ISmay ARCH,--may

I"ay esjay opdray aay inelay otay aysay eway itgay onay ustfay ateray. Ethay irlsgay isay
everclay danay yflay oundray ightray artsmay. Issmay Egmay isay oinggay otay akemay aay
operpray oodgay ousekeeper;hay eshay eshay ethay ikinglay orfay it,ay danay itsgay
ethay anghay ofay ingsthay urprisinsay uickqay. Ojay oosday eatbay lalay orfay oingay
ead,ahay utbay eshay on'tday opstay otay al'k'latecay ust,fay danay youay evernay
owknay erewhay e'sshay ikelay otay ingbray upay. Eshay oneday outay aay ubtay ofay
othesclay onay Onday,may utbay eshay archedstay Em'ay oreafay eythay asway
enched,wray danay uedblay aay inkpay alicocay essdray illtay Iay oughtthay Iay ouldshay
aay iedday aay aughinlay. Ethbay isay ethay estbay ofay ittlelay eeters,cray danay aay
ightsay ofay elphay otay e,may einbay osay orehandedfay danay ependableday. Eshay
iestray otay earnlay everything,ay danay eallyray oesgay otay arketmay eyondbay erhay
years;ay ikewiselay eepskay ounts,accay ithway ymay elp,hay uiteqay onderfulway.
Eway avehay otgay onay eryvay economicalay osay ur;fay Iay on'tday etlay ethay irlsgay
evhay offeecay onlyay onceay aay eek,way ordinaccay otay youray ish,way danay eepkay emay
onay ainplay olesomewhay ittlesvay. Yamay oesday ellway outabay ettin,fray earinway
erhay estbay othesclay danay eatinay eetsway uffstay. Rmay. Aurielay isay saay ullfay
ofay idoesday saay usual,ay danay urnstay ethay ousehay upsideay ownday equent;fray
utbay ehay eartenshay upay ethay irls,gay danay osay Iay etlay emay evhay ullfay ingsway.
Ethay olday entlemangay endssay eapshay ofay ings,thay danay isay atherray earin,way
utbay eansmay al,way danay itay intaay ymay aceplay otay aysay othinnay. Ymay eadbray isay
iz,ray osay onay oremay taay isthay imetay. Iay endsay ymay utyday otay Rmay. Arch,may danay
opehay e'shay eensay ethay astlay ofay ishay Ewmoniapay.
Yours"ay Espectful,ray
ANNAH"Hay ULLET."may
