EAD"Hay URSEnay OFay ARDway Onay. -2,-ay

All"ay erenesay onay ethay Appahannock,ray oopstray inay inefay ondition,cay
ommissarycay epartmentday ellway onducted,cay ethay Omehay Uardgay underay
Olonelcay Eddytay aysalway onay uty,day Ommander-in-chiefcay Eneralgay
Aurencelay eviewsray ethay yarmay aily,day Uartermasterqay Ullettmay eepskay
orderay inay amp,cay danay Ajormay Ionlay oesday icketpay utyday taay ightnay. Aay
alutesay ofay enty-fourtway unsgay asway iredfay onay eceiptray ofay oodgay ewsnay
omfray Ashington,way danay aay essdray aradepay ooktay aceplay taay
ead-quartershay. Ommander-in-chiefcay endssay estbay ishes,way inay ichwhay
ehay isay eartilyhay oinedjay ybay
OLONEL"Cay EDDY."tay

EAR"Day ADAM,--may

E"Thay ittlelay irlsgay earay lalay ell;way Ethbay danay ymay oybay eportray aily;day
Annahhay isay aay odelmay ervant,say danay uardsgay ettypray Egmay ikelay aay agondray.
Adglay ethay inefay eatherway olds;hay aypray akemay Ookebray useful,ay danay awdray
onay emay orfay undsfay ifay expensesay exceeday youray estimateay. On'tday etlay
youray usbandhay antway ythinganay. Ankthay Odgay ehay isay endingmay.
Your"ay inceresay iendfray danay ervant,say
AMES"Jay AURENCE."lay

Illustration:[ay Ail-piece]tay




IIxVay.

ITTLElay AITHFULfay.


Orfay aay eekway ethay ountamay ofay irtuevay inay ethay olday ousehay ouldway avehay uppliedsay ethay
eighborhoodnay. Itay asway eallyray azing,amay orfay everyay oneay eemedsay inay aay eavenlyhay
amefray ofay ind,may danay elf-denialsay asway lalay ethay ashionfay. Elievedray ofay eirthay
irstfay ietyanxay outabay eirthay ather,fay ethay irlsgay insensiblyay elaxedray eirthay
aiseworthypray effortsay aay ittle,lay danay eganbay otay allfay ackbay intoay ethay olday aysway.
Eythay idday otnay orgetfay eirthay otto,may utbay opinghay danay eepingkay usybay eemedsay otay
owgray easier;ay danay eraftay uchsay emendoustray exertions,ay eythay eltfay atthay
Endeavoray eservedday aay oliday,hay danay avegay itay aay oodgay anymay.

Ojay aughtcay aay adbay oldcay oughthray eglectnay otay overcay ethay ornshay eadhay enough,ay danay
asway ordereday otay aystay taay omehay illtay eshay asway etter,bay orfay Untaay Archmay idn'tday
ikelay otay earhay eoplepay eadray ithway oldscay inay eirthay eadshay. Ojay ikedlay is,thay danay
eraftay naay energeticay ummageray omfray arretgay otay ellar,cay ubsidedsay onay ethay ofasay
otay ursenay erhay oldcay ithway enicumarsay danay ooksbay. Yamay oundfay atthay ouseworkhay danay
taray idday otnay ogay ellway ogether,tay danay eturnedray otay erhay udmay iespay. Egmay entway
ailyday otay erhay upils,pay danay ewed,say oray oughtthay eshay id,day taay ome,hay utbay uchmay
imetay asway entspay inay itingwray onglay etterslay otay erhay other,may oray eadingray ethay
Ashingtonway espatchesday overay danay overay. Ethbay eptkay on,ay ithway onlyay ightslay
elapsesray intoay idlenessay oray ievinggray. Lalay ethay ittlelay utiesday ereway
aithfullyfay oneday eachay ay,day danay anymay ofay erhay isters'say o,alsay orfay eythay ereway
orgetful,fay danay ethay ousehay eemedsay ikelay aay ockclay osewhay endulumpay asway onegay
isitinga-vay. Enwhay erhay earthay otgay eavyhay ithway ongingslay orfay othermay oray earsfay
orfay ather,fay eshay entway ayaway intoay aay ertaincay oset,clay idhay erhay acefay inay ethay
oldsfay ofay aay ertaincay earday olday own,gay danay ademay erhay ittlelay oanmay danay ayedpray
erhay ittlelay ayerpray uietlyqay ybay erselfhay. Obodynay ewknay atwhay eeredchay erhay upay
eraftay aay obersay it,fay utbay everyay oneay eltfay owhay eetsway danay elpfulhay Ethbay as,way
danay ellfay intoay aay ayway ofay oinggay otay erhay orfay omfortcay oray iceadvay inay eirthay allsmay
airsaffay.

Lalay ereway unconsciousay atthay isthay experienceay asway aay esttay ofay aracter;chay ,anday
enwhay ethay irstfay excitementay asway over,ay eltfay atthay eythay adhay oneday ell,way danay
eservedday aisepray. Osay eythay id;day utbay eirthay istakemay asway inay easingcay otay oday
ell,way danay eythay earnedlay isthay essonlay oughthray uchmay ietyanxay danay egretray.

Eg,"May Iay ishway you'day ogay danay eesay ethay Ummels;hay youay owknay othermay oldtay usay otnay
otay orgetfay em,"thay aidsay Eth,bay entay aysday eraftay Smray. Arch'smay epartureday.

I'm"ay ootay iredtay otay ogay isthay ernoon,"aftay epliedray Eg,may ockingray omfortablycay
saay eshay ewedsay.

An't"Cay you,ay O?"jay edaskay Ethbay.

Oo"Tay ormystay orfay emay ithway ymay old."cay

I"ay oughtthay itay asway ostalmay ell."way

It's"ay ellway enoughay orfay emay otay ogay outay ithway Aurie,lay utbay otnay ellway enoughay otay
ogay otay ethay Ummels',"hay aidsay O,jay aughing,lay utbay ookinglay aay ittlelay amedashay ofay
erhay inconsistencyay.

Y"Whay on'tday youay ogay yourself?"ay edaskay Egmay.

I"ay Ave__hay eenbay everyay ay,day utbay ethay abybay isay ick,say danay Iay on'tday owknay atwhay otay
oday orfay itay. Smray. Ummelhay oesgay ayaway otay ork,way danay Ottchenlay akestay arecay ofay it;ay
utbay itay etsgay ickersay danay icker,say danay Iay inkthay youay oray Annahhay oughtay otay o."gay

Ethbay okespay earnestly,ay danay Egmay omisedpray eshay ouldway ogay o-morrowtay.

Ask"ay Annahhay orfay omesay icenay ittlelay ess,may danay aketay itay ound,ray Eth;bay ethay iraay
illway oday youay ood,"gay aidsay O,jay ingadday ologetically,apay I'd"ay o,gay utbay Iay antway
otay inishfay ymay iting."wray

Y"May eadhay esachay danay I'may ired,tay osay Iay oughtthay aymay ebay omesay ofay youay ouldway o,"gay
aidsay Ethbay.

Amy"ay illway ebay inay esently,pray danay eshay illway unray ownday orfay us,"ay uggestedsay Egmay.

Ell,"Way I'llay estray aay ittlelay danay aitway orfay er."hay

Osay Ethbay aylay ownday onay ethay ofa,say ethay othersay eturnedray otay eirthay ork,way danay ethay
Ummelshay ereway orgottenfay. Naay ourhay assed:pay Yamay idday otnay ome;cay Egmay entway otay
erhay oomray otay ytray onay aay ewnay ess;dray Ojay asway orbedabsay inay erhay ory,stay danay Annahhay
asway oundsay eepaslay eforebay ethay itchenkay ire,fay enwhay Ethbay uietlyqay utpay onay erhay
ood,hay illedfay erhay asketbay ithway oddsay danay endsay orfay ethay oorpay ildren,chay danay
entway outay intoay ethay illychay ir,aay ithway aay eavyhay ead,hay danay aay ievedgray ooklay inay
erhay atientpay eyesay. Itay asway atelay enwhay eshay amecay ack,bay danay onay oneay awsay erhay
eepcray upstairsay danay utshay erselfhay intoay erhay other'smay oomray. Alfhay naay ourhay
eraftay Ojay entway otay Other's"may oset"clay orfay omething,say danay erethay oundfay Ethbay
ittingsay onay ethay edicinemay est,chay ookinglay eryvay ave,gray ithway edray eyes,ay danay aay
amphor-bottlecay inay erhay andhay.

Istopher"Chray Olumbus!cay At'swhay ethay atter?"may iedcray O,jay saay Ethbay utpay outay erhay
andhay saay ifay otay arnway erhay off,ay danay edaskay uickly,--qay

You've"ay adhay ethay arletscay ever,fay aven'thay you?"ay

Years"ay o,agay enwhay Egmay idday. Y?"whay

En"Thay I'llay elltay youay. Oh,ay O,jay ethay aby'sbay ead!"day

At"Whay aby?"bay

S"Mray. Ummel's;hay itay iedday inay ymay aplay eforebay eshay otgay ome,"hay iedcray Eth,bay ithway
aay obsay.

Y"May oorpay ear,day owhay eadfuldray orfay you!ay Iay oughtay otay avehay one,"gay aidsay O,jay
akingtay erhay istersay inay erhay sarmay saay eshay atsay ownday inay erhay other'smay igbay air,chay
ithway aay emorsefulray acefay.

It"ay asn'tway eadful,dray O,jay onlyay osay ad!say Iay awsay inay aay inutemay atthay itay asway
icker,say utbay Ottchenlay aidsay erhay othermay adhay onegay orfay aay octor,day osay Iay ooktay
abybay danay etlay Ottylay estray. Itay eemedsay eep,aslay utbay lalay ofay aay uddensay itay avegay aay
ittlelay y,cray danay embled,tray danay enthay aylay eryvay illstay. Iay iedtray otay armway itsay
eet,fay danay Ottylay avegay itay omesay ilk,may utbay itay idn'tday ir,stay danay Iay ewknay itay asway
ead."day

Illustration:[ay Itay idn'tday ir,stay danay Iay ewknay itay asway ead]day

On't"Day y,cray ear!day Atwhay idday youay o?"day

I"ay ustjay atsay danay eldhay itay oftlysay illtay Smray. Ummelhay amecay ithway ethay octorday. Ehay
aidsay itay asway ead,day danay ookedlay taay Einrichhay danay Inna,may owhay avehay otgay oresay
oatsthray. Arlet'Scay ever,fay a'ammay. Oughtay otay avehay alledcay emay efore,'bay ehay aidsay
osslycray. Smray. Ummelhay oldtay imhay eshay asway oor,pay danay adhay iedtray otay urecay abybay
erself,hay utbay ownay itay asway ootay ate,lay danay eshay ouldcay onlyay kasay imhay otay elphay ethay
others,ay danay usttray otay aritychay orfay ishay aypay. Ehay iledsmay en,thay danay asway
inder;kay utbay itay asway eryvay ad,say danay Iay iedcray ithway emthay illtay ehay urnedtay ound,ray
lalay ofay aay udden,say danay oldtay emay otay ogay omehay danay aketay elladonnabay ightray ay,away
oray I'day avehay ethay ever."fay

O,"Nay youay on't!"way iedcray O,jay ugginghay erhay ose,clay ithway aay ightenedfray ooklay. O"ay
Eth,bay ifay youay ouldshay ebay icksay Iay evernay ouldcay orgivefay yself!may Atwhay All__shay
eway o?"day

On't"Day ebay ightened,fray Iay uessgay Iay an'tshay avehay itay adlybay. Iay ookedlay inay
other'smay ook,bay danay awsay atthay itay eginsbay ithway eadache,hay oresay oat,thray danay
ueerqay eelingsfay ikelay ine,may osay Iay idday aketay omesay elladonna,bay danay Iay eelfay
etter,"bay aidsay Eth,bay ayinglay erhay oldcay andshay onay erhay othay orehead,fay danay
yingtray otay ooklay ellway.

If"ay othermay asway onlyay taay ome!"hay exclaimeday O,jay eizingsay ethay ook,bay danay
eelingfay atthay Ashingtonway asway naay immenseay ayway offay. Eshay eadray aay age,pay ookedlay
taay Eth,bay eltfay erhay ead,hay eepedpay intoay erhay oat,thray danay enthay aidsay avely;gray
You've"ay eenbay overay ethay abybay everyay ayday orfay oremay anthay aay eek,way danay ongamay ethay
othersay owhay earay oinggay otay avehay it;ay osay I'may aidafray You__ay earay oinggay otay avehay
it,ay Ethbay. I'llay allcay Annah,hay eshay owsknay lalay outabay ickness."say

On't"Day etlay Yamay ome;cay eshay evernay adhay it,ay danay Iay ouldshay atehay otay ivegay itay otay
erhay. An'tcay youay danay Egmay avehay itay overay ain?"agay edaskay Eth,bay iouslyanxay.

I"ay uessgay ot;nay on'tday arecay ifay Iay o;day ervesay emay ight,ray elfishsay ig,pay otay etlay
youay o,gay danay aystay itingwray ubbishray yself!"may utteredmay O,jay saay eshay entway otay
onsultcay Annahhay.

Ethay oodgay oulsay asway ideway akeaway inay aay inute,may danay ooktay ethay eadlay taay once,ay
uringassay Ojay atthay erethay asway onay eednay otay orry;way everyay oneay adhay arletscay
ever,fay ,anday ifay ightlyray eated,tray obodynay ied,--allday ofay ichwhay Ojay elieved,bay
danay eltfay uchmay elievedray saay eythay entway upay otay allcay Egmay.

Ow"Nay I'llay elltay youay atwhay e'llway o,"day aidsay Annah,hay enwhay eshay adhay examineday
danay uestionedqay Eth;bay E"way illway avehay Rday. Angs,bay ustjay otay aketay aay ooklay taay
you,ay ear,day danay eesay atthay eway artstay ight;ray enthay e'llway endsay Yamay offay otay Untaay
Arch's,may orfay aay ell,spay otay eepkay erhay outay ofay arm'shay ay,way danay oneay ofay youay
irlsgay ancay aystay taay omehay danay useamay Ethbay orfay aay ayday oray o."tway

I"ay allshay ay,stay ofay ourse;cay I'may oldest,"ay eganbay Eg,may ookinglay iousanxay danay
elf-reproachfulsay.

I_"_ay all,shay ecausebay it'say ymay aultfay eshay isay ick;say Iay oldtay othermay I'day oday ethay
errands,ay danay Iay aven't,"hay aidsay Ojay ecidedlyday.

Ich"Whay illway youay ave,hay Eth?bay erethay in'taay onay eednay ofay utbay one,"ay aidsay
Annahhay.

O,"Jay ease;"play danay Ethbay eanedlay erhay eadhay ainstagay erhay ister,say ithway aay
ontentedcay ook,lay ichwhay effectuallyay ettledsay atthay ointpay.

I'll"ay ogay danay elltay Y,"amay aidsay Eg,may eelingfay aay ittlelay urt,hay yetay atherray
elieved,ray onay ethay ole,whay orfay eshay idday otnay ikelay ursing,nay danay Ojay idday.

Yamay ebelledray outright,ay danay assionatelypay eclaredday atthay eshay adhay atherray
avehay ethay everfay anthay ogay otay Untaay Archmay. Egmay easoned,ray eaded,play danay
ommanded:cay lalay inay ainvay. Yamay otestedpray atthay eshay ouldway Ot__nay o;gay danay Egmay
eftlay erhay inay espair,day otay kasay Annahhay atwhay ouldshay ebay oneday. Eforebay eshay amecay
ack,bay Aurielay alkedway intoay ethay arlorpay otay indfay Yamay obbing,say ithway erhay eadhay
inay ethay ofa-cushionssay. Eshay oldtay erhay ory,stay expectingay otay ebay onsoled;cay utbay
Aurielay onlyay utpay ishay andshay inay ishay ocketspay danay alkedway outabay ethay oom,ray
istlingwhay oftly,say saay ehay itknay ishay owsbray inay eepday oughtthay. Esentlypray ehay atsay
ownday esidebay er,hay danay aid,say inay ishay ostmay eedlesomewhay one,tay Ow"Nay ebay aay
ensiblesay ittlelay oman,way danay oday saay eythay aysay. O,nay on'tday y,cray utbay earhay atwhay
aay ollyjay anplay I'veay otgay. Youay ogay otay Untaay Arch's,may danay I'llay omecay danay aketay
youay outay everyay ay,day ivingdray oray alking,way danay e'llway avehay apitalcay imestay.
On'tway atthay ebay etterbay anthay opingmay ere?"hay

Illustration:[ay Ehay atsay ownday esidebay er]hay

I"ay on'tday ishway otay ebay entsay offay saay ifay Iay asway inay ethay ay,"way eganbay Y,amay inay naay
injureday oicevay.

Ess"Blay youray eart,hay ild,chay it'say otay eepkay youay ellway. Youay on'tday antway otay ebay
ick,say oday you?"ay

O,"Nay I'may uresay Iay on't;day utbay Iay areday aysay Iay allshay e,bay orfay I'veay eenbay ithway
Ethbay lalay ethay ime."tay

At's"Thay ethay eryvay easonray youay oughtay otay ogay ayaway taay once,ay osay atthay youay aymay
escapeay itay. Angechay ofay iraay danay arecay illway eepkay youay ell,way Iay areday ay;say or,ay ifay
itay oesday otnay entirely,ay youay illway avehay ethay everfay oremay ightlylay. Iay iseadvay youay
otay ebay offay saay oonsay saay youay an,cay orfay arletscay everfay isay onay oke,jay iss."may

Ut"Bay it'say ullday taay Untaay Arch's,may danay eshay isay osay oss,"cray aidsay Y,amay ookinglay
atherray ightenedfray.

It"ay on'tway ebay ullday ithway emay oppingpay inay everyay ayday otay elltay youay owhay Ethbay is,ay
danay aketay youay outay allivantinggay. Ethay olday adylay ikeslay e,may danay I'llay ebay saay
eetsway saay ossiblepay otay er,hay osay eshay on'tway eckpay taay us,ay ateverwhay eway o."day

Ill"Way youay aketay emay outay inay ethay ottingtray agonway ithway Uck?"pay

On"ay ymay onorhay saay aay entleman."gay

ovingappray at,pay ichwhay oyedannay Yamay oremay anthay ethay Iving"gay in."ay

ought;wray danay Y,amay eelingfay eryvay eciouspray danay elf-sacrificing,say omisedpray

danay ehay eltfay oremay iousanxay outabay erhay anthay ehay ikedlay otay owshay.

Egmay.

At"Whay aay yingtray orldway itay is!"ay aidsay O,jay umplingray upay erhay airhay inay aay etfulfray
ortsay ofay ayway. O"Nay oonersay oday eway etgay outay ofay oneay oubletray anthay ownday omescay
otheranay. Erethay oesn'tday eemsay otay ebay ythinganay otay oldhay onay otay enwhay other'smay
one;gay osay I'may lalay taay ea."say

Ell,"Way on'tday akemay aay orcupinepay ofay yourself,ay itay isn'tay ecomingbay. Ettlesay

Um,"Hay ell,way Iay an'tcay ay;say upposesay youay kasay andfathergray eraftay ethay octorday
ashay een."bay

encefay ithway naay ovingappray ilesmay.

orfay ethay ubjectsay idday otnay interestay erhay.

Rday. Angsbay ame,cay aidsay Ethbay adhay ymptomssay ofay ethay ever,fay utbay oughtthay eshay
ouldway avehay itay ightly,lay oughthay ehay ookedlay obersay overay ethay Ummelhay orystay. Yamay

eshay epartedday inay eatgray ate,stay ithway Ojay danay Aurielay saay escortay.

IIIxVay.

ARKday AYSday.


Illustration:[ay Ethbay idday avehay ethay ever]fay

Ethbay idday avehay ethay ever,fay danay asway uchmay ickersay anthay yanay oneay utbay Annahhay danay
ethay octorday uspectedsay. Ethay irlsgay ewknay othingnay outabay illness,ay danay Rmay.
Aurencelay asway otnay owedallay otay eesay er,hay osay Annahhay adhay everythingay lalay erhay
ownay ay,way danay usybay Rday. Angsbay idday ishay est,bay utbay eftlay aay oodgay ealday otay ethay
excellentay ursenay. Egmay ayedstay taay ome,hay estlay eshay ouldshay infectay ethay Ings,kay
danay eptkay ouse,hay eelingfay eryvay iousanxay danay aay ittlelay uiltygay enwhay eshay otewray
etterslay inay ichwhay onay entionmay asway ademay ofay Eth'sbay illnessay. Eshay ouldcay otnay
inkthay itay ightray otay eceiveday erhay other,may utbay eshay adhay eenbay iddenbay otay indmay
Annah,hay danay Annahhay ouldn'tway earhay ofay S"Mray. Archmay ein'bay old,tay danay orriedway
ustjay orfay echsay aay ifle."tray Ojay evotedday erselfhay otay Ethbay ayday danay ight;nay otnay aay
ardhay ask,tay orfay Ethbay asway eryvay atient,pay danay orebay erhay ainpay uncomplaininglyay
saay onglay saay eshay ouldcay ontrolcay erselfhay. Utbay erethay amecay aay imetay enwhay uringday
ethay everfay itsfay eshay eganbay otay alktay inay aay oarse,hay okenbray oice,vay otay ayplay onay
ethay overlet,cay saay ifay onay erhay elovedbay ittlelay iano,pay danay ytray otay ingsay ithway aay
oatthray osay ollensway atthay erethay asway onay usicmay eft;lay aay imetay enwhay eshay idday otnay
owknay ethay amiliarfay acesfay oundray er,hay utbay essedaddray emthay ybay ongwray ames,nay
danay alledcay imploringlyay orfay erhay othermay. Enthay Ojay ewgray ightened,fray Egmay
eggedbay otay ebay owedallay otay itewray ethay uth,tray danay evenay Annahhay aidsay eshay Ould"way
inkthay ofay it,ay oughthay erethay asway onay angerday Yet_."_ay Aay etterlay omfray Ashingtonway
edadday otay eirthay ouble,tray orfay Rmay. Archmay adhay adhay aay elapse,ray danay ouldcay otnay
inkthay ofay omingcay omehay orfay aay onglay ilewhay.

Owhay arkday ethay aysday eemedsay ow,nay owhay adsay danay onelylay ethay ouse,hay danay owhay
eavyhay ereway ethay eartshay ofay ethay isterssay saay eythay orkedway danay aited,way ilewhay
ethay adowshay ofay eathday overedhay overay ethay onceay appyhay ome!hay Enthay itay asway atthay
Argaret,may ittingsay onealay ithway earstay oppingdray oftenay onay erhay ork,way eltfay owhay
ichray eshay adhay eenbay inay ingsthay oremay eciouspray anthay yanay uxurieslay oneymay ouldcay
uy,--inbay ove,lay otection,pray eace,pay danay ealth,hay ethay ealray essingsblay ofay
ifelay. Enthay itay asway atthay O,jay ivinglay inay ethay arkenedday oom,ray ithway atthay
ufferingsay ittlelay istersay aysalway eforebay erhay eyes,ay danay atthay atheticpay oicevay
oundingsay inay erhay ears,ay earnedlay otay eesay ethay eautybay danay ethay eetnesssway ofay
Eth'sbay ature,nay otay eelfay owhay eepday danay endertay aay aceplay eshay illedfay inay lalay
earts,hay danay otay owledgeacknay ethay orthway ofay Eth'sbay unselfishay ition,ambay otay
ivelay orfay others,ay danay akemay omehay appyhay ybay ethay exerciseay ofay osethay implesay
irtuesvay ichwhay lalay aymay ossess,pay danay ichwhay lalay ouldshay ovelay danay aluevay oremay
anthay alent,tay ealth,way oray eautybay. Danay Y,amay inay erhay exile,ay ongedlay eagerlyay otay
ebay taay ome,hay atthay eshay ightmay orkway orfay Eth,bay eelingfay ownay atthay onay ervicesay
ouldway ebay ardhay oray irksome,ay danay emembering,ray ithway egretfulray ief,gray owhay
anymay eglectednay askstay osethay illingway andshay adhay oneday orfay erhay. Aurielay
auntedhay ethay ousehay ikelay aay estlessray ost,ghay danay Rmay. Aurencelay ockedlay ethay
andgray iano,pay ecausebay ehay ouldcay otnay earbay otay ebay emindedray ofay ethay youngay
eighbornay owhay useday otay akemay ethay ilighttway easantplay orfay imhay. Everyay oneay
issedmay Ethbay. Ethay ilkman,may aker,bay ocer,gray danay utcherbay inquireday owhay eshay
id;day oorpay Smray. Ummelhay amecay otay egbay ardonpay orfay erhay oughtlessness,thay danay otay
etgay aay oudshray orfay Inna;may ethay eighborsnay entsay lalay ortssay ofay omfortscay danay
oodgay ishes,way danay evenay osethay owhay ewknay erhay estbay ereway urprisedsay otay indfay owhay
anymay iendsfray yshay ittlelay Ethbay adhay ademay.

Eanwhilemay eshay aylay onay erhay edbay ithway olday Oannajay taay erhay ide,say orfay evenay inay
erhay anderingsway eshay idday otnay orgetfay erhay orlornfay OtÃ©gÃ©__pray. Eshay ongedlay orfay
erhay ats,cay utbay ouldway otnay avehay emthay ought,bray estlay eythay ouldshay etgay ick;say
,anday inay erhay uietqay ours,hay eshay asway ullfay ofay ietyanxay outabay Ojay. Eshay entsay
ovinglay essagesmay otay Y,amay adebay emthay elltay erhay othermay atthay eshay ouldway itewray
oon;say danay oftenay eggedbay orfay encilpay danay aperpay otay ytray otay aysay aay ord,way atthay
atherfay ightmay otnay inkthay eshay adhay eglectednay imhay. Utbay oonsay evenay esethay
intervalsay ofay onsciousnesscay ended,ay danay eshay aylay ourhay eraftay our,hay ossingtay
otay danay o,fray ithway incoherentay ordsway onay erhay ips,lay oray anksay intoay aay eavyhay
eepslay ichwhay oughtbray erhay onay efreshmentray. Rday. Angsbay amecay icetway aay ay,day
Annahhay atsay upay taay ight,nay Egmay eptkay aay elegramtay inay erhay eskday lalay eadyray otay
endsay offay taay yanay inute,may danay Ojay evernay irredstay omfray Eth'sbay idesay.

Ethay irstfay ofay Ecemberday asway aay intryway ayday indeeday otay em,thay orfay aay itterbay indway
ew,blay owsnay ellfay ast,fay danay ethay yearay eemedsay ettinggay eadyray orfay itsay eathday.
Enwhay Rday. Angsbay amecay atthay orning,may ehay ookedlay onglay taay Eth,bay eldhay ethay othay
andhay inay othbay ishay ownay aay inute,may danay aidlay itay entlygay own,day aying,say inay aay owlay
one,tay otay Annah,--hay

If"ay Smray. Archmay An__cay eavelay erhay usband,hay e'dshay etterbay ebay entsay or."fay

Annahhay oddednay ithoutway eaking,spay orfay erhay ipslay itchedtway ervously;nay Egmay
oppeddray ownday intoay aay airchay saay ethay engthstray eemedsay otay ogay outay ofay erhay imbslay
taay ethay oundsay ofay osethay ords;way danay O,jay eraftay andingstay ithway aay alepay acefay orfay
aay inute,may anray otay ethay arlor,pay atchedsnay upay ethay elegram,tay ,anday owingthray onay
erhay ings,thay ushedray outay intoay ethay ormstay. Eshay asway oonsay ack,bay ,anday ilewhay
oiselesslynay akingtay offay erhay oak,clay Aurielay amecay inay ithway aay etter,lay ayingsay
atthay Rmay. Archmay asway endingmay ainagay. Ojay eadray itay ankfully,thay utbay ethay eavyhay
eightway idday otnay eemsay iftedlay offay erhay eart,hay danay erhay acefay asway osay ullfay ofay
iserymay atthay Aurielay edaskay uickly,--qay

At"Whay isay it?ay isay Ethbay orse?"way

I've"ay entsay orfay other,"may aidsay O,jay uggingtay taay erhay ubberray ootsbay ithway aay
agicaltray expressionay.

oots,bay eeingsay owhay erhay andshay ookshay.

O,"Nay ethay octorday oldtay usay o."tay

O"ay O,jay it'say otnay osay adbay saay at?"thay iedcray Aurie,lay ithway aay artledstay acefay.

Yes,"ay itay is;ay eshay oesn'tday owknay us,ay eshay oesn'tday evenay alktay outabay ethay
ocksflay ofay eengray oves,day saay eshay allscay ethay ine-leavesvay onay ethay all;way eshay

danay atherfay othbay one,gay danay Odgay eemssay osay arfay ayaway Iay an'tcay indfay Im."hay

andhay inay aay elplesshay ortsay ofay ay,way saay ifay opinggray inay ethay ark,day danay Aurielay

oat,--thray

I'm"ay erehay. Oldhay onay otay e,may O,jay ear!"day

Eshay ouldcay otnay eak,spay utbay eshay idday Old"hay on,"ay danay ethay armway aspgray ofay ethay
iendlyfray umanhay andhay omfortedcay erhay oresay eart,hay danay eemedsay otay eadlay erhay
earernay otay ethay Ivineday maray ichwhay onealay ouldcay upholday erhay inay erhay oubletray.

ordsway amecay otay im,hay osay ehay oodstay ilent,say entlygay okingstray erhay entbay eadhay saay
erhay othermay useday otay oday. Itay asway ethay estbay ingthay ehay ouldcay avehay one;day arfay
oremay oothingsay anthay ethay ostmay eloquentay ords,way orfay Ojay eltfay ethay unspokenay
ympathy,say ,anday inay ethay ilence,say earnedlay ethay eetsway olacesay ichwhay ectionaffay
inistersadmay otay orrowsay. Oonsay eshay ieddray ethay earstay ichwhay adhay elievedray er,hay
danay ookedlay upay ithway aay atefulgray acefay.

andkerchiefhay overay erhay eesknay otay ydray.

Oesn't"Day Egmay ullpay air?"fay edaskay Aurie,lay ookinglay indignantay.

Oh,"ay yes;ay eshay iestray o,tay utbay eshay an'tcay ovelay Ethybay saay Iay o;day danay eshay on'tway
issmay erhay saay Iay allshay. Ethbay isay ymay onscience,cay danay Iay An't__cay ivegay erhay upay. Iay
an't!cay Iay an't!"cay

Ownday entway O'sjay acefay intoay ethay etway andkerchief,hay danay eshay iedcray
espairingly;day orfay eshay adhay eptkay upay avelybray illtay ow,nay danay evernay edshay aay

ightmay ebay unmanly,ay utbay ehay ouldn'tcay elphay it,ay danay Iay maay adglay ofay itay.

illway ie;day e'sshay osay ood,gay danay eway lalay ovelay erhay osay uch,may Iay on'tday elievebay

E"Thay oodgay danay earday eoplepay aysalway oday ie,"day oanedgray O,jay utbay eshay oppedstay
ying,cray orfay erhay iend'sfray ordsway eeredchay erhay up,ay inay itespay ofay erhay ownay
oubtsday danay earsfay.

Oor"Pay irl,gay you'reay ornway outay. Itay isn'tay ikelay youay otay ebay orlornfay. Opstay aay
it;bay I'llay eartenhay youay upay inay aay iffy."jay

Aurielay entway offay otway airsstay taay aay ime,tay danay Ojay aidlay erhay eariedway eadhay ownday
onay Eth'sbay ittlelay ownbray ood,hay ichwhay onay oneay adhay oughtthay ofay ovingmay omfray ethay

ubmissivesay iritspay ofay itsay entlegay owneray eemedsay otay enteray intoay O;jay ,anday enwhay
Aurielay amecay unningray ownday ithway aay assglay ofay ine,way eshay ooktay itay ithway aay ile,smay
danay aidsay avely,bray I"ay ink--Healthdray otay ymay Eth!bay Youay earay aay oodgay octor,day
Eddy,tay danay Uch__say aay omfortablecay iend;fray owhay ancay Iay everay aypay you?"ay eshay
ed,adday saay ethay ineway efreshedray erhay ody,bay saay ethay indkay ordsway adhay oneday erhay
oubledtray indmay.

I'll"ay endsay inay ymay ill,bay ybay danay y;bay danay o-nighttay I'llay ivegay youay omethingsay
atthay illway armway ethay ocklescay ofay youray earthay etterbay anthay uartsqay ofay ine,"way
aidsay Aurie,lay eamingbay taay erhay ithway aay acefay ofay uppressedsay atisfactionsay taay
omethingsay.

At"Whay isay it?"ay iedcray O,jay orgettingfay erhay oesway orfay aay inute,may inay erhay onderway.

I"ay elegraphedtay otay youray othermay yesterday,ay danay Ookebray eredansway e'dshay omecay
taay once,ay danay e'llshay ebay erehay o-night,tay danay everythingay illway ebay lalay ightray.
En'taray youay adglay Iay idday it?"ay

Aurielay okespay eryvay ast,fay danay urnedtay edray danay exciteday lalay inay aay inute,may orfay
ehay adhay eptkay ishay otplay aay ecret,say orfay earfay ofay isappointingday ethay irlsgay oray

ehay oppedstay eakingspay eshay electrifieday imhay ybay owingthray erhay sarmay oundray ishay
eck,nay danay yingcray out,ay ithway aay oyfuljay y,cray O"ay Aurie!lay Oay other!may Iay Am__ay osay
ad!"glay Eshay idday otnay eepway ain,agay utbay aughedlay ysterically,hay danay embledtray

ayingsay eathlessly,bray Oh,"ay on't!day Iay idn'tday eanmay o;tay itay asway eadfuldray ofay

I"ay on'tday ind,"may aughedlay Aurie,lay saay ehay ettledsay ishay ietay. Y,"Whay youay eesay Iay

Erehay ethay ockclay uckstray elve,tway danay othbay orgotfay emselvesthay inay atchingway

Illustration:[ay Y'samay Ill]way

IXxay.

Y'SaMay ILLway.


Ilewhay esethay ingsthay ereway appeninghay taay ome,hay Yamay asway avinghay ardhay imestay taay
Untaay Arch'smay. Eshay eltfay erhay exileay eeply,day ,anday orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay erhay
ife,lay ealizedray owhay uchmay eshay asway elovedbay danay ettedpay taay omehay. Untaay Archmay
evernay ettedpay yanay one;ay eshay idday otnay oveappray ofay it;ay utbay eshay eantmay otay ebay
ind,kay orfay ethay ell-behavedway ittlelay irlgay easedplay erhay eryvay uch,may danay Untaay
Archmay adhay aay oftsay aceplay inay erhay olday earthay orfay erhay ephew'snay ildren,chay
oughthay eshay idn'tday inkthay operpray otay onfesscay itay. Eshay eallyray idday erhay estbay otay
akemay Yamay appy,hay ut,bay earday e,may atwhay istakesmay eshay ade!may Omesay olday eoplepay
eepkay youngay taay earthay inay itespay ofay inkleswray danay aygray airs,hay ancay ympathizesay
ithway ildren'schay ittlelay arescay danay oys,jay akemay emthay eelfay taay ome,hay danay ancay
idehay iseway essonslay underay easantplay ays,play ivinggay danay eceivingray iendshipfray
inay ethay eetestsway ayway. Utbay Untaay Archmay adhay otnay isthay ift,gay danay eshay orriedway
Yamay eryvay uchmay ithway erhay ulesray danay orders,ay erhay impray ays,way danay ong,lay osypray
alkstay. Indingfay ethay ildchay oremay ocileday danay iableamay anthay erhay ister,say ethay
olday adylay eltfay itay erhay utyday otay ytray danay ounteract,cay saay arfay saay ossible,pay ethay
adbay effectsay ofay omehay eedomfray danay indulgenceay. Osay eshay ooktay Yamay inay and,hay danay
aughttay erhay saay eshay erselfhay adhay eenbay aughttay ixtysay yearsay o,--aagay ocesspray
ichwhay arriedcay ismayday otay Y'samay oul,say danay ademay erhay eelfay ikelay aay yflay inay ethay
ebway ofay aay eryvay ictstray iderspay.

Illustration:[ay Olishpay upay ethay oonsspay danay ethay atfay ilversay eapot]tay

Eshay adhay otay ashway ethay upscay everyay orning,may danay olishpay upay ethay old-fashioneday
oons,spay ethay atfay ilversay eapot,tay danay ethay asses,glay illtay eythay oneshay. Enthay
eshay ustmay ustday ethay oom,ray danay atwhay aay yingtray objay atthay as!way Otnay aay eckspay
escapeday Untaay Arch'smay eye,ay danay lalay ethay urniturefay adhay awclay egs,lay danay uchmay
arving,cay ichwhay asway evernay ustedday otay uitsay. Enthay Ollypay ustmay ebay ed,fay ethay
ap-doglay ombed,cay danay aay ozenday ipstray upstairsay danay own,day otay etgay ings,thay oray
eliverday orders,ay orfay ethay olday adylay asway eryvay ame,lay danay eldomsay eftlay erhay igbay
airchay. Eraftay esethay iresometay abors,lay eshay ustmay oday erhay essons,lay ichwhay asway aay
ailyday ialtray ofay everyay irtuevay eshay ossessedpay. Enthay eshay asway owedallay oneay ourhay
orfay exerciseay oray ay,play danay idn'tday eshay enjoyay it?ay Aurielay amecay everyay ay,day
danay eedledwhay Untaay Arch,may illtay Yamay asway owedallay otay ogay outay ithway im,hay enwhay
eythay alkedway danay ode,ray danay adhay apitalcay imestay. Eraftay inner,day eshay adhay otay
eadray oud,alay danay itsay illstay ilewhay ethay olday adylay ept,slay ichwhay eshay usuallyay
idday orfay naay our,hay saay eshay oppeddray offay overay ethay irstfay agepay. Enthay atchworkpay
oray owelstay eared,appay danay Yamay ewedsay ithway outwarday eeknessmay danay inwarday
ebellionray illtay usk,day enwhay eshay asway owedallay otay useamay erselfhay saay eshay ikedlay
illtay ea-timetay. Ethay eveningsay ereway ethay orstway ofay ,allay orfay Untaay Archmay ellfay
otay ellingtay onglay oriesstay outabay erhay youth,ay ichwhay ereway osay unutterablyay ullday
atthay Yamay asway aysalway eadyray otay ogay otay ed,bay intendingay otay ycray overay erhay ardhay
ate,fay utbay usuallyay oinggay otay eepslay eforebay eshay adhay ueezedsqay outay oremay anthay aay
eartay oray otway.

Ifay itay adhay otnay eenbay orfay Aurie,lay danay olday Esther,ay ethay aid,may eshay eltfay atthay
eshay evernay ouldcay avehay otgay oughthray atthay eadfuldray imetay. Ethay arrotpay onealay
asway enoughay otay ivedray erhay istracted,day orfay ehay oonsay eltfay atthay eshay idday otnay
ireadmay im,hay danay evengedray imselfhay ybay eingbay saay ischievousmay saay ossiblepay. Ehay
ulledpay erhay airhay eneverwhay eshay amecay earnay im,hay upsetay ishay eadbray danay ilkmay otay
agueplay erhay enwhay eshay adhay ewlynay eanedclay ishay age,cay ademay Opmay arkbay ybay eckingpay
taay imhay ilewhay Adammay ozed;day alledcay erhay amesnay eforebay ompany,cay danay ehavedbay
inay lalay espectsray ikelay aay eprehensibleray olday irdbay. Enthay eshay ouldcay otnay endureay
ethay og,--aday at,fay osscray east,bay owhay arledsnay danay yelpeday taay erhay enwhay eshay
ademay ishay oilet,tay danay owhay aylay onay ishay ack,bay ithway lalay ishay egslay inay ethay iraay
danay aay ostmay idioticay expressionay ofay ountenancecay enwhay ehay antedway omethingsay otay
eat,ay ichwhay asway outabay aay ozenday imestay aay ayday. Ethay ookcay asway ad-tempered,bay ethay
olday oachmancay eaf,day danay Estheray ethay onlyay oneay owhay everay ooktay yanay oticenay ofay
ethay youngay adylay.

Illustration:[ay Onay ishay ack,bay ithway lalay ishay egslay inay ethay ir]aay

Estheray asway aay Enchwoman,fray owhay adhay ivedlay ithway Adame,""May saay eshay alledcay erhay
istress,may orfay anymay years,ay danay owhay atherray yrannizedtay overay ethay olday ady,lay
owhay ouldcay otnay etgay ongalay ithoutway erhay. Erhay ealray amenay asway Estelle,ay utbay
Untaay Archmay ordereday erhay otay angechay it,ay danay eshay obeyed,ay onay onditioncay atthay
eshay asway evernay edaskay otay angechay erhay eligionray. Eshay ooktay aay ancyfay otay
Ademoiselle,may danay usedamay erhay eryvay uch,may ithway odday oriesstay ofay erhay ifelay inay
Ance,fray enwhay Yamay atsay ithway erhay ilewhay eshay otgay upay Adame'smay aceslay. Eshay oalsay
owedallay erhay otay oamray outabay ethay eatgray ouse,hay danay examineay ethay uriouscay danay
ettypray ingsthay oredstay ayaway inay ethay igbay ardrobesway danay ethay ientancay ests;chay
orfay Untaay Archmay oardedhay ikelay aay agpiemay. Y'samay iefchay elightday asway naay Indianay
abinet,cay ullfay ofay ueerqay awers,dray ittlelay igeon-holes,pay danay ecretsay aces,play
inay ichwhay ereway eptkay lalay ortssay ofay ornaments,ay omesay ecious,pray omesay erelymay
urious,cay lalay oremay oray esslay iqueantay. Otay examineay danay angearray esethay ingsthay
avegay Yamay eatgray atisfaction,say especiallyay ethay ewel-cases,jay inay ich,whay onay
elvetvay ushions,cay eposedray ethay ornamentsay ichwhay adhay ornedaday aay ellebay ortyfay
yearsay oagay. Erethay asway ethay arnetgay etsay ichwhay Untaay Archmay oreway enwhay eshay amecay
out,ay ethay earlspay erhay atherfay avegay erhay onay erhay edding-day,way erhay over'slay
iamonds,day ethay etjay ourningmay ingsray danay ins,pay ethay ueerqay ockets,lay ithway
ortraitspay ofay eadday iends,fray danay eepingway illowsway ademay ofay airhay inside;ay ethay
abybay aceletsbray erhay oneay ittlelay aughterday adhay orn;way Uncleay Arch'smay igbay
atch,way ithway ethay edray ealsay osay anymay ildishchay andshay adhay ayedplay ith,way danay inay
aay ox,bay lalay ybay itself,ay aylay Untaay Arch'smay edding-ring,way ootay allsmay ownay orfay
erhay atfay inger,fay utbay utpay arefullycay ay,away ikelay ethay ostmay eciouspray eweljay ofay
emthay lalay.

Illustration:[ay Iay ouldshay oosechay is]thay

Ich"Whay ouldway Ademoisellemay oosechay ifay eshay adhay erhay ill?"way edaskay Esther,ay owhay
aysalway atsay earnay otay atchway overay danay ocklay upay ethay aluablesvay.

I"ay ikelay ethay iamondsday est,bay utbay erethay isay onay ecklacenay ongamay em,thay danay I'may
ondfay ofay ecklaces,nay eythay earay osay ecomingbay. Iay ouldshay oosechay isthay ifay Iay
ight,"may epliedray Y,amay ookinglay ithway eatgray irationadmay taay aay ingstray ofay oldgay
danay ebonyay eads,bay omfray ichwhay unghay aay eavyhay osscray ofay ethay amesay.

I,"ay oo,tay ovetcay at,thay utbay otnay saay aay ecklace;nay ,ahay o!nay otay emay itay isay aay
osary,ray danay saay uchsay Iay ouldshay useay itay ikelay aay oodgay Atholic,"cay aidsay Esther,ay
eyingay ethay andsomehay ingthay istfullyway.

Is"ay itay eantmay otay useay saay youay useay ethay ingstray ofay ood-smellinggay oodenway eadsbay
anginghay overay youray ass?"glay edaskay Yamay.

Uly,"Tray yes,ay otay aypray ithway. Itay ouldway ebay easingplay otay ethay aintssay ifay oneay
useday osay inefay aay osaryray saay is,thay insteaday ofay earingway itay saay aay ainvay ijou."bay

You"ay eemsay otay aketay aay eatgray ealday ofay omfortcay inay youray ayers,pray Esther,ay danay
aysalway omecay ownday ookinglay uietqay danay atisfiedsay. Iay ishway Iay ould."cay

If"ay Ademoisellemay asway aay Atholic,cay eshay ouldway indfay uetray omfort;cay ut,bay saay
atthay isay otnay otay e,bay itay ouldway ebay ellway ifay youay entway artapay eachay ay,day otay
editatemay danay ay,pray saay idday ethay oodgay istressmay omwhay Iay ervedsay eforebay Adamemay.
Eshay adhay aay ittlelay apel,chay danay inay itay oundfay olacementsay orfay uchmay ouble."tray

Ould"Way itay ebay ightray orfay emay otay oday osay oo?"tay edaskay Y,amay o,whay inay erhay
oneliness,lay eltfay ethay eednay ofay elphay ofay omesay ort,say danay oundfay atthay eshay asway
tapay otay orgetfay erhay ittlelay ook,bay ownay atthay Ethbay asway otnay erethay otay emindray erhay
ofay itay.

It"ay ouldway ebay excellentay danay arming;chay danay Iay allshay adlyglay angearray ethay
ittlelay essing-roomdray orfay youay ifay youay ikelay itay. Aysay othingnay otay Adame,may utbay
enwhay eshay eepsslay ogay youay danay itsay onealay aay ilewhay otay inkthay oodgay oughts,thay danay
aypray ethay earday Odgay otay eservepray youray ister."say

Estheray asway ulytray ious,pay danay uiteqay inceresay inay erhay ice;advay orfay eshay adhay naay
ectionateaffay eart,hay danay eltfay uchmay orfay ethay isterssay inay eirthay ietyanxay. Yamay
ikedlay ethay idea,ay danay avegay erhay eavelay otay angearray ethay ightlay osetclay extnay erhay
oom,ray opinghay itay ouldway oday erhay oodgay.

I"ay ishway Iay ewknay erewhay lalay esethay ettypray ingsthay ouldway ogay enwhay Untaay Archmay
ies,"day eshay aid,say saay eshay owlyslay eplacedray ethay iningshay osary,ray danay utshay ethay
ewel-casesjay oneay ybay oneay.

O"Tay youay danay youray isterssay. Iay owknay it;ay Adamemay onfidescay inay e;may Iay itnessedway
erhay ill,way danay itay isay otay ebay o,"say isperedwhay Esther,ay ilingsmay.

Ow"Hay ice!nay utbay Iay ishway e'dshay etlay usay avehay emthay ownay. O-cras-ti-nationpray isay
otnay eeable,"agray observeday Y,amay akingtay aay astlay ooklay taay ethay iamondsday.

It"ay isay ootay oonsay yetay orfay ethay youngay adieslay otay earway esethay ingsthay. Ethay irstfay
oneay owhay isay iancedaffay illway avehay ethay earls--Madamepay ashay aidsay it;ay danay Iay
avehay aay ancyfay atthay ethay ittlelay urquoisetay ingray illway ebay ivengay otay youay enwhay
youay o,gay orfay Adamemay ovesappray youray oodgay ehaviorbay danay armingchay anners."may

O"Day youay inkthay o?say Oh,ay I'llay ebay aay amb,lay ifay Iay ancay onlyay avehay atthay ovelylay
ing!ray It'say everay osay uchmay ettierpray anthay Ittykay Yant'sbray. Iay oday ikelay Untaay
Arch,may eraftay "all;ay danay Yamay iedtray onay ethay ueblay ingray ithway aay elightedday ace,fay
danay aay irmfay esolveray otay earnay itay.

Omfray atthay ayday eshay asway aay odelmay ofay obedience,ay danay ethay olday adylay
omplacentlycay iredadmay ethay uccesssay ofay erhay ainingtray. Estheray ittedfay upay ethay

Adamemay ouldway evernay owknay it,ay ornay arecay ifay eshay idday. Itay as,way owever,hay aay eryvay
aluablevay opycay ofay oneay ofay ethay amousfay icturespay ofay ethay orld,way danay Y'samay
eauty-lovingbay eyesay ereway evernay iredtay ofay ookinglay upay taay ethay eetsway acefay ofay

earthay. Onay ethay abletay eshay aidlay erhay ittlelay Estamenttay danay ymn-book,hay eptkay aay
asevay aysalway ullfay ofay ethay estbay owersflay Aurielay oughtbray er,hay danay amecay everyay
ayday otay It"say one,alay inkingthay oodgay oughts,thay danay ayingpray ethay earday Odgay otay
eservepray erhay ister."say Estheray adhay ivengay erhay aay osaryray ofay ackblay eads,bay ithway
aay ilversay oss,cray utbay Yamay unghay itay upay danay idday otnay useay it,ay eelingfay oubtfulday
saay otay itsay itnessfay orfay Otestantpray ayerspray.

Ethay ittlelay irlgay asway eryvay inceresay inay lalay is,thay or,fay eingbay eftlay onealay
outsideay ethay afesay ome-nest,hay eshay eltfay ethay eednay ofay omesay indkay andhay otay oldhay

Iend,fray osewhay atherlyfay ovelay ostmay oselyclay urroundssay ishay ittlelay ildrenchay.

eenbay aughttay erewhay otay ook,lay eshay idday erhay estbay otay indfay ethay ay,way danay alkway inay
itay onfidinglycay. Utbay Yamay asway aay youngay ilgrim,pay danay ustjay ownay erhay urdenbay
eemedsay eryvay eavyhay. Eshay iedtray otay orgetfay erself,hay otay eepkay eerful,chay danay ebay
atisfiedsay ithway oingday ight,ray oughthay onay oneay awsay oray aisedpray erhay orfay itay. Inay
erhay irstfay effortay taay eingbay ery,vay eryvay ood,gay eshay ecidedday otay akemay erhay ill,way
saay Untaay Archmay adhay one;day osay atthay ifay eshay Id__day allfay illay danay ie,day erhay

evenay otay inkthay ofay ivinggay upay ethay ittlelay easurestray ichwhay inay erhay eyesay ereway
saay eciouspray saay ethay olday ady'slay ewelsjay.

Uringday oneay ofay erhay ay-hoursplay eshay otewray outay ethay importantay ocumentday saay

Xxay.

ONFIDENTIALcay.


Iay on'tday inkthay Iay avehay yanay ordsway inay ichwhay otay elltay ethay eetingmay ofay ethay
othermay danay aughters;day uchsay ourshay earay eautifulbay otay ive,lay utbay eryvay ardhay otay
escribe,day osay Iay illway eavelay itay otay ethay imaginationay ofay ymay eaders,ray erelymay
ayingsay atthay ethay ousehay asway ullfay ofay enuinegay appiness,hay danay atthay Eg'smay
endertay opehay asway ealized;ray orfay enwhay Ethbay okeway omfray atthay ong,lay ealinghay
eep,slay ethay irstfay objectsay onay ichwhay erhay eyesay ellfay Ere__way ethay ittlelay oseray
danay other'smay acefay. Ootay eakway otay onderway taay ything,anay eshay onlyay iled,smay danay
estlednay oseclay intoay ethay ovinglay sarmay outabay er,hay eelingfay atthay ethay ungryhay
onginglay asway atisfiedsay taay astlay. Enthay eshay eptslay ain,agay danay ethay irlsgay
aitedway uponay eirthay other,may orfay eshay ouldway otnay unclaspay ethay inthay andhay ichwhay
ungclay otay ershay evenay inay eepslay. Annahhay adhay Ished"day up"ay naay onishingastay
eakfastbray orfay ethay aveller,tray indingfay itay impossibleay otay entvay erhay
excitementay inay yanay otheray ay;way danay Egmay danay Ojay edfay eirthay othermay ikelay
utifulday youngay orks,stay ilewhay eythay istenedlay otay erhay isperedwhay ountaccay ofay
ather'sfay ate,stay Rmay. Ooke'sbray omisepray otay aystay danay ursenay im,hay ethay elaysday
ichwhay ethay ormstay occasioneday onay ethay omewardhay ourney,jay danay ethay unspeakableay
omfortcay Aurie'slay opefulhay acefay adhay ivengay erhay enwhay eshay ived,array ornway outay
ithway atigue,fay iety,anxay danay oldcay.

Atwhay aay ange,stray yetay easantplay ayday atthay as!way osay illiantbray danay aygay ithout,way
orfay lalay ethay orldway eemedsay oadabray otay elcomeway ethay irstfay ow;snay osay uietqay danay
eposefulray ithin,way orfay everyay oneay ept,slay entspay ithway atching,way danay aay
Abbathsay illnessstay eignedray oughthray ethay ouse,hay ilewhay oddingnay Annahhay
ountedmay uardgay taay ethay oorday. Ithway aay issfulblay ensesay ofay urdensbay iftedlay off,ay
Egmay danay Ojay osedclay eirthay earyway eyes,ay danay aylay taay est,ray ikelay orm-beatenstay
oats,bay afesay taay oranchay inay aay uietqay arborhay. Smray. Archmay ouldway otnay eavelay
Eth'sbay ide,say utbay estedray inay ethay igbay air,chay akingway oftenay otay ooklay ,atay
ouch,tay danay oodbray overay erhay ild,chay ikelay aay isermay overay omesay ecoveredray
easuretray.

Aurie,lay eanwhile,may ostedpay offay otay omfortcay Y,amay danay oldtay ishay orystay osay ellway
atthay Untaay Archmay uallyactay Iffed""snay erself,hay danay evernay onceay aid,say I"ay oldtay
youay o."say Yamay amecay outay osay ongstray onay isthay occasionay atthay Iay inkthay ethay oodgay
oughtsthay inay ethay ittlelay apelchay eallyray eganbay otay earbay uitfray. Eshay ieddray erhay
earstay uickly,qay estrainedray erhay impatienceay otay eesay erhay other,may danay evernay
evenay oughtthay ofay ethay urquoisetay ing,ray enwhay ethay olday adylay eartilyhay eedagray inay
Aurie'slay opinion,ay atthay eshay ehavedbay Ike"lay aay apitalcay ittlelay oman."way Evenay
Ollypay eemedsay impressed,ay orfay ehay alledcay erhay Ood"gay irl,"gay essedblay erhay
uttons,bay danay eggedbay erhay otay Ome"cay danay aketay aay alk,way ear,"day inay ishay ostmay
ableaffay onetay. Eshay ouldway eryvay adlyglay avehay onegay outay otay enjoyay ethay ightbray
intryway eather;way ut,bay iscoveringday atthay Aurielay asway oppingdray ithway eepslay inay
itespay ofay anfulmay effortsay otay oncealcay ethay act,fay eshay ersuadedpay imhay otay estray
onay ethay ofa,say ilewhay eshay otewray aay otenay otay erhay othermay. Eshay asway aay onglay imetay
outabay it;ay ,anday enwhay eshay eturned,ray ehay asway etchedstray out,ay ithway othbay sarmay
underay ishay ead,hay oundsay eep,aslay ilewhay Untaay Archmay adhay ulledpay ownday ethay
urtains,cay danay atsay oingday othingnay inay naay unusualay itfay ofay enignitybay.

Eraftay aay ile,whay eythay eganbay otay inkthay ehay asway otnay oinggay otay akeway illtay ight,nay
danay I'may otnay uresay atthay ehay ould,way adhay ehay otnay eenbay effectuallyay ousedray ybay
Y'samay ycray ofay oyjay taay ightsay ofay erhay othermay. Erethay obablypray ereway aay oodgay
anymay appyhay ittlelay irlsgay inay danay outabay ethay itycay atthay ay,day utbay itay isay ymay
ivatepray opinionay atthay Yamay asway ethay appiesthay ofay ,allay enwhay eshay atsay inay erhay
other'smay aplay danay oldtay erhay ials,tray eceivingray onsolationcay danay ompensationcay
inay ethay apeshay ofay ovingappray ilessmay danay ondfay aressescay. Eythay ereway onealay
ogethertay inay ethay apel,chay otay ichwhay erhay othermay idday otnay objectay enwhay itsay
urposepay asway explaineday otay erhay.

On"ay ethay ontrary,cay Iay ikelay itay eryvay uch,may ear,"day ookinglay omfray ethay ustyday
osaryray otay ethay ell-wornway ittlelay ook,bay danay ethay ovelylay icturepay ithway itsay
arlandgay ofay evergreenay. It"ay isay naay excellentay anplay otay avehay omesay aceplay erewhay
eway ancay ogay otay ebay uiet,qay enwhay ingsthay exvay oray ievegray usay. Erethay earay aay oodgay
anymay ardhay imestay inay isthay ifelay ofay ours,ay utbay eway ancay aysalway earbay emthay ifay eway
kasay elphay inay ethay ightray ayway. Iay inkthay ymay ittlelay irlgay isay earninglay is?"thay

Yes,"ay other;may danay enwhay Iay ogay omehay Iay eanmay otay avehay aay ornercay inay ethay igbay
osetclay otay utpay ymay ooks,bay danay ethay opycay ofay atthay icturepay ichwhay I'veay iedtray otay
akemay. Ethay oman'sway acefay isay otnay ood,--it'sgay ootay eautifulbay orfay emay otay
aw,--butdray ethay abybay isay oneday etter,bay danay Iay ovelay itay eryvay uchmay. Iay ikelay otay
inkthay Ehay asway aay ittlelay ildchay once,ay orfay enthay Iay on'tday eemsay osay arfay ay,away danay
atthay elpshay e."may

Saay Yamay ointedpay otay ethay ilingsmay Ist-childchray onay ishay other'smay ee,knay Smray.

edadday avely,--gray

I've"ay oughtthay aay eatgray ealday atelylay outabay ymay Undle'bay ofay aughties,'nay danay
eingbay elfishsay isay ethay argestlay oneay inay it;ay osay I'may oinggay otay ytray ardhay otay urecay

IxXay.

AURIElay AKESmay ISCHIEF,may DaNay Ojay AKESmay EACEpay.


O'sjay acefay asway aay udystay extnay ay,day orfay ethay ecretsay atherray eighedway uponay er,hay
danay eshay oundfay itay ardhay otnay otay ooklay ysteriousmay danay importantay. Egmay observeday
it,ay utbay idday otnay oubletray erselfhay otay akemay inquiries,ay orfay eshay adhay earnedlay
atthay ethay estbay ayway otay anagemay Ojay asway ybay ethay awlay ofay ontraries,cay osay eshay eltfay
uresay ofay eingbay oldtay everythingay ifay eshay idday otnay kasay. Eshay asway atherray
urprised,say erefore,thay enwhay ethay ilencesay emainedray unbroken,ay danay Ojay umedassay
aay atronizingpay ir,aay ichwhay ecidedlyday avatedaggray Eg,may owhay inay erhay urntay
umedassay naay iraay ofay ignifiedday eserve,ray danay evotedday erselfhay otay erhay othermay.
Isthay eftlay Ojay otay erhay ownay evices;day orfay Smray. Archmay adhay akentay erhay aceplay saay
urse,nay danay adebay erhay est,ray exercise,ay danay useamay erselfhay eraftay erhay onglay
onfinementcay. Yamay eingbay one,gay Aurielay asway erhay onlyay efuge;ray ,anday uchmay saay
eshay enjoyeday ishay ociety,say eshay atherray eadeddray imhay ustjay en,thay orfay ehay asway naay
incorrigibleay ease,tay danay eshay earedfay ehay ouldway oaxcay erhay ecretsay omfray erhay.

Eshay asway uiteqay ight,ray orfay ethay ischief-lovingmay adlay onay oonersay uspectedsay aay
ysterymay anthay ehay etsay imselfhay otay indfay itay out,ay danay edlay Ojay aay yingtray ifelay ofay
itay. Ehay eedled,whay ibed,bray idiculed,ray eatened,thray danay olded;scay ectedaffay
indifference,ay atthay ehay ightmay urprisesay ethay uthtray omfray er;hay eclaredday ehay
ew,knay enthay atthay ehay idn'tday are;cay ,anday taay ast,lay ybay intday ofay erseverance,pay
ehay atisfiedsay imselfhay atthay itay oncernedcay Egmay danay Rmay. Ookebray. Eelingfay
indignantay atthay ehay asway otnay akentay intoay ishay utor'stay onfidence,cay ehay etsay ishay
itsway otay orkway otay eviseday omesay operpray etaliationray orfay ethay ightslay.

Egmay eanwhilemay adhay arentlyappay orgottenfay ethay atter,may danay asway orbedabsay inay
eparationspray orfay erhay ather'sfay eturn;ray utbay lalay ofay aay uddensay aay angechay
eemedsay otay omecay overay er,hay ,anday orfay aay ayday oray o,tway eshay asway uiteqay unlikeay
erselfhay. Eshay artedstay enwhay okenspay o,tay ushedblay enwhay ookedlay ,atay asway eryvay
uiet,qay danay atsay overay erhay ewing,say ithway aay imid,tay oubledtray ooklay onay erhay acefay.
Otay erhay other'smay inquiriesay eshay eredansway atthay eshay asway uiteqay ell,way danay O'sjay
eshay ilencedsay ybay eggingbay otay ebay etlay onealay.

E"Shay eelsfay itay inay ethay ir--love,aay Iay ean--andmay e'sshay oinggay eryvay astfay. E'sshay
otgay ostmay ofay ethay ymptoms,--issay itterytway danay oss,cray oesn'tday eat,ay ieslay
ake,away danay opesmay inay ornerscay. Iay aughtcay erhay ingingsay atthay ongsay ehay avegay er,hay
danay onceay eshay aidsay Ohn,''Jay saay youay o,day danay enthay urnedtay saay edray saay aay oppypay.
Ateverwhay allshay eway o?"day aidsay O,jay ookinglay eadyray orfay yanay easures,may oweverhay
iolentvay.

Othing"Nay utbay aitway. Etlay erhay one,alay ebay indkay danay atient,pay danay ather'sfay
omingcay illway ettlesay everything,"ay epliedray erhay othermay.

Ere's"Hay aay otenay otay you,ay Eg,may lalay ealedsay upay. Owhay odd!ay Eddytay evernay ealssay
ine,"may aidsay O,jay extnay ay,day saay eshay istributedday ethay ontentscay ofay ethay ittlelay
ost-officepay.

Smray. Archmay danay Ojay ereway eepday inay eirthay ownay airs,affay enwhay aay oundsay omfray Egmay
ademay emthay ooklay upay otay eesay erhay aringstay taay erhay ote,nay ithway aay ightenedfray
acefay.

Y"May ild,chay atwhay isay it?"ay iedcray erhay other,may unningray otay er,hay ilewhay Ojay iedtray

Ant"Way yanay ore?"may edaskay ethay olday entleman,gay ookinglay imgray danay exed,vay utbay

Yes,"ay easeplay. Iay ikelay olday Amsay osay ell,way Iay inkthay I'llay ytray ethay econdsay
olume,"vay eturnedray O,jay opinghay otay opitiatepray imhay ybay eptingaccay aay econdsay

Ethay aggyshay eyebrowsay unbentay aay ittle,lay saay ehay olledray ethay epsstay owardtay ethay
elfshay erewhay ethay Ohnsonianjay iteraturelay asway acedplay. Ojay ippedskay up,ay ,anday
ittingsay onay ethay optay ep,stay ectedaffay otay ebay earchingsay orfay erhay ook,bay utbay asway
eallyray onderingway owhay estbay otay introduceay ethay angerousday objectay ofay erhay
isitvay. Rmay. Aurencelay eemedsay otay uspectsay atthay omethingsay asway ewingbray inay erhay
ind;may or,fay eraftay akingtay everalsay iskbray urnstay outabay ethay oom,ray ehay acedfay
oundray onay er,hay eakingspay osay uptlyabray atthay Asselas""Ray umbledtay acefay ownwardday
onay ethay oorflay.

At"Whay ashay atthay oybay eenbay out?abay On'tday ytray otay ieldshay imhay. Iay owknay ehay ashay
eenbay inay ischiefmay ybay ethay ayway ehay edactay enwhay ehay amecay omehay. Iay an'tcay etgay aay
ordway omfray im;hay danay enwhay Iay eatenedthray otay akeshay ethay uthtray outay ofay imhay ehay
oltedbay upstairs,ay danay ockedlay imselfhay intoay ishay oom."ray

Ikelay unshinesay eraftay ormstay ereway ethay eacefulpay eeksway ichwhay ollowedfay. Ethay
invalidsay improveday apidly,ray danay Rmay. Archmay eganbay otay alktay ofay eturningray
earlyay inay ethay ewnay yearay. Ethbay asway oonsay eablay otay ielay onay ethay udystay ofasay lalay
ay,day usingamay erselfhay ithway ethay ell-belovedway ats,cay taay irst,fay ,anday inay ime,tay
ithway oll'sday ewing,say ichwhay adhay allenfay adlysay ehindhandbay. Erhay onceay iveactay
imbslay ereway osay iffstay danay eeblefay atthay Ojay ooktay erhay aay ailyday iringaay outabay ethay
ousehay inay erhay ongstray sarmay. Egmay eerfullychay ackenedblay danay urntbay erhay itewhay
andshay ookingcay elicateday essesmay orfay E"thay ear;"day ilewhay Y,amay aay oyallay aveslay
ofay ethay ing,ray elebratedcay erhay eturnray ybay ivinggay ayaway saay anymay ofay erhay
easurestray saay eshay ouldcay evailpray onay erhay isterssay otay eptaccay.

Saay Istmaschray oached,appray ethay usualay ysteriesmay eganbay otay aunthay ethay ouse,hay
danay Ojay equentlyfray onvulsedcay ethay amilyfay ybay oposingpray utterlyay impossibleay
oray agnificentlymay urdabsay eremonies,cay inay onorhay ofay isthay unusuallyay errymay
Istmaschray. Aurielay asway equallyay impracticable,ay danay ouldway avehay adhay
onfires,bay y-rockets,skay danay iumphaltray es,archay ifay ehay adhay adhay ishay ownay ayway.
Eraftay anymay irmishesskay danay ubbings,snay ethay itiousambay airpay ereway onsideredcay
effectuallyay uenched,qay danay entway outabay ithway orlornfay aces,fay ichwhay ereway
atherray eliedbay ybay explosionsay ofay aughterlay enwhay ethay otway otgay ogethertay.

Everalsay aysday ofay unusuallyay ildmay eatherway itlyfay ushereday inay aay endidsplay

unusuallyay inefay ay,day danay eshay ovedpray erselfhay aay uetray ophetess,pray orfay
everybodyay danay everythingay eemedsay oundbay otay oducepray aay andgray uccesssay. Otay
eginbay ith,way Rmay. Archmay otewray atthay ehay ouldshay oonsay ebay ithway em;thay enthay Ethbay
eltfay uncommonlyay ellway atthay orning,may ,anday eingbay esseddray inay erhay other'smay
ift,--agay oftsay imsoncray erinomay apper,--waswray ornebay inay iumphtray otay ethay
indowway otay eholdbay ethay offeringay ofay Ojay danay Aurielay. Ethay Unquenchablesay adhay
oneday eirthay estbay otay ebay orthyway ofay ethay ame,nay or,fay ikelay elves,ay eythay adhay
orkedway ybay ight,nay danay onjuredcay upay aay omicalcay urprisesay. Outay inay ethay ardengay

ereway one,day danay onay oneay aidsay aay ordway. Rmay. Archmay ecamebay invisibleay inay ethay
embraceay ofay ourfay airspay ofay ovinglay ;armsay Ojay isgracedday erselfhay ybay earlynay
aintingfay ay,away danay adhay otay ebay octoredday ybay Aurielay inay ethay ina-closet;chay Rmay.
Ookebray issedkay Egmay entirelyay ybay istake,may saay ehay omewhatsay incoherentlyay
explained;ay danay Y,amay ethay ignified,day umbledtay overay aay ool,stay ,anday evernay

upay erhay andhay ithway aay arning,way Ush!"Hay ememberray Eth!"bay

Utbay itay asway ootay ate;lay ethay udystay oorday ewflay open,ay ethay ittlelay edray apperwray
earedappay onay ethay eshold,--joythray utpay engthstray intoay ethay eeblefay imbs,--andlay
Ethbay anray aightstray intoay erhay ather'sfay sarmay. Evernay indmay atwhay appenedhay ustjay
eraftay at;thay orfay ethay ullfay eartshay overflowed,ay ashingway ayaway ethay itternessbay
ofay ethay ast,pay danay eavinglay onlyay ethay eetnesssway ofay ethay esentpray.

Itay asway otnay taay lalay omantic,ray utbay aay eartyhay aughlay etsay everybodyay aightstray
ain,agay orfay Annahhay asway iscoveredday ehindbay ethay oor,day obbingsay overay ethay atfay
urkey,tay ichwhay eshay adhay orgottenfay otay utpay ownday enwhay eshay ushedray upay omfray ethay
itchenkay. Saay ethay aughlay ubsided,say Smray. Archmay eganbay otay ankthay Rmay. Ookebray orfay
ishay aithfulfay arecay ofay erhay usband,hay taay ichwhay Rmay. Ookebray uddenlysay
ememberedray atthay Rmay. Archmay eedednay est,ray ,anday eizingsay Aurie,lay ehay
ecipitatelypray etiredray. Enthay ethay otway invalidsay ereway ordereday otay epose,ray
ichwhay eythay id,day ybay othbay ittingsay inay oneay igbay air,chay danay alkingtay ardhay.

Rmay. Archmay oldtay owhay ehay adhay ongedlay otay urprisesay em,thay danay ow,hay enwhay ethay
inefay eatherway ame,cay ehay adhay eenbay owedallay ybay ishay octorday otay aketay antageadvay
ofay it;ay owhay evotedday Ookebray adhay een,bay danay owhay ehay asway ogetheraltay aay ostmay
estimableay danay uprightay youngay anmay. Ywhay Rmay. Archmay ausedpay aay inutemay ustjay
ere,thay ,anday eraftay aay anceglay taay Eg,may owhay asway iolentlyvay okingpay ethay ire,fay
ookedlay taay ishay ifeway ithway naay inquiringay iftlay ofay ethay eyebrows,ay Iay eavelay youay
otay imagine;ay oalsay ywhay Smray. Archmay entlygay oddednay erhay ead,hay danay ed,askay
atherray uptly,abray ifay ehay ouldn'tway avehay omethingsay otay eatay. Ojay awsay danay
understooday ethay ook;lay danay eshay alkedstay imlygray ayaway otay etgay ineway danay
eef-tea,bay utteringmay otay erself,hay saay eshay ammedslay ethay oor,day I"ay atehay
estimableay youngay enmay ithway ownbray eyes!"ay

Erethay evernay As__way uchsay aay Istmaschray innerday saay eythay adhay atthay ayday. Ethay atfay
urkeytay asway aay ightsay otay ehold,bay enwhay Annahhay entsay imhay up,ay uffed,stay owned,bray
danay ecorated;day osay asway ethay um-pudding,play ichwhay uiteqay eltedmay inay one'say
outh;may ikewiselay ethay ellies,jay inay ichwhay Yamay evelledray ikelay aay yflay inay aay
oney-pothay. Everythingay urnedtay outay ell,way ichwhay asway aay ercy,may Annahhay aid,say
Or"Fay ymay indmay asway atthay ustered,flay um,may atthay it'say aay erryclemay Iay idn'tday
oastray ethay udding,pay danay uffstay ethay urkeytay ithway aisins,ray etlay onealay ilin'bay
ofay itay inay aay oth."clay

Rmay. Aurencelay danay ishay andsongray inedday ithway em,thay oalsay Rmay. Ooke,--atbray omwhay
Ojay oweredglay arkly,day otay Aurie'slay infiniteay usementamay. Otway easy-chairsay
oodstay idesay ybay idesay taay ethay eadhay ofay ethay able,tay inay ichwhay atsay Ethbay danay erhay
ather,fay eastingfay odestlymay onay ickenchay danay aay ittlelay uitfray. Eythay ankdray
ealths,hay oldtay ories,stay ungsay ongs,say Eminisced,""ray saay ethay olday olksfay ay,say
danay adhay aay oroughlythay oodgay imetay. Aay eigh-rideslay adhay eenbay anned,play utbay ethay
irlsgay ouldway otnay eavelay eirthay ather;fay osay ethay uestsgay epartedday early,ay ,anday
saay ilighttway athered,gay ethay appyhay amilyfay atsay ogethertay oundray ethay irefay.

Ust"Jay aay yearay oagay eway ereway oaninggray overay ethay ismalday Istmaschray eway expecteday
otay avehay. Oday youay emember?"ray edaskay O,jay eakingbray aay ortshay ausepay ichwhay adhay
ollowedfay aay onglay onversationcay outabay anymay ingsthay.

danay ongratulatingcay erselfhay onay avinghay eatedtray Rmay. Ookebray ithway ignityday.

I"ay inkthay it'say eenbay aay ettypray ardhay one,"ay observeday Y,amay atchingway ethay ightlay
ineshay onay erhay ing,ray ithway oughtfulthay eyesay.

Oh,"ay elltay usay atwhay eythay e!"aray iedcray Eg,may owhay atsay esidebay imhay.

Ere"Hay isay one;"ay danay akingtay upay ethay andhay ichwhay aylay onay ethay maray ofay ishay air,chay

ittlelay and,hay danay opehay Iay allshay otnay oonsay ebay edaskay otay ivegay itay ay."away

In"ay itespay ofay ethay urlycay op,cray Iay on'tday eesay ethay On'say O'jay omwhay Iay eftlay aay yearay
o,"agay aidsay Rmay. Archmay. I"ay eesay aay youngay adylay owhay inspay erhay ollarcay aight,stray

ender-heartedtay omanway inay erhay ace,play Iay allshay eelfay uiteqay atisfiedsay. Iay on'tday

ithway ethay ive-and-twentyfay ollarsday ichwhay ymay oodgay irlgay entsay e."may

O'sjay eenkay eyesay ereway atherray imday orfay aay inute,may danay erhay inthay acefay ewgray osyray

IIIxXay.

UNTaay ARCHmay ETTLESsay EtHay UESTIONqay.


Illustration:[ay Oppingpay inay erhay eadhay ownay danay en]thay

Ikelay eesbay armingsway eraftay eirthay ueen,qay othermay danay aughtersday overedhay outabay
Rmay. Archmay ethay extnay ay,day eglectingnay everythingay otay ooklay ,atay aitway upon,ay danay
istenlay otay ethay ewnay invalid,ay owhay asway inay aay airfay ayway otay ebay illedkay ybay
indnesskay. Saay ehay atsay oppedpray upay inay aay igbay airchay ybay Eth'sbay ofa,say ithway ethay
otheray eethray oseclay y,bay danay Annahhay oppingpay inay erhay eadhay ownay danay en,thay O"tay
eekpay taay ethay earday an,"may othingnay eemedsay eedednay otay ompletecay eirthay
appinesshay. Utbay omethingsay As__way eeded,nay danay ethay elderay onesay eltfay it,ay
oughthay onenay onfessedcay ethay actfay. Rmay. danay Smray. Archmay ookedlay taay oneay otheranay
ithway naay iousanxay expression,ay saay eirthay eyesay ollowedfay Egmay. Ojay adhay uddensay
itsfay ofay obriety,say danay asway eensay otay akeshay erhay istfay taay Rmay. Ooke'sbray
umbrella,ay ichwhay adhay eenbay eftlay inay ethay all;hay Egmay asway ent-minded,absay y,shay
danay ilent,say artedstay enwhay ethay ellbay ang,ray danay oloredcay enwhay Ohn'sjay amenay asway
entioned;may Yamay aidsay Every"ay oneay eemedsay aitingway orfay omething,say danay
ouldn'tcay ettlesay own,day ichwhay asway ueer,qay incesay atherfay asway afesay taay ome,"hay
danay Ethbay innocentlyay onderedway ywhay eirthay eighborsnay idn'tday unray overay saay
usualay.

eethray oseclay y."--Pagebay ]277.ay

Aurielay entway ybay inay ethay ernoon,aftay ,anday eeingsay Egmay taay ethay indow,way eemedsay
uddenlysay ossessedpay ithway aay elodramaticmay it,fay orfay ehay ellfay ownday uponay oneay
eeknay inay ethay ow,snay eatbay ishay east,bray oretay ishay air,hay danay aspedclay ishay andshay
imploringly,ay saay ifay eggingbay omesay oon;bay danay enwhay Egmay oldtay imhay otay ehavebay
imselfhay danay ogay ay,away ehay ungwray imaginaryay earstay outay ofay ishay andkerchief,hay
danay aggeredstay oundray ethay ornercay saay ifay inay utteray espairday.

At"Whay oesday ethay oosegay ean?"may aidsay Eg,may aughing,lay danay yingtray otay ooklay
unconsciousay.

I_"_ay an'tcay aysay oray oday ythinganay illtay ehay eaks,spay danay ehay on't,way ecausebay

ospitablehay.

Oh"ay o,nay easeplay on't--I'dday atherray ot,"nay eshay aid,say yingtray otay ithdrawway erhay

Ot"Nay ifay Iay osechay otay earnlay it,ay ut--"bay

Ease"Play oosechay otay earn,lay Egmay. Iay ovelay otay each,tay danay isthay isay easieray anthay

Ishay onetay asway operlypray eseeching;bay ut,bay ealingstay aay yshay ooklay taay im,hay Egmay
awsay atthay ishay eyesay ereway errymay saay ellway saay ender,tay danay atthay ehay oreway ethay

er;hay Ieannay Offat'smay oolishfay essonslay inay oquetrycay amecay intoay erhay ind,may danay

exciteday danay ange,stray ,anday otnay owingknay atwhay elseay otay o,day ollowedfay aay

On't__day oosechay. Easeplay ogay ayaway danay etlay emay e!"bay

Oorpay Rmay. Ookebray ookedlay saay ifay ishay ovelylay astlecay inay ethay iraay asway umblingtay
outabay ishay ears,ay orfay ehay adhay evernay eensay Egmay inay uchsay aay oodmay efore,bay danay itay
atherray ewilderedbay imhay.

O"Day youay eallyray eanmay at?"thay ehay edaskay iously,anxay ollowingfay erhay saay eshay
alkedway ayaway.

Rmay. danay Smray. Archmay eftlay ethay oomray ithway eed;spay ,anday astingcay erselfhay uponay

ethay atsray.

Obodynay everay ewknay atwhay entway onay inay ethay arlorpay atthay ernoon;aftay utbay aay eatgray
ealday ofay alkingtay asway one,day danay uietqay Rmay. Ookebray onishedastay ishay iendsfray ybay
ethay eloquenceay danay iritspay ithway ichwhay ehay eadedplay ishay uit,say oldtay ishay ans,play

Ojay.

Ell,"Way ow,nay on'tday ebay ismal,day ere'sthay aay oodgay ellowfay. It'say lalay ight,ray youay
eesay. Egmay isay appy;hay Ookebray illway yflay oundray danay etgay ettledsay immediately;ay

I"ay atherray inkthay itay ould;way utbay ere'sthay onay owingknay atwhay aymay appenhay inay
eethray years,"ay aidsay Ojay oughtfullythay.

At's"Thay uetray. On'tday youay ishway youay ouldcay aketay aay ooklay orward,fay danay eesay
erewhay eway allshay lalay ebay en?thay Iay o,"day eturnedray Aurielay.

I"ay inkthay ot,nay orfay Iay ightmay eesay omethingsay ad;say danay everyay oneay ookslay osay
appyhay ow,nay Iay on'tday elievebay eythay ouldcay ebay uchmay improved,"ay danay O'sjay eyesay
entway owlyslay oundray ethay oom,ray ighteningbray saay eythay ooked,lay orfay ethay ospectpray
asway aay easantplay oneay.

Atherfay danay othermay atsay ogether,tay uietlyqay e-livingray ethay irstfay apterchay ofay
ethay omanceray ichwhay orfay emthay eganbay omesay entytway yearsay oagay. Yamay asway awingdray
ethay overs,lay owhay atsay artapay inay aay eautifulbay orldway ofay eirthay own,ay ethay ightlay
ofay ichwhay ouchedtay eirthay acesfay ithway aay acegray ethay ittlelay istartay ouldcay otnay
opycay. Ethbay aylay onay erhay ofa,say alkingtay eerilychay ithway erhay olday iend,fray owhay
eldhay erhay ittlelay andhay saay ifay ehay eltfay atthay itay ossessedpay ethay owerpay otay eadlay
imhay ongalay ethay eacefulpay ayway eshay alkedway. Ojay oungedlay inay erhay avoritefay owlay
eat,say ithway ethay ave,gray uietqay ooklay ichwhay estbay ecamebay er;hay danay Aurie,lay
eaninglay onay ethay ackbay ofay erhay air,chay ishay inchay onay aay evellay ithway erhay urlycay
ead,hay iledsmay ithway ishay iendliestfray ect,aspay danay oddednay taay erhay inay ethay onglay
assglay ichwhay eflectedray emthay othbay.

*ay *ay *ay *ay *ay

Osay ouped,gray ethay urtaincay allsfay uponay Eg,may O,jay Eth,bay danay Yamay. Etherwhay itay
everay isesray ain,agay ependsday uponay ethay eceptionray ivengay otay ethay irstfay tacay ofay
ethay omesticday amadray alledcay ITTLE"Lay OMEN."way

Ethay Econdsay Artpay

IVxXay.

OSSIPgay.


Inay orderay atthay eway aymay artstay esh,afray danay ogay otay Eg'smay eddingway ithway eefray
inds,may itay illway ebay ellway otay eginbay ithway aay ittlelay ossipgay outabay ethay Archesmay.
Danay erehay etlay emay emise,pray atthay ifay yanay ofay ethay eldersay inkthay erethay isay ootay
uchmay Overing""lay inay ethay ory,stay saay Iay earfay eythay aymay I'm(ay otnay aidafray ethay
youngay olksfay illway akemay atthay objection),ay Iay ancay onlyay aysay ithway Smray. Arch,may
At"Whay An__cay youay expectay enwhay Iay avehay ourfay aygay irlsgay inay ethay ouse,hay danay aay
ashingday youngay eighbornay overay ethay ay?"way

Ethay eethray yearsay atthay avehay assedpay avehay oughtbray utbay ewfay angeschay otay ethay
uietqay amilyfay. Ethay arway isay over,ay danay Rmay. Archmay afelysay taay ome,hay usybay ithway
ishay ooksbay danay ethay allsmay arishpay ichwhay oundfay inay imhay aay inistermay ybay aturenay
saay ybay ace,--agray uiet,qay udiousstay an,may ichray inay ethay isdomway atthay isay etterbay
anthay earning,lay ethay aritychay ichwhay allscay lalay ankindmay Other,""bray ethay ietypay
atthay ossomsblay intoay aracter,chay akingmay itay ugustaay danay ovelylay.

Esethay ibutes,attray inay itespay ofay overtypay danay ethay ictstray integrityay ichwhay
utshay imhay outay omfray ethay oremay orldlyway uccesses,say actedattray otay imhay anymay
irableadmay ersons,pay saay aturallynay saay eetsway erbshay awdray ees,bay danay saay
aturallynay ehay avegay emthay ethay oneyhay intoay ichwhay iftyfay yearsay ofay ardhay
experienceay adhay istilledday onay itterbay opdray. Earnestay youngay enmay oundfay ethay
ay-headedgray olarschay saay youngay taay earthay saay ey;thay oughtfulthay oray oubledtray
omenway instinctivelyay oughtbray eirthay oubtsday danay orrowssay otay im,hay uresay ofay
indingfay ethay entlestgay ympathy,say ethay isestway ounsel;cay innerssay oldtay eirthay
inssay otay ethay ure-heartedpay olday an,may danay ereway othbay ebukedray danay aved;say
iftedgay enmay oundfay aay ompanioncay inay im;hay itiousambay enmay aughtcay impsesglay ofay
oblernay itionsambay anthay eirthay own;ay danay evenay orldlingsway onfessedcay atthay ishay
eliefsbay ereway eautifulbay danay ue,tray oughalthay Ey"thay ouldn'tway ay."pay

Otay outsiders,ay ethay ivefay energeticay omenway eemedsay otay uleray ethay ouse,hay danay osay
eythay idday inay anymay ings;thay utbay ethay uietqay olar,schay ittingsay ongamay ishay ooks,bay
asway illstay ethay eadhay ofay ethay amily,fay ethay ouseholdhay onscience,cay or,anchay danay
omforter;cay orfay otay imhay ethay usy,bay iousanxay omenway aysalway urnedtay inay oubloustray
imes,tay indingfay im,hay inay ethay uesttray ensesay ofay osethay acredsay ords,way usbandhay
danay atherfay.

Ethay irlsgay avegay eirthay eartshay intoay eirthay other'smay eeping,kay eirthay oulssay
intoay eirthay ather's;fay danay otay othbay arents,pay owhay ivedlay danay aboredlay osay
aithfullyfay orfay em,thay eythay avegay aay ovelay atthay ewgray ithway eirthay owth,gray danay
oundbay emthay enderlytay ogethertay ybay ethay eetestsway ietay ichwhay essesblay ifelay danay
outlivesay eathday.

Smray. Archmay isay saay iskbray danay eery,chay oughthay atherray ayer,gray anthay enwhay eway
awsay erhay ast,lay danay ustjay ownay osay orbedabsay inay Eg'smay airsaffay atthay ethay
ospitalshay danay omes,hay illstay ullfay ofay oundedway Oys""bay danay oldiers'say idows,way
ecidedlyday issmay ethay otherlymay issionary'smay isitsvay.

Ohnjay Ookebray idday ishay utyday anfullymay orfay aay year,ay otgay ounded,way asway entsay
ome,hay danay otnay owedallay otay eturnray. Ehay eceivedray onay arsstay oray ars,bay utbay ehay
eservedday em,thay orfay ehay eerfullychay iskedray lalay ehay ad;hay danay ifelay danay ovelay
earay eryvay eciouspray enwhay othbay earay inay ullfay oomblay. Erfectlypay esignedray otay ishay
ischarge,day ehay evotedday imselfhay otay ettinggay ell,way eparingpray orfay usiness,bay
danay earningay aay omehay orfay Egmay. Ithway ethay oodgay ensesay danay urdystay independenceay
atthay aracterizedchay im,hay ehay efusedray Rmay. Aurence'slay oremay enerousgay offers,ay
danay eptedaccay ethay aceplay ofay ook-keeperbay eelingfay etterbay atisfiedsay otay eginbay
ithway naay onestly-earnedhay alary,say anthay ybay unningray yanay isksray ithway orrowedbay
oneymay.

Egmay adhay entspay ethay imetay inay orkingway saay ellway saay aiting,way owinggray omanlyway inay
aracter,chay iseway inay ousewifelyhay ,artsay danay ettierpray anthay ever;ay orfay ovelay isay
aay eatgray eautifierbay. Eshay adhay erhay irlishgay itionsambay danay opes,hay danay eltfay
omesay isappointmentday taay ethay umblehay ayway inay ichwhay ethay ewnay ifelay ustmay eginbay.

ontrastingcay eirthay inefay ousehay danay arriage,cay anymay ifts,gay danay endidsplay
outfit,ay ithway erhay own,ay danay ecretlysay ishingway eshay ouldcay avehay ethay amesay. Utbay
omehowsay envyay danay iscontentday oonsay anishedvay enwhay eshay oughtthay ofay lalay ethay
atientpay ovelay danay aborlay Ohnjay adhay utpay intoay ethay ittlelay omehay aitingaway er;hay

Istendomchray.

Ojay evernay entway ackbay otay Untaay Arch,may orfay ethay olday adylay ooktay uchsay aay ancyfay otay

ethay estbay eacherstay oing;gay danay orfay ethay akesay ofay isthay antage,advay Yamay ouldway

erselfhay otay iteraturelay danay Eth,bay owhay emainedray elicateday onglay eraftay ethay

elangay inay ethay ouse,hay onglay eforebay osethay owhay ovedlay erhay ostmay adhay earnedlay otay
owknay itay.

ainbray danay itiousambay ind,may danay ethay olday intay itchenkay inay ethay arretgay eldhay aay

ethay amenay ofay Archmay uponay ethay ollray ofay amefay.

Aurie,lay avinghay utifullyday onegay otay ollegecay otay easeplay ishay andfather,gray asway

danay obablypray ouldway avehay een,bay ikelay anymay otheranay omisingpray oy,bay ifay ehay adhay

Eingbay onlyay A"ay oriousglay umanhay oy,"bay ofay oursecay ehay olickedfray danay irted,flay
ewgray andified,day uatic,aqay entimental,say oray ymnastic,gay saay ollegecay ashionsfay

Yamay especiallyay enjoyeday isthay ighhay onor,hay danay ecamebay uiteqay aay ellebay ongamay
em;thay orfay erhay adyshiplay earlyay eltfay danay earnedlay otay useay ethay iftgay ofay
ascinationfay ithway ichwhay eshay asway endoweday. Egmay asway ootay uchmay orbedabsay inay erhay
ivatepray danay articularpay Ohnjay otay arecay orfay yanay otheray ordslay ofay eation,cray danay
