Atthay asway ethay amenay ofay ethay ittlelay ownbray ousehay ichwhay Rmay. Ookebray adhay
eparedpray orfay Eg'smay irstfay omehay. Aurielay adhay istenedchray it,ay ayingsay itay asway
ighlyhay opriateappray otay ethay entlegay overs,lay owhay Ent"way onay ogethertay ikelay aay
airpay ofay urtle-doves,tay ithway irstfay aay illbay danay enthay aay oo."cay Itay asway aay inytay
ouse,hay ithway aay ittlelay ardengay ehind,bay danay aay awnlay outabay saay igbay saay aay
ocket-handkerchiefpay inay ontfray. Erehay Egmay eantmay otay avehay aay ountain,fay
ubbery,shray danay aay ofusionpray ofay ovelylay owers;flay oughthay ustjay taay esent,pray
ethay ountainfay asway epresentedray ybay aay eather-beatenway urn,ay eryvay ikelay aay
ilapidatedday op-bowl;slay ethay ubberyshray onsistedcay ofay everalsay youngay arches,lay
undecideday etherwhay otay ivelay oray ie;day danay ethay ofusionpray ofay owersflay asway
erelymay intedhay ybay egimentsray ofay icks,stay otay owshay erewhay eedssay ereway antedplay.
Utbay inside,ay itay asway ogetheraltay arming,chay danay ethay appyhay idebray awsay onay aultfay
omfray arretgay otay ellarcay. Otay ebay ure,say ethay allhay asway osay arrow,nay itay asway
ortunatefay atthay eythay adhay onay iano,pay orfay oneay evernay ouldcay avehay eenbay otgay inay
ole;whay ethay ining-roomday asway osay allsmay atthay ixsay eoplepay ereway aay ighttay it;fay
danay ethay itchenkay airsstay eemedsay uiltbay orfay ethay expressay urposepay ofay
ecipitatingpray othbay ervantssay danay inachay ell-mellpay intoay ethay oal-bincay. Utbay
onceay etgay useday otay esethay ightslay emishes,blay danay othingnay ouldcay ebay oremay
omplete,cay orfay oodgay ensesay danay oodgay astetay adhay esidedpray overay ethay
urnishing,fay danay ethay esultray asway ighlyhay atisfactorysay. Erethay ereway onay
arble-toppedmay ables,tay onglay irrors,may oray acelay urtainscay inay ethay ittlelay
arlor,pay utbay implesay urniture,fay entyplay ofay ooks,bay aay inefay icturepay oray o,tway aay
andstay ofay owersflay inay ethay ay-window,bay ,anday atteredscay lalay out,abay ethay ettypray
iftsgay ichwhay amecay omfray iendlyfray ands,hay danay ereway ethay airerfay orfay ethay ovinglay
essagesmay eythay oughtbray.

Iay on'tday inkthay ethay Arianpay Ychepsay Aurielay avegay ostlay yanay ofay itsay eautybay
ecausebay Ohnjay utpay upay ethay acketbray itay oodstay upon;ay atthay yanay upholstereray
ouldcay avehay apeddray ethay ainplay uslinmay urtainscay oremay acefullygray anthay Y'samay
isticartay and;hay oray atthay yanay ore-roomstay asway everay etterbay ovidedpray ithway oodgay
ishes,way errymay ords,way danay appyhay opes,hay anthay atthay inay ichwhay Ojay danay erhay
othermay utpay ayaway Eg'smay ewfay oxes,bay arrels,bay danay undles;bay danay Iay maay orallymay
ertaincay atthay ethay andy-newspay itchenkay evernay Ould__cay avehay ookedlay osay oseycay
danay eatnay ifay Annahhay adhay otnay angedarray everyay otpay danay anpay aay ozenday imestay
over,ay danay aidlay ethay irefay lalay eadyray orfay ighting,lay ethay inutemay Is"May. Ookebray
amecay ome."hay Iay oalsay oubtday ifay yanay youngay atronmay everay eganbay ifelay ithway osay
ichray aay upplysay ofay usters,day olders,hay danay iece-bags;pay orfay Ethbay ademay enoughay
otay astlay illtay ethay ilversay eddingway amecay ound,ray danay inventeday eethray
ifferentday indskay ofay ishclothsday orfay ethay expressay ervicesay ofay ethay idalbray
inachay.

Eoplepay owhay irehay lalay esethay ingsthay oneday orfay emthay evernay owknay atwhay eythay
ose;lay orfay ethay omeliesthay askstay etgay eautifiedbay ifay ovinglay andshay oday em,thay
danay Egmay oundfay osay anymay oofspray ofay is,thay atthay everythingay inay erhay allsmay est,nay
omfray ethay itchenkay ollerray otay ethay ilversay asevay onay erhay arlorpay able,tay asway
eloquentay ofay omehay ovelay danay endertay orethoughtfay.

Atwhay appyhay imestay eythay adhay anningplay ogether,tay atwhay olemnsay oppingshay
excursions;ay atwhay unnyfay istakesmay eythay ade,may danay atwhay outsshay ofay aughterlay
osearay overay Aurie'slay idiculousray argainsbay. Inay ishay ovelay ofay okes,jay isthay
youngay entleman,gay oughthay earlynay oughthray ollege,cay asway saay uchmay ofay aay oybay saay
everay. Ishay astlay imwhay adhay eenbay otay ingbray ithway im,hay onay ishay eeklyway isits,vay
omesay ew,nay useful,ay danay ingeniousay icleartay orfay ethay youngay ousekeeperhay. Ownay aay
agbay ofay emarkableray othes-pins;clay ext,nay aay onderfulway utmeg-grater,nay ichwhay
ellfay otay iecespay taay ethay irstfay ial;tray aay ife-cleanerknay atthay oiltspay lalay ethay
ives;knay oray aay eepersway atthay ickedpay ethay apnay eatlynay offay ethay arpet,cay danay eftlay
ethay irt;day abor-savinglay oapsay atthay ooktay ethay inskay offay one'say ands;hay
infallibleay ementscay ichwhay uckstay irmlyfay otay othingnay utbay ethay ingersfay ofay ethay
eludedday uyer;bay danay everyay indkay ofay in-ware,tay omfray aay oytay avings-banksay orfay
odday ennies,pay otay aay onderfulway oilerbay ichwhay ouldway ashway iclesartay inay itsay ownay
eam,stay ithway everyay ospectpray ofay explodingay inay ethay ocesspray.

Inay ainvay Egmay eggedbay imhay otay opstay. Ohnjay aughedlay taay im,hay danay Ojay alledcay imhay
R"May. Oodles."tay Ehay asway ossessedpay ithway aay aniamay orfay atronizingpay Yankeeay
ingenuity,ay danay eeingsay ishay iendsfray itlyfay urnishedfay orthfay. Osay eachay eekway
eheldbay omesay eshfray urdityabsay.

Everythingay asway oneday taay ast,lay evenay otay Y'samay angingarray ifferentday oloredcay
oapssay otay atchmay ethay ifferentday oloredcay ooms,ray danay Eth'sbay ettingsay ethay abletay
orfay ethay irstfay ealmay.

Are"ay youay atisfied?say Oesday itay eemsay ikelay ome,hay danay oday youay eelfay saay ifay youay
ouldshay ebay appyhay ere?"hay edaskay Smray. Arch,may saay eshay danay erhay aughterday entway
oughthray ethay ewnay ingdom,kay in-arm;arm-ay orfay ustjay enthay eythay eemedsay otay ingclay
ogethertay oremay enderlytay anthay everay.

Yes,"ay other,may erfectlypay atisfied,say anksthay otay youay ,allay danay O__say appyhay
atthay Iay an'tcay alktay outabay it,"ay eredansway Eg,may ithway aay ooklay atthay asway etterbay
anthay ordsway.

If"ay eshay onlyay adhay aay ervantsay oray otway itay ouldway ebay lalay ight,"ray aidsay Y,amay
omingcay outay ofay ethay arlor,pay erewhay eshay adhay eenbay yingtray otay ecideday etherwhay
ethay onzebray Ercurymay ookedlay estbay onay ethay atnotwhay oray ethay antle-piecemay.

Other"May danay Iay avehay alkedtay atthay over,ay danay Iay avehay ademay upay ymay indmay otay ytray
erhay ayway irstfay. Erethay illway ebay osay ittlelay otay o,day at,thay ithway Ottylay otay unray ymay
errandsay danay elphay emay erehay danay ere,thay Iay allshay onlyay avehay enoughay orkway otay
eepkay emay omfray ettinggay azylay oray omesick,"hay eredansway Egmay anquillytray.

Allie"Say Offatmay ashay our,"fay eganbay Yamay.

If"ay Egmay adhay ourfay ethay ousehay ouldn'tway oldhay em,thay danay astermay danay issismay
ouldway avehay otay ampcay inay ethay arden,"gay okebray inay O,jay o,whay envelopeday inay aay igbay
ueblay inafore,pay asway ivinggay ethay astlay olishpay otay ethay oor-handlesday.

Allie"Say isn'tay aay oorpay an'smay ife,way danay anymay aidsmay earay inay eepingkay ithway erhay
inefay establishmentay. Egmay danay Ohnjay eginbay umbly,hay utbay Iay avehay aay eelingfay atthay
erethay illway ebay uiteqay saay uchmay appinesshay inay ethay ittlelay ousehay saay inay ethay igbay
oneay. It'say aay eatgray istakemay orfay youngay irlsgay ikelay Egmay otay eavelay emselvesthay
othingnay otay oday utbay ess,dray ivegay orders,ay danay ossipgay. Enwhay Iay asway irstfay
arried,may Iay useday otay onglay orfay ymay ewnay othesclay otay earway outay oray etgay orn,tay osay
atthay Iay ightmay avehay ethay easureplay ofay endingmay em;thay orfay Iay otgay eartilyhay icksay
ofay oingday ancyfay orkway danay endingtay ymay ocketpay andkerchief."hay

Y"Whay idn'tday youay ogay intoay ethay itchenkay danay akemay esses,may saay Alliesay ayssay eshay
oes,day otay useamay erself,hay oughthay eythay evernay urntay outay ell,way danay ethay
ervantssay aughlay taay er,"hay aidsay Egmay.

I"ay id,day eraftay aay ile;whay otnay otay Ess,''may utbay otay earnlay ofay Annahhay owhay ingsthay
ouldshay ebay one,day atthay ymay ervantssay eednay Ot__nay aughlay taay emay. Itay asway ayplay
en;thay utbay erethay amecay aay imetay enwhay Iay asway ulytray atefulgray atthay Iay otnay onlyay
ossessedpay ethay illway utbay ethay owerpay otay ookcay olesomewhay oodfay orfay ymay ittlelay
irls,gay danay elphay yselfmay enwhay Iay ouldcay onay ongerlay ordaffay otay irehay elphay. Youay
eginbay taay ethay otheray end,ay Eg,may ear;day utbay ethay essonslay youay earnlay ownay illway ebay
ofay useay otay youay ybay danay y,bay enwhay Ohnjay isay aay icherray an,may orfay ethay istressmay ofay
aay ouse,hay oweverhay endid,splay ouldshay owknay owhay orkway oughtay otay ebay one,day ifay eshay
ishesway otay ebay ellway danay onestlyhay erved."say

Yes,"ay other,may I'may uresay ofay at,"thay aidsay Eg,may isteninglay espectfullyray otay ethay
ittlelay ecture;lay orfay ethay estbay ofay omenway illway oldhay orthfay uponay ethay
absorbingall-ay ubjectsay ofay ousekeepinghay. O"Day youay owknay Iay ikelay isthay oomray

Ooke"bray eshay ouldn'tshay avehay aay entcay ofay erhay oney,may Untaay Archmay asway atherray inay

You"ay on'tway ivegay yanay oneay aay ance,"chay aidsay Aurie,lay ithway aay idelongsay ance,glay

I"ay on'tday ikelay atthay ortsay ofay ing;thay I'may ootay usybay otay ebay orriedway ithway

Illustration:[ay Ethay Irstfay Edding]way

VxXay.

EtHay IRSTfay EDDINGway.


Ethay Unejay osesray overay ethay orchpay ereway akeaway ightbray danay earlyay onay atthay
orning,may ejoicingray ithway lalay eirthay eartshay inay ethay oudlessclay unshine,say ikelay
iendlyfray ittlelay eighbors,nay saay eythay ereway. Uiteqay ushedflay ithway excitementay
ereway eirthay uddyray aces,fay saay eythay ungsway inay ethay ind,way isperingwhay otay oneay
otheranay atwhay eythay adhay een;say orfay omesay eepedpay inay taay ethay ining-roomday
indows,way erewhay ethay eastfay asway ead,spray omesay imbedclay upay otay odnay danay ilesmay taay
ethay isterssay saay eythay esseddray ethay ide,bray othersay avedway aay elcomeway otay osethay
owhay amecay danay entway onay ariousvay errandsay inay arden,gay orch,pay danay all,hay danay
,allay omfray ethay osiestray ull-blownfay owerflay otay ethay alestpay aby-bud,bay offereday
eirthay ibutetray ofay eautybay danay agrancefray otay ethay entlegay istressmay owhay adhay
ovedlay danay endedtay emthay osay onglay.

Egmay ookedlay eryvay ikelay aay oseray erself;hay orfay lalay atthay asway estbay danay eetestsway
inay earthay danay oulsay eemedsay otay oomblay intoay erhay acefay atthay ay,day akingmay itay airfay
danay ender,tay ithway aay armchay oremay eautifulbay anthay eautybay. Eithernay ilk,say ace,lay
ornay orange-flowersay ouldway eshay avehay. I"ay on'tday antway otay ooklay angestray oray
ixedfay upay o-day,"tay eshay aidsay. I"ay on'tday antway aay ashionablefay edding,way utbay
onlyay osethay outabay emay omwhay Iay ove,lay danay otay emthay Iay ishway otay ooklay danay ebay ymay
amiliarfay elf."say

Osay eshay ademay erhay eddingway owngay erself,hay ewingsay intoay itay ethay endertay opeshay
danay innocentay omancesray ofay aay irlishgay earthay. Erhay isterssay aidedbray upay erhay
ettypray air,hay danay ethay onlyay ornamentsay eshay oreway ereway ethay ilieslay ofay ethay
alley,vay ichwhay Er"hay Ohn"jay ikedlay estbay ofay lalay ethay owersflay atthay ewgray.

You"ay O__day ooklay ustjay ikelay ouray ownay earday Eg,may onlyay osay eryvay eetsway danay ovelylay
atthay Iay ouldshay ughay youay ifay itay ouldn'tway umplecray youray ess,"dray iedcray Y,amay
urveyingsay erhay ithway elight,day enwhay lalay asway oneday.

En"Thay Iay maay atisfiedsay. Utbay easeplay ughay danay isskay e,may everyay one,ay danay on'tday
indmay ymay ess;dray Iay antway aay eatgray anymay umplescray ofay isthay ortsay utpay intoay itay
o-day;"tay danay Egmay openeday erhay sarmay otay erhay isters,say owhay ungclay outabay erhay
ithway Ilapray acesfay orfay aay inute,may eelingfay atthay ethay ewnay ovelay adhay otnay angedchay
ethay olday.

Ow"Nay I'may oinggay otay ietay Ohn'sjay avatcray orfay im,hay danay enthay otay aystay aay ewfay
inutesmay ithway atherfay uietlyqay inay ethay udy;"stay danay Egmay anray ownday otay erformpay
esethay ittlelay eremonies,cay danay enthay otay ollowfay erhay othermay ereverwhay eshay
ent,way onsciouscay at,thay inay itespay ofay ethay ilessmay onay ethay otherlymay ace,fay erethay
asway aay ecretsay orrowsay idhay inay ethay otherlymay earthay taay ethay ightflay ofay ethay irstfay
irdbay omfray ethay estnay.

Saay ethay youngeray irlsgay andstay ogether,tay ivinggay ethay astlay ouchestay otay eirthay
implesay oilet,tay itay aymay ebay aay oodgay imetay otay elltay ofay aay ewfay angeschay ichwhay
eethray yearsay avehay oughtwray inay eirthay earance;appay orfay lalay earay ookinglay eirthay
estbay ustjay ownay.

O'sjay esanglay earay uchmay oftened;say eshay ashay earnedlay otay arrycay erselfhay ithway
ease,ay ifay otnay acegray. Ethay urlycay opcray ashay engthenedlay intoay aay ickthay oil,cay
oremay ecomingbay otay ethay allsmay eadhay opatay ofay ethay alltay igurefay. Erethay isay aay
eshfray olorcay inay erhay ownbray eeks,chay aay oftsay ineshay inay erhay eyes,ay danay onlyay
entlegay ordsway allfay omfray erhay arpshay onguetay o-daytay.

Ethbay ashay owngray ender,slay ale,pay danay oremay uietqay anthay ever;ay ethay eautiful,bay
indkay eyesay earay arger,lay danay inay emthay ieslay naay expressionay atthay addenssay one,ay
oughalthay itay isay otnay adsay itselfay. Itay isay ethay adowshay ofay ainpay ichwhay ouchestay
ethay youngay acefay ithway uchsay atheticpay atience;pay utbay Ethbay eldomsay omplains,cay
danay aysalway eaksspay opefullyhay ofay Eing"bay etterbay oon."say

Yamay isay ithway uthtray onsideredcay E"thay owerflay ofay ethay amily;"fay orfay taay ixteensay
eshay ashay ethay iraay danay earingbay ofay aay ull-grownfay oman--notway eautiful,bay utbay
ossessedpay ofay atthay indescribableay armchay alledcay acegray. Oneay awsay itay inay ethay
ineslay ofay erhay igure,fay ethay akemay danay otionmay ofay erhay ands,hay ethay owflay ofay erhay
ess,dray ethay oopdray ofay erhay air,--unconscious,hay yetay armonious,hay danay saay
activeattray otay anymay saay eautybay itselfay. Y'samay osenay illstay ictedafflay er,hay orfay
itay evernay Ould__way owgray Ecian;gray osay idday erhay outh,may eingbay ootay ide,way danay
avinghay aay ecidedday inchay. Esethay offendingay eaturesfay avegay aracterchay otay erhay
olewhay ace,fay utbay eshay evernay ouldcay eesay it,ay danay onsoledcay erselfhay ithway erhay
onderfullyway airfay omplexion,cay eenkay ueblay eyes,ay danay urls,cay oremay oldengay danay
undantabay anthay everay.

Lalay eethray oreway uitssay ofay inthay ilversay aygray Eir(thay estbay ownsgay orfay ethay
ummer),say ithway ush-rosesblay inay airhay danay osom;bay danay lalay eethray ookedlay ustjay
atwhay eythay ere,--fresh-faced,way appy-heartedhay irls,gay ausingpay aay omentmay inay
eirthay usybay iveslay otay eadray ithway istfulway eyesay ethay eetestsway apterchay inay ethay
omanceray ofay omanhoodway.

Erethay ereway otay ebay onay eremoniouscay erformances,pay everythingay asway otay ebay saay
aturalnay danay omelikehay saay ossible;pay osay enwhay Untaay Archmay ived,array eshay asway

IxXVay.

ISTICaRTay EMPTSaTTay.


Itay akestay eoplepay aay onglay imetay otay earnlay ethay ifferenceday etweenbay alenttay danay
enius,gay especiallyay itiousambay youngay enmay danay omenway. Yamay asway earninglay isthay
istinctionday oughthray uchmay ibulation;tray or,fay istakingmay enthusiasmay orfay
inspiration,ay eshay emptedattay everyay anchbray ofay taray ithway youthfulay udacityaay.
Orfay aay onglay imetay erethay asway aay ulllay inay ethay Ud-pie""may usiness,bay danay eshay
evotedday erselfhay otay ethay inestfay en-and-inkpay awing,dray inay ichwhay eshay owedshay
uchsay astetay danay illskay atthay erhay acefulgray andiworkhay ovedpray othbay easantplay
danay ofitablepray. Utbay overstraineday eyesay oonsay ausedcay enpay danay inkay otay ebay aidlay
ideasay orfay aay oldbay emptattay taay oker-sketchingpay. Ilewhay isthay ackattay asted,lay
ethay amilyfay ivedlay inay onstantcay earfay ofay aay onflagration;cay orfay ethay odoray ofay
urningbay oodway ervadedpay ethay ousehay taay lalay ours;hay okesmay issueday omfray icattay
danay edshay ithway armingalay equency,fray ed-hotray okerspay aylay outabay
omiscuously,pray danay Annahhay evernay entway otay edbay ithoutway aay ailpay ofay aterway danay
ethay inner-bellday taay erhay oor,day inay asecay ofay irefay. Aphael'sray acefay asway oundfay
oldlybay executeday onay ethay underay idesay ofay ethay oulding-board,may danay Acchusbay onay
ethay eadhay ofay aay eer-barrel;bay aay antingchay erubchay ornedaday ethay overcay ofay ethay
ugar-bucket,say danay emptsattay otay ortraypay Omeoray danay Ulietjay uppliedsay
indlingskay orfay omesay imetay.

Omfray irefay otay oilay asway aay aturalnay ansitiontray orfay urntbay ingers,fay danay Yamay
ellfay otay aintingpay ithway undiminisheday orarday. Naay istartay iendfray ittedfay erhay
outay ithway ishay ast-offcay alettes,pay ushes,bray danay olors;cay danay eshay aubedday
ay,away oducingpray astoralpay danay arinemay iewsvay uchsay saay ereway evernay eensay onay
andlay oray easay. Erhay onstrositiesmay inay ethay ayway ofay attlecay ouldway avehay akentay
izespray taay naay iculturalagray air;fay danay ethay erilouspay itchingpay ofay erhay esselsvay
ouldway avehay oducedpray ea-sicknesssay inay ethay ostmay auticalnay observer,ay ifay ethay
utteray isregardday otay lalay ownknay ulesray ofay ipbuildingshay danay iggingray adhay otnay
onvulsedcay imhay ithway aughterlay taay ethay irstfay anceglay. Arthysway oysbay danay
ark-eyedday Adonnas,may aringstay taay youay omfray oneay ornercay ofay ethay udio,stay
uggestedsay Urillo;may oily-brownay adowsshay ofay aces,fay ithway aay uridlay eakstray inay
ethay ongwray ace,play eantmay Embrandt;ray uxombay adieslay danay opsicaldray infants,ay
Ubens;ray danay Urnertay earedappay inay empeststay ofay ueblay under,thay orangeay
ightning,lay ownbray ain,ray danay urplepay ouds,clay ithway aay omato-coloredtay ashsplay
inay ethay iddle,may ichwhay ightmay ebay ethay unsay oray aay uoy,bay aay ailor'ssay irtshay oray aay
ing'skay obe,ray saay ethay ectatorspay easedplay.

Arcoalchay ortraitspay amecay ext;nay danay ethay entireay amilyfay unghay inay aay ow,ray
ookinglay saay ildway danay ockycray saay ifay ustjay evokeday omfray aay oal-bincay. Oftenedsay
intoay ayoncray etches,skay eythay idday etter;bay orfay ethay ikenesseslay ereway ood,gay danay
Y'samay air,hay O'sjay ose,nay Eg'smay outh,may danay Aurie'slay eyesay ereway onouncedpray
Onderfully"way ine."fay Aay eturnray otay ayclay danay asterplay ollowed,fay danay ostlyghay
astscay ofay erhay uaintancesacqay auntedhay ornerscay ofay ethay ouse,hay oray umbledtay offay
oset-shelvesclay onay otay eople'spay eadshay. Ildrenchay ereway enticeday inay saay odels,may
illtay eirthay incoherentay ountsaccay ofay erhay ysteriousmay oingsday ausedcay Issmay Yamay
otay ebay egardedray inay ethay ightlay ofay aay youngay ogressay. Erhay effortsay inay isthay ine,lay
owever,hay ereway oughtbray otay naay uptabray oseclay ybay naay untowarday ident,accay ichwhay
uenchedqay erhay orarday. Otheray odelsmay ailingfay erhay orfay aay ime,tay eshay undertookay
otay astcay erhay ownay ettypray oot,fay danay ethay amilyfay ereway oneay ayday armedalay ybay naay
unearthlyay umpingbay danay eaming,scray danay unningray otay ethay escue,ray oundfay ethay
youngay enthusiastay oppinghay ildlyway outabay ethay ed,shay ithway erhay ootfay eldhay astfay
inay aay an-fullpay ofay aster,play ichwhay adhay ardenedhay ithway unexpecteday apidityray.
Ithway uchmay ifficultyday danay omesay angerday eshay asway ugday out;ay orfay Ojay asway osay
overcomeay ithway aughterlay ilewhay eshay excavated,ay atthay erhay ifeknay entway ootay ar,fay
utcay ethay oorpay oot,fay danay eftlay aay astinglay emorialmay ofay oneay isticartay empt,attay
taay eastlay.

Illustration:[ay Erhay ootfay eldhay astfay inay aay anfulpay ofay aster]play

Eraftay isthay Yamay ubsided,say illtay aay aniamay orfay etchingskay omfray aturenay etsay erhay
otay auntinghay iver,ray ield,fay danay ood,way orfay icturesquepay udies,stay danay ighingsay
orfay uinsray otay opycay. Eshay aughtcay endlessay oldscay ittingsay onay ampday assgray otay
ookbay A"ay eliciousday it,"bay omposedcay ofay aay one,stay aay ump,stay oneay ushroom,may danay
aay okenbray ullein-stalk,may oray A"ay eavenlyhay assmay ofay ouds,"clay atthay ookedlay ikelay
aay oicechay isplayday ofay eather-bedsfay enwhay oneday. Eshay acrificedsay erhay
omplexioncay oatingflay onay ethay iverray inay ethay idsummermay un,say otay udystay ightlay
danay ade,shay danay otgay aay inklewray overay erhay ose,nay yingtray eraftay Oints"pay ofay
ight,"say oray ateverwhay ethay uint-and-stringsqay erformancepay isay alledcay.

Ifay Enius"gay isay eternalay atience,"pay saay Ichaelmay Eloangay irms,affay Yamay
ertainlycay adhay omesay aimclay otay ethay ivineday ibute,attray orfay eshay erseveredpay inay
itespay ofay lalay obstacles,ay ailures,fay danay iscouragements,day irmlyfay elievingbay
atthay inay imetay eshay ouldshay oday omethingsay orthyway otay ebay alledcay Igh"hay "art.ay

Eshay asway earning,lay oing,day danay enjoyingay otheray ings,thay eanwhile,may orfay eshay
adhay esolvedray otay ebay naay activeattray danay omplishedaccay oman,way evenay ifay eshay
evernay ecamebay aay eatgray istartay. Erehay eshay ucceededsay etter;bay orfay eshay asway oneay
ofay osethay appilyhay eatedcray eingsbay owhay easeplay ithoutway effort,ay akemay iendsfray
everywhere,ay danay aketay ifelay osay acefullygray danay easilyay atthay esslay ortunatefay
oulssay earay emptedtay otay elievebay atthay uchsay earay ornbay underay aay uckylay arstay.
Everybodyay ikedlay er,hay orfay ongamay erhay oodgay iftsgay asway acttay. Eshay adhay naay
instinctiveay ensesay ofay atwhay asway easingplay danay oper,pray aysalway aidsay ethay ightray
ingthay otay ethay ightray erson,pay idday ustjay atwhay uitedsay ethay imetay danay ace,play danay
asway osay elf-possessedsay atthay erhay isterssay useday otay ay,say If"ay Yamay entway otay
ourtcay ithoutway yanay ehearsalray eforehand,bay e'dshay owknay exactlyay atwhay otay o."day

Oneay ofay erhay eaknessesway asway aay esireday otay ovemay inay Our"ay estbay ociety,"say
ithoutway eingbay uiteqay uresay atwhay ethay Est__bay eallyray asway. Oney,may osition,pay
ashionablefay omplishments,accay danay elegantay annersmay ereway ostmay esirableday
ingsthay inay erhay eyes,ay danay eshay ikedlay otay ociateassay ithway osethay owhay ossessedpay
em,thay oftenay istakingmay ethay alsefay orfay ethay ue,tray danay iringadmay atwhay asway otnay
irableadmay. Evernay orgettingfay atthay ybay irthbay eshay asway aay entlewoman,gay eshay
ultivatedcay erhay istocraticaray astestay danay eelings,fay osay atthay enwhay ethay
opportunityay amecay eshay ightmay ebay eadyray otay aketay ethay aceplay omfray ichwhay overtypay
ownay excludeday erhay.

Y"May ady,"lay saay erhay iendsfray alledcay er,hay incerelysay esiredday otay ebay aay enuinegay
ady,lay danay asway osay taay eart,hay utbay adhay yetay otay earnlay atthay oneymay annotcay uybay

iraay otay ethay oom,ray saay idday ethay ovelylay asesvay ofay owersflay Ojay atteredscay outabay.

Ethay unchlay ookedlay armingly;chay danay saay eshay urveyedsay it,ay eshay incerelysay opedhay

I"ay upposesay e'llhay aughlay danay okejay overay itay ithway Aurie,lay utbay Iay a'n'tshay eesay
em;thay at'sthay aay omfort,"cay oughtthay Y,amay saay Udortay owedbay danay epartedday.

Eshay idday otnay entionmay isthay eetingmay taay omehay Ough(thay eshay iscoveredday at,thay
anksthay otay ethay upset,ay erhay ewnay essdray asway uchmay amagedday ybay ethay ivuletsray ofay

eparationspray ichwhay ownay eemedsay oremay irksomeay anthay efore;bay danay taay elvetway
o'clockay lalay asway eadyray ainagay. Eelingfay atthay ethay eighborsnay ereway interesteday
inay erhay ovements,may eshay ishedway otay effaceay ethay emorymay ofay yesterday'say

Ere's"Thay ethay umble,ray ey'rethay oming!cay I'llay ogay intoay ethay orchpay otay eetmay
em;thay itay ookslay ospitable,hay danay Iay antway ethay oorpay ildchay otay avehay aay oodgay imetay
eraftay lalay erhay ouble,"tray aidsay Smray. Arch,may uitingsay ethay ionactay otay ethay ordway.
Utbay eraftay oneay ance,glay eshay etired,ray ithway naay indescribableay expression,ay
or,fay ookinglay uiteqay ostlay inay ethay igbay arriage,cay atsay Yamay danay oneay youngay adylay.

Un,"Ray Eth,bay danay elphay Annahhay earclay alfhay ethay ingsthay offay ethay able;tay itay illway
ebay ootay urdabsay otay utpay aay uncheonlay orfay elvetway eforebay aay inglesay irl,"gay iedcray

aughlay.

Inay amecay Y,amay uiteqay alm,cay danay elightfullyday ordialcay otay ethay oneay uestgay owhay
adhay eptkay erhay omise;pray ethay estray ofay ethay amily,fay eingbay ofay aay amaticdray urn,tay
ayedplay eirthay artspay equallyay ell,way danay Issmay Eliottay oundfay emthay aay ostmay
ilarioushay et;say orfay itay asway impossibleay otay entirelyay ontrolcay ethay errimentmay
ichwhay ossessedpay emthay. Ethay emodelledray unchlay eingbay aylygay artakenpay of,ay ethay
udiostay danay ardengay isited,vay danay taray iscussedday ithway enthusiasm,ay Yamay
ordereday aay uggybay Alas(ay orfay ethay elegantay erry-bounce!)chay danay ovedray erhay
iendfray uietlyqay outabay ethay eighborhoodnay illtay unset,say enwhay E"thay artypay entway
out."ay

Saay eshay amecay alkingway in,ay ookinglay eryvay ired,tay utbay saay omposedcay saay ever,ay eshay
observeday atthay everyay estigevay ofay ethay unfortunateay E__fÃªtay adhay isappeared,day
exceptay aay uspicioussay uckerpay outabay ethay ornerscay ofay O'sjay outhmay.

You've"ay adhay aay ovelylay ernoonaftay orfay youray ive,dray ear,"day aidsay erhay other,may
saay espectfullyray saay ifay ethay olewhay elvetway adhay omecay.

Iss"May Eliottay isay aay eryvay eetsway irl,gay danay eemedsay otay enjoyay erself,hay Iay
ought,"thay observeday Eth,bay ithway unusualay armthway.

Ould"Cay youay arespay emay omesay ofay youray ake?cay Iay eallyray eednay ome,say Iay avehay osay
uchmay ompany,cay danay Iay an'tcay akemay uchsay eliciousday uffstay saay yours,"ay edaskay Egmay
oberlysay.

Ake"Tay itay ;allay I'may ethay onlyay oneay erehay owhay ikeslay eetsway ings,thay danay itay illway
ouldmay eforebay Iay ancay isposeday ofay it,"ay eredansway Y,amay inkingthay ithway aay ighsay ofay
ethay enerousgay orestay eshay adhay aidlay inay orfay uchsay naay enday saay isthay.

It's"ay aay itypay Aurielay isn'tay erehay otay elphay us,"ay eganbay O,jay saay eythay atsay ownday
otay ice-creamay danay aladsay orfay ethay econdsay imetay inay otway aysday.

Aay arningway ooklay omfray erhay othermay eckedchay yanay urtherfay emarks,ray danay ethay
olewhay amilyfay eatay inay eroichay ilence,say illtay Rmay. Archmay ildlymay observed,ay
Alad"Say asway oneay ofay ethay avoritefay ishesday ofay ethay ients,ancay danay Evelyn"--hereay
aay eneralgay explosionay ofay aughterlay utcay ortshay ethay Istory"hay ofay allets,"say otay
ethay eatgray urprisesay ofay ethay earnedlay entlemangay.

Undle"Bay everythingay intoay aay asketbay danay endsay itay otay ethay Ummels:hay Ermansgay
ikelay essesmay. I'may icksay ofay ethay ightsay ofay is;thay danay ere'sthay onay easonray youay
ouldshay lalay ieday ofay aay urfeitsay ecausebay I'veay eenbay aay ool,"fay iedcray Y,amay ipingway
erhay eyesay.

I"ay oughtthay Iay Ould__shay avehay iedday enwhay Iay awsay youay otway irlsgay attlingray outabay
inay ethay at-you-call-it,whay ikelay otway ittlelay ernelskay inay aay eryvay igbay utshell,nay
danay othermay aitingway inay atestay otay eceiveray ethay ong,"thray ighedsay O,jay uiteqay
entspay ithway aughterlay.

I'm"ay eryvay orrysay youay ereway isappointed,day ear,day utbay eway lalay idday ouray estbay otay
atisfysay you,"ay aidsay Smray. Arch,may inay aay onetay ullfay ofay otherlymay egretray.

I"ay Am__ay atisfied;say I'veay oneday atwhay Iay undertook,ay danay it'say otnay ymay aultfay

uiverqay inay erhay oicevay. I"ay ankthay youay lalay eryvay uchmay orfay elpinghay e,may danay I'llay

IIxXVay.

ITERARYlay ESSONSlay.


Ortunefay uddenlysay iledsmay uponay O,jay danay oppeddray aay ood-luckgay ennypay inay erhay
athpay. Otnay aay oldengay enny,pay exactly,ay utbay Iay oubtday ifay alfhay aay illionmay ouldway
avehay ivengay oremay ealray appinesshay anthay idday ethay ittlelay umsay atthay amecay otay erhay
inay isthay iseway.

Everyay ewfay eeksway eshay ouldway utshay erselfhay upay inay erhay oom,ray utpay onay erhay
ibblingscray uit,say danay All"fay intoay aay ortex,"vay saay eshay expresseday it,ay itingwray
ayaway taay erhay ovelnay ithway lalay erhay earthay danay oul,say orfay illtay atthay asway
inishedfay eshay ouldcay indfay onay eacepay. Erhay Ibbling"scray uit"say onsistedcay ofay aay
ackblay oollenway inaforepay onay ichwhay eshay ouldcay ipeway erhay enpay taay ill,way danay aay
apcay ofay ethay amesay aterial,may ornedaday ithway aay eerfulchay edray ow,bay intoay ichwhay
eshay undledbay erhay airhay enwhay ethay ecksday ereway earedclay orfay ionactay. Isthay apcay
asway aay eaconbay otay ethay inquiringay eyesay ofay erhay amily,fay owhay uringday esethay
eriodspay eptkay eirthay istance,day erelymay oppingpay inay eirthay eadshay
emi-occasionally,say otay ,askay ithway interest,ay Oes"Day eniusgay urn,bay O?"jay Eythay
idday otnay aysalway enturevay evenay otay kasay isthay uestion,qay utbay ooktay naay
observationay ofay ethay ap,cay danay udgedjay ordinglyaccay. Ifay isthay expressiveay
icleartay ofay essdray asway awndray owlay uponay ethay orehead,fay itay asway aay ignsay atthay
ardhay orkway asway oinggay on;ay inay excitingay omentsmay itay asway ushedpay akishlyray
ew;askay danay enwhay espairday eizedsay ethay uthoraay itay asway uckedplay ollywhay off,ay danay
astcay uponay ethay oorflay. Taay uchsay imestay ethay intruderay ilentlysay ithdrew;way danay
otnay untilay ethay edray owbay asway eensay aylygay erectay uponay ethay iftedgay ow,bray idday yanay
oneay areday essaddray Ojay.

Eshay idday otnay inkthay erselfhay aay eniusgay ybay yanay eans;may utbay enwhay ethay itingwray
itfay amecay on,ay eshay avegay erselfhay upay otay itay ithway entireay andon,abay danay edlay aay
issfulblay ife,lay unconsciousay ofay ant,way are,cay oray adbay eather,way ilewhay eshay atsay
afesay danay appyhay inay naay imaginaryay orld,way ullfay ofay iendsfray ostalmay saay ealray danay
earday otay erhay saay yanay inay ethay eshflay. Eepslay orsookfay erhay eyes,ay ealsmay oodstay
untasted,ay ayday danay ightnay ereway lalay ootay ortshay otay enjoyay ethay appinesshay ichwhay
essedblay erhay onlyay taay uchsay imes,tay danay ademay esethay ourshay orthway iving,lay evenay
ifay eythay orebay onay otheray uitfray. Ethay ivineday atusafflay usuallyay astedlay aay eekway
oray o,tway danay enthay eshay emergeday omfray erhay Ortex,""vay ungry,hay eepy,slay oss,cray
oray espondentday.

Eshay asway ustjay ecoveringray omfray oneay ofay esethay acksattay enwhay eshay asway evailedpray
uponay otay escortay Issmay Ockercray otay aay ecture,lay danay inay eturnray orfay erhay irtuevay
asway ewardedray ithway aay ewnay ideaay. Itay asway aay Eople'spay Ourse,cay ethay ecturelay onay
ethay Yramids,pay danay Ojay atherray onderedway taay ethay oicechay ofay uchsay aay ubjectsay orfay
uchsay naay udience,aay utbay ooktay itay orfay antedgray atthay omesay eatgray ocialsay evilay
ouldway ebay emediedray oray omesay eatgray antway uppliedsay ybay unfoldingay ethay oriesglay
ofay ethay Araohsphay otay naay udienceaay osewhay oughtsthay ereway usybay ithway ethay icepray
ofay oalcay danay our,flay danay osewhay iveslay ereway entspay inay yingtray otay olvesay arderhay
iddlesray anthay atthay ofay ethay Inxsphay.

Eythay ereway early;ay danay ilewhay Issmay Ockercray etsay ethay eelhay ofay erhay ocking,stay Ojay
usedamay erselfhay ybay examiningay ethay acesfay ofay ethay eoplepay owhay occupieday ethay
eatsay ithway emthay. Onay erhay eftlay ereway otway atrons,may ithway assivemay oreheads,fay
danay onnetsbay otay atch,may iscussingday Oman'sway Ightsray danay akingmay attingtay.
Eyondbay atsay aay airpay ofay umblehay overs,lay esslyartlay oldinghay eachay otheray ybay ethay
and,hay aay ombresay insterspay eatingay eppermintspay outay ofay aay aperpay ag,bay danay naay
olday entlemangay akingtay ishay eparatorypray apnay ehindbay aay yelloway andannabay. Onay
erhay ight,ray erhay onlyay eighbornay asway aay udious-lookingstay adlay orbedabsay inay aay
ewspapernay.

Itay asway aay ictorialpay eet,shay danay Ojay examineday ethay orkway ofay taray earestnay er,hay
idlyay onderingway atwhay unfortuitousay oncatenationcay ofay ircumstancescay eedednay
ethay elodramaticmay illustrationay ofay naay Indianay inay ullfay arway ostume,cay umblingtay
overay aay ecipicepray ithway aay olfway taay ishay oat,thray ilewhay otway infuriateday youngay
entlemen,gay ithway unnaturallyay allsmay eetfay danay igbay eyes,ay ereway abbingstay eachay
otheray oseclay y,bay danay aay ishevelledday emalefay asway yingflay ayaway inay ethay
ackgroundbay ithway erhay outhmay ideway openay. Ausingpay otay urntay aay age,pay ethay adlay awsay
erhay ooking,lay ,anday ithway oyishbay ood-nature,gay offereday alfhay ishay aper,pay
ayingsay untly,blay Ant"Way otay eadray it?ay At'sthay aay irst-ratefay ory."stay

omething,say oughthay itay asway onlyay otay itewray aay ensationsay orystay.

Ah,"ay utbay youay allshay o,gay I'veay etsay ymay earthay onay it;ay at'sthay atwhay Iay iedtray or,fay

Otay ethay easay idesay eythay ent,way eraftay uchmay iscussion;day danay oughthay Ethbay idn'tday

idday earnay everalsay atthay year,ay danay eganbay otay eelfay erselfhay aay owerpay inay ethay
ouse;hay orfay ybay ethay agicmay ofay aay en,pay erhay Ubbish""ray urnedtay intoay omfortscay orfay
emthay lalay. E"Thay Uke'sday Aughter"day aidpay ethay utcher'sbay ill,bay A"ay Antomphay
And"hay utpay ownday aay ewnay arpet,cay danay ethay Urse"Cay ofay ethay Oventrys"cay ovedpray ethay
essingblay ofay ethay Archesmay inay ethay ayway ofay oceriesgray danay ownsgay.

Ealthway isay ertainlycay aay ostmay esirableday ing,thay utbay overtypay ashay itsay unnysay
ide,say danay oneay ofay ethay eetsway usesay ofay ersityadvay isay ethay enuinegay atisfactionsay
ichwhay omescay omfray eartyhay orkway ofay eadhay oray and;hay danay otay ethay inspirationay ofay
ecessity,nay eway oweay alfhay ethay ise,way eautiful,bay danay usefulay essingsblay ofay ethay
orldway. Ojay enjoyeday aay astetay ofay isthay atisfaction,say danay easedcay otay envyay
icherray irls,gay akingtay eatgray omfortcay inay ethay owledgeknay atthay eshay ouldcay
upplysay erhay ownay ants,way danay eednay kasay onay oneay orfay aay ennypay.

Ittlelay oticenay asway akentay ofay erhay ories,stay utbay eythay oundfay aay arket;may ,anday
encourageday ybay isthay act,fay eshay esolvedray otay akemay aay oldbay okestray orfay amefay danay
ortunefay. Avinghay opiedcay erhay ovelnay orfay ethay ourthfay ime,tay eadray itay otay lalay erhay
onfidentialcay iends,fray danay ubmittedsay itay ithway earfay danay emblingtray otay eethray
ublishers,pay eshay taay astlay isposedday ofay it,ay onay onditioncay atthay eshay ouldway utcay
itay ownday oneay ird,thay danay omitay lalay ethay artspay ichwhay eshay articularlypay
iredadmay.

Ow"Nay Iay ustmay eitheray undlebay itay ackbay intoay ymay in-kitchentay otay ould,may aypay orfay
intingpray itay yself,may oray opchay itay upay otay uitsay urchasers,pay danay etgay atwhay Iay ancay
orfay itay. Amefay isay aay eryvay oodgay ingthay otay avehay inay ethay ouse,hay utbay ashcay isay oremay
onvenient;cay osay Iay ishway otay aketay ethay ensesay ofay ethay eetingmay onay isthay importantay
ubject,"say aidsay O,jay allingcay aay amilyfay ouncilcay.

On't"Day oilspay youray ook,bay ymay irl,gay orfay erethay isay oremay inay itay anthay youay ow,knay
danay ethay ideaay isay ellway orkedway outay. Etlay itay aitway danay ipen,"ray asway erhay
ather'sfay ice;advay danay ehay actisedpray saay ehay eached,pray avinghay aitedway
atientlypay irtythay yearsay orfay uitfray ofay ishay ownay otay ipen,ray danay eingbay inay onay
astehay otay athergay it,ay evenay ow,nay enwhay itay asway eetsway danay ellowmay.

It"ay eemssay otay emay atthay Ojay illway ofitpray oremay ybay akingmay ethay ialtray anthay ybay
aiting,"way aidsay Smray. Archmay. Iticism"Cray isay ethay estbay esttay ofay uchsay ork,way orfay
itay illway owshay erhay othbay unsuspecteday eritsmay danay aults,fay danay elphay erhay otay oday
etterbay extnay imetay. Eway earay ootay artial;pay utbay ethay aisepray danay ameblay ofay
outsidersay illway ovepray useful,ay evenay ifay eshay etsgay utbay ittlelay oney."may

Yes,""ay aidsay O,jay ittingknay erhay ows,bray At's"thay ustjay it;ay I'veay eenbay ussingfay
overay ethay ingthay osay ong,lay Iay eallyray on'tday owknay etherwhay it'say ood,gay ad,bay oray
indifferentay. Itay illway ebay aay eatgray elphay otay avehay ool,cay impartialay ersonspay
aketay aay ooklay taay it,ay danay elltay emay atwhay eythay inkthay ofay it."ay

I"ay ouldn'tway eavelay outay aay ordway ofay it;ay you'llay oilspay itay ifay youay o,day orfay ethay
interestay ofay ethay orystay isay oremay inay ethay indsmay anthay inay ethay ionsactay ofay ethay
eople,pay danay itay illway ebay lalay aay uddlemay ifay youay on'tday explainay saay youay ogay on,"ay
aidsay Eg,may owhay irmlyfay elievedbay atthay isthay ookbay asway ethay ostmay emarkableray
ovelnay everay ittenwray.

Ut"Bay Rmay. Enallay ays,say Eave'Lay outay ethay explanations,ay akemay itay iefbray danay
amatic,dray danay etlay ethay aracterschay elltay ethay ory,'"stay interrupteday O,jay
urningtay otay ethay ublisher'spay otenay.

O"Day saay ehay ellstay you;ay ehay owsknay atwhay illway ell,say danay eway on'tday. Akemay aay ood,gay
opularpay ook,bay danay etgay saay uchmay oneymay saay youay ancay. Ybay danay y,bay en,whay you'veay
otgay aay ame,nay youay ancay ordaffay otay igress,day danay avehay ilosophicalphay danay
etaphysicalmay eoplepay inay youray ovels,"nay aidsay Y,amay owhay ooktay aay ictlystray
acticalpray iewvay ofay ethay ubjectsay.

Ell,""Way aidsay O,jay aughing,lay If"ay ymay eoplepay Are__ay Ilosophical'phay danay
etaphysical,'may itay isn'tay ymay ault,fay orfay Iay owknay othingnay outabay uchsay ings,thay
exceptay atwhay Iay earhay atherfay ay,say ometimessay. Ifay I'veay otgay omesay ofay ishay iseway
ideasay umbledjay upay ithway ymay omance,ray osay uchmay ethay etterbay orfay emay. Ow,nay Eth,bay
atwhay oday youay ay?"say

I"ay ouldshay osay ikelay otay eesay itay intedpray Oon_,"_say asway lalay Ethbay aid,say danay
iledsmay inay ayingsay it;ay utbay erethay asway naay unconsciousay emphasisay onay ethay astlay
ord,way danay aay istfulway ooklay inay ethay eyesay atthay evernay ostlay eirthay ildlikechay
andor,cay ichwhay illedchay O'sjay eart,hay orfay aay inute,may ithway aay orebodingfay ear,fay
danay ecidedday erhay otay akemay erhay ittlelay enturevay Oon.""say

O,say ithway Artanspay irmness,fay ethay youngay uthoressaay aidlay erhay irst-bornfay onay
erhay able,tay danay oppedchay itay upay saay uthlesslyray saay yanay ogreay. Inay ethay opehay ofay
easingplay everyay one,ay eshay ooktay everyay one'say ice;advay ,anday ikelay ethay olday anmay
danay ishay onkeyday inay ethay able,fay uitedsay obodynay.

Erhay atherfay ikedlay ethay etaphysicalmay eakstray ichwhay adhay unconsciouslyay otgay
intoay it;ay osay atthay asway owedallay otay emain,ray oughthay eshay adhay erhay oubtsday outabay
itay. Erhay othermay oughtthay atthay erethay As__way aay ifletray ootay uchmay escription;day
out,ay erefore,thay itay earlynay lalay ame,cay danay ithway itay anymay ecessarynay inkslay inay
ethay orystay. Egmay iredadmay ethay agedy;tray osay Ojay iledpay upay ethay onyagay otay uitsay
er,hay ilewhay Yamay objecteday otay ethay un,fay ,anday ithway ethay estbay intentionsay inay
ife,lay Ojay uenchedqay ethay ightlyspray enesscay ichwhay elievedray ethay ombresay
aracterchay ofay ethay orystay. En,thay otay ompletecay ethay uin,ray eshay utcay itay ownday oneay
ird,thay danay onfidinglycay entsay ethay oorpay ittlelay omance,ray ikelay aay ickedpay
obin,ray outay intoay ethay ig,bay usybay orld,way otay ytray itsay atefay.

Ell,way itay asway inted,pray danay eshay otgay eethray undredhay ollarsday orfay it;ay ikewiselay
entyplay ofay aisepray danay ame,blay othbay osay uchmay eatergray anthay eshay expecteday atthay
eshay asway ownthray intoay aay atestay ofay ewilderment,bay omfray ichwhay itay ooktay erhay omesay
imetay otay ecoverray.

You"ay aid,say other,may atthay iticismcray ouldway elphay e;may utbay owhay ancay it,ay enwhay
it'say osay ontradictorycay atthay Iay on'tday owknay etherwhay I'veay ittenwray aay omisingpray
ookbay oray okenbray lalay ethay entay ommandments?"cay iedcray oorpay O,jay urningtay overay aay
eaphay ofay otices,nay ethay erusalpay ofay ichwhay illedfay erhay ithway idepray danay oyjay oneay
inute,may athwray danay ireday ismayday ethay extnay. Is"Thay anmay ayssay An'ay exquisiteay
ook,bay ullfay ofay uth,tray eauty,bay danay earnestness;ay lalay isay eet,sway ure,pay danay
ealthy,'"hay ontinuedcay ethay erplexedpay uthoressaay. E"Thay ext,nay E'Thay eorythay ofay
ethay ookbay isay ad,bay ullfay ofay orbidmay ancies,fay iritualisticspay ideas,ay danay
unnaturalay aracters.'chay Ow,nay saay Iay adhay onay eorythay ofay yanay ind,kay on'tday
elievebay inay Iritualism,spay danay opiedcay ymay aracterschay omfray ife,lay Iay on'tday eesay
owhay isthay iticcray An__cay ebay ightray. Otheranay ays,say It's'ay oneay ofay ethay estbay
Ericanamay ovelsnay ichwhay ashay earedappay orfay years'ay I(ay owknay etterbay anthay at);thay
danay ethay extnay ertsassay atthay Ough'thay itay isay original,ay danay ittenwray ithway eatgray
orcefay danay eeling,fay itay isay aay angerousday ook.'bay Isn't!'Tay Omesay akemay unfay ofay
it,ay omesay over-praise,ay danay earlynay lalay insistay atthay Iay adhay aay eepday eorythay otay
expound,ay enwhay Iay onlyay otewray itay orfay ethay easureplay danay ethay oneymay. Iay ishway I'day
intedpray itay olewhay oray otnay taay ,allay orfay Iay oday atehay otay ebay osay isjudged."may

Erhay amilyfay danay iendsfray inisteredadmay omfortcay danay ommendationcay iberally;lay
yetay itay asway aay ardhay imetay orfay ensitive,say igh-spiritedhay O,jay owhay eantmay osay
ell,way danay adhay arentlyappay oneday osay illay. Utbay itay idday erhay ood,gay orfay osethay
osewhay opinionay adhay ealray aluevay avegay erhay ethay iticismcray ichwhay isay naay uthor'saay
estbay education;ay danay enwhay ethay irstfay orenesssay asway over,ay eshay ouldcay aughlay taay

IIIxXVay.

OMESTICday EXPERIENCESay.


Ikelay ostmay otheray youngay atrons,may Egmay eganbay erhay arriedmay ifelay ithway ethay
eterminationday otay ebay aay odelmay ousekeeperhay. Ohnjay ouldshay indfay omehay aay
aradise;pay ehay ouldshay aysalway eesay aay ilingsmay ace,fay ouldshay arefay umptuouslysay
everyay ay,day danay evernay owknay ethay osslay ofay aay uttonbay. Eshay oughtbray osay uchmay
ove,lay energy,ay danay eerfulnesschay otay ethay orkway atthay eshay ouldcay otnay utbay
ucceed,say inay itespay ofay omesay obstaclesay. Erhay aradisepay asway otnay aay anquiltray
one;ay orfay ethay ittlelay omanway ussed,fay asway over-anxiousay otay ease,play danay
ustledbay outabay ikelay aay uetray Artha,may umberedcay ithway anymay arescay. Eshay asway ootay
ired,tay ometimes,say evenay otay ile;smay Ohnjay ewgray yspepticday eraftay aay oursecay ofay
aintyday ishes,day danay ungratefullyay emandedday ainplay arefay. Saay orfay uttons,bay eshay
oonsay earnedlay otay onderway erewhay eythay ent,way otay akeshay erhay eadhay overay ethay
arelessnesscay ofay en,may danay otay eatenthray otay akemay imhay ewsay emthay onay imself,hay
danay enthay eesay ifay Is__hay orkway ouldway andstay impatientay ugstay danay umsyclay ingersfay
yanay etterbay anthay ershay.

Eythay ereway eryvay appy,hay evenay eraftay eythay iscoveredday atthay eythay ouldn'tcay ivelay
onay ovelay onealay. Ohnjay idday otnay indfay Eg'smay eautybay iminished,day oughthay eshay
eamedbay taay imhay omfray ehindbay ethay amiliarfay offee-pot;cay ornay idday Egmay issmay yanay
ofay ethay omanceray omfray ethay ailyday arting,pay enwhay erhay usbandhay ollowedfay upay ishay
isskay ithway ethay endertay inquiry,ay All"Shay Iay endsay omehay ealvay oray uttonmay orfay
inner,day arling?"day Ethay ittlelay ousehay easedcay otay ebay aay orifiedglay ower,bay utbay
itay ecamebay aay ome,hay danay ethay youngay ouplecay oonsay eltfay atthay itay asway aay angechay
orfay ethay etterbay. Taay irstfay eythay ayedplay eep-house,kay danay olickedfray overay itay
ikelay ildren;chay enthay Ohnjay ooktay eadilystay otay usiness,bay eelingfay ethay arescay ofay
ethay eadhay ofay aay amilyfay uponay ishay oulders;shay danay Egmay aidlay ybay erhay ambriccay
appers,wray utpay onay aay igbay on,apray danay ellfay otay ork,way saay eforebay aid,say ithway
oremay energyay anthay iscretionday.

Ilewhay ethay ookingcay aniamay astedlay eshay entway oughthray Smray. Ornelius'scay Eceiptray
Ookbay saay ifay itay ereway aay athematicalmay exercise,ay orkingway outay ethay oblemspray
ithway atiencepay danay arecay. Ometimessay erhay amilyfay ereway inviteday inay otay elphay eatay
upay aay ootay ounteousbay eastfay ofay uccesses,say oray Ottylay ouldway ebay ivatelypray
espatchedday ithway aay atchbay ofay ailures,fay ichwhay ereway otay ebay oncealedcay omfray lalay
eyesay inay ethay onvenientcay omachsstay ofay ethay ittlelay Ummelshay. Naay eveningay ithway
Ohnjay overay ethay ount-booksaccay usuallyay oducedpray aay emporarytay ulllay inay ethay
ulinarycay enthusiasm,ay danay aay ugalfray itfay ouldway ensue,ay uringday ichwhay ethay oorpay
anmay asway utpay oughthray aay oursecay ofay ead-pudding,bray ash,hay danay armed-overway
offee,cay ichwhay iedtray ishay oul,say oughalthay ehay orebay itay ithway aiseworthypray
ortitudefay. Eforebay ethay oldengay eanmay asway ound,fay owever,hay Egmay edadday otay erhay
omesticday ossessionspay atwhay youngay ouplescay eldomsay etgay onay onglay ithout,--away
amilyfay arjay.

Iredfay ithway aay ousewifelyhay ishway otay eesay erhay ore-roomstay ockedstay ithway
ome-madehay eserves,pray eshay undertookay otay utpay upay erhay ownay urrantcay ellyjay. Ohnjay
asway equestedray otay orderay omehay aay ozenday oray osay ofay ittlelay ots,pay danay naay extraay
uantityqay ofay ugar,say orfay eirthay ownay urrantscay ereway ipe,ray danay ereway otay ebay
endedattay otay taay onceay. Saay Ohnjay irmlyfay elievedbay atthay Y"may ife"way asway equalay otay
ything,anay danay ooktay aay aturalnay idepray inay erhay ill,skay ehay esolvedray atthay eshay
ouldshay ebay atified,gray danay eirthay onlyay opcray ofay uitfray aidlay ybay inay aay ostmay
easingplay ormfay orfay interway useay. Omehay amecay ourfay ozenday elightfulday ittlelay
ots,pay alfhay aay arrelbay ofay ugar,say danay aay allsmay oybay otay ickpay ethay urrantscay orfay
erhay. Ithway erhay ettypray airhay uckedtay intoay aay ittlelay ap,cay sarmay aredbay otay ethay
elbow,ay danay aay eckedchay onapray ichwhay adhay aay oquettishcay ooklay inay itespay ofay ethay
ib,bay ethay youngay ousewifehay ellfay otay ork,way eelingfay onay oubtsday outabay erhay
uccess;say orfay adn'thay eshay eensay Annahhay oday itay undredshay ofay imes?tay Ethay ayarray
ofay otspay atherray azedamay erhay taay irst,fay utbay Ohnjay asway osay ondfay ofay elly,jay danay
ethay icenay ittlelay arsjay ouldway ooklay osay ellway onay ethay optay elf,shay atthay Egmay
esolvedray otay illfay emthay ,allay danay entspay aay onglay ayday icking,pay oiling,bay
aining,stray danay ussingfay overay erhay ellyjay. Eshay idday erhay est;bay eshay edaskay
iceadvay ofay Smray. Ornelius;cay eshay ackedray erhay ainbray otay ememberray atwhay Annahhay
idday atthay eshay adhay eftlay undone;ay eshay eboiled,ray esugared,ray danay estrained,ray
utbay atthay eadfuldray uffstay ouldn'tway Ell_.""_jay

Eshay ongedlay otay unray ome,hay ibbay danay ,allay danay kasay othermay otay endlay aay and,hay utbay
Ohnjay danay eshay adhay eedagray atthay eythay ouldway evernay oyannay yanay oneay ithway eirthay
ivatepray orries,way experiments,ay oray uarrelsqay. Eythay adhay aughedlay overay atthay
astlay ordway saay ifay ethay ideaay itay uggestedsay asway aay ostmay eposterouspray one;ay utbay
eythay adhay eldhay otay eirthay esolve,ray danay eneverwhay eythay ouldcay etgay onay ithoutway
elphay eythay idday o,say danay onay oneay interfered,ay orfay Smray. Archmay adhay isedadvay ethay
anplay. Osay Egmay estledwray onealay ithway ethay efractoryray eetmeatssway lalay atthay othay
ummersay ay,day danay taay ivefay o'clockay atsay ownday inay erhay opsy-turvytay itchen,kay
ungwray erhay edaubedbay ands,hay iftedlay upay erhay oicevay danay eptway.

Ow,nay inay ethay irstfay ushflay ofay ethay ewnay ife,lay eshay adhay oftenay aid,--say

Y"May usbandhay allshay aysalway eelfay eefray otay ingbray aay iendfray omehay eneverwhay ehay
ikeslay. Iay allshay aysalway ebay epared;pray erethay allshay ebay onay urry,flay onay
olding,scay onay iscomfort,day utbay aay eatnay ouse,hay aay eerfulchay ife,way danay aay oodgay
innerday. Ohn,jay ear,day evernay opstay otay kasay ymay eave,lay inviteay omwhay youay ease,play
danay ebay uresay ofay aay elcomeway omfray e."may

Owhay armingchay atthay as,way otay ebay ure!say Ohnjay uiteqay owedglay ithway idepray otay earhay
erhay aysay it,ay danay eltfay atwhay aay essedblay ingthay itay asway otay avehay aay uperiorsay
ifeway. Ut,bay oughalthay eythay adhay adhay ompanycay omfray imetay otay ime,tay itay evernay
appenedhay otay ebay unexpected,ay danay Egmay adhay evernay adhay naay opportunityay otay
istinguishday erselfhay illtay ownay. Itay aysalway appenshay osay inay isthay alevay ofay
ears;tay erethay isay naay inevitabilityay outabay uchsay ingsthay ichwhay eway ancay onlyay
onderway ,atay eplore,day danay earbay saay eway estbay ancay.

Ifay Ohnjay adhay otnay orgottenfay lalay outabay ethay elly,jay itay eallyray ouldway avehay eenbay
unpardonableay inay imhay otay oosechay atthay ay,day ofay lalay ethay aysday inay ethay year,ay otay
ingbray aay iendfray omehay otay innerday unexpectedlyay. Ongratulatingcay imselfhay atthay
aay andsomehay epastray adhay eenbay ordereday atthay orning,may eelingfay uresay atthay itay
ouldway ebay eadyray otay ethay inute,may danay indulgingay inay easantplay icipationsantay ofay
ethay armingchay effectay itay ouldway oduce,pray enwhay ishay ettypray ifeway amecay unningray
outay otay eetmay im,hay ehay escorteday ishay iendfray otay ishay ansion,may ithway ethay
irrepressibleay atisfactionsay ofay aay youngay osthay danay usbandhay.

Itay isay aay orldway ofay isappointments,day saay Ohnjay iscoveredday enwhay ehay eachedray ethay
Ove-coteday. Ethay ontfray oorday usuallyay oodstay ospitablyhay open;ay ownay itay asway otnay
onlyay ut,shay utbay ocked,lay danay yesterday'say udmay illstay ornedaday ethay epsstay. Ethay
arlor-windowspay ereway osedclay danay urtained,cay onay icturepay ofay ethay ettypray ifeway
ewingsay onay ethay iazza,pay inay ite,whay ithway aay istractingday ittlelay owbay inay erhay
air,hay oray aay ight-eyedbray ostess,hay ilingsmay aay yshay elcomeway saay eshay eetedgray erhay
uestgay. Othingnay ofay ethay ort,say orfay otnay aay oulsay eared,appay utbay aay
anguinary-lookingsay oybay eepaslay underay ethay urrant-bushescay.

I'm"ay aidafray omethingsay ashay appenedhay. Epstay intoay ethay arden,gay Ott,scay ilewhay Iay
ooklay upay Smray. Ooke,"bray aidsay Ohn,jay armedalay taay ethay ilencesay danay olitudesay.

Oundray ethay ousehay ehay urried,hay edlay ybay aay ungentpay ellsmay ofay urntbay ugar,say danay
Rmay. Ottscay olledstray eraftay im,hay ithway aay ueerqay ooklay onay ishay acefay. Ehay ausedpay
iscreetlyday taay aay istanceday enwhay Ookebray isappeared;day utbay ehay ouldcay othbay eesay
danay ear,hay ,anday eingbay aay achelor,bay enjoyeday ethay ospectpray ightilymay.

Inay ethay itchenkay eignedray onfusioncay danay espair;day oneay editionay ofay ellyjay asway
ickledtray omfray otpay otay ot,pay otheranay aylay uponay ethay oor,flay danay aay irdthay asway
urningbay aylygay onay ethay ovestay. Otty,lay ithway Eutonictay egm,phlay asway almlycay
eatingay eadbray danay urrantcay ine,way orfay ethay ellyjay asway illstay inay aay opelesslyhay
iquidlay ate,stay ilewhay Smray. Ooke,bray ithway erhay onapray overay erhay ead,hay atsay
obbingsay ismallyday.

Y"May earestday irl,gay atwhay isay ethay atter?"may iedcray Ohn,jay ushingray in,ay ithway
ulawfay isionsvay ofay aldedscay ands,hay uddensay ewsnay ofay iction,afflay danay ecretsay
onsternationcay taay ethay oughtthay ofay ethay uestgay inay ethay ardengay.

O"ay Ohn,jay Iay Am__ay osay iredtay danay othay danay osscray danay orried!way I'veay eenbay taay itay
illtay I'may lalay ornway outay. Oday omecay danay elphay emay oray Iay All__shay ie!"day danay ethay

elcomeway inay everyay ensesay ofay ethay ord,way orfay erhay inaforepay adhay eenbay aptizedbay
taay ethay amesay imetay saay ethay oorflay.

iousanxay Ohn,jay enderlytay issingkay ethay owncray ofay ethay ittlelay ap,cay ichwhay asway
lalay ewaskay.

Yes,""ay obbedsay Egmay espairinglyday.

Ell"Tay emay uick,qay enthay. On'tday y,cray Iay ancay earbay ythinganay etterbay anthay atthay.

E--the"Thay ellyjay on'tway elljay danay Iay on'tday owknay atwhay otay o!"day

Ohnjay Ookebray aughedlay enthay saay ehay evernay aredday otay aughlay erward;aftay danay ethay

Is"ay atthay ?allay Ingflay itay outay ofay indow,way danay on'tday otherbay yanay oremay outabay
itay. I'llay uybay youay uartsqay ifay youay antway it;ay utbay orfay eaven'shay akesay on'tday avehay
ysterics,hay orfay I'veay oughtbray Ackjay Ottscay omehay otay inner,day "and--ay

Ohnjay otgay onay urther,fay orfay Egmay astcay imhay off,ay danay aspedclay erhay andshay ithway aay

A"ay anmay otay inner,day danay everythingay inay aay ess!may Ohnjay Ooke,bray owhay Ould__cay youay

You"ay oughtay otay avehay entsay ord,way oray oldtay emay isthay orning,may danay youay oughtay otay
avehay ememberedray owhay usybay Iay as,"way ontinuedcay Egmay etulantly;pay orfay evenay

I"ay idn'tday owknay itay isthay orning,may danay erethay asway onay imetay otay endsay ord,way orfay
Iay etmay imhay onay ethay ayway outay. Iay evernay oughtthay ofay ingaskay eave,lay enwhay youay avehay

Iay everay oday ain!"agay edadday Ohn,jay ithway naay ievedaggray iraay.

I"ay ouldshay opehay ot!nay Aketay imhay ayaway taay once;ay Iay an'tcay eesay im,hay danay erethay
isn'tay yanay inner."day

Ell,"Way Iay ikelay at!thay Ere'swhay ethay eefbay danay egetablesvay Iay entsay ome,hay danay ethay
uddingpay youay omised?"pray iedcray Ohn,jay ushingray otay ethay arderlay.

I"ay adn'thay imetay otay ookcay ything;anay Iay eantmay otay ineday taay other'smay. I'may orry,say
utbay Iay asway O__say usy;"bay danay Eg'smay earstay eganbay ainagay.

Ohnjay asway aay ildmay an,may utbay ehay asway uman;hay danay eraftay aay onglay ay'sday ork,way otay
omecay omehay ired,tay ungry,hay danay opeful,hay otay indfay aay aoticchay ouse,hay naay emptyay
able,tay danay aay osscray ifeway asway otnay exactlyay onducivecay otay eposeray ofay indmay oray
annermay. Ehay estrainedray imself,hay owever,hay danay ethay ittlelay uallsqay ouldway avehay
ownblay over,ay utbay orfay oneay unluckyay ordway.

It's"ay aay ape,scray Iay owledge;acknay utbay ifay youay illway endlay aay and,hay e'llway ullpay
ough,thray danay avehay aay oodgay imetay yetay. On'tday y,cray ear,day utbay ustjay exertay
yourselfay aay it,bay danay ockknay usay upay omethingsay otay eatay. E'reway othbay saay ungryhay
saay unters,hay osay eway a'n'tshay indmay atwhay itay isay. Ivegay usay ethay oldcay eat,may danay
eadbray danay eese;chay eway on'tway kasay orfay elly."jay

Ehay eantmay itay orfay aay ood-naturedgay oke;jay utbay atthay oneay ordway ealedsay ishay atefay.
Egmay oughtthay itay asway Oo__tay uelcray otay inthay outabay erhay adsay ailure,fay danay ethay
astlay omatay ofay atiencepay anishedvay saay ehay okespay.

You"ay ustmay etgay yourselfay outay ofay ethay apescray saay youay an;cay I'may ootay useday upay otay
Exert''ay yselfmay orfay yanay oneay. It'say ikelay aay anmay otay oposepray aay onebay danay ulgarvay
eadbray danay eesechay orfay ompanycay. Iay on'tway avehay ythinganay ofay ethay ortsay inay ymay
ousehay. Aketay atthay Ottscay upay otay other's,may danay elltay imhay I'may ay,away ick,say
ead,--anythingday. Iay on'tway eesay im,hay danay youay otway ancay aughlay taay emay danay ymay
ellyjay saay uchmay saay youay ike:lay youay on'tway avehay ythinganay elseay ere;"hay danay
avinghay eliveredday erhay efianceday lalay inay oneay eath,bray Egmay astcay ayaway erhay
inafore,pay danay ecipitatelypray eftlay ethay ieldfay otay emoanbay erselfhay inay erhay ownay
oomray.

Atwhay osethay otway eaturescray idday inay erhay ence,absay eshay evernay ew;knay utbay Rmay.
Ottscay asway otnay akentay Up"ay otay other's,"may danay enwhay Egmay escended,day eraftay eythay
adhay olledstray ayaway ogether,tay eshay oundfay acestray ofay aay omiscuouspray unchlay
ichwhay illedfay erhay ithway orrorhay. Ottylay eportedray atthay eythay adhay eatenay A"ay
uch,may danay eatlygray aughed,lay danay ethay astermay idbay erhay owthray ayaway lalay ethay
eetsway uff,stay danay idehay ethay ots."pay

Egmay ongedlay otay ogay danay elltay other;may utbay aay ensesay ofay ameshay taay erhay ownay
ort-comings,shay ofay oyaltylay otay Ohn,jay O"whay ightmay ebay uel,cray utbay obodynay
ouldshay owknay it,"ay estrainedray er;hay danay eraftay aay ummarysay earingclay up,ay eshay
esseddray erselfhay ettily,pray danay atsay ownday otay aitway orfay Ohnjay otay omecay danay ebay
orgivenfay.

Unfortunately,ay Ohnjay idn'tday ome,cay otnay eeingsay ethay attermay inay atthay ightlay. Ehay
adhay arriedcay itay offay saay aay oodgay okejay ithway Ott,scay excuseday ishay ittlelay ifeway saay
ellway saay ehay ould,cay danay ayedplay ethay osthay osay ospitablyhay atthay ishay iendfray
enjoyeday ethay impromptuay inner,day danay omisedpray otay omecay ainagay. Utbay Ohnjay asway
y,angray oughthay ehay idday otnay owshay it;ay ehay eltfay atthay Egmay adhay otgay imhay intoay aay
ape,scray danay enthay esertedday imhay inay ishay ourhay ofay eednay. It"ay asn'tway airfay otay
elltay aay anmay otay ingbray olksfay omehay yanay ime,tay ithway erfectpay eedom,fray danay enwhay
ehay ooktay youay taay youray ord,way otay ameflay upay danay ameblay im,hay danay eavelay imhay inay
ethay urch,lay otay ebay aughedlay taay oray itiedpay. O,nay ybay Eorge,gay itay asn't!way danay Egmay
ustmay owknay it."ay Ehay adhay umedfay inwardlyay uringday ethay east,fay utbay enwhay ethay
urryflay asway over,ay danay ehay olledstray ome,hay eraftay eeingsay Ottscay off,ay aay ildermay
oodmay amecay overay imhay. Oor"Pay ittlelay ing!thay itay asway ardhay uponay erhay enwhay eshay
iedtray osay eartilyhay otay easeplay emay. Eshay asway ong,wray ofay ourse,cay utbay enthay eshay
asway youngay. Iay ustmay ebay atientpay danay eachtay er."hay Ehay opedhay eshay adhay otnay onegay
ome--hehay atedhay ossipgay danay interferenceay. Orfay aay inutemay ehay asway uffledray
ainagay taay ethay eremay oughtthay ofay it;ay danay enthay ethay earfay atthay Egmay ouldway ycray
erselfhay icksay oftenedsay ishay eart,hay danay entsay imhay onay taay aay uickerqay ace,pay
esolvingray otay ebay almcay danay ind,kay utbay irm,fay uiteqay irm,fay danay owshay erhay erewhay
eshay adhay ailedfay inay erhay utyday otay erhay ousespay.

Egmay ikewiselay esolvedray otay ebay Alm"cay danay ind,kay utbay irm,"fay danay owshay Im__hay
ishay utyday. Eshay ongedlay otay unray otay eetmay im,hay danay egbay ardon,pay danay ebay issedkay
danay omforted,cay saay eshay asway uresay ofay eing;bay ut,bay ofay ourse,cay eshay idday othingnay
ofay ethay ort,say danay enwhay eshay awsay Ohnjay oming,cay eganbay otay umhay uiteqay aturally,nay
saay eshay ockedray danay ewed,say ikelay aay adylay ofay eisurelay inay erhay estbay arlorpay.

Ohnjay asway aay ittlelay isappointedday otnay otay indfay aay endertay Iobe;nay ut,bay eelingfay
atthay ishay ignityday emandedday ethay irstfay ology,apay ehay ademay one,nay onlyay amecay
eisurelylay in,ay danay aidlay imselfhay uponay ethay ofa,say ithway ethay ingularlysay
elevantray emark,--ray

E"Way earay oinggay otay avehay aay ewnay oon,may ymay ear."day

I've"ay onay objection,"ay asway Eg'smay equallyay oothingsay emarkray.

Aay ewfay otheray opicstay ofay eneralgay interestay ereway introduceday ybay Rmay. Ooke,bray
danay et-blanketedway ybay Smray. Ooke,bray danay onversationcay anguishedlay. Ohnjay entway
otay oneay indow,way unfoldeday ishay aper,pay danay appedwray imselfhay inay it,ay
igurativelyfay eakingspay. Egmay entway otay ethay otheray indow,way danay ewedsay saay ifay ewnay
osettesray orfay erhay ippersslay ereway ongamay ethay ecessariesnay ofay ifelay. Eithernay
oke;spay othbay ookedlay uiteqay Alm"cay danay irm,"fay danay othbay eltfay esperatelyday
uncomfortableay.

Oh"ay ear,"day oughtthay Eg,may Arried"may ifelay isay eryvay ying,tray danay oesday eednay
infiniteay atience,pay saay ellway saay ove,lay saay othermay ays."say Ethay ordway Other""may
uggestedsay otheray aternalmay ounsels,cay ivengay onglay o,agay danay eceivedray ithway
unbelievingay otestspray.

Ohn"Jay isay aay oodgay an,may utbay ehay ashay ishay aults,fay danay youay ustmay earnlay otay eesay
danay earbay ithway em,thay ememberingray youray ownay. Ehay isay eryvay ecided,day utbay evernay
illway ebay obstinate,ay ifay youay easonray indly,kay otnay opposeay impatientlyay. Ehay isay
eryvay urate,accay danay articularpay outabay ethay uth--atray oodgay ait,tray oughthay youay
allcay imhay Ussy.''fay Evernay eceiveday imhay ybay ooklay oray ord,way Eg,may danay ehay illway
ivegay youay ethay onfidencecay youay eserve,day ethay upportsay youay eednay. Ehay ashay aay
emper,tay otnay ikelay ours,--oneay ash,flay danay enthay lalay over,--butay ethay ite,whay
illstay er,angay atthay isay eldomsay irred,stay utbay onceay indled,kay isay ardhay otay
uenchqay. Ebay areful,cay eryvay areful,cay otnay otay akeway isthay erangay ainstagay
yourself,ay orfay eacepay danay appinesshay ependday onay eepingkay ishay espectray. Atchway
yourself,ay ebay ethay irstfay otay kasay ardonpay ifay youay othbay err,ay danay uardgay ainstagay
ethay ittlelay iques,pay isunderstandings,may danay astyhay ordsway atthay oftenay avepay
ethay ayway orfay itterbay orrowsay danay egret."ray

Esethay ordsway amecay ackbay otay Eg,may saay eshay atsay ewingsay inay ethay unset,say
especiallyay ethay astlay. Isthay asway ethay irstfay erioussay isagreement;day erhay ownay
astyhay eechesspay oundedsay othbay illysay danay unkind,ay saay eshay ecalledray em,thay erhay
ownay erangay ookedlay ildishchay ow,nay danay oughtsthay ofay oorpay Ohnjay omingcay omehay otay
uchsay aay enescay uiteqay eltedmay erhay earthay. Eshay ancedglay taay imhay ithway earstay inay
erhay eyes,ay utbay ehay idday otnay eesay em;thay eshay utpay ownday erhay orkway danay otgay up,ay
inking,thay I"ay Ill__way ebay ethay irstfay otay ay,say Orgive'Fay e,'"may utbay ehay idday otnay
eemsay otay earhay er;hay eshay entway eryvay owlyslay ossacray ethay oom,ray orfay idepray asway
ardhay otay allow,sway danay oodstay ybay im,hay utbay ehay idday otnay urntay ishay eadhay. Orfay aay
inutemay eshay eltfay saay ifay eshay eallyray ouldn'tcay oday it;ay enthay amecay ethay ought,thay
Is"Thay isay ethay eginning,bay I'llay oday ymay art,pay danay avehay othingnay otay eproachray
yselfmay ith,"way danay oopingstay own,day eshay oftlysay issedkay erhay usbandhay onay ethay
oreheadfay. Ofay oursecay atthay ettledsay it;ay ethay enitentpay isskay asway etterbay anthay aay
orldway ofay ords,way danay Ohnjay adhay erhay onay ishay eeknay inay aay inute,may ayingsay
enderly,--tay

It"ay asway ootay adbay otay aughlay taay ethay oorpay ittlelay elly-potsjay. Orgivefay e,may
ear,day Iay evernay illway ain!"agay

Utbay ehay id,day ohay essblay you,ay yes,ay undredshay ofay imes,tay danay osay idday Eg,may othbay
eclaringday atthay itay asway ethay eetestsway ellyjay eythay everay ade;may orfay amilyfay
eacepay asway eservedpray inay atthay ittlelay amilyfay arjay.

Eraftay is,thay Egmay adhay Rmay. Ottscay otay innerday ybay ecialspay invitation,ay danay
ervedsay imhay upay aay easantplay eastfay ithoutway aay ookedcay ifeway orfay ethay irstfay
ourse;cay onay ichwhay occasionay eshay asway osay aygay danay acious,gray danay ademay
everythingay ogay offay osay armingly,chay atthay Rmay. Ottscay oldtay Ohnjay ehay asway aay appyhay
ellow,fay danay ookshay ishay eadhay overay ethay ardshipshay ofay achelorhoodbay lalay ethay
ayway omehay.

Inay ethay utumn,aay ewnay ialstray danay experiencesay amecay otay Egmay. Alliesay Offatmay
enewedray erhay iendship,fray asway aysalway unningray outay orfay aay ishday ofay ossipgay taay
ethay ittlelay ouse,hay oray invitingay At"thay oorpay ear"day otay omecay inay danay endspay ethay
ayday taay ethay igbay ousehay. Itay asway easant,play orfay inay ullday eatherway Egmay oftenay
eltfay onely;lay lalay ereway usybay taay ome,hay Ohnjay entabsay illtay ight,nay danay othingnay
otay oday utbay ew,say oray ead,ray oray otterpay outabay. Osay itay aturallynay ellfay outay atthay
Egmay otgay intoay ethay ayway ofay addinggay danay ossipinggay ithway erhay iendfray. Eeingsay
Allie'ssay ettypray ingsthay ademay erhay onglay orfay uch,say danay itypay erselfhay ecausebay
eshay adhay otnay otgay emthay. Alliesay asway eryvay ind,kay danay oftenay offereday erhay ethay
ovetedcay ifles;tray utbay Egmay eclinedday em,thay owingknay atthay Ohnjay ouldn'tway ikelay
it;ay danay enthay isthay oolishfay ittlelay omanway entway danay idday atwhay Ohnjay islikedday
infinitelyay orseway.

Eshay ewknay erhay usband'shay income,ay danay eshay ovedlay otay eelfay atthay ehay ustedtray
er,hay otnay onlyay ithway ishay appiness,hay utbay atwhay omesay enmay eemsay otay aluevay
ore,--hismay oneymay. Eshay ewknay erewhay itay as,way asway eefray otay aketay atwhay eshay
iked,lay danay lalay ehay edaskay asway atthay eshay ouldshay eepkay ountaccay ofay everyay enny,pay
aypay illsbay onceay aay onth,may danay ememberray atthay eshay asway aay oorpay an'smay ifeway.
Illtay ow,nay eshay adhay oneday ell,way eenbay udentpray danay exact,ay eptkay erhay ittlelay
ount-booksaccay eatly,nay danay owedshay emthay otay imhay onthlymay ithoutway earfay. Utbay
atthay utumnaay ethay erpentsay otgay intoay Eg'smay aradise,pay danay emptedtay er,hay ikelay
anymay aay odernmay Eve,ay otnay ithway es,applay utbay ithway essdray. Egmay idn'tday ikelay otay
ebay itiedpay danay ademay otay eelfay oor;pay itay irritateday er,hay utbay eshay asway amedashay
otay onfesscay it,ay danay ownay danay enthay eshay iedtray otay onsolecay erselfhay ybay uyingbay
omethingsay etty,pray osay atthay Alliesay eedn'tnay inkthay eshay adhay otay economizeay. Eshay
aysalway eltfay ickedway eraftay it,ay orfay ethay ettypray ingsthay ereway eldomsay
ecessaries;nay utbay enthay eythay ostcay osay ittle,lay itay asn'tway orthway orryingway
out;abay osay ethay iflestray increaseday unconsciously,ay danay inay ethay oppingshay
excursionsay eshay asway onay ongerlay aay assivepay ooker-onlay.

Utbay ethay iflestray ostcay oremay anthay oneay ouldway imagine;ay danay enwhay eshay astcay upay
erhay ountsaccay taay ethay enday ofay ethay onth,may ethay umsay otaltay atherray aredscay erhay.
Ohnjay asway usybay atthay onth,may danay eftlay ethay illsbay otay er;hay ethay extnay onthmay ehay
asway ent;absay utbay ethay irdthay ehay adhay aay andgray uarterlyqay ettlingsay up,ay danay Egmay
evernay orgotfay itay. Aay ewfay aysday eforebay eshay adhay oneday aay eadfuldray ing,thay danay itay
eighedway uponay erhay onsciencecay. Alliesay adhay eenbay uyingbay ilks,say danay Egmay
ongedlay orfay aay ewnay one,--justay aay andsomehay ightlay oneay orfay arties,pay erhay ackblay
ilksay asway osay ommon,cay danay inthay ingsthay orfay eveningay earway ereway onlyay operpray
orfay irlsgay. Untaay Archmay usuallyay avegay ethay isterssay aay esentpray ofay enty-fivetway
ollarsday ieceapay taay Ewnay Year;ay atthay asway onlyay aay onthmay otay ait,way danay erehay asway
aay ovelylay ioletvay ilksay oinggay taay aay argain,bay danay eshay adhay ethay oney,may ifay eshay
onlyay aredday otay aketay itay. Ohnjay aysalway aidsay atwhay asway ishay asway ers;hay utbay ouldway
ehay inkthay itay ightray otay endspay otnay onlyay ethay ospectivepray ive-and-twenty,fay utbay
otheranay ive-and-twentyfay outay ofay ethay ouseholdhay und?fay Atthay asway ethay
uestionqay. Alliesay adhay urgeday erhay otay oday it,ay adhay offereday otay oanlay ethay oney,may
danay ithway ethay estbay intentionsay inay ife,lay adhay emptedtay Egmay eyondbay erhay
engthstray. Inay naay evilay omentmay ethay opmanshay eldhay upay ethay ovely,lay immeringshay
olds,fay danay aid,say A"ay argain,bay Iay ureassay you,ay a'am."may Eshay ered,answay I'll"ay
aketay it;"ay danay itay asway utcay offay danay aidpay or,fay danay Alliesay adhay exulted,ay danay
eshay adhay aughedlay saay ifay itay ereway aay ingthay ofay onay onsequence,cay danay ivendray
ay,away eelingfay saay ifay eshay adhay olenstay omething,say danay ethay olicepay ereway eraftay
erhay.

Enwhay eshay otgay ome,hay eshay iedtray otay uageassay ethay angspay ofay emorseray ybay
eadingspray orthfay ethay ovelylay ilk;say utbay itay ookedlay esslay ilverysay ow,nay idn'tday
ecomebay er,hay eraftay ,allay danay ethay ordsway Ifty"fay ollars"day eemedsay ampedstay ikelay
aay atternpay ownday eachay eadthbray. Eshay utpay itay ay;away utbay itay auntedhay er,hay otnay

ollyfay atthay asway otnay easilyay aidlay. Enwhay Ohnjay otgay outay ishay ooksbay atthay ight,nay
Eg'smay earthay ank,say danay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay erhay arriedmay ife,lay eshay asway
aidafray ofay erhay usbandhay. Ethay ind,kay ownbray eyesay ookedlay saay ifay eythay ouldcay ebay
ern;stay danay oughthay ehay asway unusuallyay erry,may eshay anciedfay ehay adhay oundfay erhay
out,ay utbay idn'tday eanmay otay etlay erhay owknay itay. Ethay ouse-billshay ereway lalay aid,pay
ethay ooksbay lalay inay orderay. Ohnjay adhay aisedpray er,hay danay asway undoingay ethay olday
ocket-bookpay ichwhay eythay alledcay ethay Ank,""bay enwhay Eg,may owingknay atthay itay asway
uiteqay empty,ay oppedstay ishay and,hay ayingsay ervously,--nay

You"ay aven'thay eensay ymay ivatepray expenseay ookbay yet."ay

Ohnjay evernay edaskay otay eesay it;ay utbay eshay aysalway insisteday onay ishay oingday o,say danay
useday otay enjoyay ishay asculinemay azementamay taay ethay ueerqay ingsthay omenway anted,way
danay ademay imhay uessgay atwhay Iping""pay as,way emandday iercelyfay ethay eaningmay ofay aay
Ug-me-tight,""hay oray onderway owhay aay ittlelay ingthay omposedcay ofay eethray osebuds,ray
aay itbay ofay elvet,vay danay aay airpay ofay ings,stray ouldcay ossiblypay ebay aay onnet,bay danay
ostcay ivefay oray ixsay ollarsday. Atthay ightnay ehay ookedlay saay ifay ehay ouldway ikelay ethay
unfay ofay uizzingqay erhay iguresfay danay etendingpray otay ebay orrifiedhay taay erhay
extravagance,ay saay ehay oftenay id,day eingbay articularlypay oudpray ofay ishay udentpray
ifeway.

Ethay ittlelay ookbay asway oughtbray owlyslay out,ay danay aidlay ownday eforebay imhay. Egmay
otgay ehindbay ishay airchay underay etencepray ofay oothingsmay ethay inkleswray outay ofay ishay
iredtay orehead,fay danay andingstay ere,thay eshay aid,say ithway erhay anicpay increasingay
ithway everyay ord,--way

Ohn,"Jay ear,day I'may amedashay otay owshay youay ymay ook,bay orfay I'veay eallyray eenbay
eadfullydray extravagantay atelylay. Iay ogay outabay osay uchmay Iay ustmay avehay ings,thay
youay ow,knay danay Alliesay isedadvay ymay ettinggay it,ay osay Iay id;day danay ymay Ew-Year'snay
oneymay illway artlypay aypay orfay it:ay utbay Iay asway orrysay eraftay I'day oneday it,ay orfay Iay
ewknay you'day inkthay itay ongwray inay e."may

Ohnjay aughed,lay danay ewdray erhay oundray esidebay im,hay ayingsay ood-humoredly,gay
On't"Day ogay danay idehay. Iay on'tway eatbay youay ifay youay Ave__hay otgay aay airpay ofay illingkay
oots;bay I'may atherray oudpray ofay ymay ife'sway eet,fay danay on'tday indmay ifay eshay oesday
aypay eightay oray inenay ollarsday orfay erhay oots,bay ifay eythay earay oodgay ones."ay

Atthay adhay eenbay oneay ofay erhay astlay Ifles,""tray danay Ohn'sjay eyeay adhay allenfay onay itay
saay ehay okespay. Oh,"ay atwhay Ill__way ehay aysay enwhay ehay omescay otay atthay ulawfay iftyfay
ollars!"day oughtthay Eg,may ithway aay ivershay.

It's"ay orseway anthay oots,bay it'say aay ilksay ess,"dray eshay aid,say ithway ethay almnesscay
ofay esperation,day orfay eshay antedway ethay orstway overay.

Ell,"Way ear,day atwhay isay ethay Em'd'day otal,'tay saay Rmay. Antalinimay ays?"say

Atthay idn'tday oundsay ikelay Ohn,jay danay eshay ewknay ehay asway ookinglay upay taay erhay ithway
ethay aightforwardstray ooklay atthay eshay adhay aysalway eenbay eadyray otay eetmay danay
eransway ithway oneay saay ankfray illtay ownay. Eshay urnedtay ethay agepay danay erhay eadhay taay
ethay amesay ime,tay ointingpay otay ethay umsay ichwhay ouldway avehay eenbay adbay enoughay
ithoutway ethay ifty,fay utbay ichwhay asway allingappay otay erhay ithway atthay edadday. Orfay aay
inutemay ethay oomray asway eryvay ill;stay enthay Ohnjay aidsay owly,--butslay eshay ouldcay
eelfay itay ostcay imhay naay effortay otay expressay onay ispleasure,--day

Ell,"Way Iay on'tday owknay atthay iftyfay isay uchmay orfay aay ess,dray ithway lalay ethay
urbelowsfay danay otionsnay youay avehay otay avehay otay inishfay itay offay esethay ays."day

It"ay isn'tay ademay oray immed,"tray ighedsay Egmay aintly,fay orfay aay uddensay
ecollectionray ofay ethay ostcay illstay otay ebay incurreday uiteqay overwhelmeday erhay.

Enty-five"Tway yardsay ofay ilksay eemssay aay oodgay ealday otay overcay oneay allsmay oman,way
utbay I'veay onay oubtday ymay ifeway illway ooklay saay inefay saay Ednay Offat'smay enwhay eshay
etsgay itay on,"ay aidsay Ohnjay ylydray.

I"ay owknay youay earay y,angray Ohn,jay utbay Iay an'tcay elphay itay. Iay on'tday eanmay otay asteway
youray oney,may danay Iay idn'tday inkthay osethay ittlelay ingsthay ouldway ountcay upay osay. Iay
an'tcay esistray emthay enwhay Iay eesay Alliesay uyingbay lalay eshay ants,way danay ityingpay emay
ecausebay Iay on'tday. Iay ytray otay ebay ontented,cay utbay itay isay ard,hay danay I'may iredtay ofay
eingbay oor."pay

Ethay astlay ordsway ereway okenspay osay owlay eshay oughtthay ehay idday otnay earhay em,thay utbay
ehay id,day danay eythay oundedway imhay eeply,day orfay ehay adhay eniedday imselfhay anymay
easuresplay orfay Eg'smay akesay. Eshay ouldcay avehay ittenbay erhay onguetay outay ethay
inutemay eshay adhay aidsay it,ay orfay Ohnjay ushedpay ethay ooksbay ay,away danay otgay up,ay
aying,say ithway aay ittlelay uiverqay inay ishay oice,vay I"ay asway aidafray ofay is;thay Iay oday
ymay est,bay Eg."may Ifay ehay adhay oldedscay er,hay oray evenay akenshay er,hay itay ouldway otnay
avehay okenbray erhay earthay ikelay osethay ewfay ordsway. Eshay anray otay imhay danay eldhay imhay
ose,clay ying,cray ithway epentantray ears,tay O"ay Ohn,jay ymay ear,day ind,kay
ard-workinghay oy,bay Iay idn'tday eanmay it!ay Itay asway osay icked,way osay untrueay danay
ungrateful,ay owhay ouldcay Iay aysay it!ay Oh,ay owhay ouldcay Iay aysay it!"ay

Ehay asway eryvay ind,kay orgavefay erhay eadily,ray danay idday otnay utteray oneay eproach;ray
utbay Egmay ewknay atthay eshay adhay oneday danay aidsay aay ingthay ichwhay ouldway otnay ebay
orgottenfay oon,say oughalthay ehay ightmay evernay udeallay otay itay ainagay. Eshay adhay
omisedpray otay ovelay imhay orfay etterbay orfay orse;way danay enthay e,shay ishay ife,way adhay
eproachedray imhay ithway ishay overty,pay eraftay endingspay ishay earningsay ecklesslyray.
Itay asway eadful;dray danay ethay orstway ofay itay asway Ohnjay entway onay osay uietlyqay
erward,aftay ustjay saay ifay othingnay adhay appened,hay exceptay atthay ehay ayedstay inay
owntay ater,lay danay orkedway taay ightnay enwhay eshay adhay onegay otay ycray erselfhay otay
eepslay. Aay eekway ofay emorseray earlynay ademay Egmay ick;say danay ethay iscoveryday atthay
Ohnjay adhay ountermandedcay ethay orderay orfay ishay ewnay eat-coatgray educedray erhay otay aay
atestay ofay espairday ichwhay asway atheticpay otay eholdbay. Ehay adhay implysay aid,say inay
eransway otay erhay urprisedsay inquiriesay saay otay ethay ange,chay I"ay an'tcay ordaffay it,ay
ymay ear."day

Egmay aidsay onay ore,may utbay aay ewfay inutesmay eraftay ehay oundfay erhay inay ethay all,hay ithway
erhay acefay uriedbay inay ethay olday eat-coat,gray yingcray saay ifay erhay earthay ouldway
eakbray.

Eythay adhay aay onglay alktay atthay ight,nay danay Egmay earnedlay otay ovelay erhay usbandhay
etterbay orfay ishay overty,pay ecausebay itay eemedsay otay avehay ademay aay anmay ofay im,hay
ivengay imhay ethay engthstray danay ouragecay otay ightfay ishay ownay ay,way danay aughttay imhay
aay endertay atiencepay ithway ichwhay otay earbay danay omfortcay ethay aturalnay ongingslay
danay ailuresfay ofay osethay ehay ovedlay.

Extnay ayday eshay utpay erhay idepray inay erhay ocket,pay entway otay Allie,say oldtay ethay
uth,tray danay edaskay erhay otay uybay ethay ilksay saay aay avorfay. Ethay ood-naturedgay Smray.
Offatmay illinglyway idday o,say danay adhay ethay elicacyday otnay otay akemay erhay aay esentpray
ofay itay immediatelyay erwardaftay. Enthay Egmay ordereday omehay ethay eat-coat,gray ,anday
enwhay Ohnjay ived,array eshay utpay itay on,ay danay edaskay imhay owhay ehay ikedlay erhay ewnay
ilksay owngay. Oneay ancay imagineay atwhay eransway ehay ade,may owhay ehay eceivedray ishay
esent,pray danay atwhay aay issfulblay atestay ofay ingsthay ensueday. Ohnjay amecay omehay
early,ay Egmay addedgay onay ore;may danay atthay eat-coatgray asway utpay onay inay ethay orningmay
ybay aay eryvay appyhay usband,hay danay akentay offay taay ightnay ybay aay ostmay evotedday ittlelay
ifeway. Osay ethay yearay olledray ound,ray danay taay idsummermay erethay amecay otay Egmay aay ewnay
experience,--theay eepestday danay enderesttay ofay aay oman'sway ifelay.

Aurielay amecay eakingsnay intoay ethay itchenkay ofay ethay Ove-cote,day oneay Aturday,say
ithway naay exciteday ace,fay danay asway eceivedray ithway ethay ashclay ofay ymbals;cay orfay
Annahhay appedclay erhay andshay ithway aay aucepansay inay oneay danay ethay overcay inay ethay
otheray.
