eforebay Iay amecay ome?"hay eganbay Aurie,lay inay aay oudlay isperwhay.

Appy"Hay saay aay ueen,qay ethay ear!day Everyay oulsay ofay Em'ay isay upstairsay aay orshipin';way

endsay Em'ay ownday otay you,"ay ithway ichwhay omewhatsay involveday eplyray Annahhay
anished,vay ucklingchay ecstaticallyay.

Esentlypray Ojay eared,appay oudlypray earingbay aay annelflay undlebay aidlay orthfay uponay
aay argelay illowpay. O'sjay acefay asway eryvay ober,say utbay erhay eyesay inkled,tway danay

Yamay ookedlay elieved,ray utbay aughtynay Ojay ooktay erhay taay erhay ord;way or,fay uringday

At"Whay aay aughty,hay uninterestingay eaturecray atthay oldestay Issmay Archmay is!"ay asway
ethay unfortunatelyay udibleaay emarkray ofay oneay ofay ethay adies,lay saay ethay oorday

Ow"Hay ouldcay youay istakemay emay o?say Iay erelymay eantmay youay otay ebay operlypray
ignifiedday danay omposed,cay danay youay ademay yourselfay aay erfectpay ockstay danay
onestay. Ytray otay ebay ociablesay taay ethay Ambs',lay ossipgay saay otheray irlsgay o,day danay
ebay interesteday inay essdray danay irtationsflay danay ateverwhay onsensenay omescay upay.
Eythay ovemay inay ethay estbay ociety,say earay aluablevay ersonspay orfay usay otay ow,knay danay
Iay ouldn'tway ailfay otay akemay aay oodgay impressionay erethay orfay ything."anay

I'll"ay ebay eeable;agray I'llay ossipgay danay iggle,gay danay avehay orrorshay danay
apturesray overay yanay ifletray youay ikelay. Iay atherray enjoyay is,thay danay ownay I'llay
imitateay atwhay isay alledcay A'ay armingchay irl;'gay Iay ancay oday it,ay orfay Iay avehay Aymay
Esterchay saay aay odel,may danay I'llay improveay uponay erhay. Eesay ifay ethay Ambslay on'tday
ay,say At'Whay aay ively,lay icenay eaturecray atthay Ojay Archmay is!'"ay

Yamay eltfay ious,anxay saay ellway eshay ight,may orfay enwhay Ojay urnedtay eakishfray erethay
asway onay owingknay erewhay eshay ouldway opstay. Y'samay acefay asway aay udystay enwhay eshay awsay
erhay istersay imskay intoay ethay extnay awing-room,dray isskay lalay ethay youngay adieslay
ithway effusion,ay eambay aciouslygray uponay ethay youngay entlemen,gay danay oinjay inay ethay
atchay ithway aay iritspay ichwhay azedamay ethay eholderbay. Yamay asway akentay ossessionpay
ofay ybay Smray. Amb,lay ithway omwhay eshay asway aay avorite,fay danay orcedfay otay earhay aay onglay
ountaccay ofay Ucretia'slay astlay ack,attay ilewhay eethray elightfulday youngay
entlemengay overedhay ear,nay aitingway orfay aay ausepay enwhay eythay ightmay ushray inay danay
escueray erhay. Osay ituated,say eshay asway owerlesspay otay eckchay O,jay owhay eemedsay
ossessedpay ybay aay iritspay ofay ischief,may danay alkedtay ayaway saay olublyvay saay ethay olday
adylay. Aay otknay ofay eadshay atheredgay outabay er,hay danay Yamay ainedstray erhay earsay otay
earhay atwhay asway oinggay on;ay orfay okenbray entencessay illedfay erhay ithway arm,alay
oundray eyesay danay uplifteday andshay ormentedtay erhay ithway uriosity,cay danay equentfray
ealspay ofay aughterlay ademay erhay ildway otay areshay ethay unfay. Oneay aymay imagineay erhay
ufferingsay onay overhearingay agmentsfray ofay isthay ortsay ofay onversation:--cay

E"Shay idesray endidly,--whosplay aughttay er?"hay

O"Nay one;ay eshay useday otay actisepray ounting,may oldinghay ethay eins,ray danay ittingsay
aightstray onay naay olday addlesay inay aay eetray. Ownay eshay idesray ything,anay orfay eshay
oesn'tday owknay atwhay earfay is,ay danay ethay able-manstay etslay erhay avehay orseshay
eap,chay ecausebay eshay ainstray emthay otay arrycay adieslay osay ellway. Eshay ashay uchsay aay
assionpay orfay it,ay Iay oftenay elltay erhay ifay everythingay elseay ailsfay eshay ancay ebay aay
orse-breaker,hay danay etgay erhay ivinglay o."say

Taay isthay ulawfay eechspay Yamay ontainedcay erselfhay ithway ifficulty,day orfay ethay
impressionay asway eingbay ivengay atthay eshay asway atherray aay astfay youngay ady,lay ichwhay
asway erhay especialay ersionavay. Utbay atwhay ouldcay eshay o?day orfay ethay olday adylay asway
inay ethay iddlemay ofay erhay ory,stay danay onglay eforebay itay asway oneday Ojay asway offay

undersblay.

Yes,"ay Yamay asway inay espairday atthay ay,day orfay lalay ethay oodgay eastsbay ereway one,gay

aay easureplay arty,pay asn'tway it?"ay

ethay ubjectsay.

One"Nay ofay em;thay eshay eardhay ofay aay youngay orsehay taay ethay armhousefay overay ethay

ethay addlesay otay ethay orsehay. Ymay earday eature,cray eshay uallyactay owedray itay overay

azementamay ofay ethay olday an!"may

Ell,"Way Iay allcay atthay ucky!"play danay youngay Rmay. Amblay urnedtay naay ovingappray
anceglay uponay Y,amay onderingway atwhay ishay othermay ouldcay ebay ayingsay otay akemay ethay
irlgay ooklay osay edray danay uncomfortableay.

Eshay asway illstay edderray danay oremay uncomfortableay aay omentmay er,aftay enwhay aay
uddensay urntay inay ethay onversationcay introduceday ethay ubjectsay ofay essdray. Oneay ofay

Oh,"ay Yamay aintedpay it;ay youay an'tcay uybay osethay oftsay ades,shay osay eway aintpay oursay
yanay olorcay eway ikelay. It'say aay eatgray omfortcay otay avehay naay isticartay ister."say

Isn't"ay atthay naay originalay idea?"ay iedcray Issmay Amb,lay owhay oundfay Ojay eatgray unfay.

At's"Thay othingnay omparedcay otay omesay ofay erhay illiantbray erformancespay. Ere'sthay

E"Way eadray aay orystay ofay yoursay ethay otheray ay,day danay enjoyeday itay eryvay uch,"may

You"ay eedn'tnay ogay danay elltay emthay lalay ouray ittlelay ifts,shay danay exposeay ouray

En"Thay I'llay enjoyay yselfmay. Ethay oysbay earay taay ome,hay danay e'llway avehay aay

Naay enthusiasticay elcomeway omfray eethray igbay oysbay danay everalsay ettypray ildrenchay

Eavinglay erhay istersay otay erhay ownay evices,day Yamay oceededpray otay enjoyay erselfhay otay
erhay eart'shay ontentcay. Rmay. Udor'stay uncleay adhay arriedmay naay Englishay adylay owhay
asway irdthay ousincay otay aay ivinglay ord,lay danay Yamay egardedray ethay olewhay amilyfay
ithway eatgray espect;ray or,fay inay itespay ofay erhay Ericanamay irthbay danay eeding,bray
eshay ossessedpay atthay everenceray orfay itlestay ichwhay auntshay ethay estbay ofay
us,--thatay unacknowledgeday oyaltylay otay ethay earlyay aithfay inay ingskay ichwhay etsay
ethay ostmay emocraticday ationnay underay ethay unsay inay aay ermentfay taay ethay omingcay ofay aay

ould,cay danay etlay imhay ogay ithway aay arewellfay oldingscay enwhay ehay ebelledray. Utbay
evenay ethay atisfactionsay ofay alkingtay ithway aay istantday onnectioncay ofay ethay

oneay ofay Aurie'slay ankspray otay erhay iringadmay udienceaay. Oneay allsmay ildchay asway
okingpay urtlestay ithway Y'samay erishedchay arasol,pay aay econdsay asway eatingay
ingerbreadgay overay O'sjay estbay onnet,bay danay aay irdthay ayingplay allbay ithway erhay
ovesglay. Utbay lalay ereway enjoyingay emselves;thay danay enwhay Ojay ollectedcay erhay
amagedday opertypray otay o,gay erhay escortay ompaniedaccay er,hay eggingbay erhay otay omecay
ain,agay It"ay asway uchsay unfay otay earhay outabay Aurie'slay arks."lay

You"ay ightmay eattray imhay ivilly,cay taay eastlay. Youay avegay imhay aay oolcay od;nay danay

It's"ay onay useay yingtray otay ueargay ithway you,"ay eganbay Yamay.

Ow"Nay etlay usay ogay ome,hay danay evernay indmay Untaay Archmay o-daytay. Eway ancay unray ownday

Eak"Spay orfay yourself,ay ifay youay easeplay. Untaay ikeslay otay avehay usay aypay erhay ethay

At"Whay aay oodgay irlgay youay e,aray Y!"amay aidsay O,jay ithway aay epentantray anceglay omfray
erhay ownay amagedday ostumecay otay atthay ofay erhay ister,say ichwhay asway eshfray danay
otlessspay illstay. I"ay ishway itay asway saay easyay orfay emay otay oday ittlelay ingsthay otay

imetay otay oday em;thay osay Iay aitway orfay aay ancechay otay onfercay aay eatgray avor,fay danay etlay
ethay allsmay onesay ip;slay utbay eythay elltay estbay inay ethay end,ay Iay ancy."fay

Yamay iled,smay danay asway ollifiedmay taay once,ay ayingsay ithway aay aternalmay ir,--aay

Omen"Way ouldshay earnlay otay ebay eeable,agray articularlypay oorpay ones;ay orfay eythay

erethay isay oremay ofay you."ay

I'm"ay aay otchetycray olday ing,thay danay aysalway allshay e,bay utbay I'may illingway otay ownay
atthay youay earay ight;ray onlyay it'say easieray orfay emay otay iskray ymay ifelay orfay aay ersonpay
anthay otay ebay easantplay otay imhay enwhay Iay on'tday eelfay ikelay itay. It'say aay eatgray
isfortunemay otay avehay uchsay ongstray ikeslay danay islikes,day isn'tay it?"ay

It's"ay aay eatergray otnay otay ebay eablay otay idehay emthay. Iay on'tday indmay ayingsay atthay Iay
on'tday oveappray ofay Udortay yanay oremay anthay youay o;day utbay I'may otnay alledcay uponay otay

isagreeableday ecausebay ehay is."ay

Ut"Bay Iay inkthay irlsgay oughtay otay owshay enwhay eythay isapproveday ofay youngay en;may danay
owhay ancay eythay oday itay exceptay ybay eirthay anners?may Eachingpray oesday otnay oday yanay
ood,gay saay Iay owknay otay ymay orrow,say incesay I'veay adhay Eddytay otay anage;may utbay erethay
earay anymay ittlelay aysway inay ichwhay Iay ancay influenceay imhay ithoutway aay ord,way danay Iay
aysay eway Ought__ay otay oday itay otay othersay ifay eway an."cay

Eddy"Tay isay aay emarkableray oy,bay danay an'tcay ebay akentay saay aay amplesay ofay otheray
oys,"bay aidsay Y,amay inay aay onetay ofay olemnsay onviction,cay ichwhay ouldway avehay
onvulsedcay ethay Emarkable"ray oy,"bay ifay ehay adhay eardhay itay. If"ay eway ereway elles,bay
oray omenway ofay ealthway danay osition,pay eway ightmay oday omething,say erhaps;pay utbay orfay
usay otay ownfray taay oneay etsay ofay youngay entlemengay ecausebay eway on'tday oveappray ofay
em,thay danay ilesmay uponay otheranay etsay ecausebay eway o,day ouldn'tway avehay aay articlepay
ofay effect,ay danay eway ouldshay onlyay ebay onsideredcay odday danay uritanical."pay

O"Say eway earay otay ountenancecay ingsthay danay eoplepay ichwhay eway etest,day erelymay
ecausebay eway earay otnay ellesbay danay illionaires,may earay e?way At'sthay aay icenay ortsay
ofay orality."may

I"ay an'tcay ueargay outabay it,ay Iay onlyay owknay atthay it'say ethay ayway ofay ethay orld;way danay
eoplepay owhay etsay emselvesthay ainstagay itay onlyay etgay aughedlay taay orfay eirthay
ainspay. Iay on'tday ikelay eformers,ray danay Iay opehay youay illway evernay ytray otay ebay one."ay

I"ay oday ikelay em,thay danay Iay allshay ebay oneay ifay Iay an;cay orfay inay itespay ofay ethay
aughing,lay ethay orldway ouldway evernay etgay onay ithoutway emthay. Eway an'tcay eeagray
outabay at,thay orfay youay elongbay otay ethay olday et,say danay Iay otay ethay ew:nay youay illway
etgay onay ethay est,bay utbay Iay allshay avehay ethay iveliestlay imetay ofay itay. Iay ouldshay
atherray enjoyay ethay ickbatsbray danay ooting,hay Iay ink."thay

Ell,"Way omposecay yourselfay ow,nay danay on'tday orryway untaay ithway youray ewnay ideas."ay

I'll"ay ytray otnay o,tay utbay I'may aysalway ossessedpay otay urstbay outay ithway omesay
articularlypay untblay eechspay oray evolutionaryray entimentsay eforebay er;hay it'say ymay
oom,day danay Iay an'tcay elphay it."ay

Eythay oundfay Untaay Arrolcay ithway ethay olday ady,lay othbay orbedabsay inay omesay eryvay
interestingay ubject;say utbay eythay oppeddray itay saay ethay irlsgay amecay in,ay ithway aay
onsciouscay ooklay ichwhay etrayedbay atthay eythay adhay eenbay alkingtay outabay eirthay
iecesnay. Ojay asway otnay inay aay oodgay umor,hay danay ethay erversepay itfay eturned;ray utbay
Y,amay owhay adhay irtuouslyvay oneday erhay uty,day eptkay erhay emper,tay danay easedplay
everybody,ay asway inay aay ostmay elicangay amefray ofay indmay. Isthay iableamay iritspay asway
eltfay taay once,ay danay othbay ethay untsaay Y"may eared"day erhay ectionately,affay ookinglay
atwhay eythay erwardsaftay aidsay emphatically,--"Thatay ildchay improvesay everyay
ay."day

Are"ay youay oinggay otay elphay outabay ethay air,fay ear?"day edaskay Smray. Arrol,cay saay Yamay
atsay ownday esidebay erhay ithway ethay onfidingcay iraay elderlyay eoplepay ikelay osay ellway
inay ethay youngay.

Yes,"ay untaay. Smray. Esterchay edaskay emay ifay Iay ould,way danay Iay offereday otay endtay aay
able,tay saay Iay avehay othingnay utbay ymay imetay otay ive."gay

I'm"ay ot,"nay utpay inay Ojay ecidedlyday. I"ay atehay otay ebay atronized,pay danay ethay
Esterschay inkthay it'say aay eatgray avorfay otay owallay usay otay elphay ithway eirthay ighlyhay
onnectedcay airfay. Iay onderway youay onsented,cay Y:amay eythay onlyay antway youay otay
ork."way

I"ay maay illingway otay ork:way it'say orfay ethay eedmenfray saay ellway saay ethay Esters,chay
danay Iay inkthay itay eryvay indkay ofay emthay otay etlay emay areshay ethay aborlay danay ethay unfay.

ONSEQUENCEScay.


Smray. Ester'schay airfay asway osay eryvay elegantay danay electsay atthay itay asway
onsideredcay aay eatgray onorhay ybay ethay youngay adieslay ofay ethay eighborhoodnay otay ebay
inviteday otay aketay aay able,tay danay everyay oneay asway uchmay interesteday inay ethay
attermay. Yamay asway ed,askay utbay Ojay asway ot,nay ichwhay asway ortunatefay orfay lalay
arties,pay saay erhay elbowsay ereway ecidedlyday imboakay taay isthay eriodpay ofay erhay ife,lay
danay itay ooktay aay oodgay anymay ardhay ocksknay otay eachtay erhay owhay otay etgay onay easilyay.
Ethay Aughty,"hay uninterestingay eature"cray asway etlay everelysay one;alay utbay Y'samay
alenttay danay astetay ereway ulyday omplimentedcay ybay ethay offeray ofay ethay able,art-tay
danay eshay exerteday erselfhay otay eparepray danay ecuresay opriateappray danay aluablevay
ontributionscay otay itay.

Everythingay entway onay oothlysmay illtay ethay ayday eforebay ethay airfay opened;ay enthay
erethay occurreday oneay ofay ethay ittlelay irmishesskay ichwhay itay isay ostalmay
impossibleay otay oid,avay enwhay omesay ivefay danay entytway omen,way olday danay young,ay
ithway lalay eirthay ivatepray iquespay danay ejudices,pray ytray otay orkway ogethertay.

Aymay Esterchay asway atherray ealousjay ofay Yamay ecausebay ethay atterlay asway aay eatergray
avoritefay anthay erself,hay ,anday ustjay taay isthay ime,tay everalsay iflingtray
ircumstancescay occurreday otay increaseay ethay eelingfay. Y'samay aintyday en-and-inkpay
orkway entirelyay eclipseday Ay'smay aintedpay ases,--thatvay asway oneay orn;thay enthay
ethay onqueringall-cay Udortay adhay ancedday ourfay imestay ithway Y,amay taay aay atelay
arty,pay danay onlyay onceay ithway Ay,--thatmay asway ornthay umbernay o;tway utbay ethay iefchay
ievancegray atthay ankledray inay erhay oul,say danay avegay erhay naay excuseay orfay erhay
unfriendlyay onduct,cay asway aay umorray ichwhay omesay obligingay ossipgay adhay isperedwhay
otay er,hay atthay ethay Archmay irlsgay adhay ademay unfay ofay erhay taay ethay Ambs'lay. Lalay ethay
ameblay ofay isthay ouldshay avehay allenfay uponay O,jay orfay erhay aughtynay imitationay adhay
eenbay ootay ifelikelay otay escapeay etection,day danay ethay olicsomefray Ambslay adhay
ermittedpay ethay okejay otay escapeay. Onay inthay ofay isthay adhay eachedray ethay ulprits,cay
owever,hay danay Y'samay ismayday ancay ebay imagined,ay en,whay ethay eryvay eveningay eforebay
ethay air,fay saay eshay asway uttingpay ethay astlay ouchestay otay erhay ettypray able,tay Smray.
Ester,chay o,whay ofay ourse,cay esentedray ethay upposedsay idiculeray ofay erhay aughter,day
aid,say inay aay andblay one,tay utbay ithway aay oldcay ook,--lay

I"ay ind,fay ear,day atthay erethay isay omesay eelingfay ongamay ethay youngay adieslay outabay

Smray. Esterchay adhay anciedfay eforehandbay atthay itay ouldway ebay easyay otay eliverday

amedashay ofay erhay ownay artpay inay isthay one,ay saay ellway eshay ightmay.

Ethay ittlelay irlsgay ailedhay Yamay danay erhay easurestray ithway elight,day ichwhay

At's"Thay ethay ightray irit,spay ymay ear;day aay isskay orfay aay owblay isay aysalway est,bay

Inay itespay ofay ariousvay eryvay aturalnay emptationstay otay esentray danay etaliate,ray

askets,bay eshay ooktay upay erhay etpay oduction,--apray ittlelay ook,bay ethay iqueantay
overcay ofay ichwhay erhay atherfay adhay oundfay ongamay ishay easures,tray danay inay ich,whay
onay eaveslay ofay ellum,vay eshay adhay eautifullybay illuminateday ifferentday extstay. Saay
eshay urnedtay ethay ages,pay ichray inay aintyday evices,day ithway eryvay ardonablepay
ide,pray erhay eyeay ellfay uponay oneay ersevay atthay ademay erhay opstay danay inkthay. Amedfray
inay aay illiantbray oll-workscray ofay arlet,scay ue,blay danay old,gay ithway ittlelay
iritsspay ofay ood-willgay elpinghay oneay otheranay upay danay ownday ongamay ethay ornsthay
danay owers,flay ereway ethay ords,way Ou"Thay altshay ovelay ythay eighbornay saay yself."thay

I"ay ought,ay utbay Iay on't,"day oughtthay Y,amay saay erhay eyeay entway omfray ethay ightbray

idehay ethay acanciesvay erhay ettypray orkway adhay onceay illedfay. Yamay oodstay aay inute,may
urningtay ethay eaveslay inay erhay and,hay eadingray onay eachay omesay eetsway ebukeray orfay
lalay eart-burningshay danay uncharitablenessay ofay iritspay. Anymay iseway danay uetray
ermonssay earay eachedpray usay everyay ayday ybay unconsciousay inistersmay inay eet,stray
ool,schay office,ay oray ome;hay evenay aay air-tablefay aymay ecomebay aay ulpit,pay ifay itay
ancay offeray ethay oodgay danay elpfulhay ordsway ichwhay earay evernay outay ofay easonsay.
Y'samay onsciencecay eachedpray erhay aay ittlelay ermonsay omfray atthay ext,tay enthay danay
ere;thay danay eshay idday atwhay anymay ofay usay oday otnay aysalway o,--tookday ethay ermonsay otay
eart,hay danay aightwaystray utpay itay inay acticepray.

Aay oupgray ofay irlsgay ereway andingstay outabay Ay'smay able,tay iringadmay ethay ettypray

ory,stay danay udgingjay ordinglyaccay. Itay asway otnay easant,play utbay aay etterbay iritspay

You"ay aymay avehay em,thay danay elcome,way ithoutway ing,askay ifay youay antway emthay. Iay asway

Saay eshay oke,spay Yamay eturnedray erhay ontribution,cay ithway aay odnay danay aay ile,smay danay

Ay'smay eransway asway inaudible;ay utbay otheranay youngay ady,lay osewhay empertay asway

able."tay

Ow,nay atthay asway ard;hay enwhay eway akemay ittlelay acrificessay eway ikelay otay avehay emthay
eciated,appray taay east;lay danay orfay aay inutemay Yamay asway orrysay eshay adhay oneday it,ay
eelingfay atthay irtuevay asway otnay aysalway itsay ownay ewardray. Utbay itay is,--asay eshay
esentlypray iscovered;day orfay erhay iritsspay eganbay otay ise,ray danay erhay abletay otay
ossomblay underay erhay ilfulskay ands;hay ethay irlsgay ereway eryvay ind,kay danay atthay oneay
ittlelay tacay eemedsay otay avehay earedclay ethay osphereatmay azinglyamay.

Itay asway aay eryvay onglay ay,day danay aay ardhay oneay otay Y,amay saay eshay atsay ehindbay erhay
able,tay oftenay uiteqay one,alay orfay ethay ittlelay irlsgay esertedday eryvay oon:say ewfay
aredcay otay uybay owersflay inay ummer,say danay erhay ouquetsbay eganbay otay oopdray onglay
eforebay ightnay.

Ethay ableart-tay As__way ethay ostmay activeattray inay ethay oom;ray erethay asway aay owdcray
outabay itay lalay ayday ong,lay danay ethay enderstay ereway onstantlycay yingflay otay danay ofray
ithway importantay acesfay danay attlingray oney-boxesmay. Yamay oftenay ookedlay
istfullyway oss,acray onginglay otay ebay ere,thay erewhay eshay eltfay taay omehay danay appy,hay
insteaday ofay inay aay ornercay ithway othingnay otay oday. Itay ightmay eemsay onay ardshiphay otay
omesay ofay us;ay utbay otay aay etty,pray itheblay youngay irl,gay itay asway otnay onlyay edious,tay
utbay eryvay ying;tray danay ethay oughtthay ofay eingbay oundfay erethay inay ethay eveningay ybay
erhay amily,fay danay Aurielay danay ishay iends,fray ademay itay aay ealray artyrdommay.

Eshay idday otnay ogay omehay illtay ight,nay danay enthay eshay ookedlay osay alepay danay uietqay
atthay eythay ewknay ethay ayday adhay eenbay aay ardhay one,ay oughthay eshay ademay onay
omplaint,cay danay idday otnay evenay elltay atwhay eshay adhay oneday. Erhay othermay avegay erhay
naay extraay ordialcay upcay ofay ea,tay Ethbay elpedhay erhay ess,dray danay ademay aay armingchay
ittlelay eathwray orfay erhay air,hay ilewhay Ojay onishedastay erhay amilyfay ybay ettinggay
erselfhay upay ithway unusualay are,cay danay intinghay arklyday atthay ethay ablestay ereway
outabay otay ebay urnedtay.

On't"Day oday ythinganay ude,ray ay,pray Ojay. Iay on'tway avehay yanay ussfay ade,may osay etlay itay
lalay ass,pay danay ehavebay yourself,"ay eggedbay Y,amay saay eshay epartedday early,ay
opinghay otay indfay aay einforcementray ofay owersflay otay efreshray erhay oorpay ittlelay
abletay.

I"ay erelymay intenday otay akemay yselfmay entrancinglyay eeableagray otay everyay oneay Iay
ow,knay danay otay eepkay emthay inay youray ornercay saay onglay saay ossiblepay. Eddytay danay ishay
oysbay illway endlay aay and,hay danay e'llway avehay aay oodgay imetay yet,"ay eturnedray O,jay
eaninglay overay ethay ategay otay atchway orfay Aurielay. Esentlypray ethay amiliarfay amptray
asway eardhay inay ethay usk,day danay eshay anray outay otay eetmay imhay.

OURay OREIGNfay ORRESPONDENTcay.


ONDON"Lay.
EAREST"Day EOPLE,--pay

Ere"Hay Iay eallyray itsay taay aay ontfray indowway ofay ethay Athbay Otel,hay
Iccadillypay. It'say otnay aay ashionablefay ace,play utbay uncleay oppedstay erehay
yearsay o,agay danay on'tway ogay ywhereanay else;ay owever,hay eway on'tday eanmay otay
aystay ong,lay osay it'say onay eatgray attermay. Oh,ay Iay an'tcay eginbay otay elltay
youay owhay Iay enjoyay itay !allay Iay evernay an,cay osay I'llay onlyay ivegay youay itsbay
outay ofay ymay ote-book,nay orfay I'veay oneday othingnay utbay etchskay danay
ibblescray incesay Iay artedstay.

I"ay entsay aay inelay omfray Alifax,hay enwhay Iay eltfay ettypray iserable,may utbay
eraftay atthay Iay otgay onay elightfully,day eldomsay ill,ay onay eckday lalay ay,day
ithway entyplay ofay easantplay eoplepay otay useamay emay. Everyay oneay asway eryvay
indkay otay e,may especiallyay ethay officersay. On'tday augh,lay O;jay entlemengay
eallyray earay eryvay ecessarynay oardabay ip,shay otay oldhay onay o,tay oray otay aitway
uponay one;ay danay saay eythay avehay othingnay otay o,day it'say aay ercymay otay akemay
emthay useful,ay otherwiseay eythay ouldway okesmay emselvesthay otay eath,day I'may
aidafray.

Illustration:[ay Every"ay oneay asway eryvay ind,kay especiallyay ethay
officers."--Pageay ]378.ay

Aunt"ay danay Oflay ereway oorlypay lalay ethay ay,way danay ikedlay otay ebay etlay
one,alay osay enwhay Iay adhay oneday atwhay Iay ouldcay orfay em,thay Iay entway danay
enjoyeday yselfmay. Uchsay alksway onay eck,day uchsay unsets,say uchsay endidsplay
iraay danay aves!way Itay asway ostalmay saay excitingay saay idingray aay astfay
orse,hay enwhay eway entway ushingray onay osay andlygray. Iay ishway Ethbay ouldcay
avehay ome,cay itay ouldway avehay oneday erhay osay uchmay ood;gay saay orfay O,jay eshay
ouldway avehay onegay upay danay atsay onay ethay ain-topmay ib,jay oray ateverwhay ethay
ighhay ingthay isay alled,cay ademay iendsfray ithway ethay engineers,ay danay
ootedtay onay ethay aptain'scay eaking-trumpet,spay e'dshay avehay eenbay inay
uchsay aay atestay ofay aptureray.

It"ay asway lalay eavenly,hay utbay Iay asway adglay otay eesay ethay Irishay oast,cay danay
oundfay itay eryvay ovely,lay osay eengray danay unny,say ithway ownbray abinscay erehay
danay ere,thay uinsray onay omesay ofay ethay ills,hay danay entlemen'sgay
ountry-seatscay inay ethay alleys,vay ithway eerday eedingfay inay ethay arkspay. Itay
asway earlyay inay ethay orning,may utbay Iay idn'tday egretray ettinggay upay otay eesay
it,ay orfay ethay aybay asway ullfay ofay ittlelay oats,bay ethay oreshay O__say
icturesque,pay danay aay osyray yskay overheaday. Iay evernay allshay orgetfay itay.

At"ay Ueenstownqay oneay ofay ymay ewnay uaintancesacqay eftlay us,--Mray.
Ennox,--andlay enwhay Iay aidsay omethingsay outabay ethay Akeslay ofay Illarney,kay
ehay ighedsay danay ung,say ithway aay ooklay taay e,--may

Omfray ethay anceglay ofay erhay eye,ay
Unshay angerday danay y,flay
Orfay atal'sfay ethay anceglay ofay Atekay Earney.'kay

Asn'tway atthay onsensical?nay

E"Way onlyay oppedstay taay Iverpoollay aay ewfay ourshay. It'say aay irty,day oisynay
ace,play danay Iay asway adglay otay eavelay itay. Uncleay ushedray outay danay oughtbay aay
airpay ofay og-skinday oves,glay omesay ugly,ay ickthay oes,shay danay naay
umbrella,ay danay otgay avedshay Ã_ay a_lay utton-chop,may ethay irstfay ingthay.
Enthay ehay atteredflay imselfhay atthay ehay ookedlay ikelay aay uetray Iton;bray utbay
ethay irstfay imetay ehay adhay ethay udmay eanedclay offay ishay oes,shay ethay ittlelay
ootblackbay ewknay atthay naay Ericanamay oodstay inay em,thay danay aid,say ithway aay
in,gray Ere'Thay yeray ar,hay irsay. I'veay ivegay Em'ay ethay atestlay Yankeeay
ine.'shay Itay usedamay uncleay immenselyay. Oh,ay Iay Ust__may elltay youay atwhay
atthay urdabsay Ennoxlay id!day Ehay otgay ishay iendfray Ard,way owhay amecay onay ithway

oomray asway aay ovelylay one,ay ithway Obert'Ray Ennox'slay ompliments,'cay onay
ethay ardcay. Asn'tway atthay un,fay irls?gay Iay ikelay avellingtray.

I"ay evernay All__shay etgay otay Ondonlay ifay Iay on'tday urryhay. Ethay iptray asway
ikelay idingray oughthray aay onglay icture-gallery,pay ullfay ofay ovelylay
andscapeslay. Ethay armhousesfay ereway ymay elight;day ithway atchedthay oofs,ray
ivyay upay otay ethay eaves,ay atticedlay indows,way danay outstay omenway ithway osyray
ildrenchay taay ethay oorsday. Ethay eryvay attlecay ookedlay oremay anquiltray anthay
ours,ay saay eythay oodstay ee-deepknay inay over,clay danay ethay enshay adhay aay
ontentedcay uck,clay saay ifay eythay evernay otgay ervous,nay ikelay Yankeeay
iddiesbay. Uchsay erfectpay olorcay Iay evernay aw,--thesay assgray osay een,gray
yskay osay ue,blay aingray osay yellow,ay oodsway osay ark,--Iday asway inay aay aptureray
lalay ethay ayway. Osay asway O;flay danay eway eptkay ouncingbay omfray oneay idesay otay
ethay other,ay yingtray otay eesay everythingay ilewhay eway ereway iskingwhay ongalay
taay ethay ateray ofay ixtysay ilesmay naay ourhay. Untaay asway iredtay danay entway otay
eep,slay utbay uncleay eadray ishay uide-book,gay danay ouldn'tway ebay onishedastay
taay ythinganay. Isthay isay ethay ayway eway entway on:ay Y,amay yingflay up,--'Oh,ay
atthay ustmay ebay Enilworth,kay atthay aygray aceplay ongamay ethay ees!'tray O,flay
artingday otay ymay indow,--'Howway eet!sway Eway ustmay ogay erethay omesay ime,tay
on'tway e,way apa?'pay Uncle,ay almlycay iringadmay ishay oots,--'No,bay ymay
ear,day otnay unlessay youay antway eer;bay at'sthay aay ewery.'bray

A"ay ause,--thenpay Oflay iedcray out,ay Ess'Blay e,may ere'sthay aay allowsgay danay
aay anmay oinggay up.'ay Ere,'Whay ere?'whay ieksshray Y,amay aringstay outay taay otway

olliery,'cay emarksray uncle,ay ithway aay inkletway ofay ethay eyeay. Ere's'Hay aay

en'taray eythay etty!'pray edadday Oflay entimentallysay. Eese,'Gay youngay

ettlessay ownday otay enjoyay E'Thay Irtationsflay ofay Aptcay. Avendish,'cay danay
Iay avehay ethay eneryscay lalay otay yselfmay.

Of"ay oursecay itay ainedray enwhay eway otgay otay Ondon,lay danay erethay asway
othingnay otay ebay eensay utbay ogfay danay umbrellasay. Eway ested,ray unpacked,ay
danay oppedshay aay ittlelay etweenbay ethay owersshay. Untaay Arymay otgay emay omesay
ewnay ings,thay orfay Iay amecay offay inay uchsay aay urryhay Iay asn'tway alfhay eadyray.
Aay itewhay athay danay ueblay eather,fay aay uslinmay essdray otay atch,may danay ethay

erfectlypay endid;splay ingsthay eemsay osay eap--nicechay ibbonsray onlyay
ixpencesay aay yarday. Iay aidlay inay aay ock,stay utbay allshay etgay ymay ovesglay inay
Arispay. Oesn'tday atthay oundsay ortsay ofay elegantay danay ich?ray

O"Flay danay I,ay orfay ethay unfay ofay it,ay ordereday aay ansomhay ab,cay ilewhay untaay

Ow"'Nay en,thay um?'may

I"ay avegay ymay orderay saay oberlysay saay Iay ould,cay danay ammingslay ownday ethay
oor,day ithway naay Aye,'ay ye,aay um,'may ethay anmay ademay ishay orsehay alk,way saay
ifay oinggay otay aay uneralfay. Iay okedpay ain,agay danay aid,say A'ay ittlelay
aster;'fay enthay offay ehay ent,way elter-skelter,hay saay efore,bay danay eway
esignedray ourselvesay otay ouray atefay.

O-day"Tay asway airfay danay eway entway otay Ydehay Ark,pay oseclay y,bay orfay eway earay
oremay istocraticaray anthay eway ooklay. Ethay Ukeday ofay Evonshireday iveslay
earnay. Iay oftenay eesay ishay ootmenfay ounginglay taay ethay ackbay ate;gay danay ethay
Ukeday ofay Ellington'sway ousehay isay otnay arfay offay. Uchsay ightssay saay Iay aw,say
ymay ear!day Itay asway saay oodgay saay Unch,pay orfay erethay ereway atfay owagersday
ollingray outabay inay eirthay edray danay yelloway oaches,cay ithway orgeousgay
Eamesesjay inay ilksay ockingsstay danay elvetvay oats,cay upay ehind,bay danay
owderedpay oachmencay inay ontfray. Artsmay aids,may ithway ethay osiestray
ildrenchay Iay everay aw;say andsomehay irls,gay ookinglay alfhay eep;aslay
andies,day inay ueerqay Englishay atshay danay avenderlay ids,kay ounginglay
out,abay danay alltay oldiers,say inay ortshay edray acketsjay danay uffinmay apscay
uckstay onay oneay ide,say ookinglay osay unnyfay Iay ongedlay otay etchskay emthay.

Otten"Ray Owray eansmay Oute'_Ray eday Oi_,'ray oray ethay ing'skay ay;way utbay ownay
it'say oremay ikelay aay iding-schoolray anthay ythinganay elseay. Ethay orseshay
earay endid,splay danay ethay en,may especiallyay ethay ooms,gray ideray ell;way utbay
ethay omenway earay iff,stay danay ounce,bay ichwhay isn'tay ordingaccay otay ouray
ulesray. Iay ongedlay otay owshay emthay aay earingtay Ericanamay allop,gay orfay eythay
ottedtray olemnlysay upay danay own,day inay eirthay antscay abitshay danay ighhay
ats,hay ookinglay ikelay ethay omenway inay aay oytay Oah'snay Karay. Everyay oneay
ides,--oldray en,may outstay adies,lay ittlelay ildren,--andchay ethay youngay
olksfay oday aay ealday ofay irtingflay ere;hay Iay awsay aay airpay exchangeay
osebuds,ray orfay it'say ethay ingthay otay earway oneay inay ethay utton-hole,bay danay
Iay oughtthay itay atherray aay icenay ittlelay ideaay.

In"ay ethay Mp.ay. otay Estminsterway Ey;abbay utbay on'tday expectay emay otay
escribeday it,ay at'sthay impossible--soay I'llay onlyay aysay itay asway ublime!say
Isthay eveningay eway earay oinggay otay eesay Echter,fay ichwhay illway ebay naay
opriateappray enday otay ethay appiesthay ayday ofay ymay ifelay.

IDNIGHT"May.

It's"ay eryvay ate,lay utbay Iay an'tcay etlay ymay etterlay ogay inay ethay orningmay
ithoutway ellingtay youay atwhay appenedhay astlay eveningay. Owhay oday youay inkthay
amecay in,ay saay eway ereway taay ea?tay Aurie'slay Englishay iends,fray Edfray danay
Ankfray Aughn!vay Iay asway O__say urprised,say orfay Iay ouldn'tshay avehay ownknay
emthay utbay orfay ethay ardscay. Othbay earay alltay ellows,fay ithway iskers;whay
Edfray andsomehay inay ethay Englishay yle,stay danay Ankfray uchmay etter,bay orfay
ehay onlyay impslay ightly,slay danay usesay onay utchescray. Eythay adhay eardhay
omfray Aurielay erewhay eway ereway otay e,bay danay amecay otay kasay usay otay eirthay
ouse;hay utbay uncleay on'tway o,gay osay eway allshay eturnray ethay all,cay danay eesay
emthay saay eway ancay. Eythay entway otay ethay eatrethay ithway us,ay danay eway idday
avehay Uch__say aay oodgay ime,tay orfay Ankfray evotedday imselfhay otay O,flay danay
Edfray danay Iay alkedtay overay ast,pay esent,pray danay uturefay unfay saay ifay eway
adhay ownknay eachay otheray lalay ouray aysday. Elltay Ethbay Ankfray edaskay orfay
er,hay danay asway orrysay otay earhay ofay erhay illay ealthhay. Edfray aughedlay enwhay
Iay okespay ofay O,jay danay entsay ishay Espectful'ray omplimentscay otay ethay igbay
at.'hay Eithernay ofay emthay adhay orgottenfay Ampcay Aurence,lay oray ethay unfay eway
adhay erethay. Atwhay esagay oagay itay eems,say oesn'tday it?ay

Aunt"ay isay appingtay onay ethay allway orfay ethay irdthay ime,tay osay Iay Ust__may

Y."aMay


EAR"Day IRLS,--gay ARIS"Pay.

In"ay ymay astlay Iay oldtay youay outabay ouray Ondonlay isit,--howvay indkay ethay
Aughnsvay ere,way danay atwhay easantplay artiespay eythay ademay orfay usay. Iay
enjoyeday ethay ipstray otay Amptonhay Ourtcay danay ethay Ensingtonkay Useummay
oremay anthay ythinganay else,--foray taay Amptonhay Iay awsay Aphael'sray
artoons,cay ,anday taay ethay Useum,may oomsray ullfay ofay icturespay ybay Urner,tay
Awrence,lay Eynolds,ray Ogarth,hay danay ethay otheray eatgray eaturescray. Ethay
ayday inay Ichmondray Arkpay asway arming,chay orfay eway adhay aay egularray Englishay
icnic,pay danay Iay adhay oremay endidsplay oaksay danay oupsgray ofay eerday anthay Iay
ouldcay opy;cay oalsay eardhay aay ightingale,nay danay awsay arkslay ogay upay. Eway
Id''day Ondonlay otay ouray earts'hay ontent,cay anksthay otay Edfray danay Ank,fray
danay ereway orrysay otay ogay ay;away or,fay oughthay Englishay eoplepay earay owslay
otay aketay youay in,ay enwhay eythay onceay akemay upay eirthay indsmay otay oday itay eythay
annotcay ebay outdoneay inay ospitality,hay I__ay inkthay. Ethay Aughnsvay opehay otay
eetmay usay inay Omeray extnay inter,way danay Iay allshay ebay eadfullydray
isappointedday ifay eythay on't,day orfay Acegray danay Iay earay eatgray iends,fray
danay ethay oysbay eryvay icenay ellows,--especiallyfay Edfray.

Ell,"Way eway ereway ardlyhay ettledsay ere,hay enwhay ehay urnedtay upay ain,agay
ayingsay ehay adhay omecay orfay aay oliday,hay danay asway oinggay otay Itzerlandsway.
Untaay ookedlay obersay taay irst,fay utbay ehay asway osay oolcay outabay itay eshay
ouldn'tcay aysay aay ord;way danay ownay eway etgay onay icely,nay danay earay eryvay adglay
ehay ame,cay orfay ehay eaksspay Enchfray ikelay aay ative,nay danay Iay on'tday owknay
atwhay eway ouldshay oday ithoutway imhay. Uncleay oesn'tday owknay entay ords,way danay
insistsay onay alkingtay Englishay eryvay oud,lay saay ifay atthay ouldway akemay
eoplepay understanday imhay. Unt'saay onunciationpray isay old-fashioned,ay
danay Oflay danay I,ay oughthay eway atteredflay ourselvesay atthay eway ewknay aay oodgay
eal,day indfay eway on't,day danay earay eryvay atefulgray otay avehay Edfray oday ethay
Arley'_pay ooing_,'vay saay uncleay allscay itay.

Uch"Say elightfulday imestay saay eway earay aving!hay ight-seeingsay omfray
orningmay illtay ight,nay oppingstay orfay icenay uncheslay inay ethay aygay
AfÃ©s_,_cay danay eetingmay ithway lalay ortssay ofay olldray enturesadvay. Ainyray
aysday Iay endspay inay ethay Ouvre,lay evellingray inay icturespay. Ojay ouldway urntay
upay erhay aughtynay osenay taay omesay ofay ethay inest,fay ecausebay eshay ashay onay
oulsay orfay ;artay utbay I__ay ave,hay danay I'may ultivatingcay eyeay danay astetay saay
astfay saay Iay ancay. Eshay ouldway ikelay ethay elicsray ofay eatgray eoplepay etter,bay
orfay I'veay eensay erhay Apoleon'snay ockedcay athay danay aygray oat,cay ishay
aby'sbay adlecray danay ishay olday oothbrush;tay oalsay Ariemay Oinette'santay
ittlelay oe,shay ethay ingray ofay Aintsay Enis,day Arlemagne'schay ord,sway danay
anymay otheray interestingay ingsthay. I'llay alktay orfay ourshay outabay emthay
enwhay Iay ome,cay utbay aven'thay imetay otay itewray.

E"Thay Alaispay Oyaleray isay aay eavenlyhay ace,--soplay ullfay ofay Ijouterie__bay
danay ovelylay ingsthay atthay I'may earlynay istractedday ecausebay Iay an'tcay uybay
emthay. Edfray antedway otay etgay emay ome,say utbay ofay oursecay Iay idn'tday owallay
itay. Enthay ethay Oisbay danay ethay Ampschay ElysÃ©esay earay S_trÃ¨ay agnifique_may.
I'veay eensay ethay imperialay amilyfay everalsay imes,--thetay emperoray naay
ugly,ay ard-lookinghay an,may ethay empressay alepay danay etty,pray utbay esseddray
inay adbay aste,tay I__ay ought,--purplethay ess,dray eengray at,hay danay yelloway
ovesglay. Ittlelay Apnay. isay aay andsomehay oy,bay owhay itssay attingchay otay ishay
utor,tay danay isseskay ishay andhay otay ethay eoplepay saay ehay assespay inay ishay
our-horsefay arouche,bay ithway ostilionspay inay edray atinsay ackets,jay danay aay
ountedmay uardgay eforebay danay ehindbay.

E"Way oftenay alkway inay ethay Uileriestay Ardens,gay orfay eythay earay ovely,lay
oughthay ethay iqueantay Uxembourglay Ardensgay uitsay emay etterbay. EpÃ¨ray alay
Aisechay isay eryvay urious,cay orfay anymay ofay ethay ombstay earay ikelay allsmay

enwhay eythay omecay otay amentlay. Atthay isay osay Enchyfray.

Our"ay oomsray earay onay ethay Ueray eday Ivoli,ray ,anday ittingsay inay ethay
alcony,bay eway ooklay upay danay ownday ethay ong,lay illiantbray eetstray. Itay isay

iredtay ithway ouray ay'sday orkway otay ogay outay. Edfray isay eryvay entertaining,ay

earay eryvay ich,ray danay omecay ofay naay excellentay amily,fay osay Iay on'tway indfay
aultfay ithway eirthay yelloway air,hay saay ymay ownay isay yelloweray.

Ext"Nay eekway eway earay offay otay Ermanygay danay Itzerland;sway ,anday saay eway
allshay aveltray ast,fay Iay allshay onlyay ebay eablay otay ivegay youay astyhay

escribeday earlyclay lalay atthay Iay eesay danay ire,'admay saay atherfay isedadvay.

youay aay etterbay ideaay ofay ymay ourtay anthay esethay ibblesscray.

Adieu;"ay Iay embraceay youay enderlytay. OTREvay IE."aMay


Y"May EARday AMMA,--may EIDELBERG"Hay.

Aving"Hay aay uietqay ourhay eforebay eway eavelay orfay Erne,bay I'llay ytray otay elltay
youay atwhay ashay appened,hay orfay omesay ofay itay isay eryvay important,ay saay youay
illway eesay.

E"Thay ailsay upay ethay Inerhay asway erfect,pay danay Iay ustjay atsay danay enjoyeday
itay ithway lalay ymay ightmay. Etgay ather'sfay olday uide-books,gay danay eadray
outabay it;ay Iay aven'thay ordsway eautifulbay enoughay otay escribeday itay. Taay
Oblentzcay eway adhay aay ovelylay ime,tay orfay omesay udentsstay omfray Onn,bay ithway
omwhay Edfray otgay uaintedacqay onay ethay oat,bay avegay usay aay erenadesay. Itay asway
aay oonlightmay ight,nay ,anday outabay oneay o'clock,ay Oflay danay Iay ereway akedway
ybay ethay ostmay eliciousday usicmay underay ouray indowsway. Eway ewflay up,ay danay
idhay ehindbay ethay urtains;cay utbay yslay eepspay owedshay usay Edfray danay ethay
udentsstay ingingsay ayaway ownday elowbay. Itay asway ethay ostmay omanticray ingthay
Iay everay aw,--thesay iver,ray ethay idgebray ofay oats,bay ethay eatgray ortressfay
opposite,ay oonlightmay everywhere,ay danay usicmay itfay otay eltmay aay earthay ofay
onestay.

En"Whay eythay ereway oneday eway ewthray ownday omesay owers,flay danay awsay emthay
amblescray orfay em,thay isskay eirthay andshay otay ethay invisibleay adies,lay danay
ogay aughinglay ay,--toaway okesmay danay inkdray eer,bay Iay upposesay. Extnay
orningmay Edfray owedshay emay oneay ofay ethay umpledcray owersflay inay ishay
est-pocket,vay danay ookedlay eryvay entimentalsay. Iay aughedlay taay im,hay danay
aidsay Iay idn'tday owthray it,ay utbay O,flay ichwhay eemedsay otay isgustday im,hay
orfay ehay ossedtay itay outay ofay ethay indow,way danay urnedtay ensiblesay ainagay.
I'may aidafray I'may oinggay otay avehay oubletray ithway atthay oy,bay itay eginsbay otay
ooklay ikelay itay.

E"Thay athsbay taay Assaunay ereway eryvay ay,gay osay asway Aden-Baden,bay erewhay
Edfray ostlay omesay oney,may danay Iay oldedscay imhay. Ehay eedsnay omesay oneay otay
ooklay eraftay imhay enwhay Ankfray isay otnay ithway imhay. Atekay aidsay onceay eshay
opedhay e'dhay arrymay oon,say danay Iay uiteqay eeagray ithway erhay atthay itay ouldway
ebay ellway orfay imhay. Ankfortfray asway elightful;day Iay awsay Oethe'sgay ouse,hay
Iller'sschay atue,stay danay Annecker'sday amousfay Ariadne.''ay Itay asway eryvay
ovely,lay utbay Iay ouldshay avehay enjoyeday itay oremay ifay Iay adhay ownknay ethay
orystay etterbay. Iay idn'tday ikelay otay ,askay saay everyay oneay ewknay it,ay oray
etendedpray eythay idday. Iay ishway Ojay ouldway elltay emay lalay outabay it;ay Iay
oughtay otay avehay eadray ore,may orfay Iay indfay Iay on'tday owknay ything,anay danay
itay ortifiesmay emay.

Ow"Nay omescay ethay erioussay art,--forpay itay appenedhay ere,hay danay Edfray isay
ustjay onegay. Ehay ashay eenbay osay indkay danay ollyjay atthay eway lalay otgay uiteqay
ondfay ofay im;hay Iay evernay oughtthay ofay ythinganay utbay aay avellingtray
iendship,fray illtay ethay erenadesay ightnay. Incesay enthay I'veay egunbay otay
eelfay atthay ethay oonlightmay alks,way alconybay alks,tay danay ailyday
enturesadvay ereway omethingsay oremay otay imhay anthay unfay. Iay aven'thay
irted,flay other,may uly,tray utbay ememberedray atwhay youay aidsay otay e,may danay
avehay oneday ymay eryvay estbay. Iay an'tcay elphay itay ifay eoplepay ikelay e;may Iay
on'tday ytray otay akemay em,thay danay itay orriesway emay ifay Iay on'tday arecay orfay
em,thay oughthay Ojay ayssay Iay aven'thay otgay yanay earthay. Ownay Iay owknay othermay
illway akeshay erhay ead,hay danay ethay irlsgay ay,say Oh,'ay ethay ercenarymay
ittlelay etch!'wray utbay I'veay ademay upay ymay ind,may ,anday ifay Edfray saskay e,may
Iay allshay eptaccay im,hay oughthay I'may otnay adlymay inay ovelay. Iay ikelay im,hay
danay eway etgay onay omfortablycay ogethertay. Ehay isay andsome,hay young,ay
everclay enough,ay danay eryvay ich,--everray osay uchmay icherray anthay ethay
Aurenceslay. Iay on'tday inkthay ishay amilyfay ouldway object,ay danay Iay ouldshay
ebay eryvay appy,hay orfay eythay earay lalay ind,kay ell-bred,way enerousgay
eople,pay danay eythay ikelay emay. Ed,fray saay ethay eldestay in,tway illway avehay
ethay estate,ay Iay uppose,say danay uchsay aay endidsplay oneay saay itay is!ay Aay itycay
ousehay inay aay ashionablefay eet,stray otnay osay owyshay saay ouray igbay ouses,hay
utbay icetway saay omfortable,cay danay ullfay ofay olidsay uxury,lay uchsay saay
Englishay eoplepay elievebay inay. Iay ikelay it,ay orfay it'say enuinegay. I'veay
eensay ethay ate,play ethay amilyfay ewels,jay ethay olday ervants,say danay
icturespay ofay ethay ountrycay ace,play ithway itsay ark,pay eatgray ouse,hay
ovelylay ounds,gray danay inefay orseshay. Oh,ay itay ouldway ebay lalay Iay ouldshay
!askay danay I'day atherray avehay itay anthay yanay itletay uchsay saay irlsgay apsnay upay
osay eadily,ray danay indfay othingnay ehindbay. Iay aymay ebay ercenary,may utbay Iay
atehay overty,pay danay on'tday eanmay otay earbay itay aay inutemay ongerlay anthay Iay
ancay elphay. Oneay ofay usay Ust__may arrymay ell;way Egmay idn't,day Ojay on't,way
Ethbay an'tcay yet,ay osay Iay all,shay danay akemay everythingay oseycay lalay oundray.
Iay ouldn'tway arrymay aay anmay Iay atedhay oray espisedday. Youay aymay ebay uresay ofay
at;thay ,anday oughthay Edfray isay otnay ymay odelmay ero,hay ehay oesday eryvay ell,way
,anday inay ime,tay Iay ouldshay etgay ondfay enoughay ofay imhay ifay ehay asway eryvay
ondfay ofay e,may danay etlay emay oday ustjay saay Iay ikedlay. Osay I'veay eenbay urningtay
ethay attermay overay inay ymay indmay ethay astlay eek,way orfay itay asway impossibleay
otay elphay eeingsay atthay Edfray ikedlay emay. Ehay aidsay othing,nay utbay ittlelay
ingsthay owedshay it;ay ehay evernay oesgay ithway O,flay aysalway etsgay onay ymay idesay
ofay ethay arriage,cay able,tay oray omenade,pray ookslay entimentalsay enwhay eway
earay one,alay danay ownsfray taay yanay oneay elseay owhay enturesvay otay eakspay otay
emay. Yesterday,ay taay inner,day enwhay naay Ustrianaay officeray aredstay taay us,ay
danay enthay aidsay omethingsay otay ishay iend,--afray akish-lookingray
aron,--aboutbay Ein'_ay onderschÃ¶nesway En_,'blÃ¶ndchay Edfray ookedlay saay
iercefay saay aay ion,lay danay utcay ishay eatmay osay avagely,say itay earlynay ewflay
offay ishay ateplay. Ehay isn'tay oneay ofay ethay ool,cay iffstay Englishmen,ay utbay
isay atherray eppery,pay orfay ehay ashay Otchscay oodblay inay im,hay saay oneay ightmay
uessgay omfray ishay onniebay ueblay eyesay.

Ell,"Way astlay eveningay eway entway upay otay ethay astlecay outabay unset,--atsay
eastlay lalay ofay usay utbay Ed,fray owhay asway otay eetmay usay ere,thay eraftay oinggay
otay ethay Ostpay Estanteray orfay etterslay. Eway adhay aay armingchay imetay okingpay
outabay ethay uins,ray ethay aultsvay erewhay ethay onstermay untay is,ay danay ethay
eautifulbay ardensgay ademay ybay ethay elector,ay onglay o,agay orfay ishay Englishay
ifeway. Iay ikedlay ethay eatgray erracetay est,bay orfay ethay iewvay asway ivine;day
o,say ilewhay ethay estray entway otay eesay ethay oomsray inside,ay Iay atsay erethay
yingtray otay etchskay ethay aygray onestay ion'slay eadhay onay ethay all,way ithway
arletscay oodbineway aysspray anginghay oundray itay. Iay eltfay saay ifay I'day otgay
intoay aay omance,ray ittingsay ere,thay atchingway ethay Eckarnay ollingray
oughthray ethay alley,vay isteninglay otay ethay usicmay ofay ethay Ustrianaay andbay
elow,bay danay aitingway orfay ymay over,lay ikelay aay ealray ory-bookstay irlgay. Iay
adhay aay eelingfay atthay omethingsay asway oinggay otay appen,hay danay Iay asway
eadyray orfay itay. Iay idn'tday eelfay ushyblay oray uakey,qay utbay uiteqay ool,cay
danay onlyay aay ittlelay exciteday.

Y"Bay danay ybay Iay eardhay Ed'sfray oice,vay danay enthay ehay amecay urryinghay
oughthray ethay eatgray harcay otay indfay emay. Ehay ookedlay osay oubledtray atthay Iay
orgotfay lalay outabay yself,may danay edaskay atwhay ethay attermay asway. Ehay aidsay
e'dhay ustjay otgay aay etterlay eggingbay imhay otay omecay ome,hay orfay Ankfray asway
eryvay ill;ay osay ehay asway oinggay taay once,ay inay ethay ightnay ain,tray danay onlyay
adhay imetay otay aysay ood-bygay. Iay asway eryvay orrysay orfay im,hay danay
isappointedday orfay yself,may utbay onlyay orfay aay inute,may ecausebay ehay
aid,say saay ehay ookshay ands,--andhay aidsay itay inay aay ayway atthay Iay ouldcay otnay
istake,--'Imay allshay oonsay omecay ack;bay youay on'tway orgetfay e,may Y?'amay

I"ay idn'tday omise,pray utbay Iay ookedlay taay im,hay danay ehay eemedsay atisfied,say
danay erethay asway onay imetay orfay ythinganay utbay essagesmay danay ood-byes,gay
orfay ehay asway offay inay naay our,hay danay eway lalay issmay imhay eryvay uchmay. Iay owknay
ehay antedway otay eak,spay utbay Iay ink,thay omfray omethingsay ehay onceay inted,hay
atthay ehay adhay omisedpray ishay atherfay otnay otay oday ythinganay ofay ethay ortsay
yetay ile,awhay orfay ehay isay aay ashray oy,bay danay ethay olday entlemangay eadsdray aay
oreignfay aughter-in-lawday. Eway allshay oonsay eetmay inay Ome;ray danay en,thay
ifay Iay on'tday angechay ymay ind,may I'llay aysay Yes,'ay ankthay you,'ay enwhay ehay
ayssay Ill'Way you,ay ease?'play

Of"ay oursecay isthay isay lalay Ery_vay ivate_,pray utbay Iay ishedway youay otay owknay

ENDERtay OUBLEStRay.


O,"Jay I'may iousanxay outabay Eth."bay

Y,"Whay other,may eshay ashay eemedsay unusuallyay ellway incesay ethay abiesbay ame."cay

It's"ay otnay erhay ealthhay atthay oublestray emay ow;nay it'say erhay iritsspay. I'may uresay
erethay isay omethingsay onay erhay ind,may danay Iay antway youay otay iscoverday atwhay itay is."ay

At"Whay akesmay youay inkthay o,say other?"may

E"Shay itssay onealay aay oodgay eal,day danay oesn'tday alktay otay erhay atherfay saay uchmay saay
eshay useday. Iay oundfay erhay yingcray overay ethay abiesbay ethay otheray ayday. Enwhay eshay
ings,say ethay ongssay earay aysalway adsay ones,ay danay ownay danay enthay Iay eesay aay ooklay inay
erhay acefay atthay Iay on'tday understanday. Isthay isn'tay ikelay Eth,bay danay itay orriesway
e."may

Ave"Hay youay edaskay erhay outabay it?"ay

I"ay avehay iedtray onceay oray ice;tway utbay eshay eitheray evadeday ymay uestions,qay oray
ookedlay osay istressedday atthay Iay oppedstay. Iay evernay orcefay ymay ildren'schay
onfidence,cay danay Iay eldomsay avehay otay aitway orfay itay ong."lay

Smray. Archmay ancedglay taay Ojay saay eshay oke,spay utbay ethay acefay oppositeay eemedsay
uiteqay unconsciousay ofay yanay ecretsay isquietudeday utbay Eth's;bay ,anday eraftay
ewingsay oughtfullythay orfay aay inute,may Ojay aid,--say

I"ay inkthay eshay isay owinggray up,ay danay osay eginsbay otay eamdray eams,dray danay avehay
opeshay danay earsfay danay idgets,fay ithoutway owingknay y,whay oray eingbay eablay otay
explainay emthay. Y,whay other,may Eth'sbay eighteen,ay utbay eway on'tday ealizeray it,ay danay
eattray erhay ikelay aay ild,chay orgettingfay e'sshay aay oman."way

O"Say eshay isay. Earday eart,hay owhay astfay youay oday owgray up,"ay eturnedray erhay other,may
ithway aay ighsay danay aay ilesmay.

An't"Cay ebay elped,hay Armee,may osay youay ustmay esignray yourselfay otay lalay ortssay ofay
orries,way danay etlay youray irdsbay ophay outay ofay ethay est,nay oneay ybay oneay. Iay omisepray
evernay otay ophay eryvay ar,fay ifay atthay isay yanay omfortcay otay you."ay

It"ay isay aay eatgray omfort,cay O;jay Iay aysalway eelfay ongstray enwhay youay earay taay ome,hay
ownay Egmay isay onegay. Ethbay isay ootay eeblefay danay Yamay ootay youngay otay ependday upon;ay
utbay enwhay ethay ugtay omes,cay youay earay aysalway eady."ray

Y,"Whay youay owknay Iay on'tday indmay ardhay obsjay uch,may danay erethay ustmay aysalway ebay oneay
ubscray inay aay amilyfay. Yamay isay endidsplay inay inefay orks,way danay I'may ot;nay utbay Iay
eelfay inay ymay elementay enwhay lalay ethay arpetscay earay otay ebay akentay up,ay oray alfhay ethay
amilyfay allfay icksay taay onceay. Yamay isay istinguishingday erselfhay oad;abray utbay ifay
ythinganay isay issamay taay ome,hay I'may youray an."may

I"ay eavelay Ethbay otay youray ands,hay en,thay orfay eshay illway openay erhay endertay ittlelay
earthay otay erhay Ojay oonersay anthay otay yanay oneay elseay. Ebay eryvay ind,kay danay on'tday etlay
erhay inkthay yanay oneay atchesway oray alkstay outabay erhay. Ifay eshay onlyay ouldway etgay
uiteqay ongstray danay eerfulchay ain,agay Iay ouldn'tshay avehay aay ishway inay ethay orld."way

Appy"Hay oman!way I'veay otgay eaps."hay

Y"May ear,day atwhay earay ey?"thay

I'll"ay ettlesay Ethy'sbay oubles,tray danay enthay I'llay elltay youay inemay. Eythay earay otnay
eryvay earing,way osay ey'llthay eep;"kay danay Ojay itchedstay ay,away ithway aay iseway odnay
ichwhay etsay erhay other'smay earthay taay estray outabay er,hay orfay ethay esentpray taay
eastlay.

Ilewhay arentlyappay orbedabsay inay erhay ownay airs,affay Ojay atchedway Eth;bay ,anday
eraftay anymay onflictingcay onjectures,cay inallyfay ettledsay uponay oneay ichwhay
eemedsay otay explainay ethay angechay inay erhay. Aay ightslay incidentay avegay Ojay ethay ueclay
otay ethay ystery,may eshay ought,thay danay ivelylay ancy,fay ovinglay earthay idday ethay
estray. Eshay asway ectingaffay otay itewray usilybay oneay Aturdaysay ernoon,aftay enwhay eshay
danay Ethbay ereway onealay ogether;tay yetay saay eshay ibbled,scray eshay eptkay erhay eyeay onay
erhay ister,say owhay eemedsay unusuallyay uietqay. Ittingsay taay ethay indow,way Eth'sbay
orkway oftenay oppeddray intoay erhay ap,lay danay eshay eanedlay erhay eadhay uponay erhay and,hay
inay aay ejectedday itude,attay ilewhay erhay eyesay estedray onay ethay ull,day utumnalaay
andscapelay. Uddenlysay omesay oneay assedpay elow,bay istlingwhay ikelay naay operaticay
ackbird,blay danay aay oicevay alledcay out,--ay

illtay ishay uickqay amptray iedday ay,away enthay aidsay oftly,say saay ifay otay erself,--hay

Ow"Hay ongstray danay ellway danay appyhay atthay earday oybay ooks."lay

Um!""Hay aidsay O,jay illstay intentay uponay erhay ister'ssay ace;fay orfay ethay ightbray
olorcay adedfay saay uicklyqay saay itay ame,cay ethay ilesmay anished,vay danay esentlypray aay
eartay aylay iningshay onay ethay indow-ledgeway. Ethbay iskedwhay itay off,ay danay ancedglay
ehensivelyappray taay O;jay utbay eshay asway atchingscray ayaway taay aay emendoustray ate,ray
arentlyappay engrosseday inay Olympia's"ay Oath."ay Ethay instantay Ethbay urned,tay Ojay
eganbay erhay atchway ain,agay awsay Eth'sbay andhay ogay uietlyqay otay erhay eyesay oremay anthay
once,ay ,anday inay erhay alf-avertedhay ace,fay eadray aay endertay orrowsay atthay ademay erhay
ownay eyesay illfay. Earingfay otay etraybay erself,hay eshay ippedslay ay,away urmuringmay
omethingsay outabay eedingnay oremay aperpay.

Ercy"May onay e,may Ethbay oveslay Aurie!"lay eshay aid,say ittingsay ownday inay erhay ownay
oom,ray alepay ithway ethay ockshay ofay ethay iscoveryday ichwhay eshay elievedbay eshay adhay
ustjay ademay. I"ay evernay eamtdray ofay uchsay aay ingthay. Atwhay Ill__way othermay ay?say Iay
onderway ifay e--"hay erethay Ojay opped,stay danay urnedtay arletscay ithway aay uddensay
oughtthay. If"ay ehay ouldn'tshay ovelay ackbay ain,agay owhay eadfuldray itay ouldway ebay. Ehay
ust;may I'llay akemay im!"hay danay eshay ookshay erhay eadhay eateninglythray taay ethay
icturepay ofay ethay ischievous-lookingmay oybay aughinglay taay erhay omfray ethay allway.
Oh"ay ear,day eway Are__ay owinggray upay ithway aay engeancevay. Ere'shay Egmay arriedmay danay aay
amma,may Yamay ourishingflay ayaway taay Aris,pay danay Ethbay inay ovelay. I'may ethay onlyay oneay
atthay ashay ensesay enoughay otay eepkay outay ofay ischief."may Ojay oughtthay intentlyay orfay
aay inute,may ithway erhay eyesay ixedfay onay ethay icture;pay enthay eshay oothedsmay outay erhay
inkledwray orehead,fay danay aid,say ithway aay ecidedday odnay taay ethay acefay opposite,ay
O,"Nay ankthay you,ay ir;say you'reay eryvay arming,chay utbay you'veay onay oremay abilitystay
anthay aay eathercock;way osay youay eedn'tnay itewray ouchingtay otes,nay danay ilesmay inay
atthay insinuatingay ay,way orfay itay on'tway oday aay itbay ofay ood,gay danay Iay on'tway avehay
it."ay

Enthay eshay ighed,say danay ellfay intoay aay everie,ray omfray ichwhay eshay idday otnay akeway
illtay ethay earlyay ilighttway entsay erhay ownday otay aketay ewnay observations,ay ichwhay
onlyay onfirmedcay erhay uspicionsay. Oughthay Aurielay irtedflay ithway Yamay danay okedjay
ithway O,jay ishay annermay otay Ethbay adhay aysalway eenbay eculiarlypay indkay danay entle,gay
utbay osay asway everybody's;ay erefore,thay onay oneay oughtthay ofay imaginingay atthay ehay
aredcay oremay orfay erhay anthay orfay ethay othersay. Indeed,ay aay eneralgay impressionay adhay
evailedpray inay ethay amily,fay ofay ate,lay atthay Our"ay oy"bay asway ettinggay onderfay anthay
everay ofay O,jay o,whay owever,hay ouldn'tway earhay aay ordway uponay ethay ubject,say danay
oldedscay iolentlyvay ifay yanay oneay aredday otay uggestsay itay. Ifay eythay adhay ownknay ethay
ariousvay endertay assagespay ofay ethay astpay year,ay oray atherray emptsattay taay endertay
assagespay ichwhay adhay eenbay ippednay inay ethay ud,bay eythay ouldway avehay adhay ethay
immenseay atisfactionsay ofay aying,say I"ay oldtay youay o."say Utbay Ojay atedhay
Ilandering,""phay danay ouldn'tway owallay it,ay aysalway avinghay aay okejay oray aay ilesmay
eadyray taay ethay eastlay ignsay ofay impendingay angerday.

Enwhay Aurielay irstfay entway otay ollege,cay ehay ellfay inay ovelay outabay onceay aay onth;may
utbay esethay allsmay amesflay ereway saay iefbray saay ent,arday idday onay amage,day danay uchmay
usedamay O,jay owhay ooktay eatgray interestay inay ethay ernationsaltay ofay ope,hay espair,day
danay esignation,ray ichwhay ereway onfidedcay otay erhay inay eirthay eeklyway
onferencescay. Utbay erethay amecay aay imetay enwhay Aurielay easedcay otay orshipway taay anymay
ines,shray intedhay arklyday taay oneay absorbingall-ay assion,pay danay indulgeday
occasionallyay inay Yronicbay itsfay ofay oomglay. Enthay ehay oidedavay ethay endertay
ubjectsay ogether,altay otewray ilosophicalphay otesnay otay O,jay urnedtay udious,stay
danay avegay outay atthay ehay asway oinggay otay Ig,""day intendingay otay aduategray inay aay
azeblay ofay oryglay. Isthay uitedsay ethay youngay adylay etterbay anthay ilighttway
onfidences,cay endertay essurespray ofay ethay and,hay danay eloquentay ancesglay ofay ethay
eye;ay orfay ithway O,jay ainbray evelopedday earlieray anthay eart,hay danay eshay eferredpray
imaginaryay eroeshay otay ealray ones,ay ecause,bay enwhay iredtay ofay em,thay ethay ormerfay
ouldcay ebay utshay upay inay ethay in-kitchentay illtay alledcay or,fay danay ethay atterlay ereway
esslay anageablemay.

Ingsthay ereway inay isthay atestay enwhay ethay andgray iscoveryday asway ade,may danay Ojay
atchedway Aurielay atthay ightnay saay eshay adhay evernay oneday eforebay. Ifay eshay adhay otnay
otgay ethay ewnay ideaay intoay erhay ead,hay eshay ouldway avehay eensay othingnay unusualay inay
ethay actfay atthay Ethbay asway eryvay uiet,qay danay Aurielay eryvay indkay otay erhay. Utbay
avinghay ivengay ethay einray otay erhay ivelylay ancy,fay itay allopedgay ayaway ithway erhay taay
aay eatgray ace;pay danay ommoncay ense,say eingbay atherray eakenedway ybay aay onglay oursecay
ofay omanceray iting,wray idday otnay omecay otay ethay escueray. Saay usual,ay Ethbay aylay onay
ethay ofa,say danay Aurielay atsay inay aay owlay airchay oseclay y,bay usingamay erhay ithway lalay
ortssay ofay ossip;gay orfay eshay ependedday onay erhay eeklyway In,""spay danay ehay evernay
isappointedday erhay. Utbay atthay evening,ay Ojay anciedfay atthay Eth'sbay eyesay estedray
onay ethay ively,lay arkday acefay esidebay erhay ithway eculiarpay easure,play danay atthay eshay
istenedlay ithway intenseay interestay otay naay ountaccay ofay omesay excitingay
icket-match,cray oughthay ethay ases,phray Aught"cay offay aay ice,"tay Umped"stay offay ishay
ound,"gray danay E"thay eglay ithay orfay ee,"thray ereway saay intelligibleay otay erhay saay
Anscritsay. Eshay oalsay ancied,fay avinghay etsay erhay earthay uponay eeingsay it,ay atthay
eshay awsay aay ertaincay increaseay ofay entlenessgay inay Aurie'slay anner,may atthay ehay
oppeddray ishay oicevay ownay danay en,thay aughedlay esslay anthay usual,ay asway aay ittlelay
ent-minded,absay danay ettledsay ethay anafghay overay Eth'sbay eetfay ithway naay iduityassay
atthay asway eallyray ostalmay endertay.

O"Whay ows?knay angerstray ingsthay avehay appened,"hay oughtthay O,jay saay eshay ussedfay
outabay ethay oomray. E"Shay illway akemay uiteqay naay elangay ofay im,hay danay ehay illway akemay
ifelay elightfullyday easyay danay easantplay orfay ethay ear,day ifay eythay onlyay ovelay eachay
otheray. Iay on'tday eesay owhay ehay ancay elphay it;ay danay Iay oday elievebay ehay ouldway ifay ethay
estray ofay usay ereway outay ofay ethay ay."way

Saay everyay oneay As__way outay ofay ethay ayway utbay erself,hay Ojay eganbay otay eelfay atthay
eshay oughtay otay isposeday ofay erselfhay ithway lalay eedspay. Utbay erewhay ouldshay eshay o?gay
danay urningbay otay aylay erselfhay uponay ethay ineshray ofay isterlysay evotion,day eshay atsay
ownday otay ettlesay atthay ointpay.

Ow,nay ethay olday ofasay asway aay egularray atriarchpay ofay aay ofa,--long,say oad,bray
ell-cushioned,way danay ow;lay aay ifletray abby,shay saay ellway itay ightmay e,bay orfay ethay
irlsgay adhay eptslay danay awledspray onay itay saay abies,bay ishedfay overay ethay ack,bay oderay
onay ethay ,armsay danay adhay enageriesmay underay itay saay ildren,chay danay estedray iredtay
eads,hay eameddray eams,dray danay istenedlay otay endertay alktay onay itay saay youngay omenway.
Eythay lalay ovedlay it,ay orfay itay asway aay amilyfay efuge,ray danay oneay ornercay adhay aysalway
eenbay O'sjay avoritefay ounging-placelay. Ongamay ethay anymay illowspay atthay ornedaday
ethay enerablevay ouchcay asway one,ay ard,hay ound,ray overedcay ithway icklypray
orsehair,hay danay urnishedfay ithway aay obbyknay uttonbay taay eachay end;ay isthay
epulsiveray illowpay asway erhay especialay operty,pray eingbay useday saay aay eaponway ofay
efence,day aay arricade,bay oray aay ernstay eventivepray ofay ootay uchmay umberslay.

Aurielay ewknay isthay illowpay ell,way danay adhay ausecay otay egardray itay ithway eepday
ersion,avay avinghay eenbay unmercifullyay ummelledpay ithway itay inay ormerfay ays,day
enwhay ompingray asway owed,allay danay ownay equentlyfray ebarredday ybay itay omfray akingtay
ethay eatsay ehay ostmay oveted,cay extnay otay Ojay inay ethay ofasay ornercay. Ifay E"thay
ausage"say saay eythay alledcay it,ay oodstay onay end,ay itay asway aay ignsay atthay ehay ightmay
oachappray danay epose;ray utbay ifay itay aylay atflay ossacray ethay ofa,say oeway otay ethay an,may
oman,way oray ildchay owhay aredday isturbday it!ay Atthay eveningay Ojay orgotfay otay
arricadebay erhay orner,cay danay adhay otnay eenbay inay erhay eatsay ivefay inutes,may eforebay
aay assivemay ormfay earedappay esidebay er,hay ,anday ithway othbay sarmay eadspray overay ethay
ofa-back,say othbay onglay egslay etchedstray outay eforebay im,hay Aurielay exclaimed,ay
ithway aay ighsay ofay atisfaction,--say

Ow,"Nay Is__thay isay illingfay taay ethay ice."pray

Illustration:[ay Ow,nay isthay isay illingfay taay ethay ice]pray

O"Nay ang,"slay appedsnay O,jay ammingslay ownday ethay illowpay. Utbay itay asway ootay ate,lay
erethay asway onay oomray orfay it;ay ,anday oastingcay onay otay ethay oor,flay itay isappearedday
inay aay ostmay ysteriousmay annermay.

Ome,"Cay O,jay on'tday ebay ornythay. Eraftay udyingstay imselfhay otay aay eletonskay lalay ethay
eek,way aay ellowfay eservesday etting,pay danay oughtay otay etgay it."ay

Eth"Bay illway etpay you;ay I'may usy."bay

O,"Nay e'sshay otnay otay ebay otheredbay ithway e;may utbay youay ikelay atthay ortsay ofay ing,thay
unlessay you'veay uddenlysay ostlay youray astetay orfay itay. Avehay you?ay Oday youay atehay
youray oy,bay danay antway otay irefay illowspay taay im?"hay

Ythinganay oremay eedlesomewhay anthay atthay ouchingtay ealappay asway eldomsay eard,hay
utbay Ojay uenchedqay Er"hay oy"bay ybay urningtay onay imhay ithway ethay ernstay uery,--qay

Ow"Hay anymay ouquetsbay avehay youay entsay Issmay Andalray isthay eek?"way

Ot"Nay one,ay uponay ymay ordway. E'sshay engageday. Ownay en."thay

I'm"ay adglay ofay it;ay at'sthay oneay ofay youray oolishfay extravagances,--sendingay
owersflay danay ingsthay otay irlsgay orfay omwhay youay on'tday arecay otway ins,"pay ontinuedcay
Ojay eprovinglyray.

Ensible"Say irls,gay orfay omwhay Iay oday arecay olewhay aperspay ofay ins,pay on'tway etlay emay
endsay emthay Owers'flay danay ings,'thay osay atwhay ancay Iay o?day Ymay eelingsfay ustmay avehay
aay Ent_."_way

Other"May oesn'tday oveappray ofay irting,flay evenay inay un;fay danay youay oday irtflay
esperately,day Eddy."tay

I'd"ay ivegay ythinganay ifay Iay ouldcay er,answay O'Say oday you.'ay Saay Iay an't,cay I'llay
erelymay aysay atthay Iay on'tday eesay yanay armhay inay atthay easantplay ittlelay ame,gay ifay
lalay artiespay understanday atthay it'say onlyay ay."play

Ell,"Way itay oesday ooklay easant,play utbay Iay an'tcay earnlay owhay it'say oneday. I'veay
ied,tray ecausebay oneay eelsfay ardawkway inay ompany,cay otnay otay oday saay everybodyay elseay
isay oing;day utbay Iay on'tday eemsay otay etgay on,"ay aidsay O,jay orgettingfay otay ayplay
Entormay.

Ake"Tay essonslay ofay Y;amay eshay ashay aay egularray alenttay orfay it."ay

Yes,"ay eshay oesday itay eryvay ettily,pray danay evernay eemssay otay ogay ootay arfay. Iay
upposesay it'say aturalnay otay omesay eoplepay otay easeplay ithoutway ying,tray danay othersay
otay aysalway aysay danay oday ethay ongwray ingthay inay ethay ongwray ace."play

I'm"ay adglay youay an'tcay irt;flay it'say eallyray efreshingray otay eesay aay ensible,say
aightforwardstray irl,gay owhay ancay ebay ollyjay danay indkay ithoutway akingmay aay oolfay ofay
erselfhay. Etweenbay ourselves,ay O,jay omesay ofay ethay irlsgay Iay owknay eallyray oday ogay onay
taay uchsay aay ateray I'may amedashay ofay emthay. Eythay on'tday eanmay yanay arm,hay I'may ure;say
utbay ifay eythay ewknay owhay eway ellowsfay alkedtay outabay emthay erward,aftay ey'dthay endmay
eirthay ays,way Iay ancy."fay

Ey"Thay oday ethay ame;say ,anday saay eirthay onguestay earay ethay arpest,shay youay ellowsfay
etgay ethay orstway ofay it,ay orfay youay earay saay illysay saay ey,thay everyay itbay. Ifay youay
ehavedbay operly,pray eythay ould;way ut,bay owingknay youay ikelay eirthay onsense,nay eythay
eepkay itay up,ay danay enthay youay ameblay em."thay

Uch"May youay owknay outabay it,ay a'am,"may aidsay Aurie,lay inay aay uperiorsay onetay. E"Way
on'tday ikelay ompsray danay irts,flay oughthay eway aymay tacay saay ifay eway idday ometimessay.
Ethay etty,pray odestmay irlsgay earay evernay alkedtay out,abay exceptay espectfully,ray
ongamay entlemengay. Essblay youray innocentay oul!say Ifay youay ouldcay ebay inay ymay aceplay
orfay aay onthmay you'day eesay ingsthay atthay ouldway onishastay youay aay ifletray. Uponay ymay
ord,way enwhay Iay eesay oneay ofay osethay arum-scarumhay irls,gay Iay aysalway antway otay aysay
ithway ouray iendfray Ockcay Obin,--ray

Out"'ay uponay you,ay iefay uponay you,ay
Old-facedbay ig!'"jay

Itay asway impossibleay otay elphay aughinglay taay ethay unnyfay onflictcay etweenbay
Aurie'slay ivalrouschay eluctanceray otay eakspay illay ofay omankind,way danay ishay eryvay
aturalnay islikeday ofay ethay unfeminineay ollyfay ofay ichwhay ashionablefay ocietysay
owedshay imhay anymay amplessay. Ojay ewknay atthay Young"ay Aurence"lay asway egardedray saay aay
ostmay eligibleay Arti__pay ybay orldlyway ammas,may asway uchmay iledsmay uponay ybay eirthay
aughters,day danay atteredflay enoughay ybay adieslay ofay lalay esagay otay akemay aay oxcombcay
ofay im;hay osay eshay atchedway imhay atherray ealously,jay earingfay ehay ouldway ebay oilt,spay
danay ejoicedray oremay anthay eshay onfessedcay otay indfay atthay ehay illstay elievedbay inay
odestmay irlsgay. Eturningray uddenlysay otay erhay onitoryadmay one,tay eshay aid,say
oppingdray erhay oice,vay If"ay youay Ust__may avehay aay Ent,''way Eddy,tay ogay danay evoteday
yourselfay otay oneay ofay ethay Etty,'pray odestmay irls'gay omwhay youay oday espect,ray danay
otnay asteway youray imetay ithway ethay illysay ones."ay

You"ay eallyray iseadvay it?"ay danay Aurielay ookedlay taay erhay ithway naay odday ixturemay ofay
ietyanxay danay errimentmay inay ishay acefay.

Yes,"ay Iay o;day utbay you'day etterbay aitway illtay youay earay oughthray ollege,cay onay ethay
ole,whay danay ebay ittingfay yourselfay orfay ethay aceplay eantimemay. You'reay otnay alfhay
oodgay enoughay or--well,fay oeverwhay ethay odestmay irlgay aybe,"may danay Ojay ookedlay aay
ittlelay ueerqay ikewise,lay orfay aay amenay adhay ostalmay escapeday erhay.

At"Thay I'may ot!"nay uiescedacqay Aurie,lay ithway naay expressionay ofay umilityhay uiteqay
ewnay otay im,hay saay ehay oppeddray ishay eyes,ay danay entlyabsay oundway O'sjay on-tasselapray
oundray ishay ingerfay.

Ercy"May onay us,ay isthay illway evernay o,"day oughtthay O;jay ingadday oud,alay O"Gay danay
ingsay otay emay. I'may yingday orfay omesay usic,may danay aysalway ikelay yours."ay

I'd"ay atherray aystay ere,hay ankthay you."ay

Ell,"Way youay an't;cay erethay isn'tay oomray. Ogay danay akemay yourselfay useful,ay incesay
youay earay ootay igbay otay ebay ornamentalay. Iay oughtthay youay atedhay otay ebay iedtay otay aay
oman'sway on-string?"apray etortedray O,jay uotingqay ertaincay ebelliousray ordsway ofay
ishay ownay.

Ah,"ay atthay ependsday onay owhay earsway ethay on!"apray danay Aurielay avegay naay udaciousaay
eaktway taay ethay asseltay.

Are"ay youay oing?"gay emandedday O,jay ivingday orfay ethay illowpay.

Ehay edflay taay once,ay danay ethay inutemay itay asway ellway Up"ay ithway ethay onnetsbay ofay
onniebay Undee,"day eshay ippedslay ay,away otay eturnray onay oremay illtay ethay youngay
entlemangay adhay epartedday inay ighhay udgeonday.

Illustration:[ay Upay ithway ethay Onnetsbay ofay Onniebay Undee]day

Ojay aylay onglay akeaway atthay ight,nay danay asway ustjay oppingdray offay enwhay ethay oundsay
ofay aay ifledstay obsay ademay erhay yflay otay Eth'sbay edside,bay ithway ethay iousanxay
inquiry,ay At"Whay isay it,ay ear?"day

I"ay oughtthay youay ereway eep,"aslay obbedsay Ethbay.

Is"ay itay ethay olday ain,pay ymay ecious?"pray

O;"Nay it'say aay ewnay one;ay utbay Iay ancay earbay it,"ay danay Ethbay iedtray otay eckchay erhay
earstay.

Ell"Tay emay lalay outabay it,ay danay etlay emay urecay itay saay Iay oftenay idday ethay other."ay

You"ay an't;cay erethay isay onay ure."cay Erethay Eth'sbay oicevay avegay ay,way ,anday
ingingclay otay erhay ister,say eshay iedcray osay espairinglyday atthay Ojay asway
ightenedfray.

Ere"Whay isay it?ay Allshay Iay allcay other?"may

Ethbay idday otnay eransway ethay irstfay uestion;qay utbay inay ethay arkday oneay andhay entway
involuntarilyay otay erhay eart,hay saay ifay ethay ainpay ereway ere;thay ithway ethay otheray
eshay eldhay Ojay ast,fay isperingwhay eagerly,ay O,"Nay o,nay on'tday allcay er,hay on'tday
elltay erhay. Iay allshay ebay etterbay oonsay. Ielay ownday erehay danay Oor''pay ymay eadhay. I'llay
ebay uiet,qay danay ogay otay eep;slay indeeday Iay ill."way

Ojay obeyed;ay utbay saay erhay andhay entway oftlysay otay danay ofray ossacray Eth'sbay othay
oreheadfay danay etway eyelids,ay erhay earthay asway eryvay ull,fay danay eshay ongedlay otay
eakspay. Utbay youngay saay eshay as,way Ojay adhay earnedlay atthay earts,hay ikelay owers,flay
annotcay ebay udelyray andled,hay utbay ustmay openay aturally;nay o,say oughthay eshay
elievedbay eshay ewknay ethay ausecay ofay Eth'sbay ewnay ain,pay eshay onlyay aid,say inay erhay
enderesttay one,tay Oes"Day ythinganay oubletray you,ay eary?"day

Yes,"ay O,"jay eraftay aay onglay ausepay.

Ouldn't"Way itay omfortcay youay otay elltay emay atwhay itay is?"ay

Ot"Nay ow,nay otnay yet."ay

En"Thay Iay on'tway ;askay utbay emember,ray Ethy,bay atthay othermay danay Ojay earay aysalway
adglay otay earhay danay elphay you,ay ifay eythay an."cay

I"ay owknay itay. I'llay elltay youay ybay danay y."bay

Is"ay ethay ainpay etterbay ow?"nay

Oh,"ay yes,ay uchmay etter;bay youay earay osay omfortable,cay O!"jay

O"Gay otay eep,slay ear;day I'llay aystay ithway you."ay

Osay eekchay otay eekchay eythay ellfay eep,aslay danay onay ethay orrowmay Ethbay eemedsay uiteqay
erselfhay ain;agay orfay taay eighteen,ay eithernay eadshay ornay eartshay eachay ong,lay danay
aay ovinglay ordway ancay edicinemay ostmay illsay.

Utbay Ojay adhay ademay upay erhay ind,may ,anday eraftay onderingpay overay aay ojectpray orfay
omesay ays,day eshay onfidedcay itay otay erhay othermay.

You"ay edaskay emay ethay otheray ayday atwhay ymay ishesway ereway. I'llay elltay youay oneay ofay
em,thay Armee,"may eshay egan,bay saay eythay atsay onealay ogethertay. I"ay antway otay ogay ayaway
omewheresay isthay interway orfay aay ange."chay

Y,"Whay O?"jay danay erhay othermay ookedlay upay uickly,qay saay ifay ethay ordsway uggestedsay aay
oubleday eaningmay.

Ithway erhay eyesay onay erhay ork,way Ojay eredansway oberly,say I"ay antway omethingsay ew;nay Iay
eelfay estless,ray danay iousanxay otay ebay eeing,say oing,day danay earninglay oremay anthay Iay
maay. Iay oodbray ootay uchmay overay ymay ownay allsmay airs,affay danay eednay irringstay up,ay
o,say saay Iay ancay ebay aredspay isthay inter,way I'day ikelay otay ophay aay ittlelay ay,way danay
ytray ymay ings."way

Ere"Whay illway youay op?"hay

O"Tay Ewnay Yorkay. Iay adhay aay ightbray ideaay yesterday,ay danay isthay isay itay. Youay owknay
Smray. Irkekay otewray otay youay orfay omesay espectableray youngay ersonpay otay eachtay erhay
ildrenchay danay ewsay. It'say atherray ardhay otay indfay ustjay ethay ing,thay utbay Iay inkthay Iay
ouldshay uitsay ifay Iay ied."tray

Y"May ear,day ogay outay otay ervicesay inay atthay eatgray oarding-house!"bay danay Smray.
Archmay ookedlay urprised,say utbay otnay ispleasedday.

It's"ay otnay exactlyay oinggay outay otay ervice;say orfay Smray. Irkekay isay youray
iend,--thefray indestkay oulsay atthay everay ived,--andlay ouldway akemay ingsthay
easantplay orfay e,may Iay owknay. Erhay amilyfay isay eparatesay omfray ethay est,ray danay onay
oneay owsknay emay erethay. On'tday arecay ifay eythay o;day it'say onesthay ork,way danay I'may otnay
amedashay ofay it."ay

Or"Nay I;ay utbay youray iting?"wray

All"ay ethay etterbay orfay ethay angechay. Iay allshay eesay danay earhay ewnay ings,thay etgay ewnay
ideas,ay ,anday evenay ifay Iay aven'thay uchmay imetay ere,thay Iay allshay ingbray omehay
uantitiesqay ofay aterialmay orfay ymay ubbish."ray

I"ay avehay onay oubtday ofay it;ay utbay earay esethay youray onlyay easonsray orfay isthay uddensay
ancy?"fay

O,"Nay other."may

Ay"May Iay owknay ethay others?"ay

Ojay ookedlay upay danay Ojay ookedlay own,day enthay aidsay owly,slay ithway uddensay olorcay inay
erhay eeks,chay It"ay aymay ebay ainvay danay ongwray otay aysay it,ay ut--I'mbay aid--Laurieafray
isay ettinggay ootay ondfay ofay e."may

En"Thay youay on'tday arecay orfay imhay inay ethay ayway itay isay evidentay ehay eginsbay otay arecay
orfay you?"ay danay Smray. Archmay ookedlay iousanxay saay eshay utpay ethay uestionqay.

Ercy,"May o!nay Iay ovelay ethay earday oy,bay saay Iay aysalway ave,hay danay maay immenselyay
oudpray ofay im;hay utbay saay orfay ythinganay ore,may it'say outay ofay ethay uestion."qay

I'm"ay adglay ofay at,thay O."jay

Y,"Whay ease?"play

Ecause,"Bay ear,day Iay on'tday inkthay youay uitedsay otay oneay otheranay. Saay iendsfray youay
earay eryvay appy,hay danay youray equentfray uarrelsqay oonsay owblay over;ay utbay Iay earfay
youay ouldway othbay ebelray ifay youay ereway atedmay orfay ifelay. Youay earay ootay uchmay ikealay
danay ootay ondfay ofay eedom,fray otnay otay entionmay othay emperstay danay ongstray ills,way otay
etgay onay appilyhay ogether,tay inay aay elationray ichwhay eedsnay infiniteay atiencepay danay
orbearance,fay saay ellway saay ove."lay

At's"Thay ustjay ethay eelingfay Iay ad,hay oughthay Iay ouldn'tcay expressay itay. I'may adglay
youay inkthay ehay isay onlyay eginningbay otay arecay orfay emay. Itay ouldway oubletray emay adlysay
otay akemay imhay unhappy;ay orfay Iay ouldn'tcay allfay inay ovelay ithway ethay earday olday
ellowfay erelymay outay ofay atitude,gray ouldcay I?"ay

You"ay earay uresay ofay ishay eelingfay orfay you?"ay

Ethay olorcay eepenedday inay O'sjay eeks,chay saay eshay ered,answay ithway ethay ooklay ofay
ingledmay easure,play ide,pray danay ainpay ichwhay youngay irlsgay earway enwhay eakingspay
ofay irstfay overs,--lay

I'm"ay aidafray itay isay o,say other;may ehay asn'thay aidsay ything,anay utbay ehay ookslay aay
eatgray ealday. Iay inkthay Iay adhay etterbay ogay ayaway eforebay itay omescay otay ything."anay

I"ay eeagray ithway you,ay danay ifay itay ancay ebay anagedmay youay allshay o."gay

Ojay ookedlay elieved,ray ,anday eraftay aay ause,pay aid,say iling,smay Ow"Hay Smray. Offatmay
ouldway onderway taay youray antway ofay anagement,may ifay eshay ew;knay danay owhay eshay illway
ejoiceray atthay Ieannay illstay aymay ope."hay

Ah,"ay O,jay othersmay aymay ifferday inay eirthay anagement,may utbay ethay opehay isay ethay
amesay inay eall,--thay esireday otay eesay eirthay ildrenchay appyhay. Egmay isay o,say danay Iay
maay ontentcay ithway erhay uccesssay. Youay Iay eavelay otay enjoyay youray ibertylay illtay youay
iretay ofay it;ay orfay onlyay enthay illway youay indfay atthay erethay isay omethingsay eetersway.
Yamay isay ymay iefchay arecay ow,nay utbay erhay oodgay ensesay illway elphay erhay. Orfay Eth,bay Iay
indulgeay onay opeshay exceptay atthay eshay aymay ebay ellway. Ybay ethay ay,way eshay eemssay
ighterbray isthay astlay ayday oray otway. Avehay youay okenspay otay er?"hay

Yes;"ay eshay owneday eshay adhay aay ouble,tray danay omisedpray otay elltay emay ybay danay ybay. Iay
aidsay onay ore,may orfay Iay inkthay Iay owknay it;"ay danay Ojay oldtay erhay ittlelay orystay.

Smray. Archmay ookshay erhay ead,hay danay idday otnay aketay osay omanticray aay iewvay ofay ethay
ase,cay utbay ookedlay ave,gray danay epeatedray erhay opinionay at,thay orfay Aurie'slay
ake,say Ojay ouldshay ogay ayaway orfay aay imetay.

Et"Lay usay aysay othingnay outabay itay otay imhay illtay ethay anplay isay ettled;say enthay I'llay
unray ayaway eforebay ehay ancay ollectcay ishay itsway danay ebay agicaltray. Ethbay ustmay inkthay
I'may oinggay otay easeplay yself,may saay Iay ,amay orfay Iay an'tcay alktay outabay Aurielay otay
er;hay utbay eshay ancay etpay danay omfortcay imhay eraftay I'may one,gay danay osay urecay imhay ofay
isthay omanticray otionnay. E'shay eenbay oughthray osay anymay ittlelay ialstray ofay ethay
ort,say e'shay useday otay it,ay danay illway oonsay etgay overay ishay ove-lornity."lay

Ojay okespay opefully,hay utbay ouldcay otnay idray erselfhay ofay ethay orebodingfay earfay
atthay isthay Ittle"lay ial"tray ouldway ebay arderhay anthay ethay others,ay danay atthay
Aurielay ouldway otnay etgay overay ishay Ove-lornity""lay saay easilyay saay eretoforehay.

Ethay anplay asway alkedtay overay inay aay amilyfay ouncil,cay danay eedagray upon;ay orfay Smray.
Irkekay adlyglay eptedaccay O,jay danay omisedpray otay akemay aay easantplay omehay orfay erhay.
Ethay eachingtay ouldway enderray erhay independent;ay danay uchsay eisurelay saay eshay otgay
ightmay ebay ademay ofitablepray ybay iting,wray ilewhay ethay ewnay enesscay danay ocietysay
ouldway ebay othbay usefulay danay eeableagray. Ojay ikedlay ethay ospectpray danay asway eageray
otay ebay one,gay orfay ethay ome-nesthay asway owinggray ootay arrownay orfay erhay estlessray
aturenay danay enturousadvay iritspay. Enwhay lalay asway ettled,say ithway earfay danay
emblingtray eshay oldtay Aurie;lay utbay otay erhay urprisesay ehay ooktay itay eryvay uietlyqay.
Ehay adhay eenbay avergray anthay usualay ofay ate,lay utbay eryvay easant;play ,anday enwhay
okinglyjay usedaccay ofay urningtay overay aay ewnay eaf,lay ehay eredansway oberly,say O"Say Iay
;amay danay Iay eanmay isthay oneay allshay aystay urned."tay

Ojay asway eryvay uchmay elievedray atthay oneay ofay ishay irtuousvay itsfay ouldshay omecay onay
ustjay en,thay danay ademay erhay eparationspray ithway aay ightenedlay eart,--forhay Ethbay
eemedsay oremay eerful,--andchay opedhay eshay asway oingday ethay estbay orfay lalay.

One"ay ingthay Iay eavelay otay youray especialay are,"cay eshay aid,say ethay ightnay eforebay
eshay eftlay.

You"ay eanmay youray apers?"pay edaskay Ethbay.

O,"Nay ymay oybay. Ebay eryvay oodgay otay im,hay on'tway you?"ay

Of"ay oursecay Iay ill;way utbay Iay an'tcay illfay youray ace,play danay e'llhay issmay youay
adly."say

It"ay on'tway urthay im;hay osay emember,ray Iay eavelay imhay inay youray arge,chay otay ague,play
et,pay danay eepkay inay order."ay

I'll"ay oday ymay est,bay orfay youray ake,"say omisedpray Eth,bay onderingway ywhay Ojay ookedlay
taay erhay osay ueerlyqay.
