IIIxXXay.

O'Sjay OURNALjay.


EW"Nay YORK,ay Ovembernay.

EAR"Day ARMEEmay DaNay ETH,--bay

I'm"ay oinggay otay itewray youay aay egularray olume,vay orfay I'veay otgay eapshay otay
ell,tay oughthay I'may otnay aay inefay youngay adylay avellingtray onay ethay
ontinentcay. Enwhay Iay ostlay ightsay ofay ather'sfay earday olday ace,fay Iay eltfay aay
ifletray ue,blay danay ightmay avehay edshay aay inybray opdray oray o,tway ifay naay
Irishay adylay ithway ourfay allsmay ildren,chay lalay yingcray oremay oray ess,lay
adn'thay ivertedday ymay ind;may orfay Iay usedamay yselfmay ybay oppingdray
ingerbreadgay utsnay overay ethay eatsay everyay imetay eythay openeday eirthay
outhsmay otay oarray.

Oon"Say ethay unsay amecay out,ay danay akingtay itay saay aay oodgay omen,ay Iay earedclay
upay ikewise,lay danay enjoyeday ymay ourneyjay ithway lalay ymay earthay.

S"Mray. Irkekay elcomedway emay osay indlykay Iay eltfay taay omehay taay once,ay evenay
inay atthay igbay ousehay ullfay ofay angersstray. Eshay avegay emay aay unnyfay ittlelay
y-parlor--allskay eshay ad;hay utbay erethay isay aay ovestay inay it,ay danay aay icenay
abletay inay aay unnysay indow,way osay Iay ancay itsay erehay danay itewray eneverwhay Iay
ikelay. Aay inefay iewvay danay aay urch-towerchay oppositeay oneatay orfay ethay anymay
airs,stay danay Iay ooktay aay ancyfay otay ymay enday onay ethay otspay. Ethay ursery,nay
erewhay Iay maay otay eachtay danay ew,say isay aay easantplay oomray extnay Smray.
Irke'skay ivatepray arlor,pay danay ethay otway ittlelay irlsgay earay ettypray
ildren,--ratherchay oilt,spay Iay ancy,fay utbay eythay ooktay otay emay eraftay
ellingtay emthay E'Thay Evensay Adbay Igs;'pay danay I'veay onay oubtday Iay allshay
akemay aay odelmay overnessgay.

I"ay maay otay avehay ymay ealsmay ithway ethay ildren,chay ifay Iay eferpray itay otay ethay

oughthay onay oneay illway elievebay itay.

aymay upposesay ithway uchsay aay amily;fay utbay aay eatgray ietyanxay illway ebay offay

aysalway openay otay you,ay danay youray ownay allshay ebay saay omfortablecay saay Iay
ancay akemay itay. Erethay earay omesay easantplay eoplepay inay ethay ousehay ifay youay

ea-bell;tay Iay ustmay unray danay angechay ymay ap;'cay danay offay eshay ustled,bay
eavinglay emay otay ettlesay yselfmay inay ymay ewnay estnay.

S"Mray. Kay. oldtay emay ehay asway omfray Erlin;bay eryvay earnedlay danay ood,gay utbay

Ursday._"_Thay

Yesterday"ay asway aay uietqay ay,day entspay inay eaching,tay ewing,say danay
itingwray inay ymay ittlelay oom,ray ichwhay isay eryvay osey,cay ithway aay ightlay danay

owhay oesday ethay inefay ironingay inay ethay aundrylay erehay. Ethay ittlelay ingthay

ofay okesjay onay ishay amenay. Utbay ehay enjoysay itay ikelay aay oy,bay Smray. Kay. ays,say
danay akestay itay osay ood-naturedlygay atthay eythay lalay ikelay im,hay inay itespay
ofay ishay oreignfay aysway.

omesay ewspapersnay orfay Smray. Irkekay. Eshay asn'tway ere,thay utbay Innie,may

Aturday._"_Say

Othing"Nay ashay appenedhay otay itewray out,abay exceptay aay allcay onay Issmay
Orton,nay owhay ashay aay oomray ullfay ofay ovelylay ings,thay danay owhay asway eryvay
arming,chay orfay eshay owedshay emay lalay erhay easures,tray danay edaskay emay ifay Iay
ouldway ometimessay ogay ithway erhay otay ectureslay danay oncerts,cay saay erhay
escort,--ifay Iay enjoyeday emthay. Eshay utpay itay saay aay avor,fay utbay I'may uresay
Smray. Irkekay ashay oldtay erhay outabay us,ay danay eshay oesday itay outay ofay
indnesskay otay emay. I'may saay oudpray saay Ucifer,lay utbay uchsay avorsfay omfray
uchsay eoplepay on'tday urdenbay e,may danay Iay eptedaccay atefullygray.

En"Whay Iay otgay ackbay otay ethay urserynay erethay asway uchsay naay uproaray inay ethay
arlorpay atthay Iay ookedlay in;ay danay erethay asway Rmay. Aerbhay ownday onay ishay
andshay danay ees,knay ithway Inatay onay ishay ack,bay Ittykay eadinglay imhay ithway aay
ump-rope,jay danay Inniemay eedingfay otway allsmay oysbay ithway eed-cakes,say saay
eythay oaredray danay ampedray inay agescay uiltbay ofay airschay.

E"'Way earay ayingplay Argerie_,'_nay explaineday Ittykay.

Is"'Day isay inemay effalunt!'ay edadday Ina,tay oldinghay onay ybay ethay
Ofessor'spray airhay.

Illustration:[ay Isday isay inemay effalunt]ay

Amma"'May aysalway owsallay usay otay oday atwhay eway ikelay Aturdaysay ernoon,aftay
enwhay Anzfray danay Emilay ome,cay oesn'tday e,shay Rmay. Aer?'bhay aidsay
Inniemay.

E"Thay Effalunt''ay atsay up,ay ookinglay saay uchmay inay earnestay saay yanay ofay
em,thay danay aidsay oberlysay otay e,--may

I"'ay ifgay youay ymay ortway itay isay osay. Ifay eway akemay ootay argelay aay oisenay youay
allshay aysay Ush!""Hay otay us,ay danay eway ogay oremay oftly.'say

I"ay omisedpray otay oday o,say utbay eftlay ethay oorday open,ay danay enjoyeday ethay
unfay saay uchmay saay eythay id,--forday aay oremay oriousglay olicfray Iay evernay
itnessedway. Eythay ayedplay agtay danay oldiers,say ancedday danay ung,say danay
enwhay itay eganbay otay owgray arkday eythay lalay iledpay onay otay ethay ofasay outabay
ethay Ofessor,pray ilewhay ehay oldtay armingchay airyfay oriesstay ofay ethay
orksstay onay ethay imney-tops,chay danay ethay ittlelay Obolds,''kay owhay ideray
ethay ow-flakessnay saay eythay allfay. Iay ishway Ericansamay ereway saay implesay
danay aturalnay saay Ermans,gay on'tday you?ay

I'm"ay osay ondfay ofay iting,wray Iay ouldshay ogay inningspay onay oreverfay ifay
otivesmay ofay economyay idn'tday opstay e,may orfay oughthay I'veay useday inthay
aperpay danay ittenwray ine,fay Iay embletray otay inkthay ofay ethay ampsstay isthay
onglay etterlay illway eednay. Aypray orwardfay Y'samay saay oonsay saay youay ancay
arespay emthay. Ymay allsmay ewsnay illway oundsay eryvay atflay eraftay erhay
endors,splay utbay youay illway ikelay em,thay Iay owknay. Isay Eddytay udyingstay osay
ardhay atthay ehay an'tcay indfay imetay otay itewray otay ishay iends?fray Aketay oodgay
arecay ofay imhay orfay e,may Eth,bay danay elltay emay lalay outabay ethay abies,bay danay
ivegay eapshay ofay ovelay otay everyay oneay.

Om"Fray youray aithfulfay Ojay.

P"ay. Say. Onay eadingray overay ymay etterlay itay ikesstray emay saay atherray Aery;bhay
utbay Iay maay aysalway interesteday inay odday eople,pay danay Iay eallyray adhay
othingnay elseay otay itewray outabay. Essblay you!"ay

ECEMBER"Day.

Y"May ECIOUSpRay ETSEY,--bay

As"ay isthay isay otay ebay aay ibble-scrabblescray etter,lay Iay irectday itay otay
you,ay orfay itay aymay useamay you,ay danay ivegay youay omesay ideaay ofay ymay oingsgay
on;ay or,fay oughthay uiet,qay eythay earay atherray using,amay orfay ich,whay oh,ay
ebay oyful!jay Eraftay atwhay Yamay ouldway allcay Erculaneumhay efforts,ay inay ethay
ayway ofay entalmay danay oralmay iculture,agray ymay youngay ideasay eginbay otay
ootshay danay ymay ittlelay igstway otay endbay saay Iay ouldcay ishway. Eythay earay otnay
osay interestingay otay emay saay Inatay danay ethay oys,bay utbay Iay oday ymay utyday ybay
em,thay danay eythay earay ondfay ofay emay. Anzfray danay Emilay earay ollyjay ittlelay
ads,lay uiteqay eraftay ymay ownay eart;hay orfay ethay ixturemay ofay Ermangay danay
Ericanamay iritspay inay emthay oducespray aay onstantcay atestay ofay
effervescenceay. Aturdaysay ernoonsaftay earay iotousray imes,tay etherwhay
entspay inay ethay ousehay oray out;ay orfay onay easantplay aysday eythay lalay ogay otay
alk,way ikelay aay eminary,say ithway ethay Ofessorpray danay yselfmay otay eepkay
order;ay danay enthay uchsay un!fay

E"Way earay eryvay oodgay iendsfray ow,nay danay I'veay egunbay otay aketay essonslay. Iay
eallyray ouldn'tcay elphay it,ay danay itay lalay amecay outabay inay uchsay aay olldray
ayway atthay Iay ustmay elltay youay. Otay eginbay taay ethay eginning,bay Smray. Irkekay
alledcay otay e,may oneay ay,day saay Iay assedpay Rmay. Aer'sbhay oom,ray erewhay eshay
asway ummagingray.

Id"'Day youay everay eesay uchsay aay en,day ymay ear?day Ustjay omecay danay elphay emay
utpay esethay ooksbay otay ights,ray orfay I'veay urnedtay everythingay upsideay

andkerchiefshay Iay avegay imhay otnay onglay o.'agay

I"ay entway in,ay danay ilewhay eway orkedway Iay ookedlay outabay e,may orfay itay asway A'ay
en,'day otay ebay uresay. Ooksbay danay aperspay everywhere;ay aay okenbray
eerschaum,may danay naay olday uteflay overay ethay antel-piecemay saay ifay oneday
ith;way aay aggedray ird,bay ithoutway yanay ail,tay irpedchay onay oneay
indow-seat,way danay aay oxbay ofay itewhay icemay ornedaday ethay other;ay
alf-finishedhay oatsbay danay itsbay ofay ingstray aylay ongamay ethay
anuscripts;may irtyday ittlelay ootsbay oodstay yingdray eforebay ethay ire;fay
danay acestray ofay ethay earlyday elovedbay oys,bay orfay omwhay ehay akesmay aay aveslay
ofay imself,hay ereway otay ebay eensay lalay overay ethay oomray. Eraftay aay andgray
ummageray eethray ofay ethay issingmay iclesartay ereway ound,--onefay overay ethay
ird-cage,bay oneay overedcay ithway ink,ay danay aay irdthay urntbay own,bray avinghay
eenbay useday saay aay olderhay.

Uch"'Say aay an!'may aughedlay ood-naturedgay Smray. ,k.ay saay eshay utpay ethay
elicsray inay ethay ag-bagray. I'ay upposesay ethay othersay earay orntay upay otay igray
ips,shay andagebay utcay ingers,fay oray akemay ite-tailskay. It'say eadful,dray
utbay Iay an'tcay oldscay im:hay e'shay osay ent-mindedabsay danay ood-natured,gay
ehay etslay osethay oysbay ideray overay imhay ough-shodray. Iay eedagray otay oday ishay

orgetfay otay ooklay emthay over,ay osay ehay omescay otay aay adsay asspay ometimes.'say

Et"'Lay emay endmay em,'thay aidsay Iay. I'ay on'tday indmay it,ay danay ehay eedn'tnay

O"Say Iay avehay otgay ishay ingsthay inay order,ay danay itknay eelshay intoay otway

essonslay ehay ivesgay otay othersay ashay interesteday danay usedamay emay osay uchmay
atthay Iay ooktay aay ancyfay otay earn;lay orfay Inatay unsray inay danay out,ay eavinglay
ethay oorday open,ay danay Iay ancay earhay. Iay adhay eenbay ittingsay earnay isthay
oor,day inishingfay offay ethay astlay ock,say danay yingtray otay understanday atwhay
ehay aidsay otay aay ewnay olar,schay owhay isay saay upidstay saay Iay maay. Ethay irlgay adhay

danay elievebay atthay ingsstray akemay eirselves."thay !ahay utbay Iay afhay naay

Of"ay oursecay Iay ouldn'tcay aysay ythinganay eraftay at,thay danay saay itay eallyray

ooktay ourfay essons,lay danay enthay Iay uckstay astfay inay aay ammaticalgray ogbay.

ethay oor,flay danay archedmay outay ofay ethay oomray. Iay eltfay yselfmay isgracedday
danay esertedday orever,fay utbay idn'tday ameblay imhay aay article,pay danay asway
amblingscray ymay aperspay ogether,tay eaningmay otay ushray upstairsay danay

E"Hay okespay osay indly,kay danay openeday Anshay Ersen'sanday airyfay alestay osay

O(nay otheray ordway illway expressay it)ay ithway lalay ymay ight,may umblingtay overay

inute,may danay oingday ymay eryvay estbay. Enwhay Iay inishedfay eadingray ymay irstfay

out,ay inay ishay eartyhay ay,way As'Day istay ute!gay Ownay eway ogay ell!way Ymay urntay.
Iay oday imhay inay Erman;gay ifgay emay youray ear.'ay Danay ayaway ehay ent,way umblingray

Intay Oldier,'say ichwhay isay oll,dray youay ow,knay osay Iay ouldcay augh,--andlay Iay
id,--thoughday Iay idn'tday understanday alfhay ehay ead,ray orfay Iay ouldn'tcay
elphay it,ay ehay asway osay earnest,ay Iay osay excited,ay danay ethay olewhay ingthay osay
omicalcay.

After"ay atthay eway otgay onay etter,bay danay ownay Iay eadray ymay essonslay ettypray

ammargray etsgay uckedtay intoay ethay alestay danay oetrypay saay oneay ivesgay illspay

omethingsay ice,nay Armeemay.

I'm"ay adglay Aurielay eemssay osay appyhay danay usy,bay atthay ehay ashay ivengay upay
oking,smay danay etslay ishay airhay owgray. Youay eesay Ethbay anagesmay imhay etterbay

ANUARY"Jay.

A"ay Appyhay Ewnay Yearay otay youay ,allay ymay earestday amily,fay ichwhay ofay oursecay
includesay Rmay. Lay. danay aay youngay anmay ybay ethay amenay ofay Eddytay. Iay an'tcay
elltay youay owhay uchmay Iay enjoyeday youray Istmaschray undle,bay orfay Iay idn'tday
etgay itay illtay ight,nay danay adhay ivengay upay opinghay. Youray etterlay amecay inay
ethay orning,may utbay youay aidsay othingnay outabay aay arcel,pay eaningmay itay
orfay aay urprise;say osay Iay asway isappointed,day orfay I'day adhay aay Ind'kay ofay aay
eeling'fay atthay youay ouldn'tway orgetfay emay. Iay eltfay aay ittlelay owlay inay ymay
ind,may saay Iay atsay upay inay ymay oom,ray eraftay ea;tay danay enwhay ethay ig,bay
uddy,may attered-lookingbay undlebay asway oughtbray otay e,may Iay ustjay uggedhay
it,ay danay ancedpray. Itay asway osay Omey__hay danay efreshing,ray atthay Iay atsay
ownday onay ethay oorflay danay eadray danay ookedlay danay eatay danay aughedlay danay
ied,cray inay ymay usualay urdabsay ayway. Ethay ingsthay ereway ustjay atwhay Iay
anted,way danay lalay ethay etterbay orfay eingbay ademay insteaday ofay oughtbay.
Eth'sbay ewnay Ink-bib''ay asway apital;cay danay Annah'shay oxbay ofay ardhay
ingerbreadgay illway ebay aay easuretray. I'llay ebay uresay danay earway ethay icenay
annelsflay youay ent,say Armee,may danay eadray arefullycay ethay ooksbay atherfay
ashay arkedmay. Ankthay youay ,allay eapshay danay eaps!hay

Illustration:[ay Iay atsay ownday uponay ethay oorflay danay eadray danay ookedlay danay e]atay

Eaking"Spay ofay ooksbay emindsray emay atthay I'may ettinggay ichray inay atthay
inelay or,fay onay Ewnay Year'say Ay,day Rmay. Aerbhay avegay emay aay inefay
Akespeareshay. Itay isay oneay ehay aluesvay uch,may danay I'veay oftenay iredadmay
it,ay etsay upay inay ethay aceplay ofay onor,hay ithway ishay Ermangay Ible,bay Ato,play
Omer,hay danay Ilton;may osay youay aymay imagineay owhay Iay eltfay enwhay ehay
oughtbray itay own,day ithoutway itsay over,cay danay owedshay emay ymay amenay inay
it,ay Om'fray ymay iendfray Iedrichfray Aer.'bhay

You"'ay aysay oftenay youay ishway aay ibrary:lay erehay Iay ifgay youay one;ay orfay
etweenbay esethay idslay E(hay eantmay overs)cay isay anymay ooksbay inay oneay. Eadray
imhay ell,way danay ehay illway elphay youay uch;may orfay ethay udystay ofay aracterchay
inay isthay ookbay illway elphay youay otay eadray itay inay ethay orldway danay aintpay itay
ithway youray en.'pay

I"ay ankedthay imhay saay ellway saay Iay ould,cay danay alktay ownay outabay Y'may
ibrary,'lay saay ifay Iay adhay aay undredhay ooksbay. Iay evernay ewknay owhay uchmay
erethay asway inay Akespeareshay efore;bay utbay enthay Iay evernay adhay aay Aerbhay otay
explainay itay otay emay. Ownay On't__day aughlay taay ishay orridhay ame;nay itay isn'tay
onouncedpray eitheray Earbay oray Eer,bay saay eoplepay Ill__way aysay it,ay utbay
omethingsay etweenbay ethay o,tway saay onlyay Ermansgay ancay ivegay itay. I'may adglay
youay othbay ikelay atwhay Iay elltay youay outabay im,hay danay opehay youay illway owknay
imhay omesay ayday. Othermay ouldway ireadmay ishay armway eart,hay atherfay ishay
iseway eadhay. Iay ireadmay oth,bay danay eelfay ichray inay ymay ewnay Iend'fray
Iedrichfray Aer.'bhay

Ot"Nay avinghay uchmay oney,may oray owingknay atwhay e'dhay ike,lay Iay otgay everalsay
ittlelay ings,thay danay utpay emthay outabay ethay oom,ray erewhay ehay ouldway indfay
emthay unexpectedlyay. Eythay ereway useful,ay etty,pray oray unny,--afay ewnay
andishstay onay ishay able,tay aay ittlelay asevay orfay ishay ower,--heflay aysalway
ashay one,ay oray aay itbay ofay eengray inay aay ass,glay otay eepkay imhay esh,fray ehay
ays,--andsay aay olderhay orfay ishay ower,blay osay atthay ehay eedn'tnay urnbay upay
atwhay Yamay allscay Ouchoirs.''may Iay ademay itay ikelay osethay Ethbay
invented,--aay igbay utterflybay ithway aay atfay ody,bay danay ackblay danay yelloway
ings,way orstedway eelers,fay danay eadbay eyesay. Itay ooktay ishay ancyfay
immensely,ay danay ehay utpay itay onay ishay antel-piecemay saay naay icleartay ofay
Ertu_;_vay osay itay asway atherray aay ailurefay eraftay lalay. Oorpay saay ehay is,ay ehay
idn'tday orgetfay aay ervantsay oray aay ildchay inay ethay ouse;hay danay otnay aay oulsay
ere,hay omfray ethay Enchfray aundry-womanlay otay Issmay Orton,nay orgotfay imhay.
Iay asway osay adglay ofay atthay.

Ey"Thay otgay upay aay asquerade,may danay adhay aay aygay imetay Ewnay Year'say Eveay. Iay
idn'tday eanmay otay ogay own,day avinghay onay ess;dray utbay taay ethay astlay inute,may
Smray. Irkekay ememberedray omesay olday ocades,bray danay Issmay Ortonnay entlay emay
acelay danay eathers;fay osay Iay esseddray upay saay Smray. Alaprop,may danay ailedsay
inay ithway aay askmay onay. Onay oneay ewknay e,may orfay Iay isguisedday ymay oice,vay danay
onay oneay eameddray ofay ethay ilent,say aughtyhay Issmay Archmay Or(fay eythay inkthay
Iay maay eryvay iffstay danay ool,cay ostmay ofay em;thay danay osay Iay maay otay
ipper-snappers)whay ouldcay anceday danay ess,dray danay urstbay outay intoay aay
Ice'nay erangementday ofay epitaphs,ay ikelay naay egoryallay onay ethay anksbay ofay
ethay Ile.'nay Iay enjoyeday itay eryvay uch;may danay enwhay eway unmasked,ay itay asway
unfay otay eesay emthay arestay taay emay. Iay eardhay oneay ofay ethay youngay enmay elltay
otheranay atthay ehay ewknay I'day eenbay naay ess;actray inay act,fay ehay oughtthay ehay
ememberedray eeingsay emay taay oneay ofay ethay inormay eatresthay. Egmay illway
elishray atthay okejay. Rmay. Aerbhay asway Icknay Ottom,bay danay Inatay asway
Itania,--atay erfectpay ittlelay airyfay inay ishay sarmay. Otay eesay emthay anceday
asway Uite'qay aay andscape,'lay otay useay aay Eddyismtay.

I"ay adhay aay eryvay appyhay Ewnay Year,ay eraftay ;allay danay enwhay Iay oughtthay itay
overay inay ymay oom,ray Iay eltfay saay ifay Iay asway ettinggay onay aay ittlelay inay itespay
ofay ymay anymay ailures;fay orfay I'may eerfulchay lalay ethay imetay ow,nay orkway
ithway aay ill,way danay aketay oremay interestay inay otheray eoplepay anthay Iay useday
o,tay ichwhay isay atisfactorysay. Essblay youay !allay Everay youray ovinglay

O."jay

Illustration:[ay Inay ethay esencepray ofay eethray entlemen]gay

IVxXXay.

Aay IENDfRay.


Oughthay eryvay appyhay inay ethay ocialsay osphereatmay outabay er,hay danay eryvay usybay ithway
ethay ailyday orkway atthay earneday erhay ead,bray danay ademay itay eetersway orfay ethay
effort,ay Ojay illstay oundfay imetay orfay iterarylay aborslay. Ethay urposepay ichwhay ownay
ooktay ossessionpay ofay erhay asway aay aturalnay oneay otay aay oorpay danay itiousambay irl;gay
utbay ethay eansmay eshay ooktay otay aingay erhay enday ereway otnay ethay estbay. Eshay awsay atthay
oneymay onferredcay ower:pay oneymay danay ower,pay erefore,thay eshay esolvedray otay ave;hay
otnay otay ebay useday orfay erselfhay one,alay utbay orfay osethay omwhay eshay ovedlay oremay anthay
elfsay.

Ethay eamdray ofay illingfay omehay ithway omforts,cay ivinggay Ethbay everythingay eshay
anted,way omfray awberriesstray inay interway otay naay organay inay erhay edroom;bay oinggay
oadabray erself,hay danay aysalway avinghay Ore__may anthay enough,ay osay atthay eshay ightmay
indulgeay inay ethay uxurylay ofay arity,chay adhay eenbay orfay yearsay O'sjay ostmay erishedchay
astlecay inay ethay iraay.

Ethay ize-storypray experienceay adhay eemedsay otay openay aay ayway ichwhay ight,may eraftay
onglay avellingtray danay uchmay up-hillay orkway eadlay otay isthay elightfulday Eau_chÃ¢tay
enay Espagne_ay. Utbay ethay ovelnay isasterday uenchedqay erhay ouragecay orfay aay ime,tay orfay
ublicpay opinionay isay aay iantgay ichwhay ashay ightenedfray outer-heartedstay Acksjay onay
iggerbay ean-stalksbay anthay ershay. Ikelay atthay immortalay ero,hay eshay eposedray
ileawhay eraftay ethay irstfay empt,attay ichwhay esultedray inay aay umble,tay danay ethay
eastlay ovelylay ofay ethay iant'sgay easures,tray ifay Iay ememberray ightlyray. Utbay ethay
Up"ay ainagay danay aketay other"anay iritspay asway saay ongstray inay Ojay saay inay Ack;jay osay
eshay ambledscray up,ay onay ethay adyshay idesay isthay ime,tay danay otgay oremay ooty,bay utbay
earlynay eftlay ehindbay erhay atwhay asway arfay oremay eciouspray anthay ethay oney-bagsmay.

Eshay ooktay otay itingwray ensationsay ories;stay orfay inay osethay arkday es,agay evenay
erfectall-pay Ericaamay eadray ubbishray. Eshay oldtay onay one,ay utbay oncoctedcay aay

ofay ethay Eekly"Way Olcano."vay Eshay adhay evernay eadray Artor"Say Esartus,"ray utbay eshay
adhay aay omanlyway instinctay atthay othesclay ossesspay naay influenceay oremay owerfulpay
overay anymay anthay ethay orthway ofay aracterchay oray ethay agicmay ofay annersmay. Osay eshay
esseddray erselfhay inay erhay est,bay ,anday yingtray otay ersuadepay erselfhay atthay eshay

Ollowingfay Rmay. Ashwood'sday irections,day danay akingmay Smray. Orthburynay erhay
odel,may Ojay ashlyray ooktay aay ungeplay intoay ethay othyfray easay ofay ensationalsay
iterature;lay ut,bay anksthay otay ethay ife-preserverlay ownthray erhay ybay aay iend,fray
eshay amecay upay ain,agay otnay uchmay ethay orseway orfay erhay uckingday.

Ikelay ostmay youngay ibblers,scray eshay entway oadabray orfay erhay aracterschay danay
enery;scay danay anditti,bay ounts,cay ypsies,gay uns,nay danay uchessesday earedappay
uponay erhay age,stay danay ayedplay eirthay artspay ithway saay uchmay uracyaccay danay iritspay
saay ouldcay ebay expecteday. Erhay eadersray ereway otnay articularpay outabay uchsay iflestray
saay ammar,gray unctuation,pay danay obability,pray danay Rmay. Ashwoodday aciouslygray
ermittedpay erhay otay illfay ishay olumnscay taay ethay owestlay ices,pray otnay inkingthay itay
ecessarynay otay elltay erhay atthay ethay ealray ausecay ofay ishay ospitalityhay asway ethay
actfay atthay oneay ofay ishay acks,hay onay eingbay offereday igherhay ages,way adhay aselybay
eftlay imhay inay ethay urchlay.

Eshay oonsay ecamebay interesteday inay erhay ork,way orfay erhay emaciateday ursepay ewgray
out,stay danay ethay ittlelay oardhay eshay asway akingmay otay aketay Ethbay otay ethay ountainsmay
extnay ummersay ewgray owlyslay utbay urelysay saay ethay eeksway assedpay. Oneay ingthay
isturbedday erhay atisfaction,say danay atthay asway atthay eshay idday otnay elltay emthay taay
omehay. Eshay adhay aay eelingfay atthay atherfay danay othermay ouldway otnay ove,appray danay
eferredpray otay avehay erhay ownay ayway irst,fay danay egbay ardonpay erwardaftay. Itay asway
easyay otay eepkay erhay ecret,say orfay onay amenay earedappay ithway erhay ories;stay Rmay.
Ashwoodday ad,hay ofay ourse,cay oundfay itay outay eryvay oon,say utbay omisedpray otay ebay
umb;day ,anday orfay aay onder,way eptkay ishay ordway.

Eshay oughtthay itay ouldway oday erhay onay arm,hay orfay eshay incerelysay eantmay otay itewray
othingnay ofay ichwhay eshay ouldshay ebay amed,ashay danay uietedqay lalay ickspray ofay
onsciencecay ybay icipationsantay ofay ethay appyhay inutemay enwhay eshay ouldshay owshay erhay
earningsay danay aughlay overay erhay ell-keptway ecretsay.

Utbay Rmay. Ashwoodday ejectedray yanay utbay illingthray ales;tay ,anday saay illsthray ouldcay
otnay ebay oducedpray exceptay ybay arrowinghay upay ethay oulssay ofay ethay eaders,ray istoryhay
danay omance,ray andlay danay ea,say iencescay danay ,artay olicepay ecordsray danay unaticlay
ylums,asay adhay otay ebay ansackedray orfay ethay urposepay. Ojay oonsay oundfay atthay erhay
innocentay experienceay adhay ivengay erhay utbay ewfay impsesglay ofay ethay agictray orldway
ichwhay underliesay ociety;say o,say egardingray itay inay aay usinessbay ight,lay eshay etsay
outabay upplyingsay erhay eficienciesday ithway aracteristicchay energyay. Eageray otay
indfay aterialmay orfay ories,stay danay entbay onay akingmay emthay originalay inay ot,play ifay
otnay asterlymay inay execution,ay eshay earchedsay ewspapersnay orfay idents,accay
incidents,ay danay imes;cray eshay exciteday ethay uspicionssay ofay ublicpay ibrarianslay
ybay ingaskay orfay orksway onay oisons;pay eshay udiedstay acesfay inay ethay eet,stray danay
aracters,chay ood,gay ad,bay danay indifferent,ay lalay outabay er;hay eshay elvedday inay ethay
ustday ofay ientancay imestay orfay actsfay oray ictionsfay osay olday atthay eythay ereway saay
oodgay saay ew,nay danay introduceday erselfhay otay olly,fay in,say danay isery,may saay ellway
saay erhay imitedlay opportunitiesay owedallay. Eshay oughtthay eshay asway osperingpray
inely;fay ut,bay unconsciously,ay eshay asway eginningbay otay esecrateday omesay ofay ethay
omanliestway ibutesattray ofay aay oman'sway aracterchay. Eshay asway ivinglay inay adbay
ociety;say ,anday imaginaryay oughthay itay as,way itsay influenceay ectedaffay er,hay orfay
eshay asway eedingfay earthay danay ancyfay onay angerousday danay unsubstantialay ood,fay danay
asway astfay ushingbray ethay innocentay oomblay omfray erhay aturenay ybay aay ematurepray
uaintanceacqay ithway ethay arkerday idesay ofay ife,lay ichwhay omescay oonsay enoughay otay
lalay ofay usay.

Eshay asway eginningbay otay eelfay atherray anthay eesay is,thay orfay uchmay escribingday ofay
otheray eople'spay assionspay danay eelingsfay etsay erhay otay udyingstay danay eculatingspay
outabay erhay own,--aay orbidmay usement,amay inay ichwhay ealthyhay youngay indsmay oday otnay
oluntarilyvay indulgeay. Ong-doingwray aysalway ingsbray itsay ownay unishment;pay ,anday
enwhay Ojay ostmay eedednay ers,hay eshay otgay itay.

Iay on'tday owknay etherwhay ethay udystay ofay Akespeareshay elpedhay erhay otay eadray
aracter,chay oray ethay aturalnay instinctay ofay aay omanway orfay atwhay asway onest,hay
ave,bray danay ong;stray utbay ilewhay endowingay erhay imaginaryay eroeshay ithway everyay
erfectionpay underay ethay un,say Ojay asway iscoveringday aay ivelay ero,hay owhay interesteday
erhay inay itespay ofay anymay umanhay imperfectionsay. Rmay. Aer,bhay inay oneay ofay eirthay
onversations,cay adhay isedadvay erhay otay udystay imple,say ue,tray danay ovelylay
aracters,chay ereverwhay eshay oundfay em,thay saay oodgay ainingtray orfay aay iterwray. Ojay
ooktay imhay taay ishay ord,way orfay eshay oollycay urnedtay oundray danay udiedstay im,--ahay
oceedingpray ichwhay ouldway avehay uchmay urprisedsay im,hay adhay ehay ownknay it,ay orfay ethay
orthyway Ofessorpray asway eryvay umblehay inay ishay ownay onceitcay.

Ywhay everybodyay ikedlay imhay asway atwhay uzzledpay O,jay taay irstfay. Ehay asway eithernay
ichray ornay eat,gray youngay ornay andsome;hay inay onay espectray atwhay isay alledcay
ascinating,fay imposing,ay oray illiant;bray danay yetay ehay asway saay activeattray saay aay
enialgay ire,fay danay eoplepay eemedsay otay athergay outabay imhay saay aturallynay saay outabay
aay armway earthhay. Ehay asway oor,pay yetay aysalway earedappay otay ebay ivinggay omethingsay
ay;away aay anger,stray yetay everyay oneay asway ishay iend;fray onay ongerlay young,ay utbay saay
appy-heartedhay saay aay oy;bay ainplay danay eculiar,pay yetay ishay acefay ookedlay
eautifulbay otay any,may danay ishay odditiesay ereway eelyfray orgivenfay orfay ishay akesay.
Ojay oftenay atchedway im,hay yingtray otay iscoverday ethay arm,chay ,anday taay ast,lay
ecidedday atthay itay asway enevolencebay ichwhay orkedway ethay iraclemay. Ifay ehay adhay yanay
orrow,say It"ay atsay ithway itsay eadhay underay itsay ing,"way danay ehay urnedtay onlyay ishay
unnysay idesay otay ethay orldway. Erethay ereway ineslay uponay ishay orehead,fay utbay Imetay
eemedsay otay avehay ouchedtay imhay ently,gay ememberingray owhay indkay ehay asway otay
othersay. Ethay easantplay urvescay outabay ishay outhmay ereway ethay emorialsmay ofay anymay
iendlyfray ordsway danay eerychay aughs;lay ishay eyesay ereway evernay oldcay oray ard,hay danay
ishay igbay andhay adhay aay arm,way ongstray aspgray atthay asway oremay expressiveay anthay
ordsway.

Ishay eryvay othesclay eemedsay otay artakepay ofay ethay ospitablehay aturenay ofay ethay
earerway. Eythay ookedlay saay ifay eythay ereway taay ease,ay danay ikedlay otay akemay imhay
omfortable;cay ishay apaciouscay aistcoatway asway uggestivesay ofay aay argelay earthay
underneath;ay ishay ustyray oatcay adhay aay ocialsay ir,aay danay ethay aggybay ocketspay
ainlyplay ovedpray atthay ittlelay andshay oftenay entway inay emptyay danay amecay outay ull;fay
ishay eryvay ootsbay ereway enevolent,bay danay ishay ollarscay evernay iffstay danay aspyray
ikelay otheray eople'spay.

At's"Thay it!"ay aidsay Ojay otay erself,hay enwhay eshay taay engthlay iscoveredday atthay
enuinegay ood-willgay owardstay one'say ellow-menfay ouldcay eautifybay danay ignifyday
evenay aay outstay Ermangay eacher,tay owhay ovelledshay inay ishay inner,day arnedday ishay ownay
ocks,say danay asway urdenedbay ithway ethay amenay ofay Aerbhay.

Ojay aluedvay oodnessgay ighly,hay utbay eshay oalsay ossessedpay aay ostmay emininefay
espectray orfay intellect,ay danay aay ittlelay iscoveryday ichwhay eshay ademay outabay ethay
Ofessorpray edadday uchmay otay erhay egardray orfay imhay. Ehay evernay okespay ofay imself,hay
danay onay oneay everay ewknay atthay inay ishay ativenay itycay ehay adhay eenbay aay anmay uchmay
onoredhay danay esteemeday orfay earninglay danay integrity,ay illtay aay ountrymancay amecay
otay eesay im,hay ,anday inay aay onversationcay ithway Issmay Orton,nay ivulgedday ethay
easingplay actfay. Omfray erhay Ojay earnedlay it,ay danay ikedlay itay lalay ethay etterbay
ecausebay Rmay. Aerbhay adhay evernay oldtay itay. Eshay eltfay oudpray otay owknay atthay ehay asway
naay onoredhay Ofessorpray inay Erlin,bay oughthay onlyay aay oorpay anguage-masterlay inay
Erica;amay danay ishay omely,hay ard-workinghay ifelay asway uchmay eautifiedbay ybay ethay
icespay ofay omanceray ichwhay isthay iscoveryday avegay itay.

unexpecteday annermay. Issmay Ortonnay adhay ethay EntrÃ©e__ay intoay iterarylay ociety,say
ichwhay Ojay ouldway avehay adhay onay ancechay ofay eeingsay utbay orfay erhay. Ethay olitarysay

avorsfay ofay isthay ortsay othbay onay Ojay danay ethay Ofessorpray. Eshay ooktay emthay ithway

elebritiescay.

Irit,"spay ire,fay danay ew,"day otay eholdbay imhay evouringday ishay uppersay ithway naay
orarday ichwhay ushedflay ishay intellectualay ountenancecay. Urningtay saay omfray aay

omanticray illusionsay. Ethay eatgray ovelistnay ibratedvay etweenbay otway ecantersday
ithway ethay egularityray ofay aay endulum;pay ethay amousfay ivineday irtedflay openlyay ithway
oneay ofay ethay Adamemay eday AÃ«lsstay ofay ethay e,agay owhay ookedlay aggersday taay otheranay

danay earedappay otay umber,slay ethay oquacitylay ofay ethay adylay enderingray eechspay
impossibleay. Ethay ientificscay elebrities,cay orgettingfay eirthay ollusksmay danay
acialglay eriods,pay ossipedgay outabay ,artay ilewhay evotingday emselvesthay otay

armingchay ethay itycay ikelay aay econdsay Orpheus,ay alkedtay orses;hay danay ethay ecimenspay
ofay ethay Itishbray obilitynay esentpray appenedhay otay ebay ethay ostmay ordinaryay anmay ofay
ethay artypay.

Eforebay ethay eveningay asway alfhay over,ay Ojay eltfay osay ompletelycay IllusionÃ©e_,_dÃ©say
atthay eshay atsay ownday inay aay ornercay otay ecoverray erselfhay. Rmay. Aerbhay oonsay oinedjay
er,hay ookinglay atherray outay ofay ishay element,ay danay esentlypray everalsay ofay ethay
ilosophers,phay eachay ountedmay onay ishay obby,hay amecay ingamblay upay otay oldhay naay
intellectualay ournamenttay inay ethay ecessray. Ethay onversationcay asway ilesmay eyondbay
O'sjay omprehension,cay utbay eshay enjoyeday it,ay oughthay Antkay danay Egelhay ereway
unknownay ods,gay ethay Ubjectivesay danay Objectiveay unintelligibleay erms;tay danay ethay
onlyay ingthay Evolved"ay omfray erhay inneray onsciousness,"cay asway aay adbay eadachehay
eraftay itay asway lalay overay. Itay awnedday uponay erhay aduallygray atthay ethay orldway asway
eingbay ickedpay otay ieces,pay danay utpay ogethertay onay ew,nay ,anday ordingaccay otay ethay
alkers,tay onay infinitelyay etterbay inciplespray anthay efore;bay atthay eligionray asway
inay aay airfay ayway otay ebay easonedray intoay othingness,nay danay intellectay asway otay ebay
ethay onlyay Odgay. Ojay ewknay othingnay outabay ilosophyphay oray etaphysicsmay ofay yanay
ort,say utbay aay uriouscay excitement,ay alfhay easurable,play alfhay ainful,pay amecay
overay er,hay saay eshay istenedlay ithway aay ensesay ofay eingbay urnedtay iftadray intoay imetay
danay ace,spay ikelay aay youngay alloonbay outay onay aay olidayhay.

Eshay ookedlay oundray otay eesay owhay ethay Ofessorpray ikedlay it,ay danay oundfay imhay
ookinglay taay erhay ithway ethay immestgray expressionay eshay adhay everay eensay imhay earway.
Ehay ookshay ishay ead,hay danay eckonedbay erhay otay omecay ay;away utbay eshay asway
ascinated,fay ustjay en,thay ybay ethay eedomfray ofay Eculativespay Ilosophy,phay danay
eptkay erhay eat,say yingtray otay indfay outay atwhay ethay iseway entlemengay intendeday otay
elyray uponay eraftay eythay adhay ihilatedannay lalay ethay olday eliefsbay.

Ow,nay Rmay. Aerbhay asway aay iffidentday an,may danay owslay otay offeray ishay ownay opinions,ay
otnay ecausebay eythay ereway unsettled,ay utbay ootay inceresay danay earnestay otay ebay
ightlylay okenspay. Saay ehay ancedglay omfray Ojay otay everalsay otheray youngay eople,pay
actedattray ybay ethay illiancybray ofay ethay ilosophicphay yrotechnics,pay ehay itknay ishay
ows,bray danay ongedlay otay eak,spay earingfay atthay omesay inflammableay youngay oulsay
ouldway ebay edlay ayastray ybay ethay ockets,ray otay ind,fay enwhay ethay isplayday asway over,ay
atthay eythay adhay onlyay naay emptyay ickstay oray aay orchedscay andhay.

Ehay orebay itay saay onglay saay ehay ould;cay utbay enwhay ehay asway ealedappay otay orfay naay
opinion,ay ehay azedblay upay ithway onesthay indignation,ay danay efendedday eligionray
ithway lalay ethay eloquenceay ofay uth,--antray eloquenceay ichwhay ademay ishay okenbray
Englishay usical,may danay ishay ainplay acefay eautifulbay. Ehay adhay aay ardhay ight,fay orfay
ethay iseway enmay uedargay ell;way utbay ehay idn'tday owknay enwhay ehay asway eaten,bay danay
oodstay otay ishay olorscay ikelay aay anmay. Omehow,say saay ehay alked,tay ethay orldway otgay
ightray ainagay otay O;jay ethay olday eliefs,bay atthay adhay astedlay osay ong,lay eemedsay
etterbay anthay ethay ew;nay Odgay asway otnay aay indblay orce,fay danay immortalityay asway otnay
aay ettypray able,fay utbay aay essedblay actfay. Eshay eltfay saay ifay eshay adhay olidsay oundgray
underay erhay eetfay ain;agay danay enwhay Rmay. Aerbhay aused,pay out-talked,ay utbay otnay oneay
itwhay onvinced,cay Ojay antedway otay apclay erhay andshay danay ankthay imhay.

Eshay idday either;nay utbay eshay ememberedray isthay ene,scay danay avegay ethay Ofessorpray
erhay eartiesthay espect,ray orfay eshay ewknay itay ostcay imhay naay effortay otay eakspay outay
enthay danay ere,thay ecausebay ishay onsciencecay ouldway otnay etlay imhay ebay ilentsay. Eshay
eganbay otay eesay atthay aracterchay isay aay etterbay ossessionpay anthay oney,may ank,ray
intellect,ay oray eauty;bay danay otay eelfay atthay ifay eatnessgray isay atwhay aay iseway anmay
ashay efinedday itay otay e,bay Uth,"tray everence,ray danay ood-will,"gay enthay erhay iendfray
Iedrichfray Aerbhay asway otnay onlyay ood,gay utbay eatgray.

Isthay eliefbay engthenedstray ailyday. Eshay aluedvay ishay esteem,ay eshay ovetedcay ishay
espect,ray eshay antedway otay ebay orthyway ofay ishay iendship;fray ,anday ustjay enwhay ethay

aay ockedcay at;hay orfay oneay eveningay ethay Ofessorpray amecay inay otay ivegay Ojay erhay
esson,lay ithway aay aperpay oldier-capsay onay ishay ead,hay ichwhay Inatay adhay utpay ere,thay
danay ehay adhay orgottenfay otay aketay offay.

atthay oralsmay idn'tday ellsay.

inkstand,ay danay aid,say inay aay itfay ofay eryvay olesomewhay umility,--hay

I"ay on'tday owknay ything;anay I'llay aitway illtay Iay oday eforebay Iay ytray ain,agay ,anday
eantime,may Eep'sway udmay inay ethay eet,'stray ifay Iay an'tcay oday etter;bay at'sthay
onest,hay taay east;"lay ichwhay ecisionday ovedpray atthay erhay econdsay umbletay ownday ethay
ean-stalkbay adhay oneday erhay omesay oodgay.

Ilewhay esethay internalay evolutionsray ereway oinggay on,ay erhay externalay ifelay adhay
eenbay saay usybay danay uneventfulay saay usual;ay danay ifay eshay ometimessay ookedlay
erioussay oray aay ittlelay adsay onay oneay observeday itay utbay Ofessorpray Aerbhay. Ehay idday
itay osay uietlyqay atthay Ojay evernay ewknay ehay asway atchingway otay eesay ifay eshay ouldway
eptaccay danay ofitpray ybay ishay eproof;ray utbay eshay oodstay ethay est,tay danay ehay asway
atisfied;say or,fay oughthay onay ordsway assedpay etweenbay em,thay ehay ewknay atthay eshay
adhay ivengay upay itingwray. Otnay onlyay idday ehay uessgay itay ybay ethay actfay atthay ethay
econdsay ingerfay ofay erhay ightray andhay asway onay ongerlay inky,ay utbay eshay entspay erhay
eveningsay ownstairsday ow,nay asway etmay onay oremay ongamay ewspapernay offices,ay danay
udiedstay ithway aay oggedday atience,pay ichwhay uredassay imhay atthay eshay asway entbay onay
occupyingay erhay indmay ithway omethingsay useful,ay ifay otnay easantplay.

Ehay elpedhay erhay inay anymay ays,way ovingpray imselfhay aay uetray iend,fray danay Ojay asway
appy;hay or,fay ilewhay erhay enpay aylay idle,ay eshay asway earninglay otheray essonslay
esidebay Erman,gay danay ayinglay aay oundationfay orfay ethay ensationsay orystay ofay erhay
ownay ifelay.

Itay asway aay easantplay interway danay aay onglay one,ay orfay eshay idday otnay eavelay Smray.
Irkekay illtay Unejay. Everyay oneay eemedsay orrysay enwhay ethay imetay ame;cay ethay ildrenchay
ereway inconsolable,ay danay Rmay. Aer'sbhay airhay uckstay aightstray upay lalay overay ishay
ead,hay orfay ehay aysalway umpledray itay ildlyway enwhay isturbedday inay indmay.

ilewhay eshay eldhay aay ittlelay eveelay onay atthay astlay eveningay.

Ojay ookedlay upay en,thay uiteqay unconsciousay ofay ythinganay utbay erhay ownay easureplay inay

Est"bay iend,"fray ,anday implysay ecausebay eshay articularlypay ishedway otnay otay ooklay
saay ifay ythinganay asway ethay atter,may eshay involuntarilyay eganbay otay ush;blay danay ethay

onay erhay ee,knay eshay idn'tday owknay atwhay ouldway avehay ecomebay ofay erhay. Ortunately,fay
ethay ildchay asway ovedmay otay ughay er;hay osay eshay anagedmay otay idehay erhay acefay naay
instant,ay opinghay ethay Ofessorpray idday otnay eesay itay. Utbay ehay id,day danay ishay ownay
angedchay ainagay omfray atthay omentarymay ietyanxay otay itsay usualay expression,ay saay ehay
aidsay ordially,--cay

I"ay earfay Iay allshay otnay akemay ethay imetay orfay at,thay utbay Iay ishway ethay iendfray uchmay
uccess,say danay youay lalay appinesshay. Ottgay essblay you!"ay danay ithway at,thay ehay ookshay
andshay armly,way oulderedshay Ina,tay danay entway ayaway.

Utbay eraftay ethay oysbay ereway ed,abay ehay atsay onglay eforebay ishay ire,fay ithway ethay
iredtay ooklay onay ishay ace,fay danay ethay Eimweh_,""_hay oray omesickness,hay yinglay
eavyhay taay ishay earthay. Once,ay enwhay ehay ememberedray O,jay saay eshay atsay ithway ethay
ittlelay ildchay inay erhay aplay danay atthay ewnay oftnesssay inay erhay ace,fay ehay eanedlay ishay
eadhay onay ishay andshay aay inute,may danay enthay oamedray outabay ethay oom,ray saay ifay inay
earchsay ofay omethingsay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay indfay.

It"ay isay otnay orfay e;may Iay ustmay otnay opehay itay ow,"nay ehay aidsay otay imself,hay ithway aay
ighsay atthay asway ostalmay aay oan;gray en,thay saay ifay eproachingray imselfhay orfay ethay
onginglay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay epress,ray ehay entway danay issedkay ethay otway owzledtay
eadshay uponay ethay illow,pay ooktay ownday ishay eldom-usedsay eerschaum,may danay openeday
ishay Atoplay.

Ehay idday ishay est,bay danay idday itay anfully;may utbay Iay on'tday inkthay ehay oundfay atthay aay
airpay ofay ampantray oys,bay aay ipe,pay oray evenay ethay ivineday Ato,play ereway eryvay
atisfactorysay ubstitutessay orfay ifeway danay ildchay danay omehay.

Earlyay saay itay as,way ehay asway taay ethay ation,stay extnay orning,may otay eesay Ojay off;ay

EARTACHEhay.


Ateverwhay ishay otivemay ightmay avehay een,bay Aurielay udiedstay otay omesay urposepay atthay
year,ay orfay ehay aduatedgray ithway onor,hay danay avegay ethay Atinlay orationay ithway ethay
acegray ofay aay Illipsphay danay ethay eloquenceay ofay aay Emosthenes,day osay ishay iendsfray
aidsay. Eythay ereway lalay ere,thay ishay andfather,--oh,gray osay oud!--Mrpray. danay Smray.

Orfay aay inutemay O'sjay earthay oodstay ill,stay saay ehay ungsway imselfhay ownday ethay ank,bay
owardtay ethay iver;ray utbay itay akestay uchmay olly,fay in,say oray iserymay otay endsay aay
youngay anmay otay aay iolentvay eath,day danay Aurielay asway otnay oneay ofay ethay eakway ortsay
owhay earay onqueredcay ybay aay inglesay ailurefay. Ehay adhay onay oughtthay ofay aay
elodramaticmay unge,play utbay omesay indblay instinctay edlay imhay otay ingflay athay danay
oatcay intoay ishay oat,bay danay owray ayaway ithway lalay ishay ight,may akingmay etterbay imetay
upay ethay iverray anthay ehay adhay oneday inay anymay aay aceray. Ojay ewdray aay onglay eathbray danay
unclaspeday erhay andshay saay eshay atchedway ethay oorpay ellowfay yingtray otay outstripay
ethay oubletray ichwhay ehay arriedcay inay ishay earthay.

At"Thay illway oday imhay ood,gay danay e'llhay omecay omehay inay uchsay aay ender,tay enitentpay
atestay ofay ind,may atthay Iay a'n'tshay areday otay eesay im,"hay eshay aid;say ing,adday saay eshay
entway owlyslay ome,hay eelingfay saay ifay eshay adhay urderedmay omesay innocentay ing,thay
danay uriedbay itay underay ethay eaves,--lay

Ow"Nay Iay ustmay ogay danay eparepray Rmay. Aurencelay otay ebay eryvay indkay otay ymay oorpay oybay.
Iay ishway e'dhay ovelay Eth;bay erhapspay ehay ay,may inay ime,tay utbay Iay eginbay otay inkthay Iay
asway istakenmay outabay erhay. Ohay ear!day owhay ancay irlsgay ikelay otay avehay overslay danay
efuseray emthay. Iay inkthay it'say eadful."dray

Eingbay uresay atthay onay oneay ouldcay oday itay osay ellway saay erself,hay eshay entway aightstray
otay Rmay. Aurence,lay oldtay ethay ardhay orystay avelybray ough,thray danay enthay okebray
own,day yingcray osay ismallyday overay erhay ownay insensibilityay atthay ethay indkay olday
entleman,gay oughthay orelysay isappointed,day idday otnay utteray aay eproachray. Ehay
oundfay itay ifficultday otay understanday owhay yanay irlgay ouldcay elphay ovinglay Aurie,lay
danay opedhay eshay ouldway angechay erhay ind,may utbay ehay ewknay evenay etterbay anthay Ojay
atthay ovelay annotcay ebay orced,fay osay ehay ookshay ishay eadhay adly,say danay esolvedray otay
arrycay ishay oybay outay ofay arm'shay ay;way orfay Youngay Impetuosity'say artingpay ordsway
otay Ojay isturbedday imhay oremay anthay ehay ouldway onfesscay.

Enwhay Aurielay amecay ome,hay eadday ired,tay utbay uiteqay omposed,cay ishay andfathergray
etmay imhay saay ifay ehay ewknay othing,nay danay eptkay upay ethay elusionday eryvay
uccessfullysay orfay naay ourhay oray otway. Utbay enwhay eythay atsay ogethertay inay ethay
ilight,tway ethay imetay eythay useday otay enjoyay osay uch,may itay asway ardhay orkway orfay ethay
olday anmay otay ambleray onay saay usual,ay danay arderhay illstay orfay ethay youngay oneay otay
istenlay otay aisespray ofay ethay astlay year'say uccess,say ichwhay otay imhay ownay eemedsay
ove'slay aborlay ostlay. Ehay orebay itay saay onglay saay ehay ould,cay enthay entway otay ishay
iano,pay danay eganbay otay ayplay. Ethay indowsway ereway open;ay danay O,jay alkingway inay ethay
ardengay ithway Eth,bay orfay onceay understooday usicmay etterbay anthay erhay ister,say orfay
ehay ayedplay ethay Onata"Say AthÃ©tique,"pay danay ayedplay itay saay ehay evernay idday eforebay.

At's"Thay eryvay ine,fay Iay areday ay,say utbay it'say adsay enoughay otay akemay oneay y;cray ivegay
usay omethingsay ayer,gay ad,"lay aidsay Rmay. Aurence,lay osewhay indkay olday earthay asway
ullfay ofay ympathy,say ichwhay ehay ongedlay otay ow,shay utbay ewknay otnay owhay.

Aurielay ashedday intoay aay ivelierlay ain,stray ayedplay ormilystay orfay everalsay
inutes,may danay ouldway avehay otgay oughthray avely,bray if,ay inay aay omentarymay ull,lay
Smray. Arch'smay oicevay adhay otnay eenbay eardhay alling,--cay

O,"Jay ear,day omecay in;ay Iay antway you."ay

ethay usicianmay atsay ilentsay inay ethay arkday.

I"ay ow,knay ymay oy,bay Iay ow."knay

Yself.""May

Ord"Lay elphay e,may yes,ay Iay oday ow,knay orfay I'veay eenbay oughthray itay lalay efore,bay onceay

itsay uietlyqay own,day danay earhay ymay anplay. It'say lalay ettled,say danay ancay ebay arriedcay

Ell,"Way ir,say atwhay isay it?"ay danay Aurielay atsay own,day ithoutway aay ignsay ofay interestay
inay acefay oray oicevay.

Ere"Thay isay usinessbay inay Ondonlay atthay eedsnay ookinglay er;aftay Iay eantmay youay

Ut"Bay youay atehay avelling,tray ir;say Iay an'tcay kasay itay ofay youay taay youray e,"agay eganbay

one,alay ifay ehay entway taay lalay.

Ethay olday entlemangay ewknay atthay erfectlypay ell,way danay articularlypay esiredday otay

im,hay ehay aidsay outly,--stay

Ess"Blay youray oul,say I'may otnay uperannuatedsay yetay. Iay uiteqay enjoyay ethay idea;ay itay

isay ostalmay saay easyay saay ittingsay inay aay air."chay

Aay estlessray ovementmay omfray Aurielay uggestedsay atthay Is__hay airchay asway otnay easy,ay

I"ay on'tday eanmay otay ebay aay arplotmay oray aay urden;bay Iay ogay ecausebay Iay inkthay you'day
eelfay appierhay anthay ifay Iay asway eftlay ehindbay. Iay on'tday intenday otay adgay outabay ithway
you,ay utbay eavelay youay eefray otay ogay erewhay youay ike,lay ilewhay Iay useamay yselfmay inay ymay
ownay ayway. I'veay iendsfray inay Ondonlay danay Aris,pay danay ouldshay ikelay otay isitvay

Ow,nay Aurielay eltfay ustjay enthay atthay ishay earthay asway entirelyay oken,bray danay ethay
orldway aay owlinghay ilderness;way utbay taay ethay oundsay ofay ertaincay ordsway ichwhay ethay

earthay avegay naay unexpecteday eap,lay danay aay eengray oasisay oray otway uddenlysay
earedappay inay ethay owlinghay ildernessway. Ehay ighed,say danay enthay aid,say inay aay
iritlessspay one,--tay

Ust"Jay saay youay ike,lay ir;say itay oesn'tday attermay erewhay Iay ogay oray atwhay Iay o."day

It"ay oesday otay e,may ememberray at,thay ymay ad;lay Iay ivegay youay entireay iberty,lay utbay Iay
usttray youay otay akemay naay onesthay useay ofay itay. Omisepray emay at,thay Aurie."lay

Anything"ay youay ike,lay ir."say

Ood,""Gay oughtthay ethay olday entlemangay. You"ay on'tday arecay ow,nay utbay ere'llthay
omecay aay imetay enwhay atthay omisepray illway eepkay youay outay ofay ischief,may oray I'may uchmay
istaken."may

Eingbay naay energeticay individual,ay Rmay. Aurencelay uckstray ilewhay ethay ironay asway
ot;hay danay eforebay ethay ightedblay eingbay ecoveredray iritspay enoughay otay ebel,ray
eythay ereway offay. Uringday ethay imetay ecessarynay orfay eparation,pray Aurielay orebay
imselfhay saay youngay entlemengay usuallyay oday inay uchsay asescay. Ehay asway oody,may
irritable,ay danay ensivepay ybay urns;tay ostlay ishay etite,appay eglectednay ishay ess,dray
danay evotedday uchmay imetay otay ayingplay empestuouslytay onay ishay iano;pay oidedavay O,jay
utbay onsoledcay imselfhay ybay aringstay taay erhay omfray ishay indow,way ithway aay agicaltray
acefay atthay auntedhay erhay eamsdray ybay ight,nay danay oppresseday erhay ithway aay eavyhay
ensesay ofay uiltgay ybay ayday. Unlikeay omesay ufferers,say ehay evernay okespay ofay ishay
unrequiteday assion,pay danay ouldway owallay onay one,ay otnay evenay Smray. Arch,may otay
emptattay onsolationcay oray offeray ympathysay. Onay omesay ounts,accay isthay asway aay
eliefray otay ishay iends;fray utbay ethay eeksway eforebay ishay epartureday ereway eryvay
uncomfortable,ay danay everyay oneay ejoicedray atthay ethay Oor,"pay earday ellowfay asway
oinggay ayaway otay orgetfay ishay ouble,tray danay omecay omehay appy."hay Ofay ourse,cay ehay
iledsmay arklyday taay eirthay elusion,day utbay assedpay itay y,bay ithway ethay adsay
uperioritysay ofay oneay owhay ewknay atthay ishay idelity,fay ikelay ishay ove,lay asway
unalterableay.

Enwhay ethay artingpay amecay ehay ectedaffay ighhay irits,spay otay oncealcay ertaincay
inconvenientay emotionsay ichwhay eemedsay inclineday otay ertassay emselvesthay. Isthay
ayetygay idday otnay imposeay uponay ybody,anay utbay eythay iedtray otay ooklay saay ifay itay id,day
orfay ishay ake,say danay ehay otgay onay eryvay ellway illtay Smray. Archmay issedkay im,hay ithway
aay isperwhay ullfay ofay otherlymay olicitude;say en,thay eelingfay atthay ehay asway oinggay
eryvay ast,fay ehay astilyhay embraceday emthay lalay ound,ray otnay orgettingfay ethay
ictedafflay Annah,hay danay anray ownstairsday saay ifay orfay ishay ifelay. Ojay ollowedfay aay
inutemay eraftay otay aveway erhay andhay otay imhay ifay ehay ookedlay oundray. Ehay idday ooklay
ound,ray amecay ack,bay utpay ishay sarmay outabay er,hay saay eshay oodstay onay ethay epstay oveabay
im,hay danay ookedlay upay taay erhay ithway aay acefay atthay ademay ishay ortshay ealappay othbay
eloquentay danay atheticpay.

O"ay O,jay an'tcay you?"ay

Eddy,"Tay ear,day Iay ishway Iay ould!"cay

Atthay asway ,allay exceptay aay ittlelay ause;pay enthay Aurielay aightenedstray imselfhay
up,ay aidsay It's"ay lalay ight,ray evernay ind,"may danay entway ayaway ithoutway otheranay
ordway. ,ahay utbay itay asn'tway lalay ight,ray danay Ojay Id__day ind;may orfay ilewhay ethay
urlycay eadhay aylay onay erhay maray aay inutemay eraftay erhay ardhay er,answay eshay eltfay saay ifay
eshay adhay abbedstay erhay earestday iend;fray danay enwhay ehay eftlay erhay ithoutway aay ooklay
ehindbay im,hay eshay ewknay atthay ethay oybay Aurielay evernay ouldway omecay ainagay.

IxXXVay.

ETH'Sbay ECRETsay.


Enwhay Ojay amecay omehay atthay ing,spray eshay adhay eenbay uckstray ithway ethay angechay inay
Ethbay. Onay oneay okespay ofay itay oray eemedsay areaway ofay it,ay orfay itay adhay omecay ootay
aduallygray otay artlestay osethay owhay awsay erhay aily;day utbay otay eyesay arpenedshay ybay
ence,absay itay asway eryvay ain;play danay aay eavyhay eightway ellfay onay O'sjay earthay saay eshay
awsay erhay ister'ssay acefay. Itay asway onay alerpay danay utbay ittlelay innerthay anthay inay
ethay utumn;aay yetay erethay asway aay ange,stray ansparenttray ooklay outabay it,ay saay ifay
ethay ortalmay asway eingbay owlyslay efinedray ay,away danay ethay immortalay iningshay
oughthray ethay ailfray eshflay ithway naay indescribablyay atheticpay eautybay. Ojay awsay
danay eltfay it,ay utbay aidsay othingnay taay ethay ime,tay danay oonsay ethay irstfay impressionay
ostlay uchmay ofay itsay ower;pay orfay Ethbay eemedsay appy,hay onay oneay earedappay otay oubtday
atthay eshay asway etter;bay ,anday esently,pray inay otheray ares,cay Ojay orfay aay imetay
orgotfay erhay earfay.

Utbay enwhay Aurielay asway one,gay danay eacepay evailedpray ain,agay ethay aguevay ietyanxay
eturnedray danay auntedhay erhay. Eshay adhay onfessedcay erhay inssay danay eenbay orgiven;fay
utbay enwhay eshay owedshay erhay avingssay danay oposedpray ethay ountainmay ip,tray Ethbay adhay
ankedthay erhay eartily,hay utbay eggedbay otnay otay ogay osay arfay ayaway omfray omehay.
Otheranay ittlelay isitvay otay ethay eashoresay ouldway uitsay erhay etter,bay ,anday saay
andmagray ouldcay otnay ebay evailedpray uponay otay eavelay ethay abies,bay Ojay ooktay Ethbay
ownday otay ethay uietqay ace,play erewhay eshay ouldcay ivelay uchmay inay ethay openay ir,aay danay
etlay ethay eshfray ea-breezessay owblay aay ittlelay olorcay intoay erhay alepay eekschay.

Itay asway otnay aay ashionablefay ace,play ut,bay evenay ongamay ethay easantplay eoplepay
ere,thay ethay irlsgay ademay ewfay iends,fray eferringpray otay ivelay orfay oneay otheranay.
Ethbay asway ootay yshay otay enjoyay ociety,say danay Ojay ootay appedwray upay inay erhay otay arecay
orfay yanay oneay else;ay osay eythay ereway lalay inay lalay otay eachay other,ay danay amecay danay
ent,way uiteqay unconsciousay ofay ethay interestay eythay exciteday inay osethay outabay
em,thay owhay atchedway ithway ympatheticsay eyesay ethay ongstray istersay danay ethay eeblefay
one,ay aysalway ogether,tay saay ifay eythay eltfay instinctivelyay atthay aay onglay
eparationsay asway otnay arfay ayaway.

Eythay idday eelfay it,ay yetay eithernay okespay ofay it;ay orfay oftenay etweenbay ourselvesay
danay osethay earestnay danay earestday otay usay erethay existsay aay eserveray ichwhay itay isay
eryvay ardhay otay overcomeay. Ojay eltfay saay ifay aay eilvay adhay allenfay etweenbay erhay earthay
danay Eth's;bay utbay enwhay eshay utpay outay erhay andhay otay iftlay itay up,ay erethay eemedsay
omethingsay acredsay inay ethay ilence,say danay eshay aitedway orfay Ethbay otay eakspay. Eshay
ondered,way danay asway ankfulthay o,alsay atthay erhay arentspay idday otnay eemsay otay eesay
atwhay eshay aw;say ,anday uringday ethay uietqay eeks,way enwhay ethay adowshay ewgray osay ainplay
otay er,hay eshay aidsay othingnay ofay itay otay osethay taay ome,hay elievingbay atthay itay ouldway
elltay itselfay enwhay Ethbay amecay ackbay onay etterbay. Eshay onderedway illstay oremay ifay
erhay istersay eallyray uessedgay ethay ardhay uth,tray danay atwhay oughtsthay ereway assingpay
oughthray erhay indmay uringday ethay onglay ourshay enwhay eshay aylay onay ethay armway ocks,ray
ithway erhay eadhay inay O'sjay ap,lay ilewhay ethay indsway ewblay ealthfullyhay overay er,hay
danay ethay easay ademay usicmay taay erhay eetfay.

Illustration:[ay Ithway erhay eadhay inay O'sjay ap,lay ilewhay ethay indway ewblay
ealthfullyhay overay er]hay

Oneay ayday Ethbay oldtay erhay. Ojay oughtthay eshay asway eep,aslay eshay aylay osay ill;stay ,anday
uttingpay ownday erhay ook,bay atsay ookinglay taay erhay ithway istfulway eyes,ay yingtray otay
eesay ignssay ofay opehay inay ethay aintfay olorcay onay Eth'sbay eekschay. Utbay eshay ouldcay otnay
indfay enoughay otay atisfysay er,hay orfay ethay eekschay ereway eryvay in,thay danay ethay andshay
eemedsay ootay eeblefay otay oldhay evenay ethay osyray ittlelay ellsshay eythay adhay eenbay
atheringgay. Itay amecay otay erhay enthay oremay itterlybay anthay everay atthay Ethbay asway
owlyslay iftingdray ayaway omfray er,hay danay erhay sarmay instinctivelyay ightenedtay
eirthay oldhay uponay ethay earestday easuretray eshay ossessedpay. Orfay aay inutemay erhay
eyesay ereway ootay imday orfay eeing,say ,anday enwhay eythay eared,clay Ethbay asway ookinglay
upay taay erhay osay enderlytay atthay erethay asway ardlyhay yanay eednay orfay erhay otay ay,--say

O,"Jay ear,day I'may adglay youay owknay itay. I'veay iedtray otay elltay you,ay utbay Iay
ouldn't."cay

Erethay asway onay eransway exceptay erhay ister'ssay eekchay ainstagay erhay own,ay otnay evenay
ears;tay orfay enwhay ostmay eeplyday oved,may Ojay idday otnay ycray. Eshay asway ethay eaker,way
en,thay danay Ethbay iedtray otay omfortcay danay ustainsay er,hay ithway erhay sarmay outabay
er,hay danay ethay oothingsay ordsway eshay isperedwhay inay erhay earay.

I've"ay ownknay itay orfay aay oodgay ile,whay ear,day ,anday ownay I'may useday otay it,ay itay isn'tay
ardhay otay inkthay ofay oray otay earbay. Ytray otay eesay itay o,say danay on'tday ebay oubledtray
outabay e,may ecausebay it'say est;bay indeeday itay is."ay

Is"ay isthay atwhay ademay youay osay unhappyay inay ethay utumn,aay Eth?bay Youay idday otnay eelfay
itay en,thay danay eepkay itay otay yourselfay osay ong,lay idday you?"ay edaskay O,jay efusingray
otay eesay oray aysay atthay itay As__way est,bay utbay adglay otay owknay atthay Aurielay adhay onay
artpay inay Eth'sbay oubletray.

Yes,"ay Iay avegay upay opinghay en,thay utbay Iay idn'tday ikelay otay ownay itay. Iay iedtray otay
inkthay itay asway aay icksay ancy,fay danay ouldway otnay etlay itay oubletray yanay oneay. Utbay
enwhay Iay awsay youay lalay osay ellway danay ong,stray danay ullfay ofay appyhay ans,play itay asway
ardhay otay eelfay atthay Iay ouldcay evernay ebay ikelay you,ay danay enthay Iay asway iserable,may
O."jay

O"ay Eth,bay danay youay idn'tday elltay e,may idn'tday etlay emay omfortcay danay elphay you!ay Owhay
ouldcay youay utshay emay out,ay danay earbay itay lalay one?"alay

O'sjay oicevay asway ullfay ofay endertay eproach,ray danay erhay earthay edachay otay inkthay ofay
ethay olitarysay ugglestray atthay ustmay avehay onegay onay ilewhay Ethbay earnedlay otay aysay
ood-bygay otay ealth,hay ove,lay danay ife,lay danay aketay upay erhay osscray osay eerfullychay.

Erhaps"Pay itay asway ong,wray utbay Iay iedtray otay oday ight;ray Iay asn'tway ure,say onay oneay
aidsay ything,anay danay Iay opedhay Iay asway istakenmay. Itay ouldway avehay eenbay elfishsay otay
ightenfray youay lalay enwhay Armeemay asway osay iousanxay outabay Eg,may danay Yamay ay,away danay
youay osay appyhay ithway Aurie,--atlay east,lay Iay oughtthay osay en."thay

And"ay Iay oughtthay atthay youay ovedlay im,hay Eth,bay danay Iay entway ayaway ecausebay Iay
ouldn't,"cay iedcray O,jay adglay otay aysay lalay ethay uthtray.

Ethbay ookedlay osay azedamay taay ethay ideaay atthay Ojay iledsmay inay itespay ofay erhay ain,pay
danay edadday oftly,--say

En"Thay youay idn't,day eary?day Iay asway aidafray itay asway o,say danay imagineday youray oorpay
ittlelay earthay ullfay ofay ove-lornitylay lalay atthay ile."whay

Y,"Whay O,jay owhay ouldcay I,ay enwhay ehay asway osay ondfay ofay you?"ay edaskay Eth,bay saay
innocentlyay saay aay ildchay. I"ay oday ovelay imhay early;day ehay isay osay oodgay otay e,may owhay
ancay Iay elphay it?ay Utbay ehay evernay ouldcay ebay ythinganay otay emay utbay ymay otherbray. Iay
opehay ehay ulytray illway e,bay ometime."say

Ot"Nay oughthray e,"may aidsay Ojay ecidedlyday. Amy"ay isay eftlay orfay im,hay danay eythay
ouldway uitsay excellently;ay utbay Iay avehay onay earthay orfay uchsay ings,thay ownay. Iay
on'tday arecay atwhay ecomesbay ofay ybodyanay utbay you,ay Ethbay. Youay Ust__may etgay ell."way

I"ay antway o,tay oh,ay osay uch!may Iay y,tray utbay everyay ayday Iay oselay aay ittle,lay danay eelfay
oremay uresay atthay Iay allshay evernay aingay itay ackbay. It'say ikelay ethay ide,tay O,jay enwhay
itay urns,tay itay oesgay owly,slay utbay itay an'tcay ebay opped."stay

It"ay All__shay ebay opped,stay youray idetay ustmay otnay urntay osay oon,say ineteennay isay ootay
youngay. Eth,bay Iay an'tcay etlay youay ogay. I'llay orkway danay aypray danay ightfay ainstagay
itay. I'llay eepkay youay inay itespay ofay everything;ay erethay ustmay ebay ays,way itay an'tcay
ebay ootay atelay. Odgay on'tway ebay osay uelcray saay otay aketay youay omfray e,"may iedcray oorpay
Ojay ebelliously,ray orfay erhay iritspay asway arfay esslay iouslypay ubmissivesay anthay
Eth'sbay.

Imple,say inceresay eoplepay eldomsay eakspay uchmay ofay eirthay iety;pay itay owsshay itselfay
inay ,actsay atherray anthay inay ords,way danay ashay oremay influenceay anthay omilieshay oray
otestationspray. Ethbay ouldcay otnay easonray uponay oray explainay ethay aithfay atthay avegay
erhay ouragecay danay atiencepay otay ivegay upay ife,lay danay eerfullychay aitway orfay eathday.
Ikelay aay onfidingcay ild,chay eshay edaskay onay uestions,qay utbay eftlay everythingay otay
Odgay danay ature,nay Atherfay danay othermay ofay usay ,allay eelingfay uresay atthay ey,thay danay
eythay only,ay ouldcay eachtay danay engthenstray earthay danay iritspay orfay isthay ifelay danay
ethay ifelay otay omecay. Eshay idday otnay ebukeray Ojay ithway aintlysay eeches,spay onlyay
ovedlay erhay etterbay orfay erhay assionatepay ection,affay danay ungclay oremay oselyclay otay
ethay earday umanhay ove,lay omfray ichwhay ouray Atherfay evernay eansmay usay otay ebay eaned,way
utbay oughthray ichwhay Ehay awsdray usay oserclay otay Imselfhay. Eshay ouldcay otnay ay,say I'm"ay
adglay otay o,"gay orfay ifelay asway eryvay eetsway otay er;hay eshay ouldcay onlyay obsay out,ay I"ay

ofay isthay eatgray orrowsay okebray overay emthay ogethertay.

Ybay danay ybay Ethbay aid,say ithway ecoveredray erenity,--say

Ethbay aylay aay inutemay inking,thay danay enthay aidsay inay erhay uietqay ay,--way

I"ay on'tday owknay owhay otay expressay yself,may danay ouldn'tshay y,tray otay yanay oneay utbay
you,ay ecausebay Iay an'tcay eakspay out,ay exceptay otay ymay Ojay. Iay onlyay eanmay otay aysay
atthay Iay avehay aay eelingfay atthay itay evernay asway intendeday Iay ouldshay ivelay onglay. I'may
otnay ikelay ethay estray ofay you;ay Iay evernay ademay yanay ansplay outabay atwhay I'day oday enwhay
Iay ewgray up;ay Iay evernay oughtthay ofay eingbay arried,may saay youay lalay idday. Iay ouldn'tcay
eemsay otay imagineay yselfmay ythinganay utbay upidstay ittlelay Eth,bay ottingtray outabay
taay ome,hay ofay onay useay ywhereanay utbay erethay. Iay evernay antedway otay ogay ay,away danay
ethay ardhay artpay ownay isay ethay eavinglay youay lalay. I'may otnay aid,afray utbay itay eemssay
saay ifay Iay ouldshay ebay omesickhay orfay youay evenay inay eaven."hay

Ojay ouldcay otnay eak;spay danay orfay everalsay inutesmay erethay asway onay oundsay utbay ethay
ighsay ofay ethay indway danay ethay appinglay ofay ethay idetay. Aay ite-wingedwhay ullgay ewflay
y,bay ithway ethay ashflay ofay unshinesay onay itsay ilverysay east;bray Ethbay atchedway itay
illtay itay anished,vay danay erhay eyesay ereway ullfay ofay adnesssay. Aay ittlelay
ay-coatedgray and-birdsay amecay ippingtray overay ethay each,bay Eeping""pay oftlysay otay
itself,ay saay ifay enjoyingay ethay unsay danay ea;say itay amecay uiteqay oseclay otay Eth,bay
ookedlay taay erhay ithway aay iendlyfray eye,ay danay atsay uponay aay armway one,stay essingdray
itsay etway eathers,fay uiteqay taay omehay. Ethbay iled,smay danay eltfay omforted,cay orfay
ethay inytay ingthay eemedsay otay offeray itsay allsmay iendship,fray danay emindray erhay atthay
aay easantplay orldway asway illstay otay ebay enjoyeday.

Ear"Day ittlelay ird!bay Ee,say O,jay owhay ametay itay isay. Iay ikelay eepspay etterbay anthay ethay
ulls:gay eythay earay otnay osay ildway danay andsome,hay utbay eythay eemsay appy,hay onfidingcay
ittlelay ingsthay. Iay useday otay allcay emthay ymay irds,bay astlay ummer;say danay othermay
aidsay eythay emindedray erhay ofay e,--busy,may uaker-coloredqay eatures,cray aysalway
earnay ethay ore,shay danay aysalway irpingchay atthay ontentedcay ittlelay ongsay ofay
eirsthay. Youay earay ethay ull,gay O,jay ongstray danay ild,way ondfay ofay ethay ormstay danay ethay
ind,way yingflay arfay outay otay ea,say danay appyhay lalay onealay. Egmay isay ethay
urtle-dove,tay danay Yamay isay ikelay ethay arklay eshay iteswray out,abay yingtray otay etgay upay
ongamay ethay ouds,clay utbay aysalway oppingdray ownday intoay itsay estnay ainagay. Earday
ittlelay irl!gay e'sshay osay itious,ambay utbay erhay earthay isay oodgay danay ender;tay danay
onay attermay owhay ighhay eshay ies,flay eshay evernay illway orgetfay omehay. Iay opehay Iay allshay
eesay erhay ain,agay utbay eshay eemssay O__say arfay ay."away

E"Shay isay omingcay inay ethay ing,spray danay Iay eanmay atthay youay allshay ebay lalay eadyray otay

eganbay O,jay eelingfay atthay ofay lalay ethay angeschay inay Eth,bay ethay alkingtay angechay
asway ethay eatest,gray orfay itay eemedsay otay ostcay onay effortay ow,nay danay eshay oughtthay
oudalay inay aay ayway uiteqay unlikeay ashfulbay Ethbay.

O,"Jay ear,day on'tday opehay yanay ore;may itay on'tway oday yanay ood,gay I'may uresay ofay atthay.
Eway on'tway ebay iserable,may utbay enjoyay eingbay ogethertay ilewhay eway aitway. E'llway
avehay appyhay imes,tay orfay Iay on'tday uffersay uch,may danay Iay inkthay ethay idetay illway ogay
outay easily,ay ifay youay elphay e."may

Ojay eanedlay ownday otay isskay ethay anquiltray ace;fay danay ithway atthay ilentsay iss,kay eshay
edicatedday erselfhay oulsay danay odybay otay Ethbay.

Eshay asway ight:ray erethay asway onay eednay ofay yanay ordsway enwhay eythay otgay ome,hay orfay
atherfay danay othermay awsay ainly,play ow,nay atwhay eythay adhay ayedpray otay ebay avedsay
omfray eeingsay. Iredtay ithway erhay ortshay ourney,jay Ethbay entway taay onceay otay ed,bay
ayingsay owhay adglay eshay asway otay ebay taay ome;hay danay enwhay Ojay entway own,day eshay oundfay
atthay eshay ouldway ebay aredspay ethay ardhay asktay ofay ellingtay Eth'sbay ecretsay. Erhay
atherfay oodstay eaninglay ishay eadhay onay ethay antel-piece,may danay idday otnay urntay saay
eshay amecay in;ay utbay erhay othermay etchedstray outay erhay sarmay saay ifay orfay elp,hay danay

IIxXXVay.

EWnay IMPRESSIONSay.


Taay eethray o'clockay inay ethay ernoon,aftay lalay ethay ashionablefay orldway taay Icenay aymay
ebay eensay onay ethay Omenadepray esday Ais,--aanglay armingchay ace;play orfay ethay ideway
alk,way orderedbay ithway alms,pay owers,flay danay opicaltray ubs,shray isay oundedbay onay
oneay idesay ybay ethay ea,say onay ethay otheray ybay ethay andgray ive,dray inedlay ithway otelshay
danay illas,vay ilewhay eyondbay ielay orange-orchardsay danay ethay illshay. Anymay ationsnay
earay epresented,ray anymay anguageslay oken,spay anymay ostumescay orn;way ,anday onay aay
unnysay ay,day ethay ectaclespay isay saay aygay danay illiantbray saay aay arnivalcay. Aughtyhay
English,ay ivelylay Ench,fray obersay Ermans,gay andsomehay Aniards,spay uglyay
Ussians,ray eekmay Ews,jay ee-and-easyfray Ericans,amay lalay ive,dray it,say oray auntersay
ere,hay attingchay overay ethay ews,nay danay iticisingcray ethay atestlay elebritycay owhay
ashay ived,--Ristoriarray oray Ickens,day Ictorvay Emmanuelay oray ethay Ueenqay ofay ethay
Andwichsay Islandsay. Ethay equipagesay earay saay ariedvay saay ethay ompany,cay danay
actattray saay uchmay ention,attay especiallyay ethay owlay asket-barouchesbay inay ichwhay
adieslay ivedray emselves,thay ithway aay airpay ofay ashingday onies,pay aygay etsnay otay eepkay
eirthay oluminousvay ouncesflay omfray overflowingay ethay iminutiveday ehicles,vay danay
ittlelay oomsgray onay ethay erchpay ehindbay.

Ongalay isthay alk,way onay Istmaschray Ay,day aay alltay youngay anmay alkedway owly,slay ithway
ishay andshay ehindbay im,hay danay aay omewhatsay entabsay expressionay ofay ountenancecay.
Ehay ookedlay ikelay naay Italian,ay asway esseddray ikelay naay Englishman,ay danay adhay ethay
independentay iraay ofay naay Erican,--aamay ombinationcay ichwhay ausedcay undrysay airspay
ofay emininefay eyesay otay ooklay ovinglyappray eraftay im,hay danay undrysay andiesday inay
ackblay elvetvay uits,say ithway ose-coloredray eckties,nay uffbay oves,glay danay
orange-flowersay inay eirthay utton-holes,bay otay ugshray eirthay oulders,shay danay enthay
envyay imhay ishay inchesay. Erethay ereway entyplay ofay ettypray acesfay otay ire,admay utbay
ethay youngay anmay ooktay ittlelay oticenay ofay em,thay exceptay otay ance,glay ownay danay
en,thay taay omesay ondeblay irl,gay oray adylay inay ueblay. Esentlypray ehay olledstray outay ofay
ethay omenade,pray danay oodstay aay omentmay taay ethay ossing,cray saay ifay undecideday
etherwhay otay ogay danay istenlay otay ethay andbay inay ethay Ardinjay Ublique,pay oray otay
anderway ongalay ethay eachbay owardtay Astlecay Illhay. Ethay uickqay ottray ofay onies'pay
eetfay ademay imhay ooklay up,ay saay oneay ofay ethay ittlelay arriages,cay ontainingcay aay
inglesay ady,lay amecay apidlyray ownday ethay eetstray. Ethay adylay asway young,ay onde,blay
danay esseddray inay ueblay. Ehay aredstay aay inute,may enthay ishay olewhay acefay okeway up,ay
,anday avingway ishay athay ikelay aay oy,bay ehay urriedhay orwardfay otay eetmay erhay.

At's"Thay aay ociablesay angement,"array aidsay Y,amay issingmay omethingsay inay Aurie'slay
anner,may oughthay eshay ouldn'tcay elltay atwhay.

Y,"Whay youay eesay ehay ateshay otay avel,tray danay Iay atehay otay eepkay ill;stay osay eway eachay
uitsay ourselves,ay danay erethay isay onay oubletray. Iay maay oftenay ithway im,hay danay ehay

emay enwhay Iay etgay ackbay omfray ymay anderingsway. Irtyday olday ole,hay isn'tay it?"ay ehay
ed,adday ithway aay ooklay ofay isgust,day saay eythay ovedray ongalay ethay oulevardbay otay ethay
Aceplay Apoleon,nay inay ethay olday itycay.

E"Thay irtday isay icturesque,pay osay Iay on'tday indmay. Ethay iverray danay ethay illshay earay
elicious,day danay esethay impsesglay ofay ethay arrownay oss-streetscray earay ymay
elightday. Ownay eway allshay avehay otay aitway orfay atthay ocessionpray otay ass;pay it'say
oinggay otay ethay Urchchay ofay Tsay. Ohn."jay

Ilewhay Aurielay istlesslylay atchedway ethay ocessionpray ofay iestspray underay eirthay
anopies,cay ite-veiledwhay unsnay earingbay ightedlay apers,tay danay omesay otherhoodbray
inay ue,blay antingchay saay eythay alked,way Yamay atchedway im,hay danay eltfay aay ewnay ortsay
ofay ynessshay ealstay overay er;hay orfay ehay asway anged,chay danay eshay ouldcay otnay indfay
ethay erry-facedmay oybay eshay eftlay inay ethay oody-lookingmay anmay esidebay erhay. Ehay asway
andsomerhay anthay ever,ay danay eatlygray improved,ay eshay ought;thay utbay ownay atthay ethay
ushflay ofay easureplay taay eetingmay erhay asway over,ay ehay ookedlay iredtay danay
iritless,--notspay ick,say ornay exactlyay unhappy,ay utbay olderay danay avergray anthay aay
yearay oray otway ofay osperouspray ifelay ouldshay avehay ademay imhay. Eshay ouldn'tcay
understanday it,ay danay idday otnay enturevay otay kasay uestions;qay osay eshay ookshay erhay
ead,hay danay ouchedtay upay erhay onies,pay saay ethay ocessionpray oundway ayaway ossacray ethay
esarchay ofay ethay Aglionipay idge,bray danay anishedvay inay ethay urchchay.

Ue"_Qay ensezpay ous_?"vay eshay aid,say iringaay erhay Ench,fray ichwhay adhay improveday inay
uantity,qay ifay otnay inay uality,qay incesay eshay amecay oadabray.

At"Thay ademoisellemay ashay ademay oodgay useay ofay erhay ime,tay danay ethay esultray isay
arming,"chay epliedray Aurie,lay owing,bay ithway ishay andhay onay ishay eart,hay danay naay
iringadmay ooklay.

Eshay ushedblay ithway easure,play utbay omehowsay ethay omplimentcay idday otnay atisfysay
erhay ikelay ethay untblay aisespray ehay useday otay ivegay erhay taay ome,hay enwhay ehay
omenadedpray oundray erhay onay estivalfay occasions,ay danay oldtay erhay eshay asway
Altogether"ay olly,"jay ithway aay eartyhay ilesmay danay naay ovingappray atpay onay ethay
eadhay. Eshay idn'tday ikelay ethay ewnay one;tay or,fay oughthay otnay AsÃ©_,_blay itay oundedsay
indifferentay inay itespay ofay ethay ooklay.

If"ay at'sthay ethay ayway e'shay oinggay otay owgray up,ay Iay ishway e'dhay aystay aay oy,"bay eshay
ought,thay ithway aay uriouscay ensesay ofay isappointmentday danay iscomfort,day yingtray
eantimemay otay eemsay uiteqay easyay danay aygay.

Taay Igdor'savay eshay oundfay ethay eciouspray ome-letters,hay ,anday ivinggay ethay einsray
otay Aurie,lay eadray emthay uxuriouslylay saay eythay oundway upay ethay adyshay oadray etweenbay
eengray edges,hay erewhay ea-rosestay oomedblay saay eshlyfray saay inay Unejay.

Eth"Bay isay eryvay oorly,pay othermay ayssay. Iay oftenay inkthay Iay oughtay otay ogay ome,hay utbay
eythay lalay aysay Ay;''stay osay Iay o,day orfay Iay allshay evernay avehay otheranay ancechay ikelay
is,"thay aidsay Y,amay ookinglay obersay overay oneay agepay.

I"ay inkthay youay earay ight,ray ere;thay youay ouldcay oday othingnay taay ome,hay danay itay isay aay
eatgray omfortcay otay emthay otay owknay atthay youay earay ellway danay appy,hay danay enjoyingay
osay uch,may ymay ear."day

Ehay ewdray aay ittlelay earer,nay danay ookedlay oremay ikelay ishay olday elf,say saay ehay aidsay
at;thay danay ethay earfay atthay ometimessay eighedway onay Y'samay earthay asway ightened,lay
orfay ethay ook,lay ethay ,actay ethay otherlybray Y"may ear,"day eemedsay otay ureassay erhay
atthay ifay yanay oubletray idday ome,cay eshay ouldway otnay ebay onealay inay aay angestray andlay.
Esentlypray eshay aughed,lay danay owedshay imhay aay allsmay etchskay ofay Ojay inay erhay
ibbling-suit,scray ithway ethay owbay ampantlyray erectay uponay erhay ap,cay danay issuingay
omfray erhay outhmay ethay ords,way Enius"Gay urns!"bay

Aurielay iled,smay ooktay it,ay utpay itay inay ishay est-pocket,vay O"tay eepkay itay omfray
owingblay ay,"away danay istenedlay ithway interestay otay ethay ivelylay etterlay Yamay eadray
imhay.

Is"Thay illway ebay aay egularlyray errymay Istmaschray otay e,may ithway esentspray inay ethay
orning,may youay danay etterslay inay ethay ernoon,aftay danay aay artypay taay ight,"nay aidsay
Y,amay saay eythay ightedalay ongamay ethay uinsray ofay ethay olday ort,fay danay aay ockflay ofay
endidsplay eacockspay amecay oopingtray outabay em,thay amelytay aitingway otay ebay edfay.
Ilewhay Yamay oodstay aughinglay onay ethay ankbay oveabay imhay saay eshay atteredscay umbscray
otay ethay illiantbray irds,bay Aurielay ookedlay taay erhay saay eshay adhay ookedlay taay im,hay
ithway aay aturalnay uriositycay otay eesay atwhay angeschay imetay danay enceabsay adhay
oughtwray. Ehay oundfay othingnay otay erplexpay oray isappoint,day uchmay otay ireadmay danay
ove;appray or,fay overlookingay aay ewfay ittlelay ectationsaffay ofay eechspay danay
anner,may eshay asway saay ightlyspray danay acefulgray saay ever,ay ithway ethay itionadday ofay
atthay indescribableay omethingsay inay essdray danay earingbay ichwhay eway allcay
eleganceay. Aysalway aturemay orfay erhay e,agay eshay adhay ainedgay aay ertaincay Aplomb__ay
inay othbay arriagecay danay onversation,cay ichwhay ademay erhay eemsay oremay ofay aay omanway
ofay ethay orldway anthay eshay as;way utbay erhay olday etulancepay ownay danay enthay owedshay
itself,ay erhay ongstray illway illstay eldhay itsay own,ay danay erhay ativenay anknessfray asway
unspoileday ybay oreignfay olishpay.

ehay awsay enoughay otay atisfysay danay interestay im,hay danay arriedcay ayaway aay ettypray
ittlelay icturepay ofay aay ight-facedbray irlgay andingstay inay ethay unshine,say ichwhay
oughtbray outay ethay oftsay uehay ofay erhay ess,dray ethay eshfray olorcay ofay erhay eeks,chay

easantplay enescay.

ered,answay Oreign"Fay ifelay olishespay oneay inay itespay ofay one'say elf;say Iay udystay saay

aste;tay utbay Aurielay ikedlay erhay ethay etterbay orfay it,ay danay oundfay imselfhay othbay
iringadmay danay espectingray ethay avebray atiencepay atthay ademay ethay ostmay ofay
opportunity,ay danay ethay eerfulchay iritspay atthay overedcay overtypay ithway owersflay.
Yamay idday otnay owknay ywhay ehay ookedlay taay erhay osay indly,kay ornay ywhay ehay illedfay upay
erhay ookbay ithway ishay ownay ame,nay danay evotedday imselfhay otay erhay orfay ethay estray ofay
ethay evening,ay inay ethay ostmay elightfulday anner;may utbay ethay impulseay atthay oughtwray
isthay eeableagray angechay asway ethay esultray ofay oneay ofay ethay ewnay impressionsay ichwhay
othbay ofay emthay ereway unconsciouslyay ivinggay danay eceivingray.
