IIIxXXVay.

ONay EtHay ELFsHay.


Inay Ancefray ethay youngay irlsgay avehay aay ullday imetay ofay itay illtay eythay earay arried,may
enwhay Ive"_Vay alay ibertÃ©_"lay ecomesbay eirthay ottomay. Inay Erica,amay saay everyay oneay
ows,knay irlsgay earlyay ignsay ethay eclarationday ofay independence,ay danay enjoyay eirthay
eedomfray ithway epublicanray est;zay utbay ethay youngay atronsmay usuallyay icateabday
ithway ethay irstfay eirhay otay ethay one,thray danay ogay intoay aay eclusionsay ostalmay saay
oseclay saay aay Enchfray unnery,nay oughthay ybay onay eansmay saay uietqay. Etherwhay eythay
ikelay itay oray ot,nay eythay earay irtuallyvay utpay uponay ethay elfshay saay oonsay saay ethay
eddingway excitementay isay over,ay danay ostmay ofay emthay ightmay exclaim,ay saay idday aay
eryvay ettypray omanway ethay otheray ay,day I'm"ay saay andsomehay saay ever,ay utbay onay oneay
akestay yanay oticenay ofay emay ecausebay I'may arried."may

Otnay eingbay aay ellebay oray evenay aay ashionablefay ady,lay Egmay idday otnay experienceay
isthay ictionafflay illtay erhay abiesbay ereway aay yearay old,ay orfay inay erhay ittlelay orldway
imitivepray ustomscay evailed,pray danay eshay oundfay erselfhay oremay iredadmay danay
elovedbay anthay everay.

Saay eshay asway aay omanlyway ittlelay oman,way ethay aternalmay instinctay asway eryvay
ong,stray danay eshay asway entirelyay orbedabsay inay erhay ildren,chay otay ethay utteray
exclusionay ofay everythingay danay everybodyay elseay. Ayday danay ightnay eshay oodedbray
overay emthay ithway irelesstay evotionday danay iety,anxay eavinglay Ohnjay otay ethay endertay
erciesmay ofay ethay elp,hay orfay naay Irishay adylay ownay esidedpray overay ethay itchenkay
epartmentday. Eingbay aay omesticday an,may Ohnjay ecidedlyday issedmay ethay ifelyway
entionsattay ehay adhay eenbay ustomedaccay otay eceive;ray ut,bay saay ehay oredaday ishay
abies,bay ehay eerfullychay elinquishedray ishay omfortcay orfay aay ime,tay upposing,say
ithway asculinemay ignorance,ay atthay eacepay ouldway oonsay ebay estoredray. Utbay eethray
onthsmay assed,pay danay erethay asway onay eturnray ofay epose;ray Egmay ookedlay ornway danay
ervous,nay ethay abiesbay orbedabsay everyay inutemay ofay erhay ime,tay ethay ousehay asway
eglected,nay danay Itty,kay ethay ook,cay owhay ooktay ifelay Aisy,""ay eptkay imhay onay ortshay
ommonscay. Enwhay ehay entway outay inay ethay orningmay ehay asway ewilderedbay ybay allsmay
ommissionscay orfay ethay aptivecay amma;may ifay ehay amecay aylygay inay taay ight,nay eageray
otay embraceay ishay amily,fay ehay asway uenchedqay ybay aay Ush!"Hay eythay earay ustjay eepaslay
eraftay orryingway lalay ay."day Ifay ehay oposedpray aay ittlelay usementamay taay ome,hay O,"Nay
itay ouldway isturbday ethay abies."bay Ifay ehay intedhay taay aay ecturelay oray oncert,cay ehay
asway eredansway ithway aay eproachfulray ook,lay danay aay ecidedday Eave"Lay ymay ildrenchay
orfay easure,play ever!"nay Ishay eepslay asway okenbray ybay infantay ailsway danay isionsvay
ofay aay antomphay igurefay acingpay oiselesslynay otay danay ofray inay ethay atchesway ofay ethay
ight;nay ishay ealsmay ereway interrupteday ybay ethay equentfray ightflay ofay ethay
esidingpray enius,gay owhay esertedday im,hay alf-helped,hay ifay aay uffledmay irpchay
oundedsay omfray ethay estnay ove;abay danay enwhay ehay eadray ishay aperpay ofay naay evening,ay
Emi'sday oliccay otgay intoay ethay ipping-list,shay danay Aisy'sday allfay ectedaffay ethay
icepray ofay ocks,stay orfay Smray. Ookebray asway onlyay interesteday inay omesticday ewsnay.

Ethay oorpay anmay asway eryvay uncomfortable,ay orfay ethay ildrenchay adhay ereftbay imhay ofay
ishay ife;way omehay asway erelymay aay ursery,nay danay ethay erpetualpay Ushing""hay ademay
imhay eelfay ikelay aay utalbray intruderay eneverwhay ehay entereday ethay acredsay ecinctspray
ofay Abylandbay. Ehay orebay itay eryvay atientlypay orfay ixsay onths,may ,anday enwhay onay
ignssay ofay endmentamay eared,appay ehay idday atwhay otheray aternalpay exilesay
o,--triedday otay etgay aay ittlelay omfortcay elsewhereay. Ottscay adhay arriedmay danay onegay
otay ousekeepinghay otnay arfay off,ay danay Ohnjay ellfay intoay ethay ayway ofay unningray overay
orfay naay ourhay oray otway ofay naay evening,ay enwhay ishay ownay arlorpay asway empty,ay danay ishay
ownay ifeway ingingsay ullabieslay atthay eemedsay otay avehay onay enday. Smray. Ottscay asway aay
ively,lay ettypray irl,gay ithway othingnay otay oday utbay ebay eeable,agray danay eshay
erformedpay erhay issionmay ostmay uccessfullysay. Ethay arlorpay asway aysalway ightbray
danay active,attray ethay ess-boardchay eady,ray ethay ianopay inay une,tay entyplay ofay aygay
ossip,gay danay aay icenay ittlelay uppersay etsay orthfay inay emptingtay ylestay.

Ohnjay ouldway avehay eferredpray ishay ownay iresidefay ifay itay adhay otnay eenbay osay onely;lay
utbay saay itay as,way ehay atefullygray ooktay ethay extnay estbay ing,thay danay enjoyeday ishay
eighbor'snay ocietysay.

Egmay atherray ovedappray ofay ethay ewnay angementarray taay irst,fay danay oundfay itay aay
eliefray otay owknay atthay Ohnjay asway avinghay aay oodgay imetay insteaday ofay ozingday inay ethay
arlor,pay oray ampingtray outabay ethay ousehay danay akingway ethay ildrenchay. Utbay ybay danay
y,bay enwhay ethay eethingtay orryway asway over,ay danay ethay idolsay entway otay eepslay taay
operpray ours,hay eavinglay ammamay imetay otay est,ray eshay eganbay otay issmay Ohn,jay danay
indfay erhay ork-basketway ullday ompany,cay enwhay ehay asway otnay ittingsay oppositeay inay
ishay olday essing-gown,dray omfortablycay orchingscay ishay ippersslay onay ethay enderfay.
Eshay ouldway otnay kasay imhay otay aystay taay ome,hay utbay eltfay injureday ecausebay ehay idday
otnay owknay atthay eshay antedway imhay ithoutway eingbay old,tay entirelyay orgettingfay ethay
anymay eveningsay ehay adhay aitedway orfay erhay inay ainvay. Eshay asway ervousnay danay ornway
outay ithway atchingway danay orry,way danay inay atthay unreasonableay amefray ofay indmay
ichwhay ethay estbay ofay othersmay occasionallyay experienceay enwhay omesticday arescay
oppressay emthay. Antway ofay exerciseay obsray emthay ofay eerfulness,chay danay ootay uchmay
evotionday otay atthay idolay ofay Ericanamay omen,way ethay eapot,tay akesmay emthay eelfay saay
ifay eythay ereway lalay ervenay danay onay usclemay.

Yes,""ay eshay ouldway ay,say ookinglay inay ethay ass,glay I'm"ay ettinggay olday danay ugly;ay

danay oesgay otay eesay ishay ettypray eighbor,nay owhay ashay onay incumbrancesay. Ell,way ethay
abiesbay ovelay e;may eythay on'tday arecay ifay Iay maay inthay danay ale,pay danay aven'thay imetay

Otay ichwhay atheticpay ealappay Aisyday ouldway eransway ithway aay oo,cay oray Emiday ithway aay
ow,cray danay Egmay ouldway utpay ybay erhay amentationslay orfay aay aternalmay evel,ray ichwhay

interestingay ointspay ithway Ott,scay uiteqay unconsciousay atthay Egmay issedmay imhay.
Otnay aay ordway idday eshay ay,say owever,hay illtay erhay othermay oundfay erhay inay earstay oneay

iritsspay adhay otnay escapeday erhay observationay.

I"ay ouldn'tway elltay yanay oneay exceptay you,ay other;may utbay Iay eallyray oday eednay
ice,advay or,fay ifay Ohnjay oesgay onay osay uchmay ongerlay Iay ightmay saay ellway ebay idowed,"way
epliedray Smray. Ooke,bray yingdray erhay earstay onay Aisy'sday ib,bay ithway naay injureday
iraay.

Oes"Gay onay ow,hay ymay ear?"day edaskay erhay othermay iouslyanxay.

You"ay avehay onlyay ademay ethay istakemay atthay ostmay youngay ivesway ake,--forgottenmay

I'm"ay aidafray itay on'tway. Ifay Iay kasay imhay otay ay,stay e'llhay inkthay I'may ealous;jay danay

artpay otay o,day danay ehay illway oday itay adlyglay danay aithfully,fay danay itay illway ebay
etterbay orfay youay "all.ay

You"ay eallyray inkthay o,say other?"may

I"ay owknay it,ay Eg,may orfay I'veay iedtray it;ay danay Iay eldomsay ivegay iceadvay unlessay I'veay
ovedpray itsay acticabilitypray. Enwhay youay danay Ojay ereway ittle,lay Iay entway onay ustjay
saay youay e,aray eelingfay saay ifay Iay idn'tday oday ymay utyday unlessay Iay evotedday yselfmay
ollywhay otay youay. Oorpay atherfay ooktay otay ishay ooks,bay eraftay Iay adhay efusedray lalay
offersay ofay elp,hay danay eftlay emay otay ytray ymay experimentay onealay. Iay uggledstray
ongalay saay ellway saay Iay ould,cay utbay Ojay asway ootay uchmay orfay emay. Iay earlynay oiltspay
erhay ybay indulgenceay. Youay ereway oorly,pay danay Iay orriedway outabay youay illtay Iay ellfay
icksay yselfmay. Enthay atherfay amecay otay ethay escue,ray uietlyqay anagedmay everything,ay
danay ademay imselfhay osay elpfulhay atthay Iay awsay ymay istake,may danay evernay avehay eenbay
eablay otay etgay onay ithoutway imhay incesay. Atthay isay ethay ecretsay ofay ouray omehay
appiness:hay ehay oesday otnay etlay usinessbay eanway imhay omfray ethay ittlelay arescay danay
utiesday atthay ectaffay usay ,allay danay Iay ytray otnay otay etlay omesticday orriesway estroyday
ymay interestay inay ishay ursuitspay. Eachay oday ouray artpay onealay inay anymay ings,thay utbay
taay omehay eway orkway ogether,tay ays."alway

It"ay isay o,say other;may danay ymay eatgray ishway isay otay ebay otay ymay usbandhay danay ildrenchay
atwhay youay avehay eenbay otay yoursay. Owshay emay ow;hay I'llay oday ythinganay youay ay."say

You"ay aysalway ereway ymay ocileday aughterday. Ell,way ear,day ifay Iay ereway you,ay I'day etlay
Ohnjay avehay oremay otay oday ithway ethay anagementmay ofay Emi,day orfay ethay oybay eedsnay
aining,tray danay it'say onenay ootay oonsay otay eginbay. Enthay I'day oday atwhay Iay avehay oftenay
oposed,pray etlay Annahhay omecay danay elphay you;ay eshay isay aay apitalcay urse,nay danay youay
aymay usttray ethay eciouspray abiesbay otay erhay ilewhay youay oday oremay ouseworkhay. Youay
eednay ethay exercise,ay Annahhay ouldway enjoyay ethay est,ray danay Ohnjay ouldway indfay ishay
ifeway ainagay. Ogay outay ore;may eepkay eerfulchay saay ellway saay usy,bay orfay youay earay ethay
unshine-makersay ofay ethay amily,fay danay ifay youay etgay ismalday erethay isay onay airfay
eatherway. Enthay I'day ytray otay aketay naay interestay inay ateverwhay Ohnjay ikes,--talklay
ithway im,hay etlay imhay eadray otay you,ay exchangeay ideas,ay danay elphay eachay otheray inay
atthay ayway. On'tday utshay yourselfay upay inay aay andboxbay ecausebay youay earay aay oman,way
utbay understanday atwhay isay oinggay on,ay danay educateay yourselfay otay aketay youray artpay
inay ethay orld'sway ork,way orfay itay lalay ectsaffay youay danay yours."ay

Ohn"Jay isay osay ensible,say I'may aidafray ehay illway inkthay I'may upidstay ifay Iay kasay
uestionsqay outabay oliticspay danay ings."thay

I"ay on'tday elievebay ehay ould;way ovelay overscay aay ultitudemay ofay ins,say danay ofay omwhay
ouldcay youay kasay oremay eelyfray anthay ofay im?hay Ytray it,ay danay eesay ifay ehay oesn'tday
indfay youray ocietysay arfay oremay eeableagray anthay Smray. Ott'sscay uppers."say

I"ay illway. Oorpay Ohn!jay I'may aidafray Iay Ave__hay eglectednay imhay adly,say utbay Iay
oughtthay Iay asway ight,ray danay ehay evernay aidsay ything."anay

E"Hay iedtray otnay otay ebay elfish,say utbay ehay As__hay eltfay atherray orlorn,fay Iay ancyfay.
Isthay isay ustjay ethay ime,tay Eg,may enwhay youngay arriedmay eoplepay earay tapay otay owgray
art,apay danay ethay eryvay imetay enwhay eythay oughtay otay ebay ostmay ogether;tay orfay ethay
irstfay endernesstay oonsay earsway off,ay unlessay arecay isay akentay otay eservepray it;ay
danay onay imetay isay osay eautifulbay danay eciouspray otay arentspay saay ethay irstfay yearsay
ofay ethay ittlelay iveslay ivengay emthay otay aintray. On'tday etlay Ohnjay ebay aay angerstray otay
ethay abies,bay orfay eythay illway oday oremay otay eepkay imhay afesay danay appyhay inay isthay
orldway ofay ialtray danay emptationtay anthay ythinganay else,ay danay oughthray emthay youay
illway earnlay otay owknay danay ovelay oneay otheranay saay youay ouldshay. Ow,nay ear,day
ood-by;gay inkthay overay other'smay eachment,pray tacay uponay itay ifay itay eemssay ood,gay
danay Odgay essblay youay "all!ay

Egmay idday inkthay itay over,ay oundfay itay ood,gay danay edactay uponay it,ay oughthay ethay
irstfay emptattay asway otnay ademay exactlyay saay eshay annedplay otay avehay itay. Ofay oursecay
ethay ildrenchay yrannizedtay overay er,hay danay uledray ethay ousehay saay oonsay saay eythay
oundfay outay atthay ickingkay danay uallingsqay oughtbray emthay ateverwhay eythay antedway.
Ammamay asway naay ectabjay aveslay otay eirthay aprices,cay utbay apapay asway otnay osay easilyay
ubjugated,say danay occasionallyay ictedafflay ishay endertay ousespay ybay naay emptattay
taay aternalpay isciplineday ithway ishay obstreperousay onsay. Orfay Emiday inheriteday aay
ifletray ofay ishay ire'ssay irmnessfay ofay aracter,--wechay on'tway allcay itay
obstinacy,--anday enwhay ehay ademay upay ishay ittlelay indmay otay avehay oray otay oday
ything,anay lalay ethay ing'skay orseshay danay lalay ethay ing'skay enmay ouldcay otnay angechay
atthay ertinaciouspay ittlelay indmay. Ammamay oughtthay ethay earday ootay youngay otay ebay
aughttay otay onquercay ishay ejudices,pray utbay apapay elievedbay atthay itay evernay asway
ootay oonsay otay earnlay obedience;ay osay Astermay Emiday earlyay iscoveredday atthay enwhay
ehay undertookay otay Astle""wray ithway Arpar,""pay ehay aysalway otgay ethay orstway ofay it;ay
yet,ay ikelay ethay Englishman,ay Abybay espectedray ethay anmay owhay onqueredcay im,hay danay
ovedlay ethay atherfay osewhay avegray O,"Nay o,"nay asway oremay impressiveay anthay lalay
amma'smay ove-patslay.

Aay ewfay aysday eraftay ethay alktay ithway erhay other,may Egmay esolvedray otay ytray aay ocialsay
eveningay ithway Ohn;jay osay eshay ordereday aay icenay upper,say etsay ethay arlorpay inay
order,ay esseddray erselfhay ettily,pray danay utpay ethay ildrenchay otay edbay early,ay atthay
othingnay ouldshay interfereay ithway erhay experimentay. Ut,bay unfortunately,ay Emi'sday
ostmay unconquerableay ejudicepray asway ainstagay oinggay otay ed,bay danay atthay ightnay ehay
ecidedday otay ogay onay aay ampage;ray osay oorpay Egmay ungsay danay ocked,ray oldtay oriesstay
danay iedtray everyay eep-provokingslay ileway eshay ouldcay evise,day utbay lalay inay ain,vay
ethay igbay eyesay ouldn'tway ut;shay danay onglay eraftay Aisyday adhay onegay otay yelow,bay
ikelay ethay ubbychay ittlelay unchbay ofay ood-naturegay eshay as,way aughtynay Emiday aylay
aringstay taay ethay ight,lay ithway ethay ostmay iscouraginglyday ide-awakeway expressionay
ofay ountenancecay.

Ill"Way Emiday ielay illstay ikelay aay oodgay oy,bay ilewhay ammamay unsray ownday danay ivesgay
oorpay apapay ishay ea?"tay edaskay Eg,may saay ethay all-doorhay oftlysay osed,clay danay ethay
ell-knownway epstay entway iptoeingtay intoay ethay ining-roomday.

E"May ashay ea!"tay aidsay Emi,day eparingpray otay oinjay inay ethay evelray.

O;"Nay utbay I'llay avesay youay omesay ittlelay akiescay orfay eakfast,bray ifay you'llay ogay
ye-bybay ikelay Aisyday. Illway you,ay ovey?"lay

Iss!""ay danay Emiday utshay ishay eyesay ight,tay saay ifay otay atchcay eepslay danay urryhay ethay
esiredday ayday.

Akingtay antageadvay ofay ethay opitiouspray oment,may Egmay ippedslay ay,away danay anray
ownday otay eetgray erhay usbandhay ithway aay ilingsmay ace,fay danay ethay ittlelay ueblay owbay
inay erhay airhay ichwhay asway ishay especialay irationadmay. Ehay awsay itay taay once,ay danay
aid,say ithway easedplay urprise,--say

Y,"Whay ittlelay other,may owhay aygay eway earay o-nighttay. Oday youay expectay ompany?"cay

Only"ay you,ay ear."day

Is"ay itay aay irthday,bay iversary,annay oray ything?"anay

O;"Nay I'may iredtay ofay eingbay aay owdy,day osay Iay esseddray upay saay aay angechay. Youay aysalway

I"ay oday itay outay ofay espectray otay you,ay ymay ear,"day aidsay old-fashioneday Ohnjay.

oicevay asway eard,hay ayingsay impatiently,--ay

Of"ay oursecay Iay ill,way ithway lalay ymay eart,hay oray ywhereanay elseay youay ikelay. Youay

Ell,"Way Iay adhay aay alktay ithway Armeemay ethay otheray ay,day danay oldtay erhay owhay ervousnay

eepkay emay omfray ettinggay otay ebay aay idgety,fay oken-downbray olday omanway eforebay ymay
imetay. It'say onlyay naay experiment,ay Ohn,jay danay Iay antway otay ytray itay orfay youray akesay

ope?"hay

Evernay indmay atwhay Ohnjay aid,say oray atwhay aay eryvay arrownay escapeay ethay ittlelay
onnetbay adhay omfray utteray uin;ray lalay atthay eway avehay yanay usinessbay otay ow,knay isay
atthay Ohnjay idday Ot__nay earappay otay object,ay udgingjay omfray ethay angeschay ichwhay
aduallygray ooktay aceplay inay ethay ousehay danay itsay inmatesay. Itay asway otnay lalay
Aradisepay ybay yanay eans,may utbay everyay oneay asway etterbay orfay ethay ivisionday ofay
aborlay ystem;say ethay ildrenchay ovethray underay ethay aternalpay ule,ray orfay urate,accay
eadfaststay Ohnjay oughtbray orderay danay obedienceay intoay Abydom,bay ilewhay Egmay
ecoveredray erhay iritsspay danay omposedcay erhay ervesnay ybay entyplay ofay olesomewhay
exercise,ay aay ittlelay easure,play danay uchmay onfidentialcay onversationcay ithway erhay
ensiblesay usbandhay. Omehay ewgray ome-likehay ain,agay danay Ohnjay adhay onay ishway otay
eavelay it,ay unlessay ehay ooktay Egmay ithway imhay. Ethay Ottsscay amecay otay ethay Ookes'bray
ow,nay danay everyay oneay oundfay ethay ittlelay ousehay aay eerfulchay ace,play ullfay ofay
appiness,hay ontent,cay danay amilyfay ovelay. Evenay aygay Alliesay Offattmay ikedlay otay ogay
erethay. It"ay isay aysalway osay uietqay danay easantplay ere;hay itay oesday emay ood,gay Eg,"may
eshay useday otay ay,say ookinglay outabay erhay ithway istfulway eyes,ay saay ifay yingtray otay
iscoverday ethay arm,chay atthay eshay ightmay useay itay inay erhay eatgray ouse,hay ullfay ofay
endidsplay oneliness;lay orfay erethay ereway onay iotous,ray unny-facedsay abiesbay
ere,thay danay Ednay ivedlay inay aay orldway ofay ishay own,ay erewhay erethay asway onay aceplay orfay
erhay.

Isthay ouseholdhay appinesshay idday otnay omecay lalay taay once,ay utbay Ohnjay danay Egmay adhay
oundfay ethay eykay otay it,ay danay eachay yearay ofay arriedmay ifelay aughttay emthay owhay otay
useay it,ay unlockingay ethay easuriestray ofay ealray ome-lovehay danay utualmay
elpfulness,hay ichwhay ethay oorestpay aymay ossess,pay danay ethay ichestray annotcay uybay.
Isthay isay ethay ortsay ofay elfshay onay ichwhay youngay ivesway danay othersmay aymay onsentcay
otay ebay aid,lay afesay omfray ethay estlessray etfray danay everfay ofay ethay orld,way indingfay
oyallay overslay inay ethay ittlelay onssay danay aughtersday owhay ingclay otay em,thay
undaunteday ybay orrow,say overty,pay oray e;agay alkingway idesay ybay ide,say oughthray airfay
danay ormystay eather,way ithway aay aithfulfay iend,fray owhay is,ay inay ethay uetray ensesay ofay
ethay oodgay olday Axonsay ord,way ethay Ouse-band,""hay danay earning,lay saay Egmay earned,lay
atthay aay oman'sway appiesthay ingdomkay isay ome,hay erhay ighesthay onorhay ethay taray ofay
ulingray it,ay otnay saay aay ueen,qay utbay aay iseway ifeway danay othermay.

Illustration:[ay Atsay ipingpay onay aay onestay ilewhay ishay oatsgay ipped]skay

IXxXXay.

AZYlay AURENCElay.


Aurielay entway otay Icenay intendingay otay aystay aay eek,way danay emainedray aay onthmay. Ehay
asway iredtay ofay anderingway outabay one,alay danay Y'samay amiliarfay esencepray eemedsay
otay ivegay aay ome-likehay armchay otay ethay oreignfay enesscay inay ichwhay eshay orebay aay
artpay. Ehay atherray issedmay ethay Etting""pay ehay useday otay eceive,ray danay enjoyeday aay
astetay ofay itay ain;agay orfay onay entions,attay oweverhay attering,flay omfray
angers,stray ereway alfhay osay easantplay saay ethay isterlysay orationaday ofay ethay irlsgay
taay omehay. Yamay evernay ouldway etpay imhay ikelay ethay others,ay utbay eshay asway eryvay adglay
otay eesay imhay ow,nay danay uiteqay ungclay otay im,hay eelingfay atthay ehay asway ethay
epresentativeray ofay ethay earday amilyfay orfay omwhay eshay ongedlay oremay anthay eshay
ouldway onfesscay. Eythay aturallynay ooktay omfortcay inay eachay other'say ociety,say danay
ereway uchmay ogether,tay iding,ray alking,way ancing,day oray awdling,day or,fay taay Ice,nay
onay oneay ancay ebay eryvay industriousay uringday ethay aygay easonsay. Ut,bay ilewhay
arentlyappay usingamay emselvesthay inay ethay ostmay arelesscay ashion,fay eythay ereway
alf-consciouslyhay akingmay iscoveriesday danay ormingfay opinionsay outabay eachay
otheray. Yamay oseray ailyday inay ethay estimationay ofay erhay iend,fray utbay ehay unksay inay
ers,hay danay eachay eltfay ethay uthtray eforebay aay ordway asway okenspay. Yamay iedtray otay
ease,play danay ucceeded,say orfay eshay asway atefulgray orfay ethay anymay easuresplay ehay
avegay er,hay danay epaidray imhay ithway ethay ittlelay ervicessay otay ichwhay omanlyway omenway
owknay owhay otay endlay naay indescribableay armchay. Aurielay ademay onay effortay ofay yanay
ind,kay utbay ustjay etlay imselfhay iftdray ongalay saay omfortablycay saay ossible,pay
yingtray otay orget,fay danay eelingfay atthay lalay omenway oweday imhay aay indkay ordway
ecausebay oneay adhay eenbay oldcay otay imhay. Itay ostcay imhay onay effortay otay ebay enerous,gay
danay ehay ouldway avehay ivengay Yamay lalay ethay inketstray inay Icenay ifay eshay ouldway avehay
akentay em;thay ut,bay taay ethay amesay ime,tay ehay eltfay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay angechay ethay
opinionay eshay asway ormingfay ofay im,hay danay ehay atherray eadeddray ethay eenkay ueblay eyesay
atthay eemedsay otay atchway imhay ithway uchsay alf-sorrowful,hay alf-scornfulhay
urprisesay.

All"ay ethay estray avehay onegay otay Onacomay orfay ethay ay;day Iay eferredpray otay aystay taay
omehay danay itewray etterslay. Eythay earay oneday ow,nay danay Iay maay oinggay otay Alrosavay otay
etch;skay illway youay ome?"cay aidsay Y,amay saay eshay oinedjay Aurielay oneay ovelylay ayday
enwhay ehay oungedlay inay saay usual,ay outabay oonnay.

Ell,"Way yes;ay utbay isn'tay itay atherray armway orfay uchsay aay onglay alk?"way ehay eredansway
owly,slay orfay ethay adedshay Alon__say ookedlay inviting,ay eraftay ethay areglay ithoutway.

I'm"ay oinggay otay avehay ethay ittlelay arriage,cay danay Aptistebay ancay ive,dray osay
you'llay avehay othingnay otay oday utbay oldhay youray umbrellaay danay eepkay youray ovesglay
ice,"nay eturnedray Y,amay ithway aay arcasticsay anceglay taay ethay immaculateay ids,kay
ichwhay ereway aay eakway ointpay ithway Aurielay.

En"Thay I'llay ogay ithway easure;"play danay ehay utpay outay ishay andhay orfay erhay
etch-bookskay. Utbay eshay uckedtay itay underay erhay maray ithway aay arp--shay

On't"Day oubletray yourself;ay it'say onay exertionay otay e,may utbay You__ay on'tday ooklay
equalay otay it."ay

Aurielay iftedlay ishay eyebrows,ay danay ollowedfay taay aay eisurelylay acepay saay eshay anray
ownstairs;day utbay enwhay eythay otgay intoay ethay arriagecay ehay ooktay ethay einsray
imself,hay danay eftlay ittlelay Aptistebay othingnay otay oday utbay oldfay ishay sarmay danay
allfay eepaslay onay ishay erchpay.

Ethay otway evernay uarrelled,--Amyqay asway ootay ell-bred,way danay ustjay ownay Aurielay
asway ootay azy;lay o,say inay aay inutemay ehay eepedpay underay erhay at-brimhay ithway naay
inquiringay ir;aay eshay eredansway ithway aay ile,smay danay eythay entway onay ogethertay inay
ethay ostmay icableamay annermay.

Itay asway aay ovelylay ive,dray ongalay indingway oadsray ichray inay ethay icturesquepay
enesscay atthay elightday eauty-lovingbay eyesay. Erehay naay ientancay onastery,may
encewhay ethay olemnsay antingchay ofay ethay onksmay amecay ownday otay emthay. Erethay aay
are-leggedbay epherd,shay inay oodenway oes,shay ointedpay at,hay danay oughray acketjay
overay oneay oulder,shay atsay ipingpay onay aay one,stay ilewhay ishay oatsgay ippedskay ongamay
ethay ocksray oray aylay taay ishay eetfay. Eek,may ouse-coloredmay onkeys,day adenlay ithway
annierspay ofay eshly-cutfray ass,gray assedpay y,bay ithway aay ettypray irlgay inay aay
Apaline__cay ittingsay etweenbay ethay eengray iles,pay oray naay olday omanway inningspay
ithway aay istaffday saay eshay entway. Own,bray oft-eyedsay ildrenchay anray outay omfray ethay
uaintqay onestay ovelshay otay offeray osegays,nay oray unchesbay ofay orangesay illstay onay
ethay oughbay. Arledgnay olive-treesay overedcay ethay illshay ithway eirthay uskyday
oliage,fay uitfray unghay oldengay inay ethay orchard,ay danay eatgray arletscay emonesanay
ingedfray ethay oadside;ray ilewhay eyondbay eengray opesslay danay aggycray eights,hay ethay
Aritimemay Salpay oseray arpshay danay itewhay ainstagay ethay ueblay Italianay yskay.

Alrosavay ellway eservedday itsay ame,nay or,fay inay atthay imateclay ofay erpetualpay
ummer,say osesray ossomedblay everywhereay. Eythay overhungay ethay ay,archway ustthray
emselvesthay etweenbay ethay arsbay ofay ethay eatgray ategay ithway aay eetsway elcomeway otay
assers-by,pay danay inedlay ethay enue,avay indingway oughthray emon-treeslay danay
eatheryfay almspay upay otay ethay illavay onay ethay illhay. Everyay adowyshay ook,nay erewhay
eatssay inviteday oneay otay opstay danay est,ray asway aay assmay ofay oom;blay everyay oolcay
ottogray adhay itsay arblemay ymphnay ilingsmay omfray aay eilvay ofay owers,flay danay everyay
ountainfay eflectedray imson,cray ite,whay oray alepay inkpay oses,ray eaninglay ownday otay
ilesmay taay eirthay ownay eautybay. Osesray overedcay ethay allsway ofay ethay ouse,hay apeddray
ethay ornices,cay imbedclay ethay illars,pay danay anray iotray overay ethay alustradebay ofay
ethay ideway errace,tay encewhay oneay ookedlay ownday onay ethay unnysay Editerranean,may danay
ethay ite-walledwhay itycay onay itsay oreshay.

oses?"ray edaskay Y,amay ausingpay onay ethay erracetay otay enjoyay ethay iew,vay danay aay

Aint"Say Aurencelay onay aay idiron,"gray edadday Aurie,lay andlyblay inishingfay ethay

expressionay eplacedray ethay ormerfay indifferenceay.

I"ay upposedsay you'day aketay itay osay. Youay enmay elltay usay eway earay els,angay danay aysay eway
ancay akemay youay atwhay eway ill;way utbay ethay instantay eway onestlyhay ytray otay oday youay

EtHay ALLEYvay OFay EtHay ADOWsHay.


Enwhay ethay irstfay itternessbay asway over,ay ethay amilyfay eptedaccay ethay inevitable,ay
danay iedtray otay earbay itay eerfully,chay elpinghay oneay otheranay ybay ethay increaseday
ectionaffay ichwhay omescay otay indbay ouseholdshay enderlytay ogethertay inay imestay ofay
oubletray. Eythay utpay ayaway eirthay ief,gray danay eachay idday ishay oray erhay artpay owardtay
akingmay atthay astlay yearay aay appyhay oneay.

Ethay easantestplay oomray inay ethay ousehay asway etsay artapay orfay Eth,bay danay inay itay asway
atheredgay everythingay atthay eshay ostmay oved,--flowers,lay ictures,pay erhay iano,pay
ethay ittlelay ork-table,way danay ethay elovedbay ussiespay. Ather'sfay estbay ooksbay
oundfay eirthay ayway ere,thay other'smay easy-chair,ay O'sjay esk,day Y'samay inestfay
etches;skay danay everyay ayday Egmay oughtbray erhay abiesbay onay aay ovinglay ilgrimage,pay
otay akemay unshinesay orfay Untyaay Ethbay. Ohnjay uietlyqay etsay artapay aay ittlelay um,say
atthay ehay ightmay enjoyay ethay easureplay ofay eepingkay ethay invaliday uppliedsay ithway
ethay uitfray eshay ovedlay danay ongedlay or;fay olday Annahhay evernay eariedway ofay
oncoctingcay aintyday ishesday otay empttay aay apriciouscay etite,appay oppingdray earstay
saay eshay orked;way danay omfray ossacray ethay easay amecay ittlelay iftsgay danay eerfulchay
etters,lay eemingsay otay ingbray eathsbray ofay armthway danay agrancefray omfray andslay
atthay owknay onay interway.

Ere,hay erishedchay ikelay aay ouseholdhay aintsay inay itsay ine,shray atsay Eth,bay anquiltray
danay usybay saay ever;ay orfay othingnay ouldcay angechay ethay eet,sway unselfishay ature,nay
danay evenay ilewhay eparingpray otay eavelay ife,lay eshay iedtray otay akemay itay appierhay orfay
osethay owhay ouldshay emainray ehindbay. Ethay eeblefay ingersfay ereway evernay idle,ay danay
oneay ofay erhay easuresplay asway otay akemay ittlelay ingsthay orfay ethay ool-childrenschay
ailyday assingpay otay danay o,--tofray opdray aay airpay ofay ittensmay omfray erhay indowway orfay
aay airpay ofay urplepay ands,hay aay eedle-booknay orfay omesay allsmay othermay ofay anymay
olls,day en-wiperspay orfay youngay enmenpay oilingtay oughthray orestsfay ofay ot-hooks,pay
ap-booksscray orfay icture-lovingpay eyes,ay danay lalay annermay ofay easantplay evices,day
illtay ethay eluctantray imbersclay upay ethay adderlay ofay earninglay oundfay eirthay ayway
ewnstray ithway owers,flay saay itay ere,way danay amecay otay egardray ethay entlegay ivergay saay
aay ortsay ofay airyfay odmother,gay owhay atsay oveabay ere,thay danay oweredshay ownday iftsgay
iraculouslymay uitedsay otay eirthay astestay danay eedsnay. Ifay Ethbay adhay antedway yanay
eward,ray eshay oundfay itay inay ethay ightbray ittlelay acesfay aysalway urnedtay upay otay erhay
indow,way ithway odsnay danay iles,smay danay ethay olldray ittlelay etterslay ichwhay amecay otay
er,hay ullfay ofay otsblay danay atitudegray.

Ethay irstfay ewfay onthsmay ereway eryvay appyhay ones,ay danay Ethbay oftenay useday otay ooklay
ound,ray danay aysay Ow"Hay eautifulbay isthay is!"ay saay eythay lalay atsay ogethertay inay erhay
unnysay oom,ray ethay abiesbay ickingkay danay owingcray onay ethay oor,flay othermay danay
isterssay orkingway ear,nay danay atherfay eading,ray inay ishay easantplay oice,vay omfray
ethay iseway olday ooksbay ichwhay eemedsay ichray inay oodgay danay omfortablecay ords,way saay
icableapplay ownay saay enwhay ittenwray enturiescay o;agay aay ittlelay apel,chay erewhay aay
aternalpay iestpray aughttay ishay ockflay ethay ardhay essonslay lalay ustmay earn,lay yingtray
otay owshay emthay atthay opehay ancay omfortcay ove,lay danay aithfay akemay esignationray
ossiblepay. Implesay ermons,say atthay entway aightstray otay ethay oulssay ofay osethay owhay
istened;lay orfay ethay ather'sfay earthay asway inay ethay inister'smay eligion,ray danay ethay
equentfray alterfay inay ethay oicevay avegay aay oubleday eloquenceay otay ethay ordsway ehay
okespay oray eadray.

Itay asway ellway orfay lalay atthay isthay eacefulpay imetay asway ivengay emthay saay
eparationpray orfay ethay adsay ourshay otay ome;cay or,fay ybay danay y,bay Ethbay aidsay ethay
eedlenay asway O"say eavy,"hay danay utpay itay ownday orever;fay alkingtay eariedway er,hay
acesfay oubledtray er,hay ainpay aimedclay erhay orfay itsay own,ay danay erhay anquiltray
iritspay asway orrowfullysay erturbedpay ybay ethay illsay atthay exedvay erhay eeblefay
eshflay. Haay e!may uchsay eavyhay ays,day uchsay ong,lay onglay ights,nay uchsay ingachay
eartshay danay imploringay ayers,pray enwhay osethay owhay ovedlay erhay estbay ereway orcedfay
otay eesay ethay inthay andshay etchedstray outay otay emthay eseechingly,bay otay earhay ethay
itterbay y,cray Elp"Hay e,may elphay e!"may danay otay eelfay atthay erethay asway onay elphay. Aay
adsay eclipseay ofay ethay erenesay oul,say aay arpshay ugglestray ofay ethay youngay ifelay ithway
eath;day utbay othbay ereway ercifullymay ief,bray danay en,thay ethay aturalnay ebellionray
over,ay ethay olday eacepay eturnedray oremay eautifulbay anthay everay. Ithway ethay eckwray ofay
erhay ailfray ody,bay Eth'sbay oulsay ewgray ong;stray ,anday oughthay eshay aidsay ittle,lay
osethay outabay erhay eltfay atthay eshay asway eady,ray awsay atthay ethay irstfay ilgrimpay
alledcay asway ikewiselay ethay ittest,fay danay aitedway ithway erhay onay ethay ore,shay
yingtray otay eesay ethay Iningshay Onesay omingcay otay eceiveray erhay enwhay eshay ossedcray
ethay iverray.

Ojay evernay eftlay erhay orfay naay ourhay incesay Ethbay adhay aid,say I"ay eelfay ongerstray enwhay
youay earay ere."hay Eshay eptslay onay aay ouchcay inay ethay oom,ray akingway oftenay otay enewray
ethay ire,fay otay eed,fay ift,lay oray aitway uponay ethay atientpay eaturecray owhay eldomsay
edaskay orfay ything,anay danay Ied"tray otnay otay ebay aay ouble."tray Lalay ayday eshay auntedhay
ethay oom,ray ealousjay ofay yanay otheray urse,nay danay ouderpray ofay eingbay osenchay enthay
anthay ofay yanay onorhay erhay ifelay everay oughtbray erhay. Eciouspray danay elpfulhay ourshay
otay O,jay orfay ownay erhay earthay eceivedray ethay eachingtay atthay itay eeded;nay essonslay
inay atiencepay ereway osay eetlysway aughttay erhay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay ailfay otay earnlay
em;thay aritychay orfay ,allay ethay ovelylay iritspay atthay ancay orgivefay danay ulytray
orgetfay unkindness,ay ethay oyaltylay otay utyday atthay akesmay ethay ardesthay easy,ay danay
ethay inceresay aithfay atthay earsfay othing,nay utbay uststray undoubtinglyay.

Often,ay enwhay eshay oke,way Ojay oundfay Ethbay eadingray inay erhay ell-wornway ittlelay
ook,bay eardhay erhay ingingsay oftly,say otay eguilebay ethay eeplessslay ight,nay oray awsay
erhay eanlay erhay acefay uponay erhay ands,hay ilewhay owslay earstay oppeddray oughthray ethay
ansparenttray ingers;fay danay Ojay ouldway ielay atchingway er,hay ithway oughtsthay ootay
eepday orfay ears,tay eelingfay atthay Eth,bay inay erhay imple,say unselfishay ay,way asway
yingtray otay eanway erselfhay omfray ethay earday olday ife,lay danay itfay erselfhay orfay ethay
ifelay otay ome,cay ybay acredsay ordsway ofay omfort,cay uietqay ayers,pray danay ethay usicmay
eshay ovedlay osay ellway.

Eeingsay isthay idday oremay orfay Ojay anthay ethay isestway ermons,say ethay aintliestsay
ymns,hay ethay ostmay erventfay ayerspray atthay yanay oicevay ouldcay utter;ay or,fay ithway
eyesay ademay earclay ybay anymay ears,tay danay aay earthay oftenedsay ybay ethay enderesttay
orrow,say eshay ecognizedray ethay eautybay ofay erhay ister'ssay ife,--uneventful,lay
unambitious,ay yetay ullfay ofay ethay enuinegay irtuesvay ichwhay Ell"smay eet,sway danay
ossomblay inay ethay ust,"day ethay elf-forgetfulnesssay atthay akesmay ethay umblesthay onay
earthay ememberedray oonestsay inay eaven,hay ethay uetray uccesssay ichwhay isay ossiblepay
otay lalay.

Oneay ight,nay enwhay Ethbay ookedlay ongamay ethay ooksbay uponay erhay able,tay otay indfay
omethingsay otay akemay erhay orgetfay ethay ortalmay earinessway atthay asway ostalmay saay
ardhay otay earbay saay ain,pay saay eshay urnedtay ethay eaveslay ofay erhay olday avoritefay
Ilgrim'spay Ogress,pray eshay oundfay aay ittlelay aper,pay ibbledscray overay inay O'sjay
andhay. Ethay amenay aughtcay erhay eye,ay danay ethay urredblay ooklay ofay ethay ineslay ademay
erhay uresay atthay earstay adhay allenfay onay itay.

Oor"Pay O!jay e'sshay astfay eep,aslay osay Iay on'tway akeway erhay otay kasay eave;lay eshay owsshay
emay lalay erhay ings,thay danay Iay on'tday inkthay e'llshay indmay ifay Iay ooklay taay is,"thay
oughtthay Eth,bay ithway aay anceglay taay erhay ister,say owhay aylay onay ethay ug,ray ithway ethay
ongstay esidebay er,hay eadyray otay akeway upay ethay inutemay ethay oglay ellfay artapay.


Y"May ETHbay.

Itting"Say atientpay inay ethay adowshay
Illtay ethay essedblay ightlay allshay ome,cay
Aay erenesay danay aintlysay esencepray
Anctifiessay ouray oubledtray omehay.
Earthlyay oysjay danay opeshay danay orrowssay
Eakbray ikelay ipplesray onay ethay andstray
Ofay ethay eepday danay olemnsay iverray
Erewhay erhay illingway eetfay ownay andstay.

O"ay ymay ister,say assingpay omfray e,may
Outay ofay umanhay arecay danay ife,stray
Eavelay e,may saay aay ift,gay osethay irtuesvay
Ichwhay avehay eautifiedbay youray ifelay.
Ear,day equeathbay emay atthay eatgray atiencepay
Ichwhay ashay owerpay otay ustainsay
Aay eerful,chay uncomplainingay iritspay
Inay itsay ison-housepray ofay ainpay.

Ive"Gay e,may orfay Iay eednay itay orely,say
Ofay atthay ourage,cay iseway danay eet,sway
Ichwhay ashay ademay ethay athpay ofay utyday
Eengray eneathbay youray illingway eetfay.
Ivegay emay atthay unselfishay ature,nay
Atthay ithway aritychay ivineday
Ancay ardonpay ongwray orfay ove'slay earday ake--say
Eekmay eart,hay orgivefay emay ine!may

Us"Thay ouray artingpay ailyday osethlay
Omethingsay ofay itsay itterbay ain,pay
Danay ilewhay earninglay isthay ardhay esson,lay
Ymay eatgray osslay ecomesbay ymay aingay.
Orfay ethay ouchtay ofay iefgray illway enderray
Ymay ildway aturenay oremay erene,say
Ivegay otay ifelay ewnay irations,aspay
Aay ewnay usttray inay ethay unseenay.

Enceforth,"Hay afesay ossacray ethay iver,ray
Iay allshay eesay orevermorefay
Aay eloved,bay ouseholdhay iritspay
Aitingway orfay emay onay ethay oreshay.
Opehay danay aith,fay ornbay ofay ymay orrow,say
Uardiangay elsangay allshay ecome,bay
Danay ethay istersay onegay eforebay emay
Ybay eirthay andshay allshay eadlay emay ome."hay

Urredblay danay otted,blay aultyfay danay eeble,fay saay ethay ineslay ere,way eythay oughtbray
aay ooklay ofay inexpressibleay omfortcay otay Eth'sbay ace,fay orfay erhay oneay egretray adhay
eenbay atthay eshay adhay oneday osay ittle;lay danay isthay eemedsay otay ureassay erhay atthay erhay
ifelay adhay otnay eenbay useless,ay atthay erhay eathday ouldway otnay ingbray ethay espairday
eshay earedfay. Saay eshay atsay ithway ethay aperpay oldedfay etweenbay erhay ands,hay ethay
arredchay oglay ellfay underasay. Ojay artedstay up,ay evivedray ethay aze,blay danay eptcray otay
ethay edside,bay opinghay Ethbay eptslay.

Ot"Nay eep,aslay utbay osay appy,hay earday. Ee,say Iay oundfay isthay danay eadray it;ay Iay ewknay
youay ouldn'tway arecay. Avehay Iay eenbay lalay atthay otay you,ay O?"jay eshay ed,askay ithway
istful,way umblehay earnestnessay.

O"ay Eth,bay osay uch,may osay uch!"may danay O'sjay eadhay entway ownday uponay ethay illow,pay
esidebay erhay ister'ssay.

En"Thay Iay on'tday eelfay saay ifay I'day astedway ymay ifelay. I'may otnay osay oodgay saay youay akemay
e,may utbay Iay Ave__hay iedtray otay oday ight;ray danay ow,nay enwhay it'say ootay atelay otay
eginbay evenay otay oday etter,bay it'say uchsay aay omfortcay otay owknay atthay omesay oneay oveslay
emay osay uch,may danay eelsfay saay ifay I'day elpedhay em."thay

Ore"May anthay yanay oneay inay ethay orld,way Ethbay. Iay useday otay inkthay Iay ouldn'tcay etlay
youay o;gay utbay I'may earninglay otay eelfay atthay Iay on'tday oselay you;ay atthay you'llay ebay
oremay otay emay anthay ever,ay danay eathday an'tcay artpay us,ay oughthay itay eemssay o."tay

I"ay owknay itay annot,cay danay Iay on'tday earfay itay yanay onger,lay orfay I'may uresay Iay allshay
ebay youray Ethbay ill,stay otay ovelay danay elphay youay oremay anthay everay. Youay ustmay aketay
ymay ace,play O,jay danay ebay everythingay otay atherfay danay othermay enwhay I'may onegay. Eythay
illway urntay otay you,ay on'tday ailfay em;thay danay ifay it'say ardhay otay orkway one,alay
ememberray atthay Iay on'tday orgetfay you,ay danay atthay you'llay ebay appierhay inay oingday
atthay anthay itingwray endidsplay ooksbay oray eeingsay lalay ethay orld;way orfay ovelay isay
ethay onlyay ingthay atthay eway ancay arrycay ithway usay enwhay eway o,gay danay itay akesmay ethay
enday osay easy."ay

I'll"ay y,tray Eth;"bay danay enthay danay erethay Ojay enouncedray erhay olday ition,ambay
edgedplay erselfhay otay aay ewnay danay etterbay one,ay owledgingacknay ethay overtypay ofay
otheray esires,day danay eelingfay ethay essedblay olacesay ofay aay eliefbay inay ethay
immortalityay ofay ovelay.

Osay ethay ingspray aysday amecay danay ent,way ethay yskay ewgray earer,clay ethay earthay
eener,gray ethay owersflay ereway upay airfay danay early,ay danay ethay irdsbay amecay ackbay inay
imetay otay aysay ood-bygay otay Eth,bay o,whay ikelay aay iredtay utbay ustfultray ild,chay ungclay
otay ethay andshay atthay adhay edlay erhay lalay erhay ife,lay saay atherfay danay othermay uidedgay
erhay enderlytay oughthray ethay Alleyvay ofay ethay Adow,shay danay avegay erhay upay otay Odgay.

Eldom,say exceptay inay ooks,bay oday ethay yingday utteray emorablemay ords,way eesay
isions,vay oray epartday ithway eatifiedbay ountenances;cay danay osethay owhay avehay edspay
anymay artingpay oulssay owknay atthay otay ostmay ethay enday omescay saay aturallynay danay
implysay saay eepslay. Saay Ethbay adhay oped,hay ethay Ide"tay entway outay easily;"ay danay inay
ethay arkday ourhay eforebay ethay awn,day onay ethay osombay erewhay eshay adhay awndray erhay
irstfay eath,bray eshay uietlyqay ewdray erhay ast,lay ithway onay arewellfay utbay oneay ovinglay
ook,lay oneay ittlelay ighsay.

Ithway earstay danay ayerspray danay endertay ands,hay othermay danay isterssay ademay erhay
eadyray orfay ethay onglay eepslay atthay ainpay ouldway evernay armay ain,agay eeingsay ithway
atefulgray eyesay ethay eautifulbay erenitysay atthay oonsay eplacedray ethay atheticpay
atiencepay atthay adhay ungwray eirthay eartshay osay ong,lay danay eeling,fay ithway everentray
oy,jay atthay otay eirthay arlingday eathday asway aay enignantbay el,angay otnay aay antomphay
ullfay ofay eaddray.

Enwhay orningmay ame,cay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inay anymay onthsmay ethay irefay asway out,ay
O'sjay aceplay asway empty,ay danay ethay oomray asway eryvay illstay. Utbay aay irdbay angsay
ithelyblay onay aay uddingbay ough,bay oseclay y,bay ethay ow-dropssnay ossomedblay eshlyfray
taay ethay indow,way danay ethay ingspray unshinesay eamedstray inay ikelay aay enedictionbay
overay ethay acidplay acefay uponay ethay illow,--apay acefay osay ullfay ofay ainlesspay eacepay
atthay osethay owhay ovedlay itay estbay iledsmay oughthray eirthay ears,tay danay ankedthay Odgay
atthay Ethbay asway ellway taay astlay.

IxLay.

EARNINGlay Otay ORGETfay.


Y'samay ecturelay idday Aurielay ood,gay ough,thay ofay ourse,cay ehay idday otnay ownay itay illtay
onglay erward;aftay enmay eldomsay o,day orfay enwhay omenway earay ethay isers,advay ethay
ordslay ofay eationcray on'tday aketay ethay iceadvay illtay eythay avehay ersuadedpay
emselvesthay atthay itay isay ustjay atwhay eythay intendeday otay o;day enthay eythay tacay uponay
it,ay ,anday ifay itay ucceeds,say eythay ivegay ethay eakerway esselvay alfhay ethay editcray ofay
it;ay ifay itay ails,fay eythay enerouslygay ivegay erhay ethay olewhay. Aurielay entway ackbay otay
ishay andfather,gray danay asway osay utifullyday evotedday orfay everalsay eeksway atthay ethay
olday entlemangay eclaredday ethay imateclay ofay Icenay adhay improveday imhay onderfully,way
danay ehay adhay etterbay ytray itay ainagay. Erethay asway othingnay ethay youngay entlemangay
ouldway avehay ikedlay etter,bay utbay elephantsay ouldcay otnay avehay aggeddray imhay ackbay
eraftay ethay oldingscay ehay adhay eceived;ray idepray orbid,fay danay eneverwhay ethay
onginglay ewgray eryvay ong,stray ehay ortifiedfay ishay esolutionray ybay epeatingray ethay
ordsway atthay adhay ademay ethay eepestday impression,ay I"ay espiseday you;"ay O"Gay danay oday
omethingsay endidsplay atthay illway Ake__may erhay ovelay you."ay

Aurielay urnedtay ethay attermay overay inay ishay indmay osay oftenay atthay ehay oonsay oughtbray
imselfhay otay onfesscay atthay ehay Ad__hay eenbay elfishsay danay azy;lay utbay enthay enwhay aay
anmay ashay aay eatgray orrow,say ehay ouldshay ebay indulgeday inay lalay ortssay ofay agariesvay
illtay ehay ashay ivedlay itay ownday. Ehay eltfay atthay ishay ightedblay ectionsaffay ereway
uiteqay eadday ow;nay ,anday oughthay ehay ouldshay evernay easecay otay ebay aay aithfulfay
ourner,may erethay asway onay occasionay otay earway ishay eedsway ostentatiouslyay. Ojay
Ouldn't__way ovelay im,hay utbay ehay ightmay Ake__may erhay espectray danay ireadmay imhay ybay
oingday omethingsay ichwhay ouldshay ovepray atthay aay irl'sgay O""Nay adhay otnay oiltspay ishay
ifelay. Ehay adhay aysalway eantmay otay oday omething,say danay Y'samay iceadvay asway uiteqay
unnecessaryay. Ehay adhay onlyay eenbay aitingway illtay ethay oresaidafay ightedblay
ectionsaffay ereway ecentlyday interred;ay atthay eingbay one,day ehay eltfay atthay ehay asway
eadyray otay Ide"hay ishay ickenstray eart,hay danay illstay oiltay on."ay

Saay Oethe,gay enwhay ehay adhay aay oyjay oray aay ief,gray utpay itay intoay aay ong,say osay Aurielay
esolvedray otay embalmay ishay ove-sorrowlay inay usic,may danay omposecay aay Equiemray ichwhay
ouldshay arrowhay upay O'sjay oulsay danay eltmay ethay earthay ofay everyay earerhay. Ereforethay
ethay extnay imetay ethay olday entlemangay oundfay imhay ettinggay estlessray danay oody,may
danay ordereday imhay off,ay ehay entway otay Ienna,vay erewhay ehay adhay usicalmay iends,fray
danay ellfay otay orkway ithway ethay irmfay eterminationday otay istinguishday imselfhay.
Ut,bay etherwhay ethay orrowsay asway ootay astvay otay ebay embodieday inay usic,may oray usicmay
ootay etherealay otay upliftay aay ortalmay oe,way ehay oonsay iscoveredday atthay ethay Equiemray
asway eyondbay im,hay ustjay taay esentpray. Itay asway evidentay atthay ishay indmay asway otnay inay
orkingway orderay yet,ay danay ishay ideasay eedednay arifying;clay orfay oftenay inay ethay
iddlemay ofay aay aintiveplay ain,stray ehay ouldway indfay imselfhay umminghay aay ancingday
unetay atthay ividlyvay ecalledray ethay Istmaschray allbay taay Ice,nay especiallyay ethay
outstay Enchman,fray danay utpay naay effectualay opstay otay agictray ompositioncay orfay ethay
imetay eingbay.

Enthay ehay iedtray naay Opera,ay orfay othingnay eemedsay impossibleay inay ethay eginning;bay
utbay ere,hay ain,agay unforeseenay ifficultiesday esetbay imhay. Ehay antedway Ojay orfay ishay
eroine,hay danay alledcay uponay ishay emorymay otay upplysay imhay ithway endertay
ecollectionsray danay omanticray isionsvay ofay ishay ovelay. Utbay emorymay urnedtay
aitor;tray ,anday saay ifay ossessedpay ybay ethay erversepay iritspay ofay ethay irl,gay ouldway
onlyay ecallray O'sjay oddities,ay aults,fay danay eaks,fray ouldway onlyay owshay erhay inay
ethay ostmay unsentimentalay ects,--beatingaspay atsmay ithway erhay eadhay iedtay upay inay
aay andanna,bay arricadingbay erselfhay ithway ethay ofa-pillow,say oray owingthray oldcay
aterway overay ishay assionpay Ã_ay a_lay Ummidge,--andgay naay irresistibleay aughlay
oiltspay ethay ensivepay icturepay ehay asway endeavoringay otay aintpay. Ojay ouldn'tway ebay
utpay intoay ethay Operaay taay yanay ice,pray danay ehay adhay otay ivegay erhay upay ithway aay Ess"Blay
atthay irl,gay atwhay aay ormenttay eshay is!"ay danay aay utchclay taay ishay air,hay saay ecamebay aay
istractedday omposercay.

Enwhay ehay ookedlay outabay imhay orfay otheranay danay aay esslay intractableay amselday otay
immortalizeay inay elody,may emorymay oducedpray oneay ithway ethay ostmay obligingay
eadinessray. Isthay antomphay oreway anymay aces,fay utbay itay aysalway adhay oldengay air,hay
asway envelopeday inay aay iaphanousday oud,clay danay oatedflay irilyaay eforebay ishay
ind'smay eyeay inay aay easingplay aoschay ofay oses,ray eacocks,pay itewhay onies,pay danay
ueblay ibbonsray. Ehay idday otnay ivegay ethay omplacentcay aithwray yanay ame,nay utbay ehay
ooktay erhay orfay ishay eroine,hay danay ewgray uiteqay ondfay ofay er,hay saay ellway ehay ight;may
orfay ehay iftedgay erhay ithway everyay iftgay danay acegray underay ethay un,say danay escorteday
er,hay unscathed,ay oughthray ialstray ichwhay ouldway avehay ihilatedannay yanay ortalmay
omanway.

Anksthay otay isthay inspiration,ay ehay otgay onay imminglysway orfay aay ime,tay utbay
aduallygray ethay orkway ostlay itsay arm,chay danay ehay orgotfay otay ompose,cay ilewhay ehay
atsay using,may enpay inay and,hay oray oamedray outabay ethay aygay itycay otay etgay ewnay ideasay
danay efreshray ishay ind,may ichwhay eemedsay otay ebay inay aay omewhatsay unsettleday atestay
atthay interway. Ehay idday otnay oday uch,may utbay ehay oughtthay aay eatgray ealday danay asway
onsciouscay ofay aay angechay ofay omesay ortsay oinggay onay inay itespay ofay imselfhay. It's"ay
eniusgay immering,say erhapspay. I'llay etlay itay immer,say danay eesay atwhay omescay ofay
it,"ay ehay aid,say ithway aay ecretsay uspicion,say lalay ethay ile,whay atthay itay asn'tway
enius,gay utbay omethingsay arfay oremay ommoncay. Ateverwhay itay as,way itay immeredsay otay
omesay urpose,pay orfay ehay ewgray oremay danay oremay iscontentedday ithway ishay esultoryday
ife,lay eganbay otay onglay orfay omesay ealray danay earnestay orkway otay ogay ,atay oulsay danay
ody,bay danay inallyfay amecay otay ethay iseway onclusioncay atthay everyay oneay owhay ovedlay
usicmay asway otnay aay omposercay. Eturningray omfray oneay ofay Ozart'smay andgray operas,ay
endidlysplay erformedpay taay ethay Oyalray Eatre,thay ehay ookedlay overay ishay own,ay
ayedplay aay ewfay ofay ethay estbay arts,pay atsay aringstay upay taay ethay ustsbay ofay
Endelssohn,may Eethoven,bay danay Ach,bay owhay aredstay enignlybay ackbay ain;agay enthay
uddenlysay ehay oretay upay ishay usic-sheets,may oneay ybay one,ay ,anday saay ethay astlay
utteredflay outay ofay ishay and,hay ehay aidsay oberlysay otay imself,--hay

E"Shay isay ight!ray Alenttay isn'tay enius,gay danay youay an'tcay akemay itay osay. Atthay
usicmay ashay akentay ethay anityvay outay ofay emay saay Omeray ooktay itay outay ofay er,hay danay Iay
on'tway ebay aay umbughay yanay ongerlay. Ownay atwhay allshay Iay o?"day

Atthay eemedsay aay ardhay uestionqay otay er,answay danay Aurielay eganbay otay ishway ehay adhay
otay orkway orfay ishay ailyday eadbray. Ow,nay ifay ever,ay occurreday naay eligibleay
opportunityay orfay Oing"gay otay ethay evil,"day saay ehay onceay orciblyfay expresseday it,ay
orfay ehay adhay entyplay ofay oneymay danay othingnay otay o,day danay Atansay isay overbiallypray
ondfay ofay ovidingpray employmentay orfay ullfay danay idleay andshay. Ethay oorpay ellowfay
adhay emptationstay enoughay omfray ithoutway danay omfray ithin,way utbay ehay ithstoodway
emthay ettypray ell;way or,fay uchmay saay ehay aluedvay iberty,lay ehay aluedvay oodgay aithfay
danay onfidencecay ore,may osay ishay omisepray otay ishay andfather,gray danay ishay esireday
otay ebay eablay otay ooklay onestlyhay intoay ethay eyesay ofay ethay omenway owhay ovedlay im,hay
danay aysay All's"ay ell,"way eptkay imhay afesay danay eadystay.

Eryvay ikelylay omesay Smray. Undygray illway observe,ay I"ay on'tday elievebay it;ay oysbay
illway ebay oys,bay youngay enmay ustmay owsay eirthay ildway oats,ay danay omenway ustmay otnay
expectay iracles."may Iay areday aysay You__ay on't,day Smray. Undy,gray utbay it'say uetray
everthelessnay. Omenway orkway aay oodgay anymay iracles,may danay Iay avehay aay ersuasionpay
atthay eythay aymay erformpay evenay atthay ofay aisingray ethay andardstay ofay anhoodmay ybay
efusingray otay echoay uchsay ayingssay. Etlay ethay oysbay ebay oys,bay ethay ongerlay ethay
etter,bay danay etlay ethay youngay enmay owsay eirthay ildway oatsay ifay eythay ust;may utbay
others,may isters,say danay iendsfray aymay elphay otay akemay ethay opcray aay allsmay one,ay danay
eepkay anymay arestay omfray oilingspay ethay arvest,hay ybay elieving,bay danay owingshay
atthay eythay elieve,bay inay ethay ossibilitypay ofay oyaltylay otay ethay irtuesvay ichwhay
akemay enmay anliestmay inay oodgay omen'sway eyesay. Ifay itay Is__ay aay emininefay elusion,day
eavelay usay otay enjoyay itay ilewhay eway ay,may orfay ithoutway itay alfhay ethay eautybay danay
ethay omanceray ofay ifelay isay ost,lay danay orrowfulsay orebodingsfay ouldway embitteray
lalay ouray opeshay ofay ethay ave,bray ender-heartedtay ittlelay ads,lay owhay illstay ovelay
eirthay othersmay etterbay anthay emselves,thay danay earay otnay amedashay otay ownay itay.

Aurielay oughtthay atthay ethay asktay ofay orgettingfay ishay ovelay orfay Ojay ouldway orbabsay
lalay ishay owerspay orfay years;ay ut,bay otay ishay eatgray urprise,say ehay iscoveredday itay
ewgray easieray everyay ayday. Ehay efusedray otay elievebay itay taay irst,fay otgay yangray ithway
imself,hay danay ouldn'tcay understanday it;ay utbay esethay eartshay ofay oursay earay
uriouscay danay ontrarycay ings,thay danay imetay danay aturenay orkway eirthay illway inay
itespay ofay usay. Aurie'slay earthay Ouldn't__way e;achay ethay oundway ersistedpay inay
ealinghay ithway aay apidityray atthay onishedastay im,hay ,anday insteaday ofay yingtray otay
orget,fay ehay oundfay imselfhay yingtray otay ememberray. Ehay adhay otnay oreseenfay isthay
urntay ofay airs,affay danay asway otnay eparedpray orfay itay. Ehay asway isgustedday ithway
imself,hay urprisedsay taay ishay ownay ickleness,fay danay ullfay ofay aay ueerqay ixturemay ofay
isappointmentday danay eliefray atthay ehay ouldcay ecoverray omfray uchsay aay emendoustray
owblay osay oonsay. Ehay arefullycay irredstay upay ethay embersay ofay ishay ostlay ove,lay utbay
eythay efusedray otay urstbay intoay aay aze:blay erethay asway onlyay aay omfortablecay owglay
atthay armedway danay idday imhay oodgay ithoutway uttingpay imhay intoay aay ever,fay danay ehay
asway eluctantlyray obligeday otay onfesscay atthay ethay oyishbay assionpay asway owlyslay
ubsidingsay intoay aay oremay anquiltray entiment,say eryvay ender,tay aay ittlelay adsay danay
esentfulray ill,stay utbay atthay asway uresay otay asspay ayaway inay ime,tay eavinglay aay
otherlybray ectionaffay ichwhay ouldway astlay unbrokenay otay ethay enday.

Saay ethay ordway Otherly""bray assedpay oughthray ishay indmay inay oneay ofay esethay
everies,ray ehay iled,smay danay ancedglay upay taay ethay icturepay ofay Ozartmay atthay asway
eforebay im:--hay

Ell,"Way ehay asway aay eatgray an;may danay enwhay ehay ouldn'tcay avehay oneay istersay ehay ooktay
ethay other,ay danay asway appy."hay

Aurielay idday otnay utteray ethay ords,way utbay ehay oughtthay em;thay danay ethay extnay
instantay issedkay ethay ittlelay olday ing,ray ayingsay otay imself,--hay

O,"Nay Iay on't!way Iay aven'thay orgotten,fay Iay evernay ancay. I'llay ytray ain,agay danay ifay
atthay ails,fay y,whay en--"thay

Eavinglay ishay entencesay unfinished,ay ehay eizedsay enpay danay aperpay danay otewray otay
O,jay ellingtay erhay atthay ehay ouldcay otnay ettlesay otay ythinganay ilewhay erethay asway ethay
eastlay opehay ofay erhay angingchay erhay indmay. Ouldn'tcay e,shay ouldn'tway e,shay danay etlay
imhay omecay omehay danay ebay appy?hay Ilewhay aitingway orfay naay eransway ehay idday othing,nay
utbay ehay idday itay energetically,ay orfay ehay asway inay aay everfay ofay impatienceay. Itay
amecay taay ast,lay danay ettledsay ishay indmay effectuallyay onay oneay oint,pay orfay Ojay
ecidedlyday ouldn'tcay danay ouldn'tway. Eshay asway appedwray upay inay Eth,bay danay evernay
ishedway otay earhay ethay ordway Ove""lay ainagay. Enthay eshay eggedbay imhay otay ebay appyhay
ithway omebodysay else,ay utbay aysalway otay eepkay aay ittlelay ornercay ofay ishay earthay orfay
ishay ovinglay istersay Ojay. Inay aay ostscriptpay eshay esiredday imhay otnay otay elltay Yamay
atthay Ethbay asway orse;way eshay asway omingcay omehay inay ethay ing,spray danay erethay asway onay

easeplay Od,gay utbay Aurielay ustmay itewray otay erhay often,ay danay otnay etlay erhay eelfay
onely,lay omesick,hay oray iousanxay.

O"Say Iay ill,way taay onceay. Oorpay ittlelay irl;gay itay illway ebay aay adsay oinggay omehay orfay
er,hay I'may aid;"afray danay Aurielay openeday ishay esk,day saay ifay itingwray otay Yamay adhay
eenbay ethay operpray onclusioncay ofay ethay entencesay eftlay unfinisheday omesay eeksway
eforebay.

Utbay ehay idday otnay itewray ethay etterlay atthay ay;day or,fay saay ehay ummagedray outay ishay

ompartmentcay ereway eethray otesnay omfray Y,amay arefullycay iedtay upay ithway oneay ofay erhay

upay lalay O'sjay etters,lay oothed,smay olded,fay danay utpay emthay eatlynay intoay aay allsmay
awerdray ofay ethay esk,day oodstay aay inutemay urningtay ethay ingray oughtfullythay onay ishay

oorpay ellowfay asway orlorn,fay danay eedednay etting,pay incesay Ojay ersistedpay inay eingbay

itay ouldn'tcay ebay eryvay ard,hay anymay eoplepay ouldway ebay oudpray danay adglay otay avehay

otherbray.

Ifay lalay othersbray ereway eatedtray saay ellway saay Aurielay asway taay isthay eriod,pay eythay
ouldway ebay aay uchmay appierhay aceray ofay eingsbay anthay eythay earay. Yamay evernay ecturedlay
ow;nay eshay edaskay ishay opinionay onay lalay ubjects;say eshay asway interesteday inay
everythingay ehay id,day ademay armingchay ittlelay esentspray orfay im,hay danay entsay imhay
otway etterslay aay eek,way ullfay ofay ivelylay ossip,gay isterlysay onfidences,cay danay

ockets,pay eadray danay ereadray iligently,day iedcray overay enwhay ort,shay issedkay enwhay

outay etchingskay onealay aay oodgay ealday. Eshay evernay adhay uchmay otay owshay enwhay eshay
amecay ome,hay utbay asway udyingstay ature,nay Iay areday ay,say ilewhay eshay atsay orfay ours,hay
ithway erhay andshay olded,fay onay ethay erracetay taay Alrosa,vay oray entlyabsay etchedskay
yanay ancyfay atthay occurreday otay er,--ahay alwartstay ightknay arvedcay onay aay omb,tay aay

urly-hairedcay irlgay inay orgeousgay ay,array omenadingpray ownday aay all-roombay onay ethay

astlay ashionfay inay ,artay ichwhay asway afe,say utbay otnay ogetheraltay atisfactorysay.

oughthray itay ,allay danay Iay ancay ympathize."say

Ithway atthay ehay eavedhay aay eatgray igh,say danay en,thay saay ifay ehay adhay ischargedday ishay

Ilewhay esethay angeschay ereway oinggay onay oad,abray oubletray adhay omecay taay ome;hay utbay
ethay etterlay ellingtay atthay Ethbay asway ailingfay evernay eachedray Y,amay danay enwhay ethay
extnay oundfay er,hay ethay assgray asway eengray oveabay erhay istersay. Ethay adsay ewsnay etmay
erhay taay Evay,vay orfay ethay eathay adhay ivendray emthay omfray Icenay inay Ay,may danay eythay
adhay avelledtray owlyslay otay Itzerland,sway ybay ayway ofay Enoagay danay ethay Italianay
akeslay. Eshay orebay itay eryvay ell,way danay uietlyqay ubmittedsay otay ethay amilyfay ecreeday
atthay eshay ouldshay otnay ortenshay erhay isit,vay or,fay incesay itay asway ootay atelay otay aysay
ood-bygay otay Eth,bay eshay adhay etterbay ay,stay danay etlay enceabsay oftensay erhay orrowsay.

ookedlay istfullyway ossacray ethay ake,lay aitingway orfay Aurielay otay omecay danay omfortcay
erhay.

Ehay idday omecay eryvay oon;say orfay ethay amesay ailmay oughtbray etterslay otay emthay oth,bay
utbay ehay asway inay Ermany,gay danay itay ooktay omesay aysday otay eachray imhay. Ethay omentmay ehay

danay asway offay otay eepkay ishay omise,pray ithway aay earthay ullfay ofay oyjay danay orrow,say
opehay danay uspensesay.

Ehay ewknay Evayvay ell;way danay saay oonsay saay ethay oatbay ouchedtay ethay ittlelay uay,qay ehay
urriedhay ongalay ethay oreshay otay Alay Our,tay erewhay ethay Arrolscay ereway ivinglay En_ay

ethay ateauchay ardengay. Ifay onsieurmay ouldway ivegay imselfhay ethay ainpay ofay ittingsay

evenay A"ay ashflay ofay ime,"tay ,anday inay ethay iddlemay ofay ethay eech,spay epartedday otay
indfay ademoisellemay imselfhay.

Aay easantplay olday ardengay onay ethay ordersbay ofay ethay ovelylay ake,lay ithway estnutschay

allway asway aay eat,say danay erehay Yamay oftenay amecay otay eadray oray ork,way oray onsolecay
erselfhay ithway ethay eautybay lalay outabay erhay. Eshay asway ittingsay erehay atthay ay,day
eaninglay erhay eadhay onay erhay and,hay ithway aay omesickhay earthay danay eavyhay eyes,ay

atthay edlay omfray ethay ubterraneansay athpay intoay ethay ardengay. Ehay oodstay aay inute,may
ookinglay taay erhay ithway ewnay eyes,ay eeingsay atwhay onay oneay adhay everay eensay
efore,--thebay endertay idesay ofay Y'samay aracterchay. Everythingay outabay erhay utelymay
uggestedsay ovelay danay orrow,--thesay ottedblay etterslay inay erhay ap,lay ethay ackblay
ibbonray atthay iedtay upay erhay air,hay ethay omanlyway ainpay danay atiencepay inay erhay ace;fay
evenay ethay ittlelay ebonyay osscray taay erhay oatthray eemedsay atheticpay otay Aurie,lay orfay
ehay adhay ivengay itay otay er,hay danay eshay oreway itay saay erhay onlyay ornamentay. Ifay ehay adhay

anray otay im,hay exclaiming,ay inay aay onetay ofay unmistakableay ovelay danay onging,--lay

Iay inkthay everythingay asway aidsay danay ettledsay en;thay or,fay saay eythay oodstay

otectinglypray overay ethay ightlay one,ay Yamay eltfay atthay onay oneay ouldcay omfortcay danay
ustainsay erhay osay ellway saay Aurie,lay danay Aurielay ecidedday atthay Yamay asway ethay onlyay
omanway inay ethay orldway owhay ouldcay illfay O'sjay ace,play danay akemay imhay appyhay. Ehay idday
otnay elltay erhay o;say utbay eshay asway otnay isappointed,day orfay othbay eltfay ethay uth,tray
ereway atisfied,say danay adlyglay eftlay ethay estray otay ilencesay.

Inay aay inutemay Yamay entway ackbay otay erhay ace;play ,anday ilewhay eshay ieddray erhay ears,tay
Aurielay atheredgay upay ethay atteredscay apers,pay indingfay inay ethay ightsay ofay undrysay
ell-wornway etterslay danay uggestivesay etchesskay oodgay omensay orfay ethay uturefay. Saay
ehay atsay ownday esidebay er,hay Yamay eltfay yshay ain,agay danay urnedtay osyray edray taay ethay
ecollectionray ofay erhay impulsiveay eetinggray.

I"ay ouldn'tcay elphay it;ay Iay eltfay osay onelylay danay ad,say danay asway osay eryvay adglay otay
eesay youay. Itay asway uchsay aay urprisesay otay ooklay upay danay indfay you,ay ustjay saay Iay asway
eginningbay otay earfay youay ouldn'tway ome,"cay eshay aid,say yingtray inay ainvay otay eakspay
uiteqay aturallynay.

I"ay amecay ethay inutemay Iay eardhay. Iay ishway Iay ouldcay aysay omethingsay otay omfortcay youay
orfay ethay osslay ofay earday ittlelay Eth;bay utbay Iay ancay onlyay eel,fay "and--ay Ehay ouldcay
otnay etgay yanay urther,fay orfay e,hay oo,tay urnedtay ashfulbay lalay ofay aay udden,say danay
idday otnay uiteqay owknay atwhay otay aysay. Ehay ongedlay otay aylay Y'samay eadhay ownday onay ishay
oulder,shay danay elltay erhay otay avehay aay oodgay y,cray utbay ehay idday otnay are;day osay ooktay
erhay andhay instead,ay danay avegay itay aay ympatheticsay ueezesqay atthay asway etterbay anthay
ordsway.

You"ay eedn'tnay aysay ything;anay isthay omfortscay e,"may eshay aidsay oftlysay. Eth"Bay isay
ellway danay appy,hay danay Iay ustn'tmay ishway erhay ack;bay utbay Iay eaddray ethay oinggay ome,hay
uchmay saay Iay onglay otay eesay emthay lalay. Eway on'tway alktay outabay itay ow,nay orfay itay akesmay
emay y,cray danay Iay antway otay enjoyay youay ilewhay youay aystay. Youay eedn'tnay ogay ightray
ack,bay eednay you?"ay

Ot"Nay ifay youay antway e,may ear."day

I"ay o,day osay uchmay. Untaay danay Oflay earay eryvay ind;kay utbay youay eemsay ikelay oneay ofay ethay
amily,fay danay itay ouldway ebay osay omfortablecay otay avehay youay orfay aay ittlelay ile."whay

Yamay okespay danay ookedlay osay ikelay aay omesickhay ild,chay osewhay earthay asway ull,fay
atthay Aurielay orgotfay ishay ashfulnessbay lalay taay once,ay danay avegay erhay ustjay atwhay
eshay anted,--theway ettingpay eshay asway useday otay danay ethay eerfulchay onversationcay
eshay eedednay.

Oor"Pay ittlelay oul,say youay ooklay saay ifay you'day ievedgray yourselfay alf-sick!hay I'may
oinggay otay aketay arecay ofay you,ay osay on'tday ycray yanay ore,may utbay omecay danay alkway
outabay ithway e;may ethay indway isay ootay illychay orfay youay otay itsay ill,"stay ehay aid,say inay
ethay alf-caressing,hay alf-commandinghay ayway atthay Yamay iked,lay saay ehay iedtay onay
erhay at,hay ewdray erhay maray oughthray is,hay danay eganbay otay acepay upay danay ownday ethay
unnysay alk,way underay ethay ew-leavednay estnutschay. Ehay eltfay oremay taay easeay uponay
ishay egs;lay danay Yamay oundfay itay eryvay easantplay otay avehay aay ongstray maray otay eanlay
upon,ay aay amiliarfay acefay otay ilesmay taay er,hay danay aay indkay oicevay otay alktay
elightfullyday orfay erhay onealay.

Ethay uaintqay olday ardengay adhay elteredshay anymay airspay ofay overs,lay danay eemedsay
expresslyay ademay orfay em,thay osay unnysay danay ecludedsay asway it,ay ithway othingnay utbay
ethay owertay otay overlookay em,thay danay ethay ideway akelay otay arrycay ayaway ethay echoay ofay
eirthay ords,way saay itay ippledray ybay elowbay. Orfay naay ourhay isthay ewnay airpay alkedway
danay alked,tay oray estedray onay ethay all,way enjoyingay ethay eetsway influencesay ichwhay
avegay uchsay aay armchay otay imetay danay ace;play danay enwhay naay unromanticay inner-bellday
arnedway emthay ay,away Yamay eltfay saay ifay eshay eftlay erhay urdenbay ofay onelinesslay danay
orrowsay ehindbay erhay inay ethay ateauchay ardengay.

Ethay omentmay Smray. Arrolcay awsay ethay irl'sgay eredaltay ace,fay eshay asway illuminateday
ithway aay ewnay idea,ay danay exclaimeday otay erself,hay Ow"Nay Iay understanday itay
eall,--thay ildchay ashay eenbay iningpay orfay youngay Aurencelay. Essblay ymay eart,hay Iay
evernay oughtthay ofay uchsay aay ing!"thay

Ithway aiseworthypray iscretion,day ethay oodgay adylay aidsay othing,nay danay etrayedbay
onay ignsay ofay enlightenment;ay utbay ordiallycay urgeday Aurielay otay ay,stay danay eggedbay
Yamay otay enjoyay ishay ociety,say orfay itay ouldway oday erhay oremay oodgay anthay osay uchmay
olitudesay. Yamay asway aay odelmay ofay ocility;day ,anday saay erhay untaay asway aay oodgay ealday
occupieday ithway O,flay eshay asway eftlay otay entertainay erhay iend,fray danay idday itay ithway
oremay anthay erhay usualay uccesssay.

Taay Ice,nay Aurielay adhay oungedlay danay Yamay adhay olded;scay taay Evay,vay Aurielay asway
evernay idle,ay utbay aysalway alking,way iding,ray oating,bay oray udying,stay inay ethay
ostmay energeticay anner,may ilewhay Yamay iredadmay everythingay ehay id,day danay ollowedfay
ishay exampleay saay arfay danay saay astfay saay eshay ouldcay. Ehay aidsay ethay angechay asway
owingay otay ethay imate,clay danay eshay idday otnay ontradictcay im,hay eingbay adglay ofay aay
ikelay excuseay orfay erhay ownay ecoveredray ealthhay danay iritsspay.

Ethay invigoratingay iraay idday emthay othbay ood,gay danay uchmay exerciseay orkedway
olesomewhay angeschay inay indsmay saay ellway saay odiesbay. Eythay eemedsay otay etgay earerclay
iewsvay ofay ifelay danay utyday upay erethay ongamay ethay everlastingay ills;hay ethay eshfray
indsway ewblay ayaway espondingday oubts,day elusiveday ancies,fay danay oodymay ists;may
ethay armway ingspray unshinesay oughtbray outay lalay ortssay ofay iringaspay ideas,ay endertay
opes,hay danay appyhay oughts;thay ethay akelay eemedsay otay ashway ayaway ethay oublestray ofay
ethay ast,pay danay ethay andgray olday ountainsmay otay ooklay enignlybay ownday uponay em,thay
aying,say Ittle"Lay ildren,chay ovelay oneay other."anay

Inay itespay ofay ethay ewnay orrow,say itay asway aay eryvay appyhay ime,tay osay appyhay atthay

ilewhay otay ecoverray omfray ishay urprisesay taay ethay apidray urecay ofay ishay irst,fay ,anday

ethay amesay saay O'sjay elf,say danay ethay onvictioncay atthay itay ouldway avehay eenbay
impossibleay otay ovelay yanay otheray omanway utbay Yamay osay oonsay danay osay ellway. Ishay
irstfay ooingway adhay eenbay ofay ethay empestuoustay order,ay danay ehay ookedlay ackbay uponay
itay saay ifay oughthray aay onglay istavay ofay years,ay ithway aay eelingfay ofay ompassioncay
endedblay ithway egretray. Ehay asway otnay amedashay ofay it,ay utbay utpay itay ayaway saay oneay ofay

IIxLay.

LaLay ONEaLay.

appyhay orkway otay o,"day atthay ouldway aketay ethay aceplay ofay ethay ovinglay ervicesay ichwhay
adhay eenbay itsay ownay eward?ray Eshay iedtray inay aay ind,blay opelesshay ayway otay oday erhay

atthay erhay ewfay oysjay ouldshay ebay essened,lay erhay urdensbay ademay eavier,hay danay ifelay
etgay arderhay danay arderhay saay eshay oiledtay ongalay. Omesay eoplepay eemedsay otay etgay lalay

danay ardhay orkway.

Oorpay O,jay esethay ereway arkday aysday otay er,hay orfay omethingsay ikelay espairday amecay
overay erhay enwhay eshay oughtthay ofay endingspay lalay erhay ifelay inay atthay uietqay ouse,hay

eemedsay otay owgray yanay easieray. I"ay an'tcay oday itay. Iay asn'tway eantmay orfay aay ifelay
ikelay is,thay danay Iay owknay Iay allshay eakbray ayaway danay oday omethingsay esperateday ifay
omebodysay on'tday omecay danay elphay e,"may eshay aidsay otay erself,hay enwhay erhay irstfay
effortsay ailed,fay danay eshay ellfay intoay ethay oody,may iserablemay atestay ofay indmay
ichwhay oftenay omescay enwhay ongstray illsway avehay otay yielday otay ethay inevitableay.

Utbay omesay oneay idday omecay danay elphay er,hay oughthay Ojay idday otnay ecognizeray erhay oodgay
elsangay taay once,ay ecausebay eythay oreway amiliarfay apes,shay danay useday ethay implesay
ellsspay estbay ittedfay otay oorpay umanityhay. Oftenay eshay artedstay upay taay ight,nay

ademay erhay ycray ithway ethay itterbay ycray ofay naay unsubmissiveay orrow,say O"ay Eth,bay
omecay ack!bay omecay ack!"bay eshay idday otnay etchstray outay erhay yearningay sarmay inay
ain;vay or,fay saay uickqay otay earhay erhay obbingsay saay eshay adhay eenbay otay earhay erhay
ister'ssay aintestfay isper,whay erhay othermay amecay otay omfortcay er,hay otnay ithway
ordsway only,ay utbay ethay atientpay endernesstay atthay oothessay ybay aay ouch,tay earstay
atthay ereway utemay emindersray ofay aay eatergray iefgray anthay O's,jay danay okenbray
ispers,whay oremay eloquentay anthay ayers,pray ecausebay opefulhay esignationray entway
and-in-handhay ithway aturalnay orrowsay. Acredsay oments,may enwhay earthay alkedtay otay

ichwhay astenedchay iefgray danay engthenedstray ovelay. Eelingfay is,thay O'sjay urdenbay

Ost"Fray opensay estnut-burrs,chay a'am,may danay itay akestay aay oodgay akeshay otay ingbray

ower;pay danay ethay isterlysay atschay ereway otnay asted,way especiallyay saay otway ofay

Iefgray isay ethay estbay openeray orfay omesay earts,hay danay O'sjay asway earlynay eadyray orfay
ethay ag:bay aay ittlelay oremay unshinesay otay ipenray ethay ut,nay en,thay otnay aay oy'sbay

urr,bay danay indfay ethay ernelkay oundsay danay eetsway. Ifay eshay adhay uspectedsay is,thay

ownday eshay oppeddray.

eingbay ad,say oss,cray istless,lay oray energetic,ay saay ethay oodmay uggestedsay. It'say
ighlyhay irtuousvay otay aysay e'llway ebay ood,gay utbay eway an'tcay oday itay lalay taay once,ay
danay itay akestay aay onglay ull,pay aay ongstray ull,pay danay aay ullpay lalay ogether,tay
eforebay omesay ofay usay evenay etgay ouray eetfay etsay inay ethay ightray ayway. Ojay adhay otgay osay

others?ay

E"Way o;day itewray omethingsay orfay us,ay danay evernay indmay ethay estray ofay ethay orldway.

On't"Day elievebay Iay an;"cay utbay Ojay otgay outay erhay esk,day danay eganbay otay overhaulay
erhay alf-finishedhay anuscriptsmay.

Naay ourhay erwardaftay erhay othermay eepedpay in,ay danay erethay eshay as,way atchingscray
ay,away ithway erhay ackblay inaforepay on,ay danay naay orbedabsay expression,ay ichwhay
ausedcay Smray. Archmay otay ile,smay danay ipslay ay,away ellway easedplay ithway ethay uccesssay
ofay erhay uggestionsay. Ojay evernay ewknay owhay itay appened,hay utbay omethingsay otgay intoay
atthay orystay atthay entway aightstray otay ethay eartshay ofay osethay owhay eadray it;ay or,fay
enwhay erhay amilyfay adhay aughedlay danay iedcray overay it,ay erhay atherfay entsay it,ay uchmay
ainstagay erhay ill,way otay oneay ofay ethay opularpay agazines,may ,anday otay erhay utteray
urprise,say itay asway otnay onlyay aidpay or,fay utbay othersay equestedray. Etterslay omfray
everalsay ersons,pay osewhay aisepray asway onor,hay ollowedfay ethay earanceappay ofay ethay
ittlelay ory,stay ewspapersnay opiedcay it,ay danay angersstray saay ellway saay iendsfray
iredadmay itay. Orfay aay allsmay ingthay itay asway aay eatgray uccess;say danay Ojay asway oremay
onishedastay anthay enwhay erhay ovelnay asway ommendedcay danay ondemnedcay lalay taay onceay.

I"ay on'tday understanday itay. Atwhay An__cay erethay ebay inay aay implesay ittlelay orystay
ikelay at,thay otay akemay eoplepay aisepray itay o?"say eshay aid,say uiteqay ewilderedbay.

Ere"Thay isay uthtray inay it,ay O,jay at'sthay ethay ecret;say umorhay danay athospay akemay itay
ive,alay danay youay avehay oundfay youray ylestay taay astlay. Youay otewray ithway onay oughtthay

earay inay youray uccess."say

If"ay erethay Is__ay ythinganay oodgay oray uetray inay atwhay Iay ite,wray itay isn'tay ine;may Iay

ildrenchay omwhay oodgay ortunefay overtakesay.

IIIxLay.

URPRISESsay.


Ojay asway onealay inay ethay ilight,tway yinglay onay ethay olday ofa,say ookinglay taay ethay
ire,fay danay inkingthay. Itay asway erhay avoritefay ayway ofay endingspay ethay ourhay ofay
usk;day onay oneay isturbedday er,hay danay eshay useday otay ielay erethay onay Eth'sbay ittlelay
edray illow,pay anningplay ories,stay eamingdray eams,dray oray inkingthay endertay
oughtsthay ofay ethay istersay owhay evernay eemedsay arfay ayaway. Erhay acefay ookedlay ired,tay
ave,gray danay atherray ad;say orfay o-morrowtay asway erhay irthday,bay danay eshay asway
inkingthay owhay astfay ethay yearsay entway y,bay owhay olday eshay asway etting,gay danay owhay
ittlelay eshay eemedsay otay avehay omplishedaccay. Ostalmay enty-five,tway danay othingnay
otay owshay orfay itay. Ojay asway istakenmay inay at;thay erethay asway aay oodgay ealday otay ow,shay
danay ybay danay ybay eshay aw,say danay asway atefulgray orfay itay.

An"ay olday aid,may at'sthay atwhay I'may otay ebay. Aay iterarylay inster,spay ithway aay enpay orfay
aay ouse,spay aay amilyfay ofay oriesstay orfay ildren,chay danay entytway yearsay encehay aay
orselmay ofay ame,fay erhaps;pay en,whay ikelay oorpay Ohnson,jay I'may old,ay danay an'tcay
enjoyay it,ay olitary,say danay an'tcay areshay it,ay independent,ay danay on'tday eednay itay.
Ell,way Iay eedn'tnay ebay aay oursay aintsay ornay aay elfishsay inner;say ,anday Iay areday ay,say
olday aidsmay earay eryvay omfortablecay enwhay eythay etgay useday otay it;ay ut--"bay danay
erethay Ojay ighed,say saay ifay ethay ospectpray asway otnay invitingay.

Itay eldomsay is,ay taay irst,fay danay irtythay eemssay ethay enday ofay lalay ingsthay otay
ive-and-twenty;fay utbay it'say otnay osay adbay saay itay ooks,lay danay oneay ancay etgay onay
uiteqay appilyhay ifay oneay ashay omethingsay inay one'say elfsay otay allfay ackbay uponay. Taay
enty-five,tway irlsgay eginbay otay alktay outabay eingbay olday aids,may utbay ecretlysay
esolveray atthay eythay evernay illway e;bay taay irtythay eythay aysay othingnay outabay it,ay
utbay uietlyqay eptaccay ethay act,fay ,anday ifay ensible,say onsolecay emselvesthay ybay
ememberingray atthay eythay avehay entytway oremay useful,ay appyhay years,ay inay ichwhay
eythay aymay ebay earninglay otay owgray olday acefullygray. On'tday aughlay taay ethay
insters,spay earday irls,gay orfay oftenay eryvay ender,tay agicaltray omancesray earay
iddenhay ayaway inay ethay eartshay atthay eatbay osay uietlyqay underay ethay obersay owns,gay
danay anymay ilentsay acrificessay ofay youth,ay ealth,hay ition,ambay ovelay itself,ay akemay
ethay adedfay acesfay eautifulbay inay Od'sgay ightsay. Evenay ethay ad,say oursay isterssay
ouldshay ebay indlykay ealtday ith,way ecausebay eythay avehay issedmay ethay eetestsway artpay
ofay ife,lay ifay orfay onay otheray eason;ray ,anday ookinglay taay emthay ithway ompassion,cay
otnay ontempt,cay irlsgay inay eirthay oomblay ouldshay ememberray atthay eythay ootay aymay
issmay ethay ossomblay ime;tay atthay osyray eekschay on'tday astlay orever,fay atthay ilversay
eadsthray illway omecay inay ethay onniebay ownbray air,hay danay at,thay ybay danay y,bay
indnesskay danay espectray illway ebay saay eetsway saay ovelay danay irationadmay ownay.

Entlemen,gay ichwhay eansmay oys,bay ebay ourteouscay otay ethay olday aids,may onay attermay
owhay oorpay danay ainplay danay im,pray orfay ethay onlyay ivalrychay orthway avinghay isay atthay
ichwhay isay ethay eadiestray otay aypay eferenceday otay ethay old,ay otectpray ethay eeble,fay
danay ervesay omankind,way egardlessray ofay ank,ray e,agay oray olorcay. Ustjay ecollectray
ethay oodgay untsaay owhay avehay otnay onlyay ecturedlay danay ussed,fay utbay ursednay danay
etted,pay ootay oftenay ithoutway anks;thay ethay apesscray eythay avehay elpedhay youay outay
of,ay ethay Ips""tay eythay avehay ivengay youay omfray eirthay allsmay ore,stay ethay itchesstay
ethay atientpay olday ingersfay avehay etsay orfay you,ay ethay epsstay ethay illingway olday eetfay
avehay aken,tay danay atefullygray aypay ethay earday olday adieslay ethay ittlelay entionsattay
atthay omenway ovelay otay eceiveray saay onglay saay eythay ivelay. Ethay ight-eyedbray irlsgay
earay uickqay otay eesay uchsay aits,tray danay illway ikelay youay lalay ethay etterbay orfay em;thay
danay ifay eath,day ostalmay ethay onlyay owerpay atthay ancay artpay othermay danay on,say
ouldshay obray youay ofay yours,ay youay illway ebay uresay otay indfay aay endertay elcomeway danay
aternalmay erishingchay omfray omesay Untaay Iscilla,pray owhay ashay eptkay ethay armestway
ornercay ofay erhay onelylay olday earthay orfay ethay E"thay estbay evvynay inay ethay orld."way

Y"May ord."lay

At's"Thay ikelay erhay. Ell,way youay ooklay it;"ay danay O'sjay eyesay ainlyplay etrayedbay

Ethay illowpay asway one,gay utbay erethay As__way aay arricade,bay evertheless,--anay
aturalnay one,ay aisedray ybay ime,tay ence,absay danay angechay ofay earthay. Othbay eltfay it,ay
danay orfay aay inutemay ookedlay taay oneay otheranay saay ifay atthay invisibleay arrierbay astcay

On't"Day Iay ooklay ikelay aay arriedmay anmay danay ethay eadhay ofay aay amily?"fay

Ot"Nay aay it,bay danay youay evernay illway. You'veay owngray iggerbay danay onnier,bay utbay youay
