Aurie,lay owhay enjoyeday itay lalay immenselyay.

Ow"Hay ancay I,ay enwhay ethay eremay ideaay ofay you,ay arriedmay danay ettled,say isay osay
irresistiblyay unnyfay atthay Iay an'tcay eepkay ober!"say eredansway O,jay ilingsmay lalay
overay erhay ace,fay osay infectiouslyay atthay eythay adhay otheranay augh,lay danay enthay
ettledsay ownday orfay aay oodgay alk,tay uiteqay inay ethay easantplay olday ashionfay.

It's"ay onay useay youray oinggay outay inay ethay oldcay otay etgay Y,amay orfay eythay earay lalay
omingcay upay esentlypray. Iay ouldn'tcay ait;way Iay antedway otay ebay ethay oneay otay elltay youay
ethay andgray urprise,say danay avehay Irst'fay im,'skay saay eway useday otay aysay enwhay eway
uabbledsqay outabay ethay eam."cray

Of"ay oursecay youay id,day danay oiltspay youray orystay ybay eginningbay taay ethay ongwray enday.
Ow,nay artstay ight,ray danay elltay emay owhay itay lalay appened;hay I'may iningpay otay ow."knay

Ell,"Way Iay idday itay otay easeplay Y,"amay eganbay Aurie,lay ithway aay inkletway atthay ademay
Ojay exclaim,--ay

Ib"Fay umbernay one;ay Yamay idday itay otay easeplay youay. Ogay on,ay danay elltay ethay uth,tray ifay
youay an,cay ir."say

Ow"Nay e'sshay eginningbay otay armmay it;ay isn'tay itay ollyjay otay earhay er?"hay aidsay
Aurielay otay ethay ire,fay danay ethay irefay owedglay danay arkledspay saay ifay itay uiteqay
eedagray. It's"ay lalay ethay ame,say youay ow,knay eshay danay Iay eingbay oneay. Eway annedplay otay

ithway usay. Osay Iay ustjay ettledsay ethay ifficultyday ybay aying,say Et's'Lay ebay arried,may
danay enthay eway ancay oday saay eway ike.'"lay

ainagay.

ingaskay ardonpay orfay erhay aternalmay ovetousnesscay.

onay ithoutway ymay ittlelay omanway yanay oremay anthay "a--ay

Eathercock"Way ancay ithoutway ind,"way uggestedsay O,jay saay ehay ausedpay orfay aay imile;say

Exactly;"ay orfay Yamay eepskay emay ointingpay ueday estway ostmay ofay ethay ime,tay ithway onlyay
naay occasionalay ifflewhay oundray otay ethay outh,say danay Iay aven'thay adhay naay easterlyay

ogetheraltay alubrioussay danay almy,bay ey,hay ymay ady?"lay

Ovely"Lay eatherway osay ar;fay Iay on'tday owknay owhay onglay itay illway ast,lay utbay I'may otnay
aidafray ofay orms,stay orfay I'may earninglay owhay otay ailsay ymay ipshay. Omecay ome,hay ear,day

eraftay ongamay ymay ingsthay. Enmay earay O__say elpless,hay other,"may aidsay Y,amay ithway aay

E"Way avehay ouray ans;play eway on'tday eanmay otay aysay uchmay outabay emthay yet,ay ecausebay eway
earay uchsay eryvay ewnay ooms,bray utbay eway on'tday intenday otay ebay idleay. I'may oinggay intoay

Iay annotcay eelfay atthay Iay avehay oneday ymay utyday saay umblehay istorianhay ofay ethay Archmay
amily,fay ithoutway evotingday taay eastlay oneay apterchay otay ethay otway ostmay eciouspray
danay importantay embersmay ofay itay. Aisyday danay Emiday adhay ownay ivedarray taay yearsay ofay
iscretion;day orfay inay isthay astfay eagay abiesbay ofay eethray oray ourfay ertassay eirthay
ights,ray danay etgay em,thay oo,tay ichwhay isay oremay anthay anymay ofay eirthay eldersay oday.
Ifay erethay everay ereway aay airpay ofay instway inay angerday ofay eingbay utterlyay oiltspay ybay
oration,aday itay asway esethay attlingpray Ookesbray. Ofay oursecay eythay ereway ethay ostmay
emarkableray ildrenchay everay orn,bay saay illway ebay ownshay enwhay Iay entionmay atthay eythay
alkedway taay eightay onths,may alkedtay uentlyflay taay elvetway onths,may danay taay otway
yearsay eythay ooktay eirthay acesplay taay able,tay danay ehavedbay ithway aay oprietypray
ichwhay armedchay lalay eholdersbay. Taay ee,thray Aisyday emandedday aay Eedler,""nay danay
uallyactay ademay aay agbay ithway ourfay itchesstay inay it;ay eshay ikewiselay etsay upay
ousekeepinghay inay ethay ideboard,say danay anagedmay aay icroscopicmay ooking-stovecay
ithway aay illskay atthay oughtbray earstay ofay idepray otay Annah'shay eyes,ay ilewhay Emiday
earnedlay ishay etterslay ithway ishay andfather,gray owhay inventeday aay ewnay odemay ofay
eachingtay ethay abetalphay ybay ormingfay ethay etterslay ithway ishay sarmay danay egs,lay
usthay unitingay ymnasticsgay orfay eadhay danay eelshay. Ethay oybay earlyay evelopedday aay
echanicalmay eniusgay ichwhay elightedday ishay atherfay danay istractedday ishay other,may
orfay ehay iedtray otay imitateay everyay achinemay ehay aw,say danay eptkay ethay urserynay inay aay
aoticchay ondition,cay ithway ishay Ewin-sheen,"--a"say ysteriousmay ucturestray ofay
ing,stray airs,chay othes-pins,clay danay ools,spay orfay eelswhay otay ogay Ound"way danay
ound;"way oalsay aay asketbay unghay overay ethay ackbay ofay aay igbay air,chay inay ichwhay ehay
ainlyvay iedtray otay oisthay ishay ootay onfidingcay ister,say o,whay ithway emininefay
evotion,day owedallay erhay ittlelay eadhay otay ebay umpedbay illtay escued,ray enwhay ethay
youngay inventoray indignantlyay emarked,ray Y,"Whay armar,may at'sday ymay ellywaiter,lay
danay e'smay yingtray otay ullpay erhay up."ay

Oughthay utterlyay unlikeay inay aracter,chay ethay instway otgay onay emarkablyray ellway
ogether,tay danay eldomsay uarrelledqay oremay anthay icethray aay ayday. Ofay ourse,cay Emiday
yrannizedtay overay Aisy,day danay allantlygay efendedday erhay omfray everyay otheray
essor;aggray ilewhay Aisyday ademay aay alley-slavegay ofay erself,hay danay oredaday erhay
otherbray saay ethay oneay erfectpay eingbay inay ethay orldway. Aay osy,ray ubby,chay unshinysay
ittlelay oulsay asway Aisy,day owhay oundfay erhay ayway otay everybody'say eart,hay danay
estlednay erethay. Oneay ofay ethay aptivatingcay ildren,chay owhay eemsay ademay otay ebay
issedkay danay uddled,cay ornedaday danay oredaday ikelay ittlelay oddesses,gay danay
oducedpray orfay eneralgay ovalappray onay lalay estivefay occasionsay. Erhay allsmay
irtuesvay ereway osay eetsway atthay eshay ouldway avehay eenbay uiteqay elicangay ifay aay ewfay
allsmay aughtinessesnay adhay otnay eptkay erhay elightfullyday umanhay. Itay asway lalay airfay
eatherway inay erhay orld,way danay everyay orningmay eshay ambledscray upay otay ethay indowway
inay erhay ittlelay ight-gownnay otay ooklay out,ay danay ay,say onay attermay etherwhay itay
ainedray oray one,shay Oh,"ay ittypay ay,day oh,ay ittypay ay!"day Everyay oneay asway aay iend,fray
danay eshay offereday isseskay otay aay angerstray osay onfidinglycay atthay ethay ostmay
inveterateay achelorbay elented,ray danay aby-loversbay ecamebay aithfulfay
orshippersway.

E"May oveslay evvybody,"ay eshay onceay aid,say openingay erhay ,armsay ithway erhay oonspay inay

ethay olewhay orldway.

aay osslay ikelay atthay ichwhay adhay atelylay aughttay emthay owhay onglay eythay adhay
entertaineday naay elangay unawaresay. Erhay andfathergray oftenay alledcay erhay Eth,""Bay
danay erhay andmothergray atchedway overay erhay ithway untiringay evotion,day saay ifay

eesay.

Emi,day ikelay aay uetray Yankee,ay asway ofay naay inquiringay urn,tay antingway otay owknay
everything,ay danay oftenay ettinggay uchmay isturbedday ecausebay ehay ouldcay otnay etgay

andfather,gray owhay useday otay oldhay Ocraticsay onversationscay ithway im,hay inay ichwhay
ethay ecociouspray upilpay occasionallyay osedpay ishay eacher,tay otay ethay undisguiseday

Open"ay e;may Iay antway otay eesay itay ogay ound."way

Y"May ear,day oday youay inkthay itay iseway otay alktay outabay uchsay ingsthay otay atthay aby?bay

unanswerableay uestions."qay

If"ay ehay isay olday enoughay otay kasay ethay uestionsqay ehay isay olday enoughay otay eceiveray

Ow,nay Emi,day elltay emay erewhay youay eepkay youray ind?"may

Ifay ethay oybay adhay epliedray ikelay Ibiades,alcay Y"Bay ethay ods,gay Ocrates,say Iay annotcay
ell,"tay ishay andfathergray ouldway otnay avehay eenbay urprised;say utbay en,whay eraftay

ered,answay inay aay onetay ofay almcay onviction,cay In"ay ymay ittlelay elly,"bay ethay olday
entlemangay ouldcay onlyay oinjay inay andma'sgray augh,lay danay ismissday ethay assclay inay
etaphysicsmay.

Erethay ightmay avehay eenbay ausecay orfay aternalmay iety,anxay ifay Emiday adhay otnay ivengay
onvincingcay oofspray atthay ehay asway aay uetray oy,bay saay ellway saay aay uddingbay
ilosopher;phay or,fay often,ay eraftay aay iscussionday ichwhay ausedcay Annahhay otay
ophesy,pray ithway ominousay ods,nay At"Thay ildchay in'taay onglay orfay isthay orld,"way ehay
ouldway urntay outabay danay etsay erhay earsfay taay estray ybay omesay ofay ethay ankspray ithway
ichwhay ear,day irty,day aughtynay ittlelay ascalsray istractday danay elightday eirthay
arents'pay oulssay.

Egmay ademay anymay oralmay ules,ray danay iedtray otay eepkay em;thay utbay atwhay othermay asway
everay oofpray ainstagay ethay inningway iles,way ethay ingeniousay evasions,ay oray ethay
anquiltray udacityaay ofay ethay iniaturemay enmay danay omenway owhay osay earlyay owshay
emselvesthay omplishedaccay Ulartfay Odgers?day

O"Nay oremay aisins,ray Emi,day ey'llthay akemay youay ick,"say ayssay ammamay otay ethay youngay
ersonpay owhay offersay ishay ervicessay inay ethay itchenkay ithway unfailingay egularityray
onay um-puddingplay ayday.

E"May ikeslay otay ebay ick."say

I"ay on'tday antway otay avehay you,ay osay unray ayaway danay elphay Aisyday akemay atty-cakes."pay

Ehay eluctantlyray eparts,day utbay ishay ongswray eighway uponay ishay irit;spay ,anday ybay
danay y,bay enwhay naay opportunityay omescay otay edressray em,thay ehay outwitsay ammamay ybay aay
ewdshray argainbay.

Rmay. Aerbhay ouldcay eadray everalsay anguages,lay utbay ehay adhay otnay earnedlay otay eadray

erefore,thay uchmay azedamay ybay ethay ontradictionscay ofay oice,vay ace,fay danay anner,may
ichwhay eshay owedshay imhay inay apidray uccessionsay atthay ay,day orfay eshay asway inay alfhay aay
ozenday ifferentday oodsmay inay ethay oursecay ofay alfhay naay ourhay. Enwhay eshay etmay imhay
eshay ookedlay urprised,say oughthay itay asway impossibleay otay elphay uspectingsay atthay
eshay adhay omecay orfay atthay expressay urposepay. Enwhay ehay offereday erhay ishay ,armay eshay
ooktay itay ithway aay ooklay atthay illedfay imhay ithway elight;day utbay enwhay ehay edaskay ifay
eshay issedmay im,hay eshay avegay uchsay aay illy,chay ormalfay eplyray atthay espairday ellfay
uponay imhay. Onay earninglay ishay oodgay ortunefay eshay ostalmay appedclay erhay ands:hay asway
ethay oyjay lalay orfay ethay oys?bay En,thay onay earinghay ishay estination,day eshay aid,say
O"Say arfay ay!"away inay aay onetay ofay espairday atthay iftedlay imhay onay otay aay innaclepay ofay
ope;hay utbay ethay extnay inutemay eshay umbledtay imhay ownday ainagay ybay observing,ay ikelay
oneay entirelyay orbedabsay inay ethay atter,--may

IN"ay EtHay ARRETgay.

Our"Fay ittlelay estschay lalay inay aay ow,ray
Imday ithway ust,day danay ornway ybay ime,tay
Lalay ashionedfay danay illed,fay onglay o,agay
Ybay ildrenchay ownay inay eirthay imepray.
Ourfay ittlelay eyskay unghay idesay ybay ide,say
Ithway adedfay ibbons,ray avebray danay aygay
Enwhay astenedfay ere,thay ithway ildishchay ide,pray
Onglay o,agay onay aay ainyray ayday.
Ourfay ittlelay ames,nay oneay onay eachay id,lay
Arvedcay outay ybay aay oyishbay and,hay
Danay underneathay erethay iethlay idhay
Istorieshay ofay ethay appyhay andbay
Onceay ayingplay ere,hay danay ausingpay oftay
Otay earhay ethay eetsway efrain,ray
Atthay amecay danay entway onay ethay oofray oft,alay
Inay ethay allingfay ummersay ainray.

Eg'"'May onay ethay irstfay id,lay oothsmay danay airfay.
Iay ooklay inay ithway ovinglay eyes,ay
Orfay oldedfay ere,hay ithway ell-knownway are,cay
Aay oodlygay atheringgay ies,lay
Ethay ecordray ofay aay eacefulpay ife,--lay
Iftsgay otay entlegay ildchay danay irl,gay
Aay idalbray own,gay ineslay otay aay ife,way
Aay inytay oe,shay aay abybay urlcay.
Onay oystay inay isthay irstfay estchay emain,ray
Orfay lalay earay arriedcay ay,away
Inay eirthay olday e,agay otay oinjay ainagay
Inay otheranay allsmay Eg'smay ayplay.
,ahay appyhay other!may ellway Iay owknay
Youay ear,hay ikelay aay eetsway efrain,ray
Ullabieslay everay oftsay danay owlay
Inay ethay allingfay ummersay ainray.

O'"'Jay onay ethay extnay id,lay atchedscray danay orn,way
Danay ithinway aay otleymay orestay
Ofay eadlesshay olls,day ofay ool-booksschay orn,tay
Irdsbay danay eastsbay atthay eakspay onay ore;may
Oilsspay oughtbray omehay omfray ethay airyfay oundgray
Onlyay odtray ybay youthfulay eet,fay
Eamsdray ofay aay uturefay evernay ound,fay
Emoriesmay ofay aay astpay illstay eet;sway
Alf-writhay oems,pay oriesstay ild,way
Ilapray etters,lay armway danay old,cay
Iariesday ofay aay ilfulway ild,chay
Intshay ofay aay omanway earlyay old;ay
Aay omanway inay aay onelylay ome,hay
Earing,hay ikelay aay adsay efrain,--ray
E'Bay orthyway ove,lay danay ovelay illway ome,'cay
Inay ethay allingfay ummersay ainray.

Y"May Eth!bay ethay ustday isay aysalway eptsway
Omfray ethay idlay atthay earsbay youray ame,nay
Saay ifay ybay ovinglay eyesay atthay ept,way
Ybay arefulcay andshay atthay oftenay amecay.
Eathday anonizedcay orfay usay oneay aint,say
Everay esslay umanhay anthay ivine,day
Danay illstay eway ay,lay ithway endertay aint,play
Elicsray inay isthay ouseholdhay ine.--shray
Ethay ilversay ell,bay osay eldomsay ung,ray
Ethay ittlelay apcay ichwhay astlay eshay ore,way
Ethay air,fay eadday Atherinecay atthay unghay
Ybay elsangay ornebay oveabay erhay oor;day
Ethay ongssay eshay ang,say ithoutway ament,lay
Inay erhay ison-housepray ofay ain,pay
Oreverfay earay eythay eetlysway entblay
Ithway ethay allingfay ummersay ainray.

Upon"ay ethay astlay id'slay olishedpay ield--fay
Egendlay ownay othbay airfay danay ue--tray
Aay allantgay ightknay earsbay onay ishay ield,shay
Amy,''ay inay etterslay oldgay danay ueblay.
Ithinway ielay oodssnay atthay oundbay erhay air,hay
Ippersslay atthay avehay ancedday eirthay ast,lay
Adedfay owersflay aidlay ybay ithway are,cay
Ansfay osewhay iryaay oilstay earay ast;pay
Aygay alentines,vay lalay entarday ames,flay
Iflestray atthay avehay ornebay eirthay artpay
Inay irlishgay opeshay danay earsfay danay ames,--shay
Ethay ecordray ofay aay aidenmay earthay
Ownay earninglay airer,fay uertray ells,spay
Earing,hay ikelay aay itheblay efrain,ray
Ethay ilversay oundsay ofay idalbray ellsbay
Inay ethay allingfay ummersay ainray.

Our"Fay ittlelay estschay lalay inay aay ow,ray
Imday ithway ust,day danay ornway ybay ime,tay
Ourfay omen,way aughttay ybay ealway danay oeway
Otay ovelay danay aborlay inay eirthay imepray.
Ourfay isters,say artedpay orfay naay our,hay
Onenay ost,lay oneay onlyay onegay efore,bay
Ademay ybay ove'slay immortalay ower,pay
Earestnay danay earestday evermoreay.
Oh,ay enwhay esethay iddenhay oresstay ofay oursay
Ielay openay otay ethay Ather'sfay ight,say
Aymay eythay ebay ichray inay oldengay ours,hay
Eedsday atthay owshay airerfay orfay ethay ight,lay
Iveslay osewhay avebray usicmay onglay allshay ing,ray
Ikelay aay irit-stirringspay ain,stray
Oulssay atthay allshay adlyglay oarsay danay ingsay
Inay ethay onglay unshinesay eraftay ainray.

J"ay. "m.ay

It's"ay eryvay adbay oetry,pay utbay Iay eltfay itay enwhay Iay otewray it,ay oneay ayday enwhay Iay asway
eryvay onely,lay danay adhay aay oodgay ycray onay aay ag-bagray. Iay evernay oughtthay itay ouldway
ogay erewhay itay ouldcay elltay ales,"tay aidsay O,jay earingtay upay ethay ersesvay ethay
Ofessorpray adhay easuredtray osay onglay.

Et"Lay itay o,gay itay ashay oneday itsay uty,day danay Iay illway afhay aay eshfray oneay enwhay Iay eadray
lalay ethay ownbray ookbay inay ichwhay eshay eepskay erhay ittlelay ecrets,"say aidsay Rmay.
Aer,bhay ithway aay ile,smay saay ehay atchedway ethay agmentsfray yflay ayaway onay ethay indway.
Yes,""ay ehay edadday earnestly,ay I"ay eadray at,thay danay Iay inkthay otay yself,may E'Shay ashay
aay orrow,say eshay isay onely,lay eshay ouldway indfay omfortcay inay uetray ovelay. Iay afhay aay

ame?'"nay

And"ay osay youay amecay otay indfay atthay itay asway otnay ootay oor,pay utbay ethay oneay eciouspray
ingthay Iay eeded,"nay isperedwhay Ojay.

I"ay adhay onay ouragecay otay inkthay atthay taay irst,fay eavenlyhay indkay saay asway youray
elcomeway otay emay. Utbay oonsay Iay eganbay otay ope,hay danay enthay Iay aid,say I'ay illway afhay
erhay ifay Iay ieday orfay it,'ay danay osay Iay ill!"way iedcray Rmay. Aer,bhay ithway aay efiantday
od,nay saay ifay ethay allsway ofay istmay osingclay oundray emthay ereway arriersbay ichwhay ehay
asway otay urmountsay oray aliantlyvay ockknay ownday.

Ojay oughtthay atthay asway endid,splay danay esolvedray otay ebay orthyway ofay erhay ight,knay
oughthay ehay idday otnay omecay ancingpray onay aay argerchay inay orgeousgay ayarray.

At"Whay ademay youay aystay ayaway osay ong?"lay eshay edaskay esently,pray indingfay itay osay
easantplay otay kasay onfidentialcay uestionsqay danay etgay elightfulday ersansway atthay
eshay ouldcay otnay eepkay ilentsay.

It"ay asway otnay easy,ay utbay Iay ouldcay otnay indfay ethay earthay otay aketay youay omfray atthay

orfay aay oorpay olday ellow,fay owhay ashay onay ortunefay utbay aay ittlelay earning?"lay

I'm"ay adglay youay Are__ay oor;pay Iay ouldn'tcay earbay aay ichray usband,"hay aidsay Ojay
ecidedly,day ing,adday inay aay oftersay one,tay On't"Day earfay overty;pay I'veay ownknay itay
onglay enoughay otay oselay ymay ead,dray danay ebay appyhay orkingway orfay osethay Iay ove;lay danay
on'tday allcay yourselfay old,--fortyay isay ethay imepray ofay ifelay. Iay ouldn'tcay elphay
ovinglay youay ifay youay ereway eventy!"say

Ethay Ofessorpray oundfay atthay osay ouchingtay atthay ehay ouldway avehay eenbay adglay ofay ishay
andkerchief,hay ifay ehay ouldcay avehay otgay taay it;ay saay ehay ouldn't,cay Ojay ipedway ishay

I"ay aymay ebay ong-minded,stray utbay onay oneay ancay aysay I'may outay ofay ymay eresphay ow,nay
orfay oman'sway ecialspay issionmay isay upposedsay otay ebay yingdray earstay danay earingbay
urdensbay. I'may otay arrycay ymay are,shay Iedrich,fray danay elphay otay earnay ethay omehay.

ehay iedtray otay eclaimray ishay oadlay.

E"Way allshay eesay. Afhay youay atiencepay otay aitway aay onglay ime,tay O?jay Iay ustmay ogay ayaway
danay oday ymay orkway onealay. Iay ustmay elphay ymay oysbay irst,fay ecause,bay evenay orfay you,ay

ilewhay eway opehay danay ait?"way

Yes,"ay Iay owknay Iay an;cay orfay eway ovelay oneay other,anay danay atthay akesmay lalay ethay estray
easyay otay earbay. Iay avehay ymay uty,day o,alsay danay ymay orkway. Iay ouldn'tcay enjoyay yselfmay
ifay Iay eglectednay emthay evenay orfay you,ay osay ere'sthay onay eednay ofay urryhay oray
impatienceay. Youay ancay oday youray artpay outay Est,way Iay ancay oday inemay ere,hay danay othbay
ebay appyhay opinghay orfay ethay est,bay danay eavinglay ethay uturefay otay ebay saay Odgay
ills."way

Ah!"ay outhay ifestgay emay uchsay opehay danay ourage,cay danay Iay afhay othingnay otay ifgay ackbay
utbay aay ullfay earthay danay esethay emptyay ands,"hay iedcray ethay Ofessor,pray uiteqay
overcomeay.

IIxLVay.

ARVESThay IMEtay.


Orfay aay yearay Ojay danay erhay Ofessorpray orkedway danay aited,way opedhay danay oved,lay etmay
occasionally,ay danay otewray uchsay oluminousvay etterslay atthay ethay iseray inay ethay
icepray ofay aperpay asway ountedaccay or,fay Aurielay aidsay. Ethay econdsay yearay eganbay
atherray oberly,say orfay eirthay ospectspray idday otnay ighten,bray danay Untaay Archmay
iedday uddenlysay. Utbay enwhay eirthay irstfay orrowsay asway over,--foray eythay ovedlay ethay
olday adylay inay itespay ofay erhay arpshay ongue,--theytay oundfay eythay adhay ausecay orfay
ejoicing,ray orfay eshay adhay eftlay Umfieldplay otay O,jay ichwhay ademay lalay ortssay ofay
oyfuljay ingsthay ossiblepay.

It's"ay aay inefay olday ace,play danay illway ingbray aay andsomehay um;say orfay ofay oursecay youay
intenday otay ellsay it,"ay aidsay Aurie,lay saay eythay ereway lalay alkingtay ethay attermay
over,ay omesay eeksway aterlay.

O,"Nay Iay on't,"day asway O'sjay ecidedday er,answay saay eshay ettedpay ethay atfay oodle,pay
omwhay eshay adhay opted,aday outay ofay espectray otay ishay ormerfay istressmay.

You"ay on'tday eanmay otay ivelay ere?"thay

Yes,"ay Iay o."day

Ut,"Bay ymay earday irl,gay it'say naay immenseay ouse,hay danay illway aketay aay owerpay ofay
oneymay otay eepkay itay inay orderay. Ethay ardengay danay orcharday onealay eednay otway oray
eethray en,may danay armingfay isn'tay inay Aer'sbhay ine,lay Iay aketay it."ay

E'll"Hay ytray ishay andhay taay itay ere,thay ifay Iay oposepray it."ay

And"ay youay expectay otay ivelay onay ethay oducepray ofay ethay ace?play Ell,way atthay oundssay
aradisiacal,pay utbay you'llay indfay itay esperateday ardhay ork."way

E"Thay opcray eway earay oinggay otay aiseray isay aay ofitablepray one;"ay danay Ojay aughedlay.

Of"ay atwhay isay isthay inefay opcray otay onsist,cay a'am?"may

Oys"Bay. Iay antway otay openay aay oolschay orfay ittlelay ads,--alay ood,gay appy,hay omelikehay
ool,schay ithway emay otay aketay arecay ofay em,thay danay Itzfray otay eachtay em."thay

Ere's"Thay aay ulytray Oianjay anplay orfay you!ay Isn'tay atthay ustjay ikelay er?"hay iedcray
Aurie,lay ealingappay otay ethay amily,fay owhay ookedlay saay uchmay urprisedsay saay ehay.

I"ay ikelay it,"ay aidsay Smray. Archmay ecidedlyday.

O"Say oday I,"ay edadday erhay usband,hay owhay elcomedway ethay oughtthay ofay aay ancechay orfay
yingtray ethay Ocraticsay ethodmay ofay educationay onay odernmay youthay.

It"ay illway ebay naay immenseay arecay orfay O,"jay aidsay Eg,may okingstray ethay eadhay ofay erhay
oneay absorbingall-ay onsay.

O"Jay ancay oday it,ay danay ebay appyhay inay itay. It'say aay endidsplay ideaay. Elltay usay lalay
outabay it,"ay iedcray Rmay. Aurence,lay owhay adhay eenbay onginglay otay endlay ethay overslay aay
and,hay utbay ewknay atthay eythay ouldway efuseray ishay elphay.

I"ay ewknay you'day andstay ybay e,may irsay. Yamay oesday oo--Itay eesay itay inay erhay eyes,ay
oughthay eshay udentlypray aitsway otay urntay itay overay inay erhay indmay eforebay eshay
eaksspay. Ow,nay ymay earday eople,"pay ontinuedcay Ojay earnestly,ay Ust"jay understanday
atthay isthay isn'tay aay ewnay ideaay ofay ine,may utbay aay ong-cherishedlay anplay. Eforebay ymay
Itzfray ame,cay Iay useday otay inkthay ow,hay enwhay I'day ademay ymay ortune,fay danay onay oneay
eedednay emay taay ome,hay I'day irehay aay igbay ouse,hay danay ickpay upay omesay oor,pay orlornfay
ittlelay ads,lay owhay adn'thay yanay others,may danay aketay arecay ofay em,thay danay akemay
ifelay ollyjay orfay emthay eforebay itay asway ootay atelay. Iay eesay osay anymay oinggay otay uin,ray
orfay antway ofay elphay taay ethay ightray inute;may Iay ovelay osay otay oday ythinganay orfay em;thay
Iay eemsay otay eelfay eirthay ants,way danay ympathizesay ithway eirthay oubles,tray ,anday oh,ay
Iay ouldshay O__say ikelay otay ebay aay othermay otay em!"thay

Smray. Archmay eldhay outay erhay andhay otay O,jay owhay ooktay it,ay iling,smay ithway earstay inay
erhay eyes,ay danay entway onay inay ethay olday enthusiasticay ay,way ichwhay eythay adhay otnay
eensay orfay aay onglay ilewhay.

I"ay oldtay ymay anplay otay Itzfray once,ay danay ehay aidsay itay asway ustjay atwhay ehay ouldway
ike,lay danay eedagray otay ytray itay enwhay eway otgay ichray. Essblay ishay earday eart,hay e'shay
eenbay oingday itay lalay ishay ife,--helpinglay oorpay oys,bay Iay ean,may otnay ettinggay
ich;ray atthay e'llhay evernay e;bay oneymay oesn'tday aystay inay ishay ocketpay onglay enoughay
otay aylay upay yanay. Utbay ow,nay anksthay otay ymay oodgay olday unt,aay owhay ovedlay emay etterbay
anthay Iay everay eserved,day I'm__ay ich,ray taay eastlay Iay eelfay o,say danay eway ancay ivelay taay
Umfieldplay erfectlypay ell,way ifay eway avehay aay ourishingflay oolschay. It'say ustjay ethay
aceplay orfay oys,bay ethay ousehay isay ig,bay danay ethay urniturefay ongstray danay ainplay.
Ere'sthay entyplay ofay oomray orfay ozensday inside,ay danay endidsplay oundsgray outsideay.
Eythay ouldcay elphay inay ethay ardengay danay orchard:ay uchsay orkway isay ealthy,hay isn'tay
it,ay ir?say Enthay Itzfray ancay aintray danay eachtay inay ishay ownay ay,way danay atherfay illway
elphay imhay. Iay ancay eedfay danay ursenay danay etpay danay oldscay em;thay danay othermay illway
ebay ymay and-bystay. I'veay aysalway ongedlay orfay otslay ofay oys,bay danay evernay adhay
enough;ay ownay Iay ancay illfay ethay ousehay ull,fay danay evelray inay ethay ittlelay earsday otay
ymay eart'shay ontentcay. Inkthay atwhay uxury,--Plumfieldlay ymay own,ay danay aay
ildernessway ofay oysbay otay enjoyay itay ithway e!"may

Saay Ojay avedway erhay ands,hay danay avegay aay ighsay ofay apture,ray ethay amilyfay entway offay
intoay aay alegay ofay erriment,may danay Rmay. Aurencelay aughedlay illtay eythay oughtthay
e'dhay avehay naay oplecticapay itfay.

I"ay on'tday eesay ythinganay unny,"fay eshay aidsay avely,gray enwhay eshay ouldcay ebay eardhay.
Othing"Nay ouldcay ebay oremay aturalnay oray operpray anthay orfay ymay Ofessorpray otay openay aay
ool,schay danay orfay emay otay eferpray otay esideray onay ymay ownay estate."ay

E"Shay isay uttingpay onay irsaay eady,"alray aidsay Aurie,lay owhay egardedray ethay ideaay inay
ethay ightlay ofay aay apitalcay okejay. Ut"Bay aymay Iay inquireay owhay youay intenday otay
upportsay ethay establishment?ay Ifay lalay ethay upilspay earay ittlelay agamuffins,ray I'may
aidafray youray opcray on'tway ebay ofitablepray inay aay orldlyway ense,say Smray. Aer."bhay

Ow"Nay on'tday ebay aay et-blanket,way Eddytay. Ofay oursecay Iay allshay avehay ichray upils,pay
o,--perhapsalsay eginbay ithway uchsay ogether;altay en,thay enwhay I'veay otgay aay art,stay
Iay ancay aketay aay agamuffinray oray o,tway ustjay orfay aay elishray. Ichray eople'spay
ildrenchay oftenay eednay arecay danay omfort,cay saay ellway saay oorpay. I'veay eensay
unfortunateay ittlelay eaturescray eftlay otay ervants,say oray ackwardbay onesay ushedpay
orward,fay enwhay it'say ealray ueltycray. Omesay earay aughtynay oughthray ismanagementmay
oray eglect,nay danay omesay oselay eirthay othersmay. Esides,bay ethay estbay avehay otay etgay
oughthray ethay obbledehoyhay e,agay danay at'sthay ethay eryvay imetay eythay eednay ostmay
atiencepay danay indnesskay. Eoplepay aughlay taay em,thay danay ustlehay emthay out,abay ytray
otay eepkay emthay outay ofay ight,say danay expectay emthay otay urn,tay lalay taay once,ay omfray
ettypray ildrenchay intoay inefay youngay enmay. Eythay on'tday omplaincay uch,--pluckymay
ittlelay ouls,--butsay eythay eelfay itay. I'veay eenbay oughthray omethingsay ofay it,ay danay
Iay owknay lalay outabay itay. I'veay aay ecialspay interestay inay uchsay youngay ears,bay danay
ikelay otay owshay emthay atthay Iay eesay ethay arm,way onest,hay ell-meaningway oys'bay
earts,hay inay itespay ofay ethay umsyclay sarmay danay egslay danay ethay opsy-turvytay eadshay.
I'veay adhay experience,ay oo,tay orfay aven'thay Iay oughtbray upay oneay oybay otay ebay aay idepray
danay onorhay otay ishay amily?"fay

I'll"ay estifytay atthay youay iedtray otay oday it,"ay aidsay Aurie,lay ithway aay atefulgray
ooklay.

And"ay I'veay ucceededsay eyondbay ymay opes;hay orfay erehay youay e,aray aay eady,stay
ensiblesay usinessbay an,may oingday eapshay ofay oodgay ithway youray oney,may danay ayinglay
upay ethay essingsblay ofay ethay oor,pay insteaday ofay ollarsday. Utbay youay earay otnay erelymay
aay usinessbay an:may youay ovelay oodgay danay eautifulbay ings,thay enjoyay emthay yourself,ay
danay etlay othersay ogay alves,hay saay youay aysalway idday inay ethay olday imestay. Iay Am__ay
oudpray ofay you,ay Eddy,tay orfay youay etgay etterbay everyay year,ay danay everyay oneay eelsfay
it,ay oughthay youay on'tway etlay emthay aysay osay. Yes,ay danay enwhay Iay avehay ymay ock,flay
I'llay ustjay ointpay otay you,ay danay ay,say Ere's'Thay youray odel,may ymay ads.'"lay

Oorpay Aurielay idn'tday owknay erewhay otay ook;lay or,fay anmay oughthay ehay as,way omethingsay
ofay ethay olday ashfulnessbay amecay overay imhay saay isthay urstbay ofay aisepray ademay lalay
acesfay urntay ovinglyappray uponay imhay.

I"ay ay,say O,jay at'sthay atherray ootay uch,"may ehay egan,bay ustjay inay ishay olday oyishbay
ayway. You"ay avehay lalay oneday oremay orfay emay anthay Iay ancay everay ankthay youay or,fay
exceptay ybay oingday ymay estbay otnay otay isappointday youay. Youay avehay atherray astcay emay
offay ately,lay O,jay utbay I'veay adhay ethay estbay ofay elp,hay evertheless;nay o,say ifay I'veay
otgay onay taay ,allay youay aymay ankthay esethay otway orfay it;"ay danay ehay aidlay oneay andhay
entlygay onay ishay andfather'sgray itewhay ead,hay ethay otheray onay Y'samay oldengay one,ay
orfay ethay eethray ereway evernay arfay artapay.

I"ay oday inkthay atthay amiliesfay earay ethay ostmay eautifulbay ingsthay inay lalay ethay
orld!"way urstbay outay O,jay owhay asway inay naay unusuallyay uplifteday amefray ofay indmay
ustjay enthay. En"Whay Iay avehay oneay ofay ymay own,ay Iay opehay itay illway ebay saay appyhay saay ethay
eethray Iay owknay danay ovelay ethay estbay. Ifay Ohnjay danay ymay Itzfray ereway onlyay ere,hay itay
ouldway ebay uiteqay aay ittlelay eavenhay onay earth,"ay eshay edadday oremay uietlyqay. Danay
atthay ight,nay enwhay eshay entway otay erhay oom,ray eraftay aay issfulblay eveningay ofay
amilyfay ounsels,cay opes,hay danay ans,play erhay earthay asway osay ullfay ofay appinesshay
atthay eshay ouldcay onlyay almcay itay ybay eelingknay esidebay ethay emptyay edbay aysalway earnay
erhay own,ay danay inkingthay endertay oughtsthay ofay Ethbay.

Itay asway aay eryvay onishingastay yearay ogether,altay orfay ingsthay eemedsay otay appenhay
inay naay unusuallyay apidray danay elightfulday annermay. Ostalmay eforebay eshay ewknay
erewhay eshay as,way Ojay oundfay erselfhay arriedmay danay ettledsay taay Umfieldplay. Enthay aay
amilyfay ofay ixsay oray evensay oysbay ungspray upay ikelay ushrooms,may danay ourishedflay
urprisingly,say oorpay oysbay saay ellway saay ich;ray orfay Rmay. Aurencelay asway
ontinuallycay indingfay omesay ouchingtay asecay ofay estitution,day danay eggingbay ethay
Aersbhay otay aketay itypay onay ethay ild,chay danay ehay ouldway adlyglay aypay aay ifletray orfay
itsay upportsay. Inay isthay ayway ethay yslay olday entlemangay otgay oundray oudpray O,jay danay
urnishedfay erhay ithway ethay ylestay ofay oybay inay ichwhay eshay ostmay elightedday.

Ofay oursecay itay asway up-hillay orkway taay irst,fay danay Ojay ademay ueerqay istakes;may utbay
ethay iseway Ofessorpray eeredstay erhay afelysay intoay almercay aters,way danay ethay ostmay
ampantray agamuffinray asway onqueredcay inay ethay enday. Owhay Ojay idday enjoyay erhay
Ilderness"way ofay oys,"bay danay owhay oor,pay earday Untaay Archmay ouldway avehay amentedlay
adhay eshay eenbay erethay otay eesay ethay acredsay ecinctspray ofay im,pray ell-orderedway
Umfieldplay overrunay ithway Oms,tay Icks,day danay Arrys!hay Erethay asway aay ortsay ofay
oeticpay usticejay outabay it,ay eraftay ,allay orfay ethay olday adylay adhay eenbay ethay errortay
ofay ethay oysbay orfay ilesmay ound;ray danay ownay ethay exilesay eastedfay eelyfray onay
orbiddenfay ums,play ickedkay upay ethay avelgray ithway ofanepray ootsbay unreproved,ay danay
ayedplay icketcray inay ethay igbay ieldfay erewhay ethay irritableay Ow"cay ithway aay umpledcray
orn"hay useday otay inviteay ashray youthsay otay omecay danay ebay ossedtay. Itay ecamebay aay ortsay
ofay oys'bay aradise,pay danay Aurielay uggestedsay atthay itay ouldshay ebay alledcay ethay
Aer-garten,""Bhay saay aay omplimentcay otay itsay astermay danay opriateappray otay itsay
inhabitantsay.

Itay evernay asway aay ashionablefay ool,schay danay ethay Ofessorpray idday otnay aylay upay aay
ortune;fay utbay itay As__way ustjay atwhay Ojay intendeday itay otay e,--"abay appy,hay
omelikehay aceplay orfay oys,bay owhay eedednay eaching,tay are,cay danay indness."kay
Everyay oomray inay ethay igbay ousehay asway oonsay ull;fay everyay ittlelay otplay inay ethay
ardengay oonsay adhay itsay owner;ay aay egularray enageriemay earedappay inay arnbay danay
ed,shay orfay etpay imalsanay ereway owed;allay ,anday eethray imestay aay ay,day Ojay iledsmay taay
erhay Itzfray omfray ethay eadhay ofay aay onglay abletay inedlay onay eitheray idesay ithway owsray
ofay appyhay youngay aces,fay ichwhay lalay urnedtay otay erhay ithway ectionateaffay eyes,ay
onfidingcay ords,way danay atefulgray earts,hay ullfay ofay ovelay orfay Other"May Aer."bhay
Eshay adhay oysbay enoughay ow,nay danay idday otnay iretay ofay em,thay oughthay eythay ereway otnay
els,angay ybay yanay eans,may danay omesay ofay emthay ausedcay othbay Ofessorpray danay
Ofessorinpray uchmay oubletray danay ietyanxay. Utbay erhay aithfay inay ethay oodgay otspay
ichwhay existsay inay ethay earthay ofay ethay aughtiest,nay auciest,say ostmay antalizingtay
ittlelay agamuffinray avegay erhay atience,pay ill,skay ,anday inay ime,tay uccess;say orfay
onay ortalmay oybay ouldcay oldhay outay onglay ithway Atherfay Aerbhay iningshay onay imhay saay
enevolentlybay saay ethay un,say danay Othermay Aerbhay orgivingfay imhay eventysay imestay
evensay. Eryvay eciouspray otay Ojay asway ethay iendshipfray ofay ethay ads;lay eirthay
enitentpay iffssnay danay isperswhay eraftay ong-doing;wray eirthay olldray oray ouchingtay
ittlelay onfidences;cay eirthay easantplay enthusiasms,ay opes,hay danay ans;play evenay
eirthay isfortunes,may orfay eythay onlyay endeareday emthay otay erhay lalay ethay oremay.
Erethay ereway owslay oysbay danay ashfulbay oys;bay eeblefay oysbay danay iotousray oys;bay
oysbay atthay ispedlay danay oysbay atthay uttered;stay oneay oray otway amelay ones;ay danay aay
errymay ittlelay uadroon,qay owhay ouldcay otnay ebay akentay inay elsewhere,ay utbay owhay asway
elcomeway otay ethay Aer-garten,""Bhay oughthay omesay eoplepay edictedpray atthay ishay
issionadmay ouldway uinray ethay oolschay.

Yes;ay Ojay asway aay eryvay appyhay omanway ere,thay inay itespay ofay ardhay ork,way uchmay
iety,anxay danay aay erpetualpay acketray. Eshay enjoyeday itay eartily,hay danay oundfay ethay
auseapplay ofay erhay oysbay oremay atisfyingsay anthay yanay aisepray ofay ethay orld;way orfay
ownay eshay oldtay onay oriesstay exceptay otay erhay ockflay ofay enthusiasticay elieversbay
danay irersadmay. Saay ethay yearsay entway on,ay otway ittlelay adslay ofay erhay ownay amecay otay
increaseay erhay appiness,--Rob,hay amednay orfay andpa,gray danay Eddy,tay aay
appy-go-luckyhay aby,bay owhay eemedsay otay avehay inheriteday ishay apa'spay unshinysay
empertay saay ellway saay ishay other'smay ivelylay iritspay. Owhay eythay everay ewgray upay
ivealay inay atthay irlpoolwhay ofay oysbay asway aay ysterymay otay eirthay andmagray danay
unts;aay utbay eythay ourishedflay ikelay andelionsday inay ing,spray danay eirthay oughray
ursesnay ovedlay danay ervedsay emthay ellway.

Erethay ereway aay eatgray anymay olidayshay taay Umfield,play danay oneay ofay ethay ostmay
elightfulday asway ethay yearlyay e-picking;applay orfay enthay ethay Arches,may
Aurences,lay Ookes,bray danay Aersbhay urnedtay outay inay ullfay orce,fay danay ademay aay ayday
ofay itay. Ivefay yearsay eraftay O'sjay edding,way oneay ofay esethay uitfulfray estivalsfay
occurred,--aay ellowmay Octoberay ay,day enwhay ethay iraay asway ullfay ofay naay
exhilaratingay eshnessfray ichwhay ademay ethay iritsspay ise,ray danay ethay oodblay anceday
ealthilyhay inay ethay einsvay. Ethay olday orcharday oreway itsay olidayhay ire;attay
olden-rodgay danay ersastay ingedfray ethay ossymay alls;way asshoppersgray ippedskay
isklybray inay ethay eresay ass,gray danay icketscray irpedchay ikelay airyfay iperspay taay aay
east;fay uirrelssqay ereway usybay ithway eirthay allsmay arvesting;hay irdsbay itteredtway
eirthay ieuxaday omfray ethay ersalday inay ethay ane;lay danay everyay eetray oodstay eadyray otay
endsay ownday itsay owershay ofay edray oray yelloway esapplay taay ethay irstfay akeshay.
Everybodyay asway ere;thay everybodyay aughedlay danay ang,say imbedclay upay danay umbledtay
own;day everybodyay eclaredday atthay erethay evernay adhay eenbay uchsay aay erfectpay ayday oray
uchsay aay ollyjay etsay otay enjoyay it;ay danay everyay oneay avegay emselvesthay upay otay ethay
implesay easuresplay ofay ethay ourhay saay eelyfray saay ifay erethay ereway onay uchsay ingsthay
saay arecay oray orrowsay inay ethay orldway.

Rmay. Archmay olledstray acidlyplay out,abay uotingqay Usser,tay Owley,cay danay Olumellacay
otay Rmay. Aurence,lay ilewhay enjoying--ay

E"Thay entlegay e'sapplay ineyway uice."jay

Ethay Ofessorpray argedchay upay danay ownday ethay eengray islesaay ikelay aay outstay Eutonictay
ight,knay ithway aay olepay orfay aay ance,lay eadinglay onay ethay oys,bay owhay ademay aay ookhay
danay adderlay ompanycay ofay emselves,thay danay erformedpay ondersway inay ethay ayway ofay
oundgray danay oftylay umblingtay. Aurielay evotedday imselfhay otay ethay ittlelay ones,ay
oderay ishay allsmay aughterday inay aay ushel-basket,bay ooktay Aisyday upay ongamay ethay
irds'bay ests,nay danay eptkay enturousadvay Obray omfray eakingbray ishay ecknay. Smray.
Archmay danay Egmay atsay ongamay ethay eapplay ilespay ikelay aay airpay ofay Omonas,pay ortingsay
ethay ontributionscay atthay eptkay ouringpay in;ay ilewhay Y,amay ithway aay eautifulbay
otherlymay expressionay inay erhay ace,fay etchedskay ethay ariousvay oups,gray danay
atchedway overay oneay alepay ad,lay owhay atsay oringaday erhay ithway ishay ittlelay utchcray
esidebay imhay.

Ojay asway inay erhay elementay atthay ay,day danay ushedray out,abay ithway erhay owngay innedpay
up,ay erhay athay ywhereanay utbay onay erhay ead,hay danay erhay abybay uckedtay underay erhay ,armay
eadyray orfay yanay ivelylay entureadvay ichwhay ightmay urntay upay. Ittlelay Eddytay orebay aay
armedchay ife,lay orfay othingnay everay appenedhay otay im,hay danay Ojay evernay eltfay yanay
ietyanxay enwhay ehay asway iskedwhay upay intoay aay eetray ybay oneay ad,lay allopedgay offay onay
ethay ackbay ofay other,anay oray uppliedsay ithway oursay ussetsray ybay ishay indulgentay
apa,pay owhay aboredlay underay ethay Ermanicgay elusionday atthay abiesbay ouldcay igestday
ything,anay omfray ickledpay abbagecay otay uttons,bay ails,nay danay eirthay ownay allsmay
oesshay. Eshay ewknay atthay ittlelay Edtay ouldway urntay upay ainagay inay ime,tay afesay danay
osy,ray irtyday danay erene,say danay eshay aysalway eceivedray imhay ackbay ithway aay eartyhay
elcome,way orfay Ojay ovedlay erhay abiesbay enderlytay.

Illustration:[ay Eddytay orebay aay armedchay ife]lay

Taay ourfay o'clockay aay ulllay ooktay ace,play danay asketsbay emainedray empty,ay ilewhay ethay
e-pickersapplay ested,ray danay omparedcay entsray danay uisesbray. Enthay Ojay danay Eg,may
ithway aay etachmentday ofay ethay iggerbay oys,bay etsay orthfay ethay uppersay onay ethay ass,gray
orfay naay out-of-dooray eatay asway aysalway ethay owningcray oyjay ofay ethay ayday. Ethay andlay
iterallylay owedflay ithway ilkmay danay oneyhay onay uchsay occasions,ay orfay ethay adslay
ereway otnay equiredray otay itsay taay able,tay utbay owedallay otay artakepay ofay efreshmentray
saay eythay iked,--freedomlay eingbay ethay aucesay estbay elovedbay ybay ethay oyishbay oulsay.
Eythay ailedavay emselvesthay ofay ethay areray ivilegepray otay ethay ullestfay extent,ay orfay
omesay iedtray ethay easingplay experimentay ofay inkingdray ilkmay ilewhay andingstay onay
eirthay eads,hay othersay entlay aay armchay otay eap-froglay ybay eatingay iepay inay ethay
ausespay ofay ethay ame,gay ookiescay ereway ownsay oadcastbray overay ethay ield,fay danay
e-turnoversapplay oostedray inay ethay eestray ikelay aay ewnay ylestay ofay irdbay. Ethay
ittlelay irlsgay adhay aay ivatepray ea-party,tay danay Edtay ovedray ongamay ethay ediblesay taay
ishay ownay eetsway illway.

Enwhay onay oneay ouldcay eatay yanay ore,may ethay Ofessorpray oposedpray ethay irstfay egularray
oast,tay ichwhay asway aysalway unkdray taay uchsay imes,--"Aunttay Arch,may Odgay essblay
er!"hay Aay oasttay eartilyhay ivengay ybay ethay oodgay an,may owhay evernay orgotfay owhay uchmay
ehay oweday er,hay danay uietlyqay unkdray ybay ethay oys,bay owhay adhay eenbay aughttay otay
eepkay erhay emorymay eengray.

Ow,"Nay andma'sgray ixtiethsay irthday!bay Onglay ifelay otay er,hay ithway eethray imestay
ee!"thray

Atthay asway ivengay ithway aay ill,way saay youay aymay ellway elieve;bay danay ethay eeringchay
onceay egun,bay itay asway ardhay otay opstay itay. Everybody'say ealthhay asway oposed,pray
omfray Rmay. Aurence,lay owhay asway onsideredcay eirthay ecialspay atron,pay otay ethay
onishedastay uinea-pig,gay owhay adhay ayedstray omfray itsay operpray eresphay inay earchsay
ofay itsay youngay astermay. Emi,day saay ethay oldestay andchild,gray enthay esentedpray ethay
ueenqay ofay ethay ayday ithway ariousvay ifts,gay osay umerousnay atthay eythay ereway
ansportedtray otay ethay estivefay enescay inay aay eelbarrowwhay. Unnyfay esents,pray omesay
ofay em,thay utbay atwhay ouldway avehay eenbay efectsday otay otheray eyesay ereway ornamentsay
otay andma's,--forgray ethay ildren'schay iftsgay ereway lalay eirthay ownay. Everyay itchstay
Aisy'sday atientpay ittlelay ingersfay adhay utpay intoay ethay andkerchiefshay eshay emmedhay
asway etterbay anthay embroideryay otay Smray. Arch;may Emi'sday oe-boxshay asway aay iraclemay
ofay echanicalmay ill,skay oughthay ethay overcay ouldn'tway ut;shay Ob'sray ootstoolfay adhay
aay iggleway inay itsay unevenay egs,lay atthay eshay eclaredday asway eryvay oothing;say danay onay
agepay ofay ethay ostlycay ookbay Y'samay ildchay avegay erhay asway osay airfay saay atthay onay
ichwhay eared,appay inay ipsytay apitals,cay ethay ords,--"Toway earday Andma,gray omfray
erhay ittlelay Eth."bay

Uringday isthay eremonycay ethay oysbay adhay ysteriouslymay isappeared;day ,anday enwhay
Smray. Archmay adhay iedtray otay ankthay erhay ildren,chay danay okenbray own,day ilewhay Eddytay
ipedway erhay eyesay onay ishay inafore,pay ethay Ofessorpray uddenlysay eganbay otay ingsay.
En,thay omfray oveabay im,hay oicevay eraftay oicevay ooktay upay ethay ords,way danay omfray eetray
otay eetray echoeday ethay usicmay ofay ethay unseenay oir,chay saay ethay oysbay ung,say ithway lalay
eirthay earts,hay ethay ittlelay ongsay Ojay adhay itten,wray Aurielay etsay otay usic,may danay
ethay Ofessorpray ainedtray ishay adslay otay ivegay ithway ethay estbay effectay. Isthay asway
omethingsay ogetheraltay ew,nay danay itay ovedpray aay andgray uccess;say orfay Smray. Archmay
ouldn'tcay etgay overay erhay urprise,say danay insisteday onay akingshay andshay ithway everyay
oneay ofay ethay eatherlessfay irds,bay omfray alltay Anzfray danay Emilay otay ethay ittlelay
uadroon,qay owhay adhay ethay eetestsway oicevay ofay lalay.

Eraftay is,thay ethay oysbay ispersedday orfay aay inalfay ark,lay eavinglay Smray. Archmay danay
erhay aughtersday underay ethay estivalfay eetray.

ee."--Pagetray ]583ay

I"ay on'tday inkthay Iay everay oughtay otay allcay yselfmay Unlucky'ay O'jay ain,agay enwhay ymay
eatestgray ishway ashay eenbay osay eautifullybay atified,"gray aidsay Smray. Aer,bhay
akingtay Eddy'stay ittlelay istfay outay ofay ethay ilk-pitcher,may inay ichwhay ehay asway
apturouslyray urningchay.

And"ay yetay youray ifelay isay eryvay ifferentday omfray ethay oneay youay icturedpay osay onglay
oagay. Oday youay ememberray ouray astlescay inay ethay ir?"aay edaskay Y,amay ilingsmay saay eshay
atchedway Aurielay danay Ohnjay ayingplay icketcray ithway ethay oysbay.

Ear"Day ellows!fay Itay oesday ymay earthay oodgay otay eesay emthay orgetfay usiness,bay danay
olicfray orfay aay ay,"day eredansway O,jay owhay ownay okespay inay aay aternalmay ayway ofay lalay
ankindmay. Yes,"ay Iay emember;ray utbay ethay ifelay Iay antedway enthay eemssay elfish,say
onely,lay danay oldcay otay emay ownay. Iay aven'thay ivengay upay ethay opehay atthay Iay aymay itewray
aay oodgay ookbay yet,ay utbay Iay ancay ait,way danay I'may uresay itay illway ebay lalay ethay etterbay
orfay uchsay experiencesay danay illustrationsay saay ese;"thay danay Ojay ointedpay omfray
ethay ivelylay adslay inay ethay istanceday otay erhay ather,fay eaninglay onay ethay
Ofessor'spray ,armay saay eythay alkedway otay danay ofray inay ethay unshine,say eepday inay oneay
ofay ethay onversationscay ichwhay othbay enjoyeday osay uch,may danay enthay otay erhay other,may
ittingsay enthroneday ongamay erhay aughters,day ithway eirthay ildrenchay inay erhay aplay
danay taay erhay eet,fay saay ifay lalay oundfay elphay danay appinesshay inay ethay acefay ichwhay
evernay ouldcay owgray olday otay emthay.

Y"May astlecay asway ethay ostmay earlynay ealizedray ofay lalay. Iay edaskay orfay endidsplay
ings,thay otay ebay ure,say utbay inay ymay earthay Iay ewknay Iay ouldshay ebay atisfied,say ifay Iay
adhay aay ittlelay ome,hay danay Ohn,jay danay omesay earday ildrenchay ikelay esethay. I'veay otgay
emthay ,allay ankthay Od,gay danay maay ethay appiesthay omanway inay ethay orld;"way danay Egmay
aidlay erhay andhay onay erhay alltay oy'sbay ead,hay ithway aay acefay ullfay ofay endertay danay
evoutday ontentcay.

Y"May astlecay isay eryvay ifferentday omfray atwhay Iay anned,play utbay Iay ouldway otnay eraltay
it,ay ough,thay ikelay O,jay Iay on'tday elinquishray lalay ymay isticartay opes,hay oray
onfinecay yselfmay otay elpinghay othersay ulfilfay eirthay eamsdray ofay eautybay. I'veay
egunbay otay odelmay aay igurefay ofay aby,bay danay Aurielay ayssay itay isay ethay estbay ingthay
I'veay everay oneday. Iay inkthay osay yself,may danay eanmay otay oday itay inay arble,may osay at,thay
ateverwhay appens,hay Iay aymay taay eastlay eepkay ethay imageay ofay ymay ittlelay el."angay

Saay Yamay oke,spay aay eatgray eartay oppeddray onay ethay oldengay airhay ofay ethay eepingslay
ildchay inay erhay ;armsay orfay erhay oneay ell-belovedway aughterday asway aay ailfray ittlelay
eaturecray danay ethay eaddray ofay osinglay erhay asway ethay adowshay overay Y'samay unshinesay.
Isthay osscray asway oingday uchmay orfay othbay atherfay danay other,may orfay oneay ovelay danay
orrowsay oundbay emthay oselyclay ogethertay. Y'samay aturenay asway owinggray eeter,sway
eeper,day danay oremay ender;tay Aurielay asway owinggray oremay erious,say ong,stray danay
irm;fay danay othbay ereway earninglay atthay eauty,bay youth,ay oodgay ortune,fay evenay ovelay
itself,ay annotcay eepkay arecay danay ain,pay osslay danay orrow,say omfray ethay ostmay est;blay
or--fay

Into"ay eachay ifelay omesay ainray ustmay all,fay
Omesay aysday ustmay ebay arkday danay adsay danay eary."dray

E"Shay isay owinggray etter,bay Iay maay uresay ofay it,ay ymay earday. On'tday espond,day utbay
opehay danay eepkay appy,"hay aidsay Smray. Arch,may saay ender-heartedtay Aisyday oopedstay
omfray erhay ee,knay otay aylay erhay osyray eekchay ainstagay erhay ittlelay ousin'scay alepay
oneay.

I"ay evernay oughtay o,tay ilewhay Iay avehay youay otay eerchay emay up,ay Armee,may danay Aurielay
otay aketay oremay anthay alfhay ofay everyay urden,"bay epliedray Yamay armlyway. E"Hay evernay
etslay emay eesay ishay iety,anxay utbay isay osay eetsway danay atientpay ithway e,may osay evotedday
otay Eth,bay danay uchsay aay aystay danay omfortcay otay emay ays,alway atthay Iay an'tcay ovelay imhay
enoughay. O,say inay itespay ofay ymay oneay oss,cray Iay ancay aysay ithway Eg,may Ank'Thay Od,gay
I'may aay appyhay oman.'"way

Ere's"Thay onay eednay orfay emay otay aysay it,ay orfay everyay oneay ancay eesay atthay I'may arfay
appierhay anthay Iay eserve,"day edadday O,jay ancingglay omfray erhay oodgay usbandhay otay erhay
ubbychay ildren,chay umblingtay onay ethay assgray esidebay erhay. Itz"Fray isay ettinggay
aygray danay out;stay I'may owinggray saay inthay saay aay adow,shay danay maay irty;thay eway evernay
allshay ebay ich,ray danay Umfieldplay aymay urnbay upay yanay ight,nay orfay atthay
incorrigibleay Ommytay Angsbay Ill__way okesmay eet-fernsway igarscay underay ethay
ed-clothes,bay oughthay e'shay etsay imselfhay ireafay eethray imestay eadyalray. Utbay inay
itespay ofay esethay unromanticay acts,fay Iay avehay othingnay otay omplaincay of,ay danay
evernay asway osay ollyjay inay ymay ifelay. Excuseay ethay emark,ray utbay ivinglay ongamay oys,bay
Iay an'tcay elphay usingay eirthay expressionsay ownay danay en."thay

Yes,"ay O,jay Iay inkthay youray arvesthay illway ebay aay oodgay one,"ay eganbay Smray. Arch,may
ighteningfray ayaway aay igbay ackblay icketcray atthay asway aringstay Eddytay outay ofay
ountenancecay.

Ot"Nay alfhay osay oodgay saay yours,ay othermay. Erehay itay is,ay danay eway evernay ancay ankthay
youay enoughay orfay ethay atientpay owingsay danay eapingray youay avehay one,"day iedcray O,jay
ithway ethay ovinglay impetuosityay ichwhay eshay evernay ouldcay outgroway.

I"ay opehay erethay illway ebay oremay eatwhay danay ewerfay arestay everyay year,"ay aidsay Yamay
oftlysay.

A"ay argelay eaf,shay utbay Iay owknay ere'sthay oomray inay youray earthay orfay it,ay Armeemay
ear,"day edadday Eg'smay endertay oicevay.

Ouchedtay otay ethay eart,hay Smray. Archmay ouldcay onlyay etchstray outay erhay ,armsay saay ifay
otay athergay ildrenchay danay andchildrengray otay erself,hay danay ay,say ithway acefay danay
oicevay ullfay ofay otherlymay ove,lay atitude,gray danay umility,--hay

O,"ay ymay irls,gay oweverhay onglay youay aymay ive,lay Iay evernay ancay ishway youay aay eatergray
appinesshay anthay is!"thay

Illustrateday Editionay

Elcomeway otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Illustrateday Editionay ofay Ittlelay Omenway ybay
Ouisalay Aymay Ott,alcay ublishedpay ybay Ittle,lay Own,bray danay Ompanycay. Omesay
ersionsvay ofay ethay ook,bay uchsay saay isthay one,ay useay ethay ullfay itletay ofay ethay ookbay
omfray ethay itletay age,pay Ittle_Lay Omen;way Oray Eg,may O,jay Eth,bay danay Y_amay.

Eway useday ethay ersionvay ofay ethay ookbay omfray Ittle,lay Own,bray danay Ompany:cay
opyrightcay ,1896ay orfay isthay anscriptiontray. Aay annedscay opycay ofay isthay ookbay isay
ailableavay oughthray ethay internetay ive,archay ourtesycay ofay ethay Ewnay Yorkay Ublicpay
Ibrarylay.

Aay opycay ofay ethay irstfay ersionvay ofay ethay ovel,nay ublishedpay inay ,1869ay asway
onsultedcay orfay emendations,ay ethay operpray enderingray ofay ordsway yphenatedhay danay
itsplay etweenbay otway ineslay orfay acing,spay danay otheray issuesay inay anscribingtray
ethay ovelnay. Eway earay otnay yingtray otay angechay isthay ersionvay ofay ethay ovelnay ackbay otay
ethay 9186ay ovel,nay utbay orrectcay ethay errorsay atthay ereway ademay inay e-transcribingray
danay updatingay ethay exttay.

Assagespay inay italicsay ereway indicateday ybay Underscores__ay.

Assagespay inay oldbay ereway indicateday ybay Equal=ay igns=say.

Allsmay apscay ereway eplacedray ithway LaLay APScay.

Oughoutthray ethay ialogues,day erethay ereway ordsway useday otay imicmay entsaccay ofay
ethay eakersspay. Osethay ordsway ereway etainedray isas-ay.

Errorsay inay unctuationspay danay yphenationhay ereway otnay orrectedcay unlessay
otherwiseay otednay elowbay.

Aay otenay outabay acingspay ofay illustrations:ay Ifay erethay earay ourfay ineslay oveabay ethay
illustration,ay enthay ethay illustrationay asway taay ethay optay ofay aay ewnay apterchay. Ifay
erethay earay ourfay ineslay elowbay ethay illustration,ay enthay ethay illustrationay asway
taay ethay enday ofay aay apterchay. Ifay erethay isay otway ineslay etweenbay aay apterchay eadinghay
danay ethay illustration,ay enthay ethay illustrationay asway naay inlineay illustrationay
Usually(ay aay op-capdray illustration)ay.

eginningbay ofay Apterchay Oneay.

uinny-dingles"qay inay ethay 9186ay ovelnay. Eesay agepay 95ay ofay ethay 9186ay ovelnay. Eway

emorablemay ordway atthay osethay intimateay ithway ethay ovelnay aymay oticenay ethay angechay.

Onay agepay ,353ay angechay owbanksnay otay ow-banksnay. Eesay agepay 97ay ofay ethay 9186ay
ovelnay.

ethay atch"lay. Eesay agepay 19ay ofay ethay 9186ay ookbay.

eshay ouldway avehay onegay up"ay. Eesay agepay 910ay ofay ethay 9186ay ookbay.

ethay 9186ay ookbay.

ontaincay Efects,ââDay uchsay ,asay utbay otnay imitedlay o,tay incomplete,ay inaccurateay
